description.hltext_display: 陳雲林話別 願盡力協商投保
description.content:
大陸海峽兩岸關係協會會長陳雲林今天在話別時表示，兩會商談還有很多重要課題，在前進的道路上，還會有一些困難和阻礙，但任何阻礙改變不了兩岸和平發展的大趨勢。
陳雲林說，這次商談簽署了兩岸醫藥衛生合作協議，並為另一個重要協議（兩岸投資保障協議）進行階段性總結，達成共識，雙方將盡最大努力，在不久的將來完成協商。
財團法人海峽交流基金會原訂上午11時50分在台北圓山飯店舉行話別談話會，但因班機時間延後，因此談話會延至12時30分舉行。
海基會董事長江丙坤表示，這次兩會簽署的「海峽兩岸醫藥衛生合作協議」，是從人道關懷出發，以兩岸人民的健康福祉為依歸。
他說，今年透過兩岸交流，有超過600萬人次往來兩岸從事觀光、商務等活動，透過疫病的通報、緊急救護制度的建立，對兩岸人民的生命安全提供進一步保障。同時，也有機會透過兩岸合作，優勢互補，在醫藥衛生方面發展新商機，共創雙贏。
江丙坤表示，明年在兩會繼續推動協商交流下，繼續完成未完的許多協議，也將推動兩岸民間交流，希望透過這些交流和協商，讓兩岸民眾共享成果。
他說，海基會將在兩會建構的平台上，繼續推動平等協商，循序漸進，擱置爭議、追求雙贏。
陳雲林表示，第6次兩會商談，我們是帶著希望和期待而來，帶著成果而歸，為能夠讓兩岸和平發展寫下新的歷史而感到高興，為讓兩岸民眾身體健康、生命安全做出努力，感到無限欣慰。
他說，兩會商談未來還有許多重要課題，在前進的道路上，還會有一些困難和阻礙，但任何阻礙只能夠阻止進程的時間，永遠改變不了兩岸和平發展的大趨勢。
陳雲林對圓山飯店的熱情接待，以及負責維安的員警表達感激之意。他說，這次到台北的情況與上次有很大不同，員警的敬業精神，給他留下深刻的印象。 陳雲林表示，兩會簽署的15項協議和達成兩項共識，得到相當多台灣人民的理解和支持。未來將不辜負兩岸人民期待，繼續為兩岸人民謀福祉。
海基會副董事長高孔廉、副秘書長馬紹章，大陸海協會常務副會長鄭立中、執行副會長兼秘書長李亞飛、駐會副會長李炳才、副秘書長張勝林等出席談話會。
陳雲林離開飯店前，現場響起陣陣掌聲，飯店人員熱情歡送，高喊「再見！歡迎再來！」。
海峽交流基金會和大陸海峽兩岸關係協會的制度性協商，由海基會董事長江丙坤和海協會會長陳雲林主談，通稱「江陳會」。991222

description.hltext_display: (駄)なんでもいいからつぶやくトピ - どうしたら・・・・
上海投资客转战商铺 成交一周增五成
description.content: 除了豪宅市场的火爆,在上海和温州等地,商铺也受到投资者的热捧,由于商铺并没有在各地限购、限贷的调控措施之下,所以,投资客开始把资金投向了上海、温州等地的商铺。 胡先生来上海做生意已经7、8年了,经过几年的苦心经营,公司积累了一些资金,除了继续扩大生产外,前几年,他还把部分富裕的资金投入到房地产市场中。不过,今年他又瞄上了商铺。胡先生:因为最近国家调控 房产调控有好多限购令啊 像征房产税 考虑到这些因素 就犹住宅转投到商业房产中 商铺 记者在调查中发现,像胡先生这样转战商铺的投资客还有很多,他们的投资行为直接催火了商铺的行情。在上海朱家角的一处商业楼盘,销售人员告诉记者,自从7月份开盘以后,他们的销售一直很火爆,特别是近两个月,几乎所有的商铺都卖完了,剩下的也已经有客户预定。上海房产交易中心的数据也显示,12月6号到12月12号一周,上海商业物业成交面积是50321平方米,比前一周的34518平方米大幅上涨了46%。 温州民资组团掘金杭州临街商铺 除了上海,北京等一线城市商铺投资火爆,杭州、武汉等地也相继出现了民间资本组团掘金临街商铺的现象。在杭州开房产中介公司的王先生告诉记者,他的客户几乎全是在杭州投资房产的温州人。4月17日新政以前,90%客户都是冲着住宅来的,可新政过后,从今年6月起,温州人越来越多地涌向了商铺投资,他自己也组织了十几位之前投资住宅的温州老乡组团买下了杭州一新楼盘近70%的商铺。杭州美地房地产代理有限公司总经理 王成郊: 我们把去年投资住宅的一部分出手掉转投商铺,4月底我们就开始买这一条商铺。反正这一排70%都是我们温州人买的。 杭州统计局最新数据显示,今年1-11月,杭州市商品房销售回落态势明显,全市商品房累计销售面积815.22万平方米,同比下降35.2%,其中住宅销售667.97万平方米,同比下降41.3%;而办公楼和商业营业用房销售面积却呈现出继续增长的态势,增速分别为26.0%和23.7%。

description.hltext_display: Christmas Candle Holder
description.content: In the past people do not well aware of all the items which are used on the Christmas day for the decoration. The Christmas candle holder is not only for the Christmas as it was also used in other occasions just for the decoration. The Christmas is the event which was celebrated by the Christian on 25th December and Christians decorate their houses with different flowers as they made Christmas tree with the flower and lights. The Christmas candle holder is used for making in the Christmas tree candles are attached to it and lighten up with the fire so it seems a charm to the house on the Christmas day.Tips to make Christmas candle holderThe Christmas candle holder is also made by the people at home by using different material. The Christmas tree contains many pictures glitters colors mostly these Christmas candle holder is made y the kids as they love to decorate their houses at Christmas and this was one of the best time pass for the kids to decorate their house on 25th December. These Christmas candle holder is of wooden or metal material because the other plastic material gets melted along with the wax.Procedure to make Christmas candle holderIt is so simple to make the Christmas candle holder at home because they are so simple but beautiful. You need to have a pencil and ruler with you by using them you can make margin along with Christmas candle holder and mark the point that how should long the holder would be and then make a metal bowl and put the wax into it before it gets freeze place the thread on the candle these candles are for life as they did nit get wasted because their wax was wasted in the candle holder so that it automatically renew itself. Well I want to tell you that it was quite easy to make the Christmas candle holder at your home.Expenses involved in making of Christmas candle holderAfter reading the article you must be thinking that it was much expensive to make the Christmas candle holder as it was according to the stylish candle you want to make as if you want to paint the candle of different color so you have to spend money on the color paints more over if you want o apply the glitter it also cost moreChristmas Candle Holder

description.hltext_display: 新规出台两天 北京63亿元新地王“献礼”
description.content:
国土部"防止出现高价地"的新规刚刚落地，北京市场便迅速以诞生一个"地王"作为"回应"。 12月21日，在经历了近半个月的等待后，中信集团拿到北京CBD核心区Z15地块的中标通知书，从而以63亿元的总价再创北京土地市场的新高。这一消息已得到了中信方面的确认。同日，恒大地产以149%的溢价率拿下广东佛山一宗地块。 就在两天前（12月19日），国土部出台落实调控政策的"204号文"，规定如有"地王"和溢价率超过50%的地块诞生，必须在两日内上报异常情况。而从价格上看，上述两宗地块均符合上报条件。有分析认为，"地王"和高价地频频在年底诞生，说明全国土地市场仍处在供需两旺的状态，若此时政府直接干预地价，很可能造成其后市场的强烈反弹。 等待半月中信得尝胜果 不出所料，CBD核心区最大的地块Z15最终花落中信。《每日经济新闻》记者从中信方面获悉，21日下午，中信集团已经拿到Z15地块的中标通知书，而63亿元的成交价格也创下北京土地市场的新高。 本月7日，位于北京CBD核心区的6宗地块进行第二轮投报（综合内容投报），在Z15地块的投报中，中信报出63亿元价格，力压竞争者海航集团和万达地产，成为当日单幅地块最高报价。 据了解，在第一阶段（规划设计方案投报）的评标中，中信就拿到5个地块的规划设计方案冠军，其中就包括Z15。算上价格因素，中信的优势十分明显。 Z15地块规划建筑面积为35万平方米，是CBD核心区最大的单体地块。依成交总价计算，该地块成交的楼面价约为1.8万元/平方米。按500米的规划建筑高度，建成后将成北京最高楼。 根据招标文件的要求，Z15地块鼓励的产业类型是"综合体"，且中标人须对项目持有、经营10年以上。有分析人士认为，这一项目可能建成中信集团的总部。 但对于该项目的建设及持有等相关信息，中信方面未作出任何表态。 另据《每日经济新闻》记者了解，Z14地块得主也于21日出炉，包括正大集团、上海世贸、华康资本、卜蜂国际、东莞玖龙纸业在内的11家企业联合体成为中标者，成交价为41.14亿元，这也是该地块收到的唯一报价。而同日竞标的Z3、Z4、Z5、Z6地块（原"中服地块"）的中标结果并未公布。 新政难遏"地王"出炉 中信独揽"地王"的消息，与国土部出台"204号文"的时间仅仅相隔两天。 19日晚，国土部出台继续落实调控政策的"204号文"，规定如有"地王"和溢价率超过50%的地块诞生，必须在两日之内上报异常情况，包括当月本地房价同比、环比涨幅，地块周边新房和二手房价格等信息。文件还强调，要严格把握居住用地出让的总量、结构和时序，坚决防范受多种因素驱动的岁末年初放量供地。 按照上述要求，中信获得的Z15地块以及恒大拿下的佛山地块分别符合"地王"和"溢价率超过50%"的新规要求。但有分析人士认为，由于北京CBD地块的交易规则在新政出台之前就已确定，因此可能不会上报，佛山地块则可能成为首宗上报异常情况的土地。 事实上，临近年末，土地市场供需两旺的态势仍十分明显，"高价地"仍频繁出现。据中原地产的监测数据，上周北京、广州等7城市共成交住宅用地174公顷，平均溢价率为65%，其中广州的溢价率超过140%。 随着两轮调控政策的展开，今年以来，国土部也连续3次发文试图抑制地价上涨，其调控手段也从完善招拍挂制度发展到对地价进行监控和"地王"的上报制度。 但这样的干预效果未必见好。来自北京庄凌顾问的分析认为，在通胀预期日益强化的背景下，公众对调控正在失去信心，房价或继续上涨。如果政府直接出面抑制地价，很可能导致土地市场的反弹。 业内观察63亿打造"平民地王"？ 每经记者叶书利发自北京 12月21日，北京市土地整理储备中心公布了北京CBD12幅地块中两幅地块的成交情况：由正大置地、正大集团、卜蜂国际等11家企业组成的联合体以41.14亿元拿下Z14地块，而中信集团则以63亿元如愿摘得Z15地块。63亿元的总价打破了北京土地市场59亿元的总价地王纪录。 链家地产首席分析师张月认为，作为北京CBD核心区地块，Z15地块基础身价无论如何都低不下去，再加上其高达35万平方米的规划建筑面积，成为总价地王应当在意料之中。另一方面，除去总价外，该地块的楼面价只有18000元/平方米，与北京历史单价地王纪录保持者后沙峪天竺开发区22号地29859元/平方米相比，相差约40%。眼下，Z15地块周边商业地产均价每平方米在3.5万元~5万元之间，如世茂工三写字楼目前的售价已经超过5万元/平方米，该地块周边的住宅均价目前也在4万元/平方米以上。基于此，她认为，Z15地块虽然成为了总价地王，但以单价看仍是一个"平民地王"。 北京中原地产三级市场研究部总监张大伟也赞同上述观点。他解释说，纵向比较，从国内同级别地块分析，CBD核心区地块单价水平并非最高。如上海今年2月成交的黄浦区外滩商业办公地块和南京东路商业用地，中标楼面地价分别约为3.4万元/平方米和5.2万元/平方米，均高于北京CBD地块，最高总价更是达到了92.2亿。 CBD地块成交信息的公布，也意味着2010年北京土地出让金额将继续攀升。21日，北京又有7块地顺利成交，截至当日，北京2010年全年土地出让金收入已达1306亿元，与2009年的930亿元相比，增长40%。如果CBD剩余地块也按最高价并且在年内成交，预计北京今年土地出让金总额可能达到1500亿元。 张月分析说，前11月北京土地出让金首破千亿之后，至今20天再次出卖300亿元，收入增长十分迅速。但是预计今年北京即使达到1500亿元的规模，也很难超过上海，因为前11月上海的土地出让金收入已经超过1300亿元。 张月认为，北京今年土地出让金收入创纪录，但市场应该理性对待这一现象。目前调控持续时间尚不足1年，由于土地市场仍处于调整起步阶段，土地价格仍有回调空间，另外今年土地成交量比去年高出约32%，供应的明显增加也是土地收入增长的主要原因。而在明年，调控不断深入到土地市场，各地方政府在宏观调控支持下对于土地收入的依赖程度有望缓解，地价继续平抑将是整体趋势。(每日经济新闻 张敏)
相关文章：
上一篇文章： 上海投资客转战商铺 成交一周增五成

description.hltext_display: Christmas Shopping with Kids
description.content: Did you read the title of this article correctly? You might want to go back and double check to make sure you understand what this article is going to be about. The most significant word in this title is the word with. Had we used the word for in the title instead this would be a completely different article but the use of the word with indicates this article will be about shopping while your children accompany you to the stores which is a totally different subject. An article on shopping for children would cover subjects such as buying age appropriate toys and choosing toys which will meet the parent's approval. This article, however, will focus on how to have a successful shopping trip with children in tow. While it is certainly true that shopping with kids can be difficult at times, it is also possible to have an effective, efficient and fun shopping expedition with children. It does take a little advanced planning and cooperation on the children's' behalf but it can be done. This article will cover a few of the basic tips for having a successful Christmas shopping trip with kids. Some of these tips include ensuring the children are well rested, taking frequent breaks, incorporating activities appropriate for children into the adventure and being prepared for any situation. Depending on the age of the children, it might be critical to ensure the children are well rested at the start of the shopping trip and that the trip does not last so long that the child will be tired out before the end of the trip. This is very important especially in the case of young children who still take daily naps. If you plan on Christmas shopping with a child who still takes daily naps, it might be worthwhile to plan your shopping trip after the child's nap. This will ensure the child has had sufficient rest and will not run out of energy or become cranky during the shopping trip as a result of exhaustion. It might be possible to plan a shopping trip for the time before a child's nap if the child takes an afternoon late in the day but in this case care should be taken to end the Christmas shopping trip well before the regularly schedule nap time. It is also important to take frequent breaks when Christmas shopping with a child. This is important because children categorically have short attention spans and are not likely to be able to be able to shop for hours on end without short diversions. A few examples of breaks which may be appropriate may include stopping for a small snack, taking a lunch break or visiting a play area in the mall or shopping center. Each of these breaks will give the child an opportunity to enjoy a break from the monotony of shopping and will also help to distract the child if they become frustrated with the shopping. Christmas shopping with children can also be made easier by incorporating activities appropriate for children into the schedule of the shopping trip. This may include visiting stores which may be of interest to the child. For example a trip to a toy store or a store which offers the opportunity to test out gadgets might be interesting for a child. It might even be worthwhile to promise the child a small toy as a reward for cooperating during the trip. This would be most effective if you schedule this trip for late in the shopping trip. This will help to ensure the child behaves for the majority of the trip. It will also help to make the remainder of the trip easier because the child will be interested in his new toy and too distracted to complain about visiting more stores. Finally, it is important to be prepared for a variety of situations when Christmas shopping with kids. If your children are not yet potty trained, be sure to bring a supply of diapers and a change of clothes. Bringing along small toys and snacks is also helpful. The toys can be used to distract the child while standing in lines. Snacks will be helpful if the child complains of hunger or as a distraction if the child starts to become bored with the shopping trip.

description.hltext_display: 聯電投資美智慧電網大廠
description.content:
聯華電子公司透過旗下的聯電創投公司投資美國的智慧電網公司Trilliant Inc. 。總部位於加州的Trilliant昨天在公司網站上發布這項聲明。
聯電的投資人關係經理于恆祥拒絕對此事置評。Trilliant的聲明並未透露投資金額。（譯者：中央社楊盈）991222

description.hltext_display: Hidden costs revealed in Hawks deal (ABC)
description.content:
It has been revealed the Tasmanian Government's new five year deal with the Hawthorn Football Club could cost taxpayers more than the publicised price tag.
The ABC has obtained a copy of the agreement to pay the Hawks $18million to play four AFL games a season in Launceston and for Tasmania to be the club's major sponsor.The 21 page document includes clauses that could bump up the price of the deal.
Hawthorn will get an extra unspecified amount from the state government if only one of its four games in Launceston is against one of the clubs based outside of Victoria; Adelaide, West Coast, Fremantle, Port Adelaide, the Gold Coast and Western Sydney.
If the Hawks get to play Collingwood, Carlton or Essendon at York Park in the next five years the government will also pay extra.
Like 2008, a premiership would earn Hawthorn a $300,000 bonus.

description.hltext_display: Swiss Myriad’s board member steps down
description.content: - Swiss mobile phone software developer Myriad (SWF:MYRN) said yesterday that Jean Schmitt had resigned from its board of directors with immediate effect. Schmitt has been a member of the board since 2002 and represented the interests of French Sofinnova Partners SA and its funds -- one of Myriad’s large capital venture investors. He decided to step down from the board as Sofinnova reduced its holdings in Myriad to under 10% on December 18, 2010, the firm added.

description.hltext_display: 国土部会议：房地产不应成为重要“经济支柱”产业
description.content: 导读： 国土部会议：房地产不应成为重要经济支柱产业 圈定105城国土部监测"异常"地价 国土部约谈县长很为难 国土部会议：房地产不应成为重要经济支柱产业 "房地产业是重要的基础产业，而不应成为重要的经济支柱产业。"国土资源部副部长小苏的一席话，再度引发业界对房地产业定位的猜测。无论此番争论结果如何，可以肯定的是，针对房地产的调控仍在向纵深挺进。 记者21日从接近国土部的人士处获悉，目前国土部已经对没有完成供地计划和闲置土地清查工作的省市列了一份名单，据此将进一步处理。土地调控风暴蓄势的背后，土地供应也悄然"转轨"：将优先保障房用地供应，特别是要确保明年1000万套保障性安居工程建设所需用地的供应。 继续狠抓调控不放松 有关房地产业应该是"支柱产业"还是"非支柱产业"的定位，一直纷争不断，而此次国土部高层的表态，可谓意味深长。 在20日召开的加强房地产用地管理和调控视频会议上，?小苏指出："当前及今后一段时期内，解决好房地产问题的难度依然很大，调控任务还将十分艰巨。"各级国土资源主管部门要坚决按照中央关于房地产市场调控的部署和要求，继续狠抓调控政策落实不放松，认真分析研判形势，提高敏锐性，密切关注土地市场中的苗头性和倾向性问题，细化调控措施。 ?小苏称，要坚定贯彻落实中央调控政策的信心和主动性。"要正确认识和解决好住房为主的房地产业的定位。住房为主的房地产业，必须建立完善市场配置资源和供应住房为主与政府保障调控相结合的机制；住房为主的房地产业是城市重要的基础产业，而不应成为重要的经济支柱产业。要坚持主动积极服务，努力做好各项工作。" 就在此前一天，国土部下发了《关于严格落实房地产用地调控政策促进土地市场健康发展有关问题》的通知，率先拉开了新一轮土地调控风暴。 定时间表列"黑名单" 种种迹象表示，本轮土地调控风暴将以闲置土地清理查处"升级"为标志。对此，?小苏表示，要"加快闲置土地清理查处，坚决打击违法违规用地行为。" 记者也从接近国土部的人士处获悉，国土部已经对没有完成供地计划和闲置土地清查工作的省市列了一份名单，并据此进一步处理。业内人士认为，"土地财政"痼疾或将有所缓解。 值得注意的是，就在昨日，国土部召开一个仅有几家主流媒体参加的小型新闻通气会，对于闲置用地整治做出部署，并列出时间表。 据悉，对因为政府原因闲置土地，要求省级国土资源主管部门在明年1月中旬之前将尚未完成整改处置的事件和具体的地块信息、闲置原因向社会公示，而国土部也会公示一批因为企业原因造成的闲置用地的情况。 据统计，截至2009年底，因为企业原因造成的闲置用地有200多宗，面积达1000多公顷，因政府原因带来的闲置用地500多宗地，一共是2000多公顷。 上周四，国土部已经约谈市级地方政府12名主要负责人，就土地违法问题进行通报，同时要求被约谈地方政府积极整改。现在看来，这或许仅仅是一个开始。(.上.证 .于.祥.明)

description.hltext_display: Toreador Resources Up 5.21% Since Stifel Nicolaus Downgraded One-Week Ago (TRGL)
description.content:
One week ago, Toreador Resources (NASDAQ:TRGL) was downgraded to Hold from Buy at Stifel Nicolaus. The stock closed yesterday at $15.74 which is 5.21% higher than the price one-week ago of $14.96.
Based on a current price of $15.74, Toreador Resources is currently 36.5% above its average consensus analyst price target of $10.00.
Toreador Resources is currently above its 50-day moving average of $14.77 and above its 200-day moving average of $9.64.
SmarTrend currently has shares of Toreador Resources in an Uptrend and issued the Uptrend alert on July 28, 2010 at $6.87. The stock has risen 120.7% since the Uptrend alert was issued.
Keywords: toreador resources analyst ratings

description.hltext_display: SUENO Beds & Mattresses
description.content: Sueno is a leading online distributor of bedroom furniture in the UK & Ireland. They offer a wide range of high-quality divan beds, bed frames, mattresses, bed headboards, beside tables, bedroom wardrobes, chest drawers & blanket boxes. Their furniture products have been carefully selected to meet quality, reliability, design & value-for-money standards. If you have any bedroom furnishing requirements, Sueno would be an online brand worth exploring. All online purchases are supported by experienced industry knowledge, friendly approachable customer services & white glove delivery services ensuring complete satisfaction throughout your purchasing cycle.Sueno have an established supply relationship with industry manufacturers & wholesalers like Highgate Beds allowing the online retailer the consumer advantage of offering great household divan bed & mattress labels such as Healthopaedic, Restoflex, Sleepmode & Sleeping Comfort at highly competitive prices. Every Healthopaedic divan bed, every Sleeping Comfort mattress is delivered with the quality as you would traditionally expect from these brands but not at usual prices. Moreover, your purchase is delivered to your door and even installed upon your request with packaging removed so that no effort or planning is required from you at all. Apart from dressing the bed that is!Sueno are not only specialists in online divan beds and mattress provision, they also offer quality, luxury bedroom furniture that can turn any bedroom space into a contemporary, designer or even regal sanctuary and not at the cost synonymous with these ideals. A quick browse of their Zocalo Furniture & Frank Hudson ranges illustrates this profoundly. So if you are a budding interior designer keen for inspiration ideas or someone who knows exactly what they are setting out to achieve, I would suggest having a look at their Tilly Bed one exceptional piece exclusive to the online brand. There will be something there that takes your fancy.What does Sueno mean? Well, the term means ‘to dream' and it I guess it's appropriate to say that this is their fundamental business message to the online community in more ways than one. A message enhanced literally by the fabulous products and sales service they offer. TestimonialsAs a parting message, I was interested to understand what customers truly thought of Sueno. Here are some customers who took the time to respond positively to the Sueno experience:"Thank you so much for such a friendly service, a personal phone call to confirm an order was great-its something you just don't get elsewhere-and the text & call on delivery date was great saving me waiting in all day, the Destiny 1000 mattress is fantastic-best nights sleep in ages!! and your price was the best online by far-:0) superfast delivery-thanks a million-sweet dreams zzzzzzzzzzzz…"- Ms. Greenbank, Kent. "The bed arrived it was really well packaged to avoid any damage which was brilliant. The mattress is excellent quality and really comfortable I found yourself very helpful and you promptly returned my calls regarding the shipping quote great service all round."- Mrs Malone, Ireland."I bought two mattresses: Great communication, V Fast shipping, Great product!!"- Amy, CambridgeContact DetailsIf you are interested in learning more about Sueno or have any bedroom furnishing requirements here are ways to get in touch:Website: www.sueno.co.ukTel.: +44 (0) 1924 456 330

description.hltext_display: 中信集团63亿夺京CBD地块 或建北京第一高楼
description.content:
备受业内外关注的北京中服地块招标终于尘埃落定。12月21日，中信集团如愿取得"标王"Z15地块，该地块是此次出让的CBD六地块中规划建筑面积最大的一幅，高达35万平方米。 依据招标文件的要求，该地块上将建成未来"北京第一高楼"，建筑高度有望达到500米，而目前北京最高建筑国贸三期的高度为330米。按照目前的设计方案，这一建筑地下4层、地上118层，容纳办公、公寓、酒店三大功能。 据分析，中信集团最终以63亿元拿得该地块，折合楼面价为18000元/平方米，可谓地价理性回归。而此次同时出让的其余5幅地块的最终出让价格也大体类似，均在20000元/平方米左右。对比之下，CBD核心区住宅均价已达40000-50000元/平方米，部分在售楼盘价格高达80000元/平方米。 "这次中服地块与其说是招标地产商，不如说是招标具备金融实力和商业地产运营能力的房地产开发运营企业。"世邦魏理仕中国区总经理金勇表示，此次中服地块出让可能代表今后土地出让的一种新趋势。
相关文章：
上一篇文章： 国土部会议：房地产不应成为重要“经济支柱”产业
下一篇文章： 住建部：十二五将加强地产市场调控

description.hltext_display: 飆仔圍毆3警 宜縣府：不寬容
description.content:
宜蘭傳出執勤員警遭11名飆車族圍毆，造成2名警察輕傷、1名替代役男重傷。宜蘭縣副縣長吳澤成今天說，宜蘭治安不容歹徒挑釁，日後警方取締工作也不因此手軟。
宜蘭警方前天深夜穿便服在市區取締飆車時，因有1名青少年不滿騎車未戴安全帽遭拍照蒐證，隨後呼叫10名友人拿棍棒毆傷宜蘭縣警察局交通隊分隊長李啟南、鄭姓員警及1名陳姓替代役男。
其中，陳姓替代役男被打成重傷，仍在陽明大學附設宜蘭醫院住院觀察。警方已逮捕到其中6名飆車族成員，還有5名在逃。
吳澤成上午前往醫院探視陳姓替代役男時表示，縣府與宜蘭縣警察局對於這起飆車族圍毆值勤員警的事件絕不寬容，也不容歹徒挑釁警方的公權力。
他除了要求警方全力緝捕5名在逃的飆車族成員之外，日後警方取締工作也不因此手軟。另外，陳姓替代役男因公受傷，警察局應給予獎勵。
媒體詢問陳姓替代役男日後執勤會不會有恐懼感時，陳姓替代役男默默點頭，表示還是心有餘悸。991222

description.hltext_display: L'ultima beffa della Maddalena Addio al sogno dell'hotel del G8
description.content:
Addio al sogno dell'hotel del G8
Licenziati i dipendenti, la Mita pronta a ridare le chiavi alla Regione.La struttura era stata data in gestione per 40 anni al gruppo Marcegaglia. I lavori furono affidati da Bertolaso al cognato Francesco Piermarini dal nostro inviato PAOLO BERIZZI
LA SUITE di Obama, adesso, più che una leggenda rischia di passare alla storia come il simbolo di una grande incompiuta. Alla Maddalena sull'ex Arsenale, l'unica struttura costruita per il G8 tenuta in vita, potrebbe calare presto il sipario. Colpa dei ritardi del governo e della Regione.
Per la bonifica di questo spicchio di mare antistante l'hotel del G8 - dato in gestione dalla Regione per 40 anni alla Mita Resort del gruppo Marcegaglia, canone da 60 mila euro l'anno più 30 milioni post-bonifica - Guido Bertolaso, l'ex capo della Protezione civile, ha speso 72 milioni di soldi pubblici. I lavori sono stati affidati al cognato Francesco Piermarini: ma la pulizia della discarica marina - in perfetto stile Cricca - non è mai stata completata. E così in porto le barche non possono navigare. Come un campo da calcio dove è impossibile tirare calci al pallone. Non pervenuti nemmeno i permessi per l'hotel che doveva ospitare i capi di Stato: primo fra tutti l'abitabilità. Mita le aspettava già questa estate le carte, ma la Regione Sardegna - proprietario di questo sito di 150mila metri quadrati dove un tempo sorgeva l'Arsenale militare - non ha ancora effettuato nemmeno la perimetrazione dell'area. E' questo il quadro di Porto Arsenale, la struttura sorta dalle ceneri dello scandalo del G8 (un affare costato 500milioni di euro, 327 per le opere alla Maddalena, il resto per l'Aquila) che nei piani del gruppo Marcegaglia doveva diventare il porto turistico più importante del Mediterraneo.
Ora potrebbe trasformarsi nell'ultima beffa della Maddalena.
Il 31 dicembre i lavoratori ancora sotto contratto con la Mita Resort - una dozzina tra guardiani e marinai - se ne andranno a casa. Gli altri essendo stagionali se ne erano già andati a settembre. L'unica azienda maddalenina che ancora lavora nell'ex Arsenale è la Roland Garden, che cura il verde. Che sia solo la prassi invernale per un porto collegato a una megastruttura turistica? Secondo il capitolato d'appalto, Mita - che ha ottenuto la concessione dell'ex Arsenale a un prezzo certamente vantaggioso - avrebbe dovuto presentare al Comune un piano industriale a garanzia che il suo business sarebbe stato per l'isola anche un'occasione di rilancio - e di indennizzo. Il piano non si è ancora visto. Secondo quanto filtra da fonti vicine alla società - che ufficialmente non dichiara nulla -, prima di fare nuovi passi ( la sola manutenzione della struttura costa 2 milioni di euro l'anno) il gruppo Marcegaglia vuole vederci chiaro. Che significa capire alcune cose: primo, se le acque dell'Arsenale continueranno - nonostante il piano della Protezione civile - a essere infestate da idrocarburi e quindi non navigabili. Secondo, se la Regione manterrà fede - finora non lo ha fatto - agli impegni presi. In pratica: non essendo nelle condizioni di poter sviluppare il proprio progetto Mita potrebbe valutare l'ipotesi di rivedere il suo impegno nell'affare di Porto Arsenale. I magazzini sono pieni di materiale ancora incellofanato: banchine galleggianti, divise del personale, attrezzature subacquee, gommoni, macchine elettriche. Tutto con il logo "Porto Arsenale". Se sono inutilizzati non è certo per colpa di Mita. La società della Marcegaglia risulta danneggiata dalla celerità elefantiaca della Regione e dagli effetti imprevisti retaggio della scriteriata azione della Protezione civile (Bertolaso&Co) sull'isola. "Siamo di fronte a un paradosso - tuona il sindaco Pd Angelo Còmiti - c'è una società che deve fare i suoi investimenti - che servono come il pane a questa città - ma non viene messa nelle condizioni per farlo. Governo e Regione ci hanno abbandonato al nostro destino".
Dietro la nebulosa senza fine che avvolge tutto quello che è passato sotto le grinfie della Cricca Balducci-De Santis-Della Giovampaola-Anemome, aleggia un nuovo spettro: e cioè che Mita di qui a poco decida di riconsegnare le chiavi dell'ex Arsenale alla Regione. "Cappellacci (governatore sardo, ndr) se ne sta lavando le mani", tuona il consigliere comunale Mauro Bittu. Nell'arcipelago degli scandali e delle beffe c'è rabbia. Altro che riconversione: molto di quello che è stato costruito per il G8 langue e appassisce. L'hotel a 5 stelle sorto nell'ex ospedale militare dista un centinaio di metri dall'Arsenale: è costato 75 milioni, 742 mila euro a stanza (sono 101). A febbraio 2010 - dopo un'inchiesta di Repubblica - Bertolaso promise che sarebbe stato fatto un nuovo bando di gara per l'assegnazione. Che c'erano contatti avviati con due società. Zero. Il bestione è ancora lì, con le erbacce intorno, una cattedrale sul mare e nessuno la vuole. E ancora: più nulla si sa del Water Front, il porto turistico cittadino i cui lavori dovevano partire a ottobre. Doveva essere un'opera collegata al G8 anche quella: ma dopo gli scandali sulla corruzione, gli arresti, i costi fuori controllo, è scivolata "a data da destinarsi" sorride amaro Còmiti. Le spese? Dieci milioni di fondi Fas, altri cinque provenienti dalle casse della Regione: ma è ancora tutto fermo. Roberto La Monica fa il pubblicitario. Con una mostra fotografica aveva già lanciato l'allarme sull'"isola usa e getta". Ora ha proposto all'amministrazione una campagna di rilancio intitolata "Maddalena c'è". Forse bisognerebbe aggiungerci un punto interrogativo.

description.hltext_display: Sweden Nov Producer Prices Rise More Than Expected
description.content:
(RTTNews) - Swedish producer prices increased 2.2% in November from the previous year, Statistics Sweden reported Wednesday. The latest growth rate was larger than the expected 1.7% increase, but slightly below last month's 2.3% rise.
From October to November, producer prices moved up 0.8% in total and by 0.7% on the domestic market. Economists had expected only 0.3% increase for November. Both export and import prices increased by 1% on average.
Increased prices on the domestic market were mostly due to higher prices for electricity, which contributed to the total by 0.3 percentage points, data showed.
For comments and feedback: contact editorial@rttnews.com

description.hltext_display: What Is A Unique Bridesmaid Gift to Give?
description.content: Are you tired of receiving the typical ceramics, photo frames and table display as wedding souvenirs? Now it is your moment to marry and hopefully you might want to divert from the common wedding mementos all wed couples do and decide to have a more unique bridesmaid gift perhaps? Here are quite a few tips you can sample.Personalized Items. What could be more unique than to personalize your presents? You can e-mail a salesperson that's compliant with a personalized sale. Generally, what you can do is to consider an object that are functional for your bridesmaid and after that add a special touch like you and your husband's initials or a defined etching of your wedding song on the object or produce.Jewelries. Women like all that sparkles. Period. You can decide on a ring, a bangle, or a locket jewelry that has a definite engraving unto it. You can also consider a more indigenous material like hand-woven bracelets or anklets comprised of exotic gems. Remember her birthstone, and then present it to her as her lucky bangle trinket. There are countless of ways in which you can innovate the usual jewelry gift to a more creative and personalized present.Mementos. Once more the usual kind of present here would be figurines, or pillows with you and your husband's photos. Why not check out for something more arty and functional at the same time? For instance if your bridesmaid go to a health resort usually, you can give her a pair of spa slippers. Does she love to cook? Give her an apron, an apron that's flirty and original. Or a tote bag or a pouch with her initials. When you want to personalize, of course you have to remember what your bridesmaids fancy and what things they are involved in. You can either give a different gift for each of them or you can remember of an interest they have in common and you can just make some alterations with every piece, such as a pair of flip-flops with each of their favorite cartoon character on it.Something Grand. Women like to be pampered. You can present them a manicure set, a set of shower gels, a set of lip gloss, or a spa gift set. These treats listen are stuffs that they can actually savor and cherish. A china display can sit on their counter for a very long time, along however with the rest of displays they have received from other wedding events. A breakable is just like the rest of other counter displays. They can collect rust and their value diminishes through time. Think of a more unique bridesmaid gift that they can not fail to remember.Reasonable Items. Most of the personalized items are actually one of the most inexpensive bridesmaid gifts. Fragrant candles, dvd's with your happy moments with her, cd's with her much loved playlist can be unique bridesmaid gift as well. Essentially, you don't need to reach a retailer for all of these items. For candles or stationeries on the other hand, you can purchase in large quantities and your salesperson might give you a big discount.

description.hltext_display: 住建部：十二五将加强地产市场调控
description.content: 住建部表示继续增加住房有效供应，抑制投资投机性需求。信息时报记者 黄亦民 摄 日前，住建部表示，"十二五"期间将加强和改善房地产市场调控，强化市场监管，扎实开展基础性工作。业内人士认为，在地王频现、房价愈涨的情况下，新一轮房地产调控或在所难免。 抑制投资投机性需求 住建部有关负责人日前表示，"十二五"期间继续增加住房有效供应，抑制投资投机性需求，积极发展住房二级市场和租赁市场，继续加强房地产市场监测。依法查处违法违规行为，加大曝光和处罚力度。强化房地产经纪从业人员管理，加强房屋拆迁市场监管。加快推进个人住房信息系统建设，加快完善房地产法律法规，引导树立梯度消费观念，建立适合国情的住房消费模式。 据了解，"十一五"期间，住建部已针对不同阶段房地产市场的不同矛盾，灵活采取了有针对性的政策措施。总体来看，房地产市场运行整体上呈现积极变化，但仍需继续严格落实调控政策，巩固调控成果。 新一轮调控或更猛烈 针对住建部的表述，不少业内人士认为，在地王频现、房价普涨的现状下，房地产调控政策将会持续从紧，新一轮调控或来得更加"猛烈"。 满堂红研究部高级经理周峰认为，新一轮调控最快也许会在明年3月才出台，且肯定还会继续在信贷方面做文章，譬如提高首套或二套住房的首付比例，提高贷款利息等。至于房产税，短期内没有全面推广的可能。 如何进行调控？经纬行研究中心主任曾英杰认为，政策调控手段应以提供足够多的房源给消费者选择为主导，而不应以控制房价为主导。即通过市场的手段来增加供给，而不是通过非市场乃至行政的手段来控制房价。另外，逐步开放户籍制度，以及社会保障制度，让租房者也能够享受和买房者一样的权利，就能够极大地缓解目前很多刚性买家的需求。如果要压抑投机性需求，最直接有效的做法是针对投机性所得(差额)课以重税，但这是治标不治本的方法。 相关报道 国土部编制明年住房供地计划 确保1000万套保障性住房用地 信息时报讯 (记者 徐凤) 昨日上午，国土部发布消息称，目前正抓紧编制明年住房供地计划。国土部副部长?小苏表示，要抓紧编制明年住房供地计划，确保国家已确定的1000万套保障性安居工程建设所需用地的供应。 国土部副部长?小苏在加强房地产用地管理和调控视频会议上表示，住房为主的房地产业是城市重要的基础产业，而不应成为重要的经济支柱产业。同时，?小苏指出，要抓紧编制明年住房供地计划，确保国家已确定的1000万套保障性安居工程建设所需用地的供应。此前，住建部提出，明年计划建设保障房1000万套。 据了解，2010年，各级国土资源部门增加住房用地供应确保了国务院下达的580万套保障房和安居工程建设用地。 合富置业首席分析师龙斌认为，保障房确实应该大力推进。在楼价持续走高的过程中，普通工薪层、中等和中低收入人群对楼价的承受力减弱，收入分配不均衡使得居住民生问题也变得突出，而目前住房保障体制还不健全，这种情况下，大力推进保障制度变得十分重要。 合富辉煌市场研究部发布报告称： 明年广州楼价升幅约为8%~15% 信息时报讯 (记者 罗莎琳) 受今年亚运会停工影响，明年广州楼市的供应量是否会大幅减少？日前，合富辉煌集团市场研究部发布报告称，明年广州市十区新货约有6.5万套，预计广州全市2011年住宅均价合理升幅为8%~15%。 据监测，2011年广州十区楼市新货约有6.5万套，与2010年基本持平。其中，新增新货约5.7万套，而2010年拿到预售证但未推出的新货则有0.8万套。统计报告称，明年广州市的新增新货主要集中在南、北两端--番禺区、花都区及白云区，这三个区域的新增新货量共占全市的65%。另外，西部局部片区亦有较充足供应，主要位于白云区的城西-金沙洲板块。中心城区及东部的新增新货量较紧张，中心六区新增新货约占全市四成。 据监测，2004~2010年广州住宅均价年均增幅约20%。亚运会召开和相关建设强化了广州作为国家中心城市的地位，直接提升了广州楼市价值。预计广州全市2011年住宅均价合理升幅为8%~15%，月度均价在1.3万~1.5万元/平方米之间运行，中心六区均价在1.9万~2.1万元/平方米之间运行。

description.hltext_display: Chinesische Zensurbehörde sagt englischen Begriffen den Kampf an
description.author: apa
description.content:
Dies sei nötig, um die "Reinheit" der chinesischen Sprache zu erhalten, berichtete die Zeitung "China Daily" am Mittwoch mit Verweis auf den bereits am Montag verabschiedeten Erlass des Amts für Presse und Publikation (GAPP). Die Verwendung englischer Wörter in chinesischen Texten habe in der Vergangenheit für Verwirrung gesorgt. Bei Verstößen seien "administrative Bestrafungen" möglich, erklärte die GAPP, ohne genaue Angaben zu machen.
Die Zensurbehörde ließ jedoch ein kleines Schlupfloch: "Wenn nötig" könnten englische Begriffe auch künftig benutzt werden. Sie müssten jedoch direkt nach ihrer Nennung auf Chinesisch erklärt werden. In chinesischen Veröffentlichungen werden oft englische Abkürzungen wie WTO für die Welthandelsorganisation oder GDP für das Bruttoinlandsprodukt verwendet.
Die chinesische Zensurbehörde hat englische Ausdrücke und Abkürzungen in Büchern, Zeitungen und auf Internetseiten verboten. 0

description.hltext_display: Health care products – solution to health problems
description.content: Health gains top priority and is the prime concern in today's world. Intense care is the basic necessity to maintain wellness. With the advancement in the fields of medicines and development in the technology, the health related issues or worries have resolved to some extent. Better health develops by following a highly nutritious and balanced diet and avoiding the excess and unnecessary intake of fatty substances. But the change in the lifestyle makes way for the people to easily get attracted to fast food and junk food which normally results in the gaining of excess weight and consequent health problems. The daily chaotic and stressful life creates many ache problems. This gives rise to an intense desire for several health and wellness product.Today Health care stores offer wide variety of health care products which include the thumper massager, an electronic device that massages and energizes the entire body, thus refreshing the mind. The most needed device to get away from the stressful daily hectic life. A massage will help relax the entire body and open up the cramped muscles. Along with it a tens unit is another device that relieves all the pain from the body but is not a permanent solution to get rid of the pain and requires doctor's recommendation before using it. A tens units works on batteries that have to be charged. New health products are up in the market which offers Biofreeze ointments that alleviate the intense pain.Fetal Doppler is a must have device for pregnant mothers for keeping a track of the beats of the unborn child and assuring the mother about the wellness of the baby. This could prove to be a superlative experience for the mother. It's easy to use and requires no technical skills or expertise to operate it. An overall sound health includes maintenance of oral hygiene and also keeping away skin ailments. With the improvement in the modern science, health and beauty products are made available to the mass helping them out to keep the impurities and dirt away from the skin thereby rejuvenating the skin and enhancing the beauty. Along with these products, Obus Form pillows are also made available at the stores that are suitable for those who snore helping them to solve their problems. The Obus form pillows is just what the doctors prescribe to get rid of the snoring problem. Oral hygiene is a must to deter severe consequences. Maintaining a proper hygiene and using recommended products of well renowned brands is advisable. The usage of Closys oral rinse is beneficial as it kills the germs and bacteria and helps maintain proper care. Getting valuable referrals from the dentist is the ultimate need of the day.With the advent of the internet facilities ordering for the health products online is easier and affordable. The online health stores help find the health products online and easily. It is quite easy to select from the world wide stores that offer quality and recommended products.

description.hltext_display: 中烹协今首度回应“化学火锅”事件：纯属谣传
description.author: sohu.com
description.content:
本报讯（记者杨滨）飘香剂+辣椒精+火锅红=底料。正是“北风起，火锅香”的时候，但近日媒体曝出麻辣火锅底料中添加飘香剂等化学添加剂事件，难免让市民对火锅安全心存担忧。今天上午，中国烹饪协会火锅专业委员会公布中国火锅企业食品安全状况，显示占全国市场7成份额的100家知名火锅企业底料检查100%合格。这也是中烹协火锅专业委员会针对时下“化学火锅”事件首度作出回应。
“‘市场上80%火锅含有违规添加剂’，这种说法纯属谣传”，中烹协副秘书长乔杰介绍说，今年10月到11月，中烹协组织专家对部分火锅企业的厨房、餐厅、物流配送中心进行了抽查。此次调查以100家国内知名的大型火锅品牌连锁企业为样本，涉及火锅餐饮门店9000余家（包括直营店及连锁店），遍布全国28个省市、自治区。在此次调查中，中烹协要求企业提交相关资质文件、食品检验报告、底料检验报告以及第3方检测报告，并随机对100个品牌企业中的门店、后厨、中心厨房、底料生产厂进行了实地调查。抽查结果显示，底料检验报告、调味品质检报告全部都合格。调查还发现，这些企业均设有食品安全管理员，其中设有专职食品安全工作人员的占63%，兼职食品安全工作人员的占37%。

description.hltext_display: 北京“新地王”出炉 中信63亿竞得CBD核心地块
description.content:
中国中信集团公司21日以63亿元的报价竞得北京商务中心区（CBD）核心区Z15地块国有建设用地使用权，创造了北京单幅地块出让价格的新纪录。 记者从北京市土地整理储备中心获悉，备受各届关注的北京CBD核心区域6幅地块中的Z15地块和Z14地块评标结果21日最终确定。其中体量最大的Z15地块，规划建筑面积为35万平方米，底价为50．575亿元。共有3家企业进入最后阶段的竞争，中信集团最终胜出。 Z14地块招标底价为31．79亿元，规划建筑面积22万平方米。竞标单位是由正大置地、正大集团、卜蜂国际、上海帝泰、正大制药投资、中山凯茵、玖龙纸业、华康资本、金光纸业、上海世茂和华侨凤凰等11家企业组成的联合体，中标价格为41．14亿元。(.新.华.社)
相关文章：
上一篇文章： 住建部：十二五将加强地产市场调控
下一篇文章： 中信集团63亿夺京CBD地块 或建北京第一高楼

description.hltext_display: 文建會：多方考量 跨年晚會採邀請制
description.content:
迎接建國百年，12月31號晚間將在大佳河濱公園的花博園區舉行跨年晚會，還會有獨創的水幕煙火，不過這場活動卻採取邀請制，不開放民眾參觀，不少熱切期待的民眾感到錯愕。文建會主委盛治仁今天表示，採取「邀請制」是經過多方考量後的決定，而且邀請的是志工，還是一般民眾，不是所謂「權貴」。
文建會主委盛治仁表示，跨年晚會現場大佳河濱公園約可容納8400人，主辦單位計畫透過各縣市政府，邀請6000位志工，還有1000多位弱勢團體的代表出席晚會，基本上能出席晚會的絕大多數人，還是一般民眾，所以這場跨年晚會絕對不是媒體報導所說的「權貴晚會」。
至於採取邀請制，則是在多方考量後，認為這是整體成本最低，效果最好的辦法『我們曾經考慮過是不是找個時間，公開讓大家來索票，可是，公開索票我們猜想一定會有人提早一天在那邊排隊，而且來索票的大概都是住在台北的人會比較多，住在其他縣市的人要來參與的機會，可能就變得更少了......』
盛治仁說，有鑒於花博開幕的經驗，大佳河濱公園的出入交通不是很方便，花博開幕當天的疏散是很大的問題，那天幾乎沒辦法散場，車子幾乎出不去，所以才採取這樣的規劃，但是既然做了決定，就會接受公評，但絕對不是為所謂權貴或官方人士所規劃的活動。

description.hltext_display: RPT-UPDATE 2-Idemitsu sees total Q1 crude refining up 1 pct y/y
description.content:
TOKYO, Dec 22 (Reuters) - Idemitsu Kosan Co, Japan's third-largest refiner, said on Wednesday it plans to refine a total of 8 million kilolitres of crude oil in January-March, or 559,000 barrels per day, up 1 percent from a year earlier as robust exports offset weak domestic demand.
Refining for the domestic market by the nation's third-biggest refiner will fall by 2 percent or 200,000 kl from the previous year to 7.5 million kl, it said.
The company plans to export 500,000 kilolitres of oil products in the first quarter of 2011, up 93 percent from a year earlier.
It has four refineries in Japan with total crude refining capacity of 640,000 barrels per day.
Idemitsu has upgraded its total refining outlook for the year ending next March by 600,000 kl from its initial plan of 28.9 million kl, up 2 percent, as a 41 percent rise in exports to 2 million kl helped offset a 1 percent decline in domestic demand.
The company estimated its total processing for October-December at 7.0 million kl, up 1 percent from a year earlier but down from the original plan of 7.2 million kl, hurt by problems at its Hokkaido and Aichi refineries in November and December.
(Reporting by Osamu Tsukimori; Editing by Ed Lane)
((osamu.tsukimori@thomsonreuters.com ; +813 6441 1857; Reuters Messaging: osamu.tsukimori.reuters.com@reuters.net)) Keywords: CRUDE IDEMITSU/REFINING
(If you have a query or comment on this story, send an email to news.feedback.asia@thomsonreuters.com)

description.hltext_display: Neues aus der Anstalt (Di. 21.12. - ZDF: 22.50 Uhr)
description.content:
Quotenhoch mit Biermösl?
Seit Oktober ist Frank-Markus Barwasser alias Erwin Pelzig in der ZDF-Anstalt für die Öffentlichkeitsarbeit des fiktiven Krankenhauses zuständig. Er scheint seinen Job gut zu machen, denn die Quoten beim Einstand stimmten: 3,6 Millionen Zuschauer wollten den Neuen sehen, das bedeutete einen Marktanteil von 15,8 Prozent - ein Prozent mehr als man es bis dato im Schnitt gewohnt war. Nun muss er beweisen, dass er seinen Spitzenstart halten kann. In dieser Ausgabe von 'Neues aus der Anstalt' treffen Barwasser und Anstaltsleiter Urban Priol auf die Gäste Monika Gruber, Arnulf Rating, Kay Ray und Biermösl Blosn.
Urban Priol (links) und Frank-Markus Barwasser alias Erwin Pelzig: Da ist Konfliktstoff vorprogrammiert. © ZDF / Tobias Hase
© 2010 teleschau - der mediendienst

description.hltext_display: 惚れっぽい私 - ２度目です
Francia y España "legitiman" el hecho colonial, según el Polisario
description.content: El ministro saharaui de Asuntos Exteriores, Mohamed Salem Ould Salek, denunció hoy que los gobiernos de Francia y España "legitiman" desde el año 2004 el hecho colonial marroquí en el Sahara Occidental. En una rueda de prensa celebrada en Argel, el responsable saharaui agregó que esta actitud de los dos países constituye una de las razones que han impedido que lleguen a buen puerto los esfuerzos de la ONU para resolver el conflicto. "Los esfuerzos desplegados por la ONU para superar los inaceptables obstáculos planteados por Marruecos para impedir la libre expresión del pueblo saharaui no han tenido validez por la intransigencia del ejecutivo marroquí y la complicidad de Francia y España que desde 2004 han legitimado el hecho colonial", explicó. Ould Salek ha deplorado igualmente que la presencia de Francia, como miembro permanente del Consejo de Seguridad y España en el grupo de los amigos del secretario general de Naciones Unidas para el Sahara Occidental, "ha impedido una acción positiva y necesaria" de este organismo para hacer respetar los acuerdos conseguidos entre las dos partes y para facilitar la conclusión del mandato de MINURSO. Para el titular de exteriores saharaui, España y Francia "prefieren ayudar al expansionismo marroquí que pone en entredicho las fronteras establecidas por esos mismos países durante la época colonial y aceptados por pueblos del continente africano" Respecto a los resultados de la última reunión informal mantenida por las delegaciones saharaui y marroquí los pasado viernes y sábado en Nueva York, Ouled Salek ha estimado que no se ha producido ningún avance que haya conseguido abrir una vía a una solución política que permita la autodeterminación del Sahara Occidental. El ministro ha recordado que el pueblo saharaui es soberano para elegir libremente entre las opciones de independencia, autonomía o integración en Marruecos por medio de un referendo democrático organizado por Naciones Unidas, en cooperación con la Unión Africana.

description.hltext_display: TeatroSei, la prosa si fa in tre Palcoscenici per ogni gusto
description.content: Vicenza. Prende il via domani con un appuntamento natalizio, la dodicesima edizione di TeatroSei, rassegna di prosa itinerante organizzata dal Comune di Vicenza - Circoscrizione n. 6, con la collaborazione della Fita e il patrocinio della Regione del Veneto, che fino al 20 marzo porterà fra le sale teatrali della zona dieci spettacoli, fra i quali due "prime". Il via, dunque, questo giovedì, alle 16.30, nel centro civico di Villa Lattes, in via Thaon de Revel, dove la compagnia La Scatola Magica di Nervesa della Battaglia, in provincia di Treviso, divertirà i bambini con lo spettacolo "Pantalone e la flatulentite" di Livia Stella; al termine, atteso come sempre, arriverà anche Babbo Natale. Ingresso libero. Dopo questo avvio squisitamente natalizio, il cartellone della rassegna riprenderà a gennaio, dividendosi fra i teatri San Giuseppe, San Lazzaro e Primavera. Per quanto riguarda il San Giuseppe, la sala in zona Mercato Nuovo ospiterà tre appuntamenti. Si comincia domenica 23 gennaio con "Il berretto a sonagli" di Luigi Pirandello, proposto dalla compagnia C.T. Altinate di Mogliano Veneto, in provincia di Treviso: fra i testi più celebri dell'autore siciliano, ne rivela uno dei temi cardine, ossia il contrasto tra la realtà e l'apparenza, tra i sentimenti più veri e le convenzioni alle quali ci costringe la società. Domenica 6 febbraio ecco invece "Napoli milionaria", grande classico di Eduardo De Filippo, proposto dalla Nuova Compagnia Teatrale 'A fenesta di S.Donà di Piave, in provincia di Venezia, specializzata nel repertorio dell'autore campano: un viaggio tra le bassezze e gli splendori dell'animo umano.Sabato 26 febbraio (con replica domenica 27) spazio infine alla sempre attesa "prima" annuale della compagnia vicentina La Ringhiera, diretta dall'attore e regista Riccardo Perrararo: dopo opere di forte intensità in compagnia di autori come Brecht, Tadini e Shakespeare, la formazione ha deciso di concedersi un po' di leggerezza, affidandosi al frizzante meccanismo comico di "Un tranquillo weekend di follia", commedia firmata da un "misterioso" Alan Bond, che tutto lascia supporre sia in realtà il noto drammaturgo Luigi Lunari, che qui si firma come traduttore. Tre gli spettacoli in cartellone anche al San Lazzaro. Domenica 30 gennaio toccherà a "Tempo de fame, ovvero El Porsèo deé àneme" di Maurizio Mason, recentissima produzione del Teatrino delle Pulci di Fellette di Romano d'Ezzelino, che ripropone uno spaccato della vita di un tempo nelle nostre campagne. Domenica 20 febbraio, moderna commedia dell'arte protagonista con "L'Odissea di Pantalone", in compagnia dello Stabilimento Teatrale di Caerano San Marco, in provincia di Treviso. Infine, l'altra "prima" in cartellone, di scena sabato 19 e domenica 20 marzo: a proporla sarà Lo Scrigno di Vicenza, formazione diretta da Andrea Rigon, che dopo il successo de "Il colpo della strega" di John Graham resta in ambito comico con "Toc Toc" di Laurent Baffie, spassosa commedia ambientata nella sala d'aspetto di uno studio psichiatrico. Risate... psichiatriche anche con "Ciò che vide il maggiordomo", lavoro brillante di Joe Orton ripreso dalla Compagnia degli Erranti di Vicenza, per la regia di Stefano Rossi, in programma domenica 13 febbraio al Teatro Primavera. La stessa sala ospiterà poi, domenica 13 marzo, "Se non ghe fosse xia Teresa... bisognarìa inventarla", lavoro comico scritto e diretto da Roberto Montee per l'Associazione Teatrale San Francesco di Vicenza, divertente mix di amore e politica. Oltre all'appuntamento natalizio di apertura, infine, TeatroSei proporrà anche uno spettacolo appositamente pensato per i meno giovani: domenica 6 marzo alle 16.30, a Villa Lattes a ingresso libero, il gruppo I Rosegoti di Vicenza proporrà infatti "Pasquinette", commedia di Maria Penello che racconta le vicissitudini di un avvocato non proprio brillante. I biglietti per gli spettacoli sono in vendita nei botteghini dei singoli teatri a 6 euro (4 i ridotti). Per informazioni: Fita Vicenza, tel. 0444 323837; Comune di Vicenza - Circoscrizione n. 6, tel. 0444 962136. Sipario alle 21 il sabato, alle 16 la domenica.

description.hltext_display: E-Mégalis récompensée pour sa salle des marchés publics
再创历史新高 今年新房销售额有望突破5万亿元
description.content:
国家统计局数据显示，1-11月，全国商品房销售额为4.23万亿元，同比增长17.48%，接近去年全年4.4万亿元的销售水平。根据历史数据并结合目前销售形势推算，今年全国商品房销售额有望突破5万亿元，可能达5.3万亿元。 由于企业集中报送数据等原因，12月商品房销售额环比增幅通常较大。从过去十年情况来看，除2009年12月商品房销售额环比增长79.62%外，其余九年环比增幅均在100%以上。其中，2005年至2008年的12月销售额环比增幅约100%，2000年至2004年则超过300%。 今年11月，全国实现商品房销售额5285.61亿元，同比增长18.56%，环比增长4.14%。如果按照12月比11月增长50%的保守估计，今年商品房销售额有望超过5万亿元，继2009年后再次创下历史新高。 此外，今年1-11月，我国房地产实际完成投资额、购置土地面积、完成开发土地面积、商品房施工面积、房地产新开工面积等数据均已超过去年全年水平。 今年前11个月，除基数原因导致11月出现异常值外，其他各月房地产新开工面积同比增幅均在40%以上。4月底出台新一轮调控政策后，5月全国新开工面积同比增幅达102.56%，6月新开工面积达1.9亿平方米，为近十年来单月新开工面积最高值。 值得注意的是，从今年3月起，全国房地产市场新开工面积同比增幅远高于商品房销售面积同比增幅。1-11月，房地产新开工面积同比增长48.71%，而商品房销售面积仅同比增长9.76%，相差38.95个百分点，市场供求缺口在缩小。业内人士预计，楼市未来供应量将大幅提升，加上保障性住房将密集投入市场，楼市供不应求的局面会得到一定程度的缓解。
相关文章：
上一篇文章： 北京“新地王”出炉 中信63亿竞得CBD核心地块
下一篇文章： 珠三角二线城市 “同城化”引爆投资冲动

description.hltext_display: Woven Labels Guide
description.content: Woven labels are great for putting finishing touches to your clothing products. Customized tags for clothing, and fabric labels are excellent for achieving uniqueness in your clothing products. These professionally woven garment labels are used by large garment designers, manufacturers as well as crafters who want to distinguish their products from the crowd. An ideal finishing touch you can give to any garment product is apparel label. Top woven labels companies will send you samples of their work (free) on request, so that you will assess the labels to know if they meet your need, they will also follow-up with you via their customer service to make sure you eventually get exactly what you need. It is possible to obtain exact professional look with iron-on patches or personalized custom labels as hang tags for your clothing products. Choose any configuration you wish for your unique name labels and be sure to have it customized for you just the way you requested. This is what the professional apparel label companies will achieve for you. Tags for clothing come in multiple choices such as;• Taffeta labels• Damask labels• Semi-damask material labels• Satin labelsTips to Purchase Your Clothing Labels• What Type of Clothing Label Do You Want?There are wide range of clothing labels that will perfectly match almost any type of application. Your first decision should be the type of clothes label you desire. You also have to consider where the label is to be placed. For instance, damask Woven labels are excellent for exterior application since they are quite durable and of high quality. Again, the complexity or simplicity of your custom clothing label need would determine the type of material to be used. For instance, if you are going for complex designs in woven garment labels, printed satin labels or damask needle loom would be ideal. For cotton label or garment labels that will be against the skin, a soft and non-irritating concept will be more suitable – in this case, thermal heat transfer labels or satin needle loom will be excellent. You will also need to choose a label style that suits your taste. You should also select your woven labels to reflect your company's message or theme. Generally, you may want to choose between simple down-home quilt and the chic high-end boutique style. • What is Your Choice of Material?There are various materials used in manufacturing garment labels; they include nylon, polyester yarns and PVC/silicone labels – which are all man-made fibers. The natural fiber materials include hemp and cotton. The varieties help to create various impressions. Complete cotton material is nice and natural; but, 3 or 2 color logos as well as complex designs with multiple colors do not work perfectly when using 100% cotton. • Selecting Your Fold TypeWhen placing an order for garment labels, you will be required to choose a fold type for your label. One of the fold types is the ‘center fold' or ‘loop'. This is simply a garment tag that is half-folded. The placement of the crease is either vertically up and down following the logo, or horizontally below the logo. Woven labels or tags for clothing are valuable additions to your clothing products, and also a great reflection of what your organization stands for.

description.hltext_display: !!! Der satirische Jahresrückblick 2010 (Di. 21.12. - ZDF: 23.50 Uhr)
description.content:
Des einen Eklat, des anderen täglich Brot. 'Wir hatten erheblich schwerere Jahre als dieses', weiß Werner Doyé, der seit knapp zehn Jahren mit Kollege Andreas Wiemers ein eingespieltes Satire-Duo in Diensten des ZDF bildet. Dass die beiden für ihre 'Frontal 21'-Rubrik 'Toll!' schon das ganze Jahr Material über die absurdesten Auswüchse aus Politik und Gesellschaft sammeln konnten, macht es ihnen noch mal leichter. '!!! Der satirische Jahresrückblick' - seit 2004 der heimliche Höhepunkt im alljährlichen Rückschauwahnsinn - strotzt einmal mehr vor launigen Breitseiten. Spät abends zwar.
Die ZDF-Satireautoren Werner Doyé (rechts) und Andreas Wiemers wurden mehrfach für den Grimme-Preis nominiert. Nun ziehen sie wieder ein Jahresfazit. © ZDF / Svea Pietschmann
Aber das tut der Popularität der Sendung, die im Dezember 2009 fast schon sensationelle 1,8 Millionen Zuschauer einschalteten, keinen Abbruch.
Es hatte sich angedeutet. Vor ziemlich genau einem Jahr hatte Werner Doyé frohlockt, die schwarz-gelbe Regierungskoalition stehe jetzt im Rampenlicht. Satiretechnisch gesehen hat sie das Beste daraus gemacht: 'Man muss aufpassen, dass man sich nicht nur auf Westerwelle und Seehofer einschießt. Die beiden könnten alleine die ganze Sendung füllen', so Doyé, der insgesamt einen 'deutlich höheren Polit-Anteil als in anderen Jahren' bei seiner Spott-Retrospektive ausmacht.
Ein Umstand, der durchaus unangenehme Begleiterscheinungen zeitigt: 'Wir gehören zu den armen Menschen, die Pressekonferenzen von vorne bis hinten anschauen müssen.' Doyé und Wiemers, die klassischen Phoenix-Gucker? Sozusagen. Allerdings bestehe auch die Möglichkeit, Material über die hauseigenen Berliner Eingangsleitungen zu sichten. 'Gerne auch mit Mickey-Maus-Stimmen in doppelter Geschwindigkeit, sodass man's schneller hinter sich hat.'
Und was bleibt hängen aus den vergangenen zwölf Monaten? '2010 war laut und schmutzig', sagt Doyé.
Die Atomdebatte, Stuttgart 21, der Missbrauchsskandal der Katholischen Kirche: Es gebe Themen, die seien von ihrer Relevanz her gesetzt. Unerfreuliche Komplexe sind das allemal, aber für den Satiriker eben Gold wert. Ist Doyé am Ende des Krisen- und Skandalejahres also wunschlos glücklich? Nicht ganz: 'Ich möchte in Zukunft wieder anständig belogen werden.'
© 2010 teleschau - der mediendienst

description.hltext_display: Ruth no irá a la cárcel
description.content:
CANARIAS7.es le agradece su interés por hacer uso de sus canales de participación. La conversación es una parte fundamental de Internet y una de las mayores aportaciones de la Red a la nueva era de la comunicación. Los comentarios de este periódico están para que todos podamos expresar nuestras opiniones.
Los comentarios están sujetos a diversos sistemas antispam. Si el suyo no se publica de inmediato, no se preocupe, puede haber sido 'cazado' por error y será publicado en breve. Por favor, evite enviar reiteradamente el mismo comentario, entorpeciendo considerablemente la labor de redacción.
Los comentarios han de ceñirse a las propuestas temáticas de cada artículo o propuesta, y no se permiten aquellos que resulten ofensivos, insultantes, de escasa educación o consideración con el resto de los usuarios, ataques personales, los que no tengan relación con el tema, publicidad, spam y, en definitiva, todos los que no contribuyan a hacer de este servicio del periódico lo que pretende: un espacio de opinión, reflexión, comunicación y debate sosegado y libre.
No se permite el envío de mensajes de contenido sexista, racista, o que impliquen cualquier otro tipo de discriminación. Tampoco se admitirán mensajes difamatorios, ofensivos, que afecten a la vida privada de otras personas, que supongan amenazas, o cuyos contenidos impliquen la violación de cualquier ley española. Esto incluye los mensajes con contenidos protegidos por derechos de autor, a no ser que la persona que envía el mensaje sea la propietaria de dichos derechos o cuente con autorización para el uso de dichos contenidos. Tampoco se permitirá el uso de este servicio por parte de empresas para promocionar sus productos o servicios. De la misma manera, no se permite el envío de cartas cadena, marketing piramidal o similares.
Las mayúsculas tienen un uso bien definido en la gramática española. Escribir todo el texto en mayúsculas es un esfuerzo inútil que no hará que su mensaje se lea más, sino más bien menos. Los comentarios escritos total o parcialmente en mayúsculas, especialmente si se producen de forma reiterada, son susceptibles de ser eliminados.
En CANARIAS7.es apostamos por potenciar el buen uso del idioma y la expresión. Los mensajes tipo SMS que empobrecen la comunicación también corren el riesgo de no ser tomados en consideración.
Defendemos el anonimato en la Red como un ciberderecho básico de todo usuario, en especial como arma en contra de sistemas que se caracterizan por la censura, la intolerancia o las restricciones a la libertad de expresión e información. El anonimato tiene sentido cuando la identificación pueda conllevar grave riesgo para el autor por sus opiniones o informaciones. En CANARIAS7.es entendemos que algunos usuarios prefieran no identificarse. Sin embargo, esconderse detrás del anonimato para insultar, difamar, vejar, 'trollear' o realizar ataques personales es una perversión del derecho al anonimato que pone en riesgo su propia consideración ante la Justicia, la Red y la ciudadanía. Ese tipo de anonimato tampoco se tolera en este periódico.
Si lo que desea es efectuar alguna observación personal a la Redacción o Dirección del periódico, bien en contenidos o en formas, los comentarios no son el lugar adecuado para ello. Envíenos un mail a info(arroba)canarias7.es (sustituyendo (arroba) por @).
Esperamos que disfrute leyendo y participando en CANARIAS7.es

description.hltext_display: こんな茶番、信じられますか？ - トピ主です 最後です
description.content:
初めて投稿します。よろしくお願いします。
肝心の相談は最後の方になりますが、説明が必要だと思いますので
冒頭長いですが、すみませんがお付き合いくださればありがたいです。
夫には2年ほど前からメールを頻繁にやりとりしている女性（独身）がいます。
仕事関係で知り合い、意気投合していることは知っていましたがそこまで気にとめることもなく過ごしていました。
しかし、携帯を持ってコソコソし出したのでさすがに怪しくなり、携帯をチェックしたところ
この翌日、私が1日家をあける予定だったので2人で会う約束をしていました。
彼女からは気持ちの悪いことに、きわどい表現がされたものもありました。
夫からは、出張先からメールしたり、誕生日にデコメールを送ったり、私には全く送ってくれたことのないメールもありました。
家族に裏切られたこともショックでしたが、夫は激務で、私とはほとんど会話する時間もないのに
この人とはこんなにもメールする時間があるのだとショックだったのをよく覚えています。
色々な覚悟の上、震えながら、最近よくメールをしていて気になるから何もないなら携帯を見せてと夫に言いました。意外と素直に携帯を差し出し、メールのやりとりが予想以上に増えてきたので、見つからないように行動しようとしたことは認めました。
でも会う約束には返事をしていないし、会う約束をＯＫしたわけでもないから、疑うなら明日の私の用事に一緒に付き合うよと言いました。
（当日、女からは「今日どうするのよー」という怒りメールが来ていましたが）
また、夫は「おそらくその女性は自分に好意があることを感じるけれど、仕事がらみの人間関係だから
無視はできない。でも自分は絶対に浮気はしないから」と言い切り、めったに謝らない夫が最後に「悪かった」と言いました。
続きます。
ユーザーID：2443360228
お気に入り登録数：0
古いレス順
レス数：5本
タイトル
投稿者
子連れオオカミ(トピ主)
2010年12月22日 15:07
もともとあまり言い訳はせず、信じないなら誤解されたままでもよいという投げやりな性格なので、この「悪かった」と「浮気は絶対にしない」という言葉を信じ、もうメールのやりとりはやめてもらうことを約束しました。
それから1年後、携帯を見てもロクなことがないということが身にしみてわかったので
本当にやりとりをやめたのか気にはなっていましたが、そのままにしていました。
ところが夫の携帯が故障し、一緒になって操作していたら偽名で登録された例の人の連絡先を見つけてしまったのです。
後でこっそり履歴を確認するとその偽名とのやりとりが何度もありました。
やりとりはどんなものかはわかりませんでしたが、信じていたのに嘘をつかれたことに傷つき、とうとう体調をくずして鬱状態になりました。
鬱だと診断されたことを夫に話し、その時に「まだ連絡をとっていることを私は知っている」と伝えたら
「仕事関係で色々相談にのることもあるけど、考えているような関係では絶対にない」と言います。
今考えるとそこでもっと追及するべきだったのかもしれませんが、そんな気力がなかったのかもしれません。
続きます。
ユーザーID：2443360228
子連れオオカミ(トピ主)
2010年12月22日 15:32
もちろん夫の配慮のなさや、既婚者に頼って家庭の平穏を乱す相手の無神経さも許せません。
でも私が実親の介護などで忙しく、忙しい夫にも負担をかけていることで負い目を感じている部分もありましたので、激務の夫のストレスが誰かと話して軽減するなら、やましい関係でない場合に限り大目に見ようとか、その後小町の存在を知り、例えば「仕事関係の女性との関係にやきもきしている」というトピに対して、「仕事上の人間関係を円滑にするための手段かもしれない」というレスもあり、私なりにシロだということを前提でモヤモヤする気持ちを抑え込むように過ごしてきました。
今では鬱は良くなりましたが、薬は服用しています。
そのまた1年後、まさにちょうど一か月前です。ＰＣメールが開いたままになっており、何気なく見たらその人とのメールの履歴がいくつも残されていたのです。
頭が真っ白になりましたが震えながら一つ一つ読みました。
友人と旅行に出かけていたはずの日なのに、彼女からデートのお礼がありました。ホテルで一夜を共にできて楽しかったと。
続きます。

description.hltext_display: 珠三角二线城市 “同城化”引爆投资冲动
description.content: "我们的项目80%都是深圳人买走的，其中相当大一部分是一次性付款。"在惠州核心地段的佳兆业中心一期售楼处，销售人员表示，开盘后从深圳过来的投资客络绎不绝，住宅价格已经从每平方米7000多元涨至11000元，目前仅剩下少量大户型房源。 城际交通发展带来的同城化趋势进一步强化，广深投资客纷纷看好惠州、佛山、东莞等地的房地产市场，珠三角众多二三线城市的中高端项目持续热销，开发投资也不断升温。 投资客看好升值空间 "城际轻轨很快就要连通惠州、东莞和广州了，从我们这里到东莞只需要半个小时，到广州一个多小时，加上惠州地铁要连上深圳地铁三号线，很多客户看好惠州楼盘的升值空间。"惠州佳兆业中心销售人员指着地图告诉记者，同城化和交通便利是目前深圳投资客最看中的因素。 尽管楼市正处于调控期，但由于深圳投资客大量涌入，惠州楼市所受影响并不明显，很多项目开盘都取得不错的销售效果，售价也稳中有升。 12月18日，惠州的光耀城、DADA草地以及格林童话三盘齐发，光耀城推出60栋高尔夫联排小别墅，基本售罄，该楼盘的客户中深圳购房者占比高达八成。DADA的草地开通了往返深圳的社区巴士，新推248套房源，周末两日即销售130套，深圳购房者比例竟超过九成。 作为广佛同城的直接受益者，佛山楼市也"底气"十足。11月3日，广佛地铁正式进入运营，从广佛地铁魁奇路站出发，只需45分钟就能与广州地铁一号线实现衔接，而四通八达的公路交通，也让佛山与广州的连接时间缩短为半小时。 广佛地铁的开通带动了佛山楼价整体上扬，地铁沿线物业涨价更加明显。广佛地铁开通1个多月，佛山地铁沿线的一手楼盘均价的涨幅在1000元/左右，即将开售的一些新盘对外放风售价竟达2万元/平方米。 早在广佛地铁开通前，佛山一些地铁沿线楼盘已经开始受到关注，保利花园、南海颐景园等多个楼盘，广州客的比例从以往的不足10%增加至20%。地铁通车后这些楼盘吸引到更多广州人关注，岭南天地、普君新城等地铁物业都在开盘后热销。 同样的情况也在与深圳接壤的东莞上演。最近的12月6日至12日一周，东莞住宅成交火热，尤其是高价位楼盘成交突出，一周共成交1298套，签约均价8856元/平方米，仅别墅就成交了99套。 东莞中原地产研究部数据显示，在一周成交的99套别墅中，其中大朗碧桂园32套，万科棠樾14套，万科紫台和万科麓湖别墅各9套，这些楼盘的相当大一部分买家都是广深投资客。 在东莞热销的楼盘中，与深圳接壤的镇区表现尤其活跃，如凤岗镇的金桂华府、常平镇的卓越・蔚蓝城邦、樟木头镇的中惠・香樟绿洲，由于深圳客的持续入市，这些区域楼盘一直处于旺销状态。 "不限购"释放投资需求 10月份，广州、深圳纷纷出台限购政策之后，珠三角二线城市迟迟未有动静。当地政府官员表示，目前房价较为稳定，暂未打算出台本地化的"限购"政策。不限购，使这些城市成为投资客转战的乐土。 自深圳限购后，投资客就开始转向周边二线城市。东莞一些曾经冷落的楼盘，在深圳客涌入后骤然火热，东莞长安的沃夫多项目曾因定价1.5万/平方米而无人问津，10月份以后，在深圳客带动下成交迅速上升，竟跻身东莞楼市月度销售前20名。与深圳接壤的东莞项目益田大运城邦，一开始就将营销重点放在深圳，该楼盘超过九成的客户都是深圳人。东莞很多楼盘也纷纷赴深圳做推广。光大地产在东莞开发的豪宅楼盘，便长期在深圳市场进行广告宣传。 东莞中原地产研究部经理车德锐表示，近两个月，深圳投资客进入东莞市场投资的势头进一步增强。价格低洼、投资升值潜力大成为了深圳投资客对东莞市场的共识，预计这波深圳客东莞投资热仍要持续一段时间。 广州限购政策对投资客的挤出，佛山楼市成了投资客的首选方向。泛澳地产市场报告显示，11月份，佛山楼市均价首次踏上八字头，再次刷新历史最高水平。世联地产(002285)近期发布的佛山房地产市场报告显示，11月，佛山一手住宅成交均价为8800元/平方米，环比上涨2.3%，同比上涨26.4%。今年1-10月，佛山新房成交面积达到572万平方米，而广州前10月成交总面积只有513万平方米，成交总面积已然超过广州。 广州市同创卓越房地产投资顾问有限公司总经理赵卓文认为，从长远来看，广州人住在佛山将是一个趋势，未来广州的土地资源紧缺，而佛山是离广州最近且交通又非常便利的一个市区，选择在佛山置业也就成了顺理成章的事情。尤其是广州出台限购政策后，对手头上有闲散资金的市民来说，来佛山投资是不错的选择。 随着广珠轻轨西线二期的开通，中山市与一线城市的交通瓶颈被打破，11月以来，到中山置业的广州、深圳人比例增加明显。最明显的是与广州南沙接壤的中山三角镇，由于在售楼盘基本上都低于4000元/平方米，有超过八成买家来自广州。 还有多少投资空间 在同城化利好推动以及在广州、深圳"限购"政策影响下，珠三角二线城市房价直追一线城市。 以佛山CBD东平新城为例，新盘售价涨幅非常明显，东平新城核心区有高档洋房的毛坯售价已经达到1.7万元/平方米，有的单价超过2万元/平方米，业内还普遍预期，东平新城的均价很快要迈过2万元大关。而广州CBD珠江新城在售楼盘价格也普遍在2.5万元/平方米至3万元/平方米。 随着佛山楼价近年来的迅猛上涨，佛山房价日渐接近广州房价，洼地优势正在消失。而此前相当长一段时间，佛山房价只相当于广州同类地段同类物业一半的价格。同样定位为城市新CBD，佛山东平新城与广州珠江新城房价已相当接近。 东莞的房价也在向着万元迈进，西平板块和万江板块是明年入市项目较集中的区域。以西平板块为例，中信地产曾经拿下的地王项目--中信凯旋公馆将在明年入市，该地块楼面地价就超过6000元/平方米，业内预计单价将要过万。而目前万江区在售楼盘均价也在7000元/平方米以上，加上通胀因素和地王入市对楼价的拉升，片区整体房价也有望超过万元。 珠三角二线城市房价已经透支未来还是仍有上涨空间，业内对此看法有分歧。有专家指出，二线城市二手房市场不发达，流动性差，容易陷入投资陷阱，买入容易卖出难。同时，二线城市规模小，外来人口少，房子出租也不容易，不利于长期投资。 记者在惠州看到，尽管中心城区高档公寓均价在1万元/平方米左右，但一套40平方米的小公寓，即使顺利出租每月租金也不足1500元，而且相当大部分只能闲置。 有专家指出，写字楼价格目前基本与住宅持平，仍处于洼地，随着珠三角同城化加速和二线城市经济发展，未来二线城市核心商务区办公需求将增大，写字楼或将具有较大升值空间。

description.hltext_display: 日本小笠原群岛海域发生7.4级地震 东京有震感
description.author: sohu.com
description.content:
日本发生7．4级地震
日本气象厅22日宣布，当地时间当天凌晨2时20分（北京时间22日凌晨1时20分）许，日本小笠原群岛附近海域发生里氏7．4级地震，日本气象厅已发布了海啸警报。
此次地震震中地点位于东经143．4度、北纬27．5度的小笠原群岛海域，震源深度10公里。包括东京在内的日本东部及东北部地区普遍有震感。
地震发生后，日本气象厅迅速发布了海啸警报，称地震造成的海啸可能在小笠原群岛造成1米高的海浪。日本气象厅还向日本列岛太平洋沿岸的多个城市发布了“海啸提示”，称这些地方可能出现0．5米高度海浪。
截止当天凌晨3时，尚无因这次地震造成人员伤亡和财产损失的消息。
（据新华社电）

description.hltext_display: Get Your Holiday Bargain Shopping Done Early
description.content: Christmas is just around the corner and there is no better time to do some holiday bargain shopping online than now. During the holiday season, shopping in a mall is extremely stressful and is very difficult. This is considered the peak of most retailers as customers flock malls and other shopping areas to look for gifts to giveaway this holiday season. The traffic going to the mall just falls slightly short of a horror story and also makes you endure long hours just waiting and for looking for a parking space. It was supposed to be a great and fun shopping experience but easily turned sour for shoppers. Good thing that there is already an alternative. One that has everything you could ever want for your family, friends and co-workers minus all the traffic, hassle and long lines - online shopping.You heard that right! You just need a computer, an internet connection, a credit card, a mouse and then you are all set to shop online right in your home with just a few clicks . How cool is that? No need for you to take your car and burn those gasoline(which is getting far more expensive these days), wait in line just to get a parking space, fall in a very long line just to pay and bump in with hundred of people in the mall at the same time. You can do your shopping at your own pace, without having to stress yourself from the mall rush.You may ask, how does this holiday bargain shopping really works? Just like regular shopping, there is a lot of thought involved. You should plan. Definitely you will encounter many gift ideas that is so confusing so to minimize your search, make sure you list the names of you friends and relatives that you intend to give gifts this yuletide season and gift ideas that you think they like. That would narrow down your search a lot. You may want to include your budget too just so you won't overspend.Start buying your gifts way before the Christmas rush so you would have enough time to compare the prices of websites. For sure, most items are affordable online but your can still get that item if you add up a little more patience. This is the reason why its called holiday bargain shopping online. You want to get the most out of the cash you have.Once you find something or a specific item that you'd want to give to someone, You better make a decision quickly if you want to get the item or not. There may be more stock available on the internet but they are most surely not unlimited.Holiday bargain shopping online is the new face of Christmas shopping. Dont get left behind and give it a shot for this December.

description.hltext_display: Now Will Probably Be The Perfect Time For Bathroom Renovation
description.content:
Bathroom restorations are probably not something that you look forward to tackling, in particular while heading into a New Year, however, this moment might be the ideal chance to come up with the improvements and move slightly closer to owning the home you've always wanted. Firstly, mortgage rates are at an all-time minimum. If you want to get a loan to get the work completed, then it is a great opportunity to lock in reduced rates that could get you paid entirely before you know it. Nevertheless, there are many personal motives to make your bathroom in to the room you have always wanted it to be. Before you choose to put it off for one more year, evaluate the following justifications why now is the best possible time to make the leap.
Start with the existing issues in your home bath. You may be married with children or single with house mates, an unsightly bathroom can be an eye sore and make you very embarrassed with regards to inviting family or friends over for a visit. No one wants to experience the kind of home which makes them feel uncomfortable if a guest needs to use the restroom. If anything you would like your house to be a showplace which impresses others whenever they stop by.
Likewise, your powder room reveals a good deal about the rest of your residence. An aging bathroom can expose likely plumbing problems that could possibly make the project more costly. In comparison, it might be a beautiful addition to the rest of the house. If you want to put together bathrooms around a particular design or trend, then there is a chance to create a bathroom that will impress.
Yet more important than likely humiliation and impressing your visitors, a bathroom is a place where you may releive stress at the end of a long day. Very little lowers hypertension more than a warm tub and a glass of your favorite wine as you unwind the hectic nature of your day or the duties awaiting you tomorrow. The bathroom is an exceptionally special spot where you can be to be with your emotions and recharge your batteries. Renovation needs only yield unwanted distractions.
Finally, bath restorations are more sensible today than later because they give you an occasion to revisit your imagination as well as perhaps apply it to the rest of the residence. As the nugget of advice goes, "one thing leads to another." Restroom restorations are often excellent ventures for getting your creativity flowing and skill which are needed in making necessary or wanted updates to the rest of your household. Think of it as a portal to the place you've always imagined.

description.hltext_display: Italian Consumer Morale Unexpectedly Strengthens In December
description.content:
(RTTNews) - Italian consumer sentiment rose further in December, defying expectations for a decline, results of a survey showed Wednesday.
The consumer confidence indicator advanced to 109.1 from 108.5 in the previous month, the research institute ISAE said, rising for the fourth consecutive month. Economists had forecast the index reading to fall to 108.3. The index has returned to levels seen at the start of the year, the think-tank said.
The Italian economy expanded at a faster pace in the third quarter than initially estimated, statistical office Istat announced earlier this month. Gross domestic product climbed 0.3% sequentially, faster than the 0.2% growth estimated previously. However, growth slowed from 0.5% recorded in the second quarter.
For comments and feedback: contact editorial@rttnews.com

description.hltext_display: 元旦升旗主持人新鮮組合 企業界俊男美女
description.content:
建國百年的元旦升旗典禮，主辦單位打破慣例，請來企業界人士主持，雅虎亞太董事總經理鄒開蓮表示，在特別的日子做特別的事情，非常值得紀念；統一企業總經理羅智先則表示，主辦單位認為這樣的安排是「驚喜」，他希望不會成為「驚嚇」。
建國百年元旦的第一場大型活動元旦升旗，請來雅虎亞太董事總經理鄒開蓮，以及統一企業總經理羅智先擔任主持人，打破以往慣例。鄒開蓮表示，建國百年是非常特殊的日子，元旦又是特別的momemt，接下這個工作，她的父親還一度以為她是要去升國旗『其實對我的家庭而言，這是一個很特別，非常榮譽的事情，我們都是生在台灣，長在台灣，當我們的國家一百週年，我們有這個機會能夠在這個特別的日子中，做一些特別的事情，我相信是很值得紀念的，也希望可以不負眾望，也不讓主委漏氣！』
羅智先則表示，年輕時他也參加過類似活動，但是像這種成為目光焦點的事情，他感到與有榮焉，他接下這個任務，排開這段時間公司所有的會議和重要行程，讓他的員工「如獲大赦」『我們還是非常非常緊張，因為這畢竟不是我們所專長的一件事情，主委說這是建國百年活動的第一個「驚喜」，我希望我們也很努力，希望不要各位有任何「驚嚇」！（哈哈哈......）』
文建會主委盛治仁希望當天打算參加元旦升旗的民眾，都能穿著有紅藍白三色的元素，展現齊心參加升旗典禮的感覺。

description.hltext_display: Soft Computing recrute commerciaux et managers
Col nuovo modulo il Vicenza viaggia a velocità doppia
description.content: Vicenza. Sì, è stata una vera e propria svolta. Da quando Maran ha deciso di cambiare e ha schierato la squadra con un nuovo assetto tattico il Vicenza ha cominciato a viaggiare a velocità doppia. Lo dicono i numeri e la matematica non è un'opinione.Nelle prime 14 partite con il modulo 4-2-3-1, che peraltro spesso diventava un 4-4-2, i biancorossi hanno raccolto 16 punti e cioè hanno marciato alla media di 1,1 punti a gara. Da quando il tecnico ha deciso di cambiare e di passare al 3-5-2 la squadra ha conquistato 13 punti nelle ultime 6 partite e dunque ha decisamente innalzato il ritmo, viaggiando alla media di 2,1 punti a gara.Insomma, con il nuovo modulo il Vicenza ha raddoppiato la velocità, fino a chiudere l'anno con 29 punti, a due sole lunghezze dalla zona playoff e con una partita ancora a disposizione (a Empoli l'8 gennaio 2011) per cercare di stabilire il bottino-record di punti nel girone d'andata nel campionato a 22, da quando la squadra è tornata in serie B.DIVARIO. Troppo netto lo scarto nella media-punti per non pensare che proprio il cambio di modulo non abbia inciso in modo decisivo. La squadra con il 3-5-2 ha raccolto quattro vittorie contro Padova, Crotone, Frosinone e Triestina, e un pareggio con il Siena che era pure una vittoria fino a pochi minuti dal termine.Soltanto a Pescara è rimasta a bocca asciutta, ma alla terza partita in sei giorni, con alcuni infortunati e complice la mancata concessione di un evidente rigore (fallo su Martinelli) che al 94' avrebbe potuto fruttare il pareggio.Nessun dubbio dal punto di vista dei risultati: rendimento da formazione di vertice con il 3-5-2, tanto da sollevare il rimpianto per non aver cambiato prima.CALENDARIO. Si potrebbe dire che il cambio di passo sia stato favorito anche dal cammino proposto dal calendario perché delle 6 partite della svolta il Vicenza ne ha disputate quattro in casa e al Menti quest'anno non è più la squadra-materasso di qualche anno fa ma una formazione che sa far valere il fattore-campo.Giocare davanti al proprio pubblico può aver aiutato il Vicenza ma non è la ragione determinante per spiegare una trasformazione nel rendimento tale da raddoppiare i punti.SOLIDITÀ. Sono anche cambiati alcuni giocatori nel passaggio dal modulo 4-2-3-1 al 3-5-2, ma neppure tanti. In realtà è cambiato il modo di utilizzarli da parte del tecnico, quindi la disposizione in campo della squadra.Con il nuovo assetto è un Vicenza sicuramente più equilibrato tra i reparti e più solido, in particolare grazie all'uomo in più al centro della difesa e nella linea mediana. Con tre marcatori centrali e tre centrocampisti centrali la squadra copre molto meglio il campo nelle zone nevralgiche e concede agli avversari molto meno spazio di manovra.METÀ CAMPO. In precedenza, con il 4-2-3-1, la squadra disposta su quattro linee era inevitabilmente più lunga, faceva più fatica a dare copertura alla difesa e lasciava molto spesso i due mediani in inferiorità numerica rispetto agli avversari e troppo lontani dalle punte per poter impostare l'azione. Era un Vicenza che soprattutto in trasferta non riusciva mai a limitare gli avversari.IL DERBY. Il passaggio al nuovo assetto tattico è maturato nel momento più difficile del campionato, dopo quattro sconfitte consecutive che avevano bocciato nei risultati la scelta tattica iniziale e imponevano comunque un cambio di rotta per non correre il rischio di infilarsi in un tunnel senza uscita.Maran ha puntato sul 3-5-2 alla vigilia di una gara doppiamente significativa, il derby al Menti contro il Padova. Fosse andata male, la stagione avrebbe preso una piega molto difficile ma è arrivata la vittoria tanto attesa e anche la svolta tattica ha dato nuove sicurezze alla squadra.Il 3-5-2 sembra così destinato a diventare il modulo-base del Vicenza anche nel girone di ritorno e quindi anche ad influenzare le scelte del prossimo mercato.MA. MA

description.hltext_display: Iker Casillas, en el último anuncio antes de las campanadas
description.content:
CANARIAS7.es le agradece su interés por hacer uso de sus canales de participación. La conversación es una parte fundamental de Internet y una de las mayores aportaciones de la Red a la nueva era de la comunicación. Los comentarios de este periódico están para que todos podamos expresar nuestras opiniones.
Los comentarios están sujetos a diversos sistemas antispam. Si el suyo no se publica de inmediato, no se preocupe, puede haber sido 'cazado' por error y será publicado en breve. Por favor, evite enviar reiteradamente el mismo comentario, entorpeciendo considerablemente la labor de redacción.
Los comentarios han de ceñirse a las propuestas temáticas de cada artículo o propuesta, y no se permiten aquellos que resulten ofensivos, insultantes, de escasa educación o consideración con el resto de los usuarios, ataques personales, los que no tengan relación con el tema, publicidad, spam y, en definitiva, todos los que no contribuyan a hacer de este servicio del periódico lo que pretende: un espacio de opinión, reflexión, comunicación y debate sosegado y libre.
No se permite el envío de mensajes de contenido sexista, racista, o que impliquen cualquier otro tipo de discriminación. Tampoco se admitirán mensajes difamatorios, ofensivos, que afecten a la vida privada de otras personas, que supongan amenazas, o cuyos contenidos impliquen la violación de cualquier ley española. Esto incluye los mensajes con contenidos protegidos por derechos de autor, a no ser que la persona que envía el mensaje sea la propietaria de dichos derechos o cuente con autorización para el uso de dichos contenidos. Tampoco se permitirá el uso de este servicio por parte de empresas para promocionar sus productos o servicios. De la misma manera, no se permite el envío de cartas cadena, marketing piramidal o similares.
Las mayúsculas tienen un uso bien definido en la gramática española. Escribir todo el texto en mayúsculas es un esfuerzo inútil que no hará que su mensaje se lea más, sino más bien menos. Los comentarios escritos total o parcialmente en mayúsculas, especialmente si se producen de forma reiterada, son susceptibles de ser eliminados.
En CANARIAS7.es apostamos por potenciar el buen uso del idioma y la expresión. Los mensajes tipo SMS que empobrecen la comunicación también corren el riesgo de no ser tomados en consideración.
Defendemos el anonimato en la Red como un ciberderecho básico de todo usuario, en especial como arma en contra de sistemas que se caracterizan por la censura, la intolerancia o las restricciones a la libertad de expresión e información. El anonimato tiene sentido cuando la identificación pueda conllevar grave riesgo para el autor por sus opiniones o informaciones. En CANARIAS7.es entendemos que algunos usuarios prefieran no identificarse. Sin embargo, esconderse detrás del anonimato para insultar, difamar, vejar, 'trollear' o realizar ataques personales es una perversión del derecho al anonimato que pone en riesgo su propia consideración ante la Justicia, la Red y la ciudadanía. Ese tipo de anonimato tampoco se tolera en este periódico.
Si lo que desea es efectuar alguna observación personal a la Redacción o Dirección del periódico, bien en contenidos o en formas, los comentarios no son el lugar adecuado para ello. Envíenos un mail a info(arroba)canarias7.es (sustituyendo (arroba) por @).
Esperamos que disfrute leyendo y participando en CANARIAS7.es

description.hltext_display: 北京CBD地块卖63亿元创新纪录 将建500米高楼
description.content: CBD核心地块中，Z15地块位于整个区域中间地带北端，未来将建成北京第一高楼（效果图）。 中服地块招标终于尘埃落定。北京市土地整理储备中心昨日公布，CBD核心区Z15地块花落中信集团，Z14地块由正大集团、玖龙纸业等11家企业组成的联合体获得。Z15地块是此次出让的CBD地块中规划建筑面积最大的一幅，达35万平方米。据招标文件要求，该地块上将建成未来"北京第一高楼"，建筑高度达到500米(视最终公布的招标方案)。 Z15楼面价18000元/平米 在CBD核心地块中，Z15地块位于整个区域中间地带北端，北侧是光华路，南侧是规划绿地。据招标文件要求，该地块上将建成500米高的未来"北京第一高楼"，而目前北京最高建筑国贸三期的高度为330米。 中服地块招标分为两个阶段。第一阶段投标中，Z15地块吸引了包括中信集团、大连万达、SOHO中国在内的26家企业投标，成为投标企业最多的三地块之一。中信集团、大连万达在第一阶段投标中分列前两名。12月7日的第二阶段投标中，中信集团、大连万达和海航集团三家企业投标，报价分别为63亿元、45亿元和59.5亿元。大连万达由于报价未达到招标底价而自动出局。最终，经过综合评标，中信集团在和海航的对决中胜出。 虽然63亿元的总价刷新了北京土地出让的新纪录，但业内普遍认为，Z15楼面价18000元/平米并不高。据了解，CBD核心区住宅普遍为4万-5万元/平米，部分在售楼盘价格超8万元/平米。 据中信方面透露，Z15地块将被规划为中信集团总部大楼。 Z14地块锁定"超级联合体" 位于Z15东侧的Z14地块建筑面积22万平方米。在第一阶段招标中，该地块共有13家企业投标，包括夺得设计方案头名的中信集团。最终，对Z15志在必得的中信集团放弃Z14。12月7日，包括昔日女首富张茵的玖龙纸业在内，11家企业组成超级联合体投标Z14，"超级联合体"也成为Z14第二阶段唯一的投标方，投标价41.14亿元，折合楼面价18700元/平方米。 关于Z14地块未来规划，记者联系了玖龙纸业公司公关部以及上海世茂旗下世茂股份有关人士，对方均表示尚不知情。 根据CBD地块出让有关规定，开发商拿地后至少须持有十年，其中不得转让，如遇到特殊情况，须经过商务中心管委会同意后方可出售。一位参与了CBD地块投标的开发商表示，受到出让规定的限制，加上CBD核心区建筑对于企业品牌的提升作用，推测Z14地块开发成大联合体共享的总部大楼可能性最大。

description.hltext_display: Garon stops 29 shots, lifts Jackets over Flames
description.content:
COLUMBUS Mathieu Garon made 29 saves in his debut as the Blue Jackets' No. 1 goalie, and Columbus snapped a four-game losing streak by beating the Calgary Flames 3-1 on Tuesday night.
Jakub Voracek, Jared Boll and Rostislav Klesla, scored for Columbus, which had only two wins in 12 games.
Olli Jokinen had the lone goal for Calgary, which lost its third straight.
Rookie Henrik Karlsson made 34 stops in his seventh outing of the season for the Flames, who have the worst road record in the Western Conference (5-11-3). Calgary has dropped five consecutive games and nine of 11 on the road.
Garon, a 10-year NHL veteran who won the Stanley Cup with Pittsburgh in 2009, took over the starting job from the struggling Steve Mason.
Mason was pulled in three of his last four starts, and his goals-against average and save percentage have dropped to near the bottom of the league. The 2009 rookie of the year in the NHL has been replaced in games a league-high 12 times the last two seasons.
Voracek opened the scoring with his sixth goal at 5:14 of the first. He curled off the half boards, skated past two defenders on his way to the high slot, and wristed a shot past Karlsson's glove hand. The goal was Voracek's first in 13 games and it marked the second time in 11 games that the Blue Jackets scored first.
The Flames nearly got on the board early in the second period, but Garon got just enough of Curtis Glenncross' slap shot to deflect it off the post.
Columbus converted its best chance of the period to make it 2-0. After a faceoff win in the Calgary zone, Tom Sestito threw a hard-angled shot at the net that caromed off the right post. The puck landed at the feet of Boll, who jammed it in at 11:18 for his third goal.
Five minutes later, with Antoine Vermette serving his second interference penalty of the period, Jokinen took a cross-ice pass from Jarome Iginla and shot a one-timer from the right circle inside the near post.
Late in the game, the Flames failed to take advantage of a power play. Garon smothered a shot with traffic in front as the penalty expired.
Klesla made it 3-1 with an empty-net goal in the final minute.
NOTES: The Flames played the second of a three-game road trip. They lost 4-1 to the Wild on Monday. ... The Blue Jackets are 9-8-1 at home. ... Calgary had won four of five meetings between the teams and two straight in Columbus. ... The Blue Jackets are 13-2 when scoring first.
