description.hltext_display: Tis The Season To Shop Online! Here's Some Tips and Tricks To Find The Good Stuff and Great Buys On Trustworthy Sites
description.content:
Tis the Season to Shop! If the thought of long lines and crowded stores makes you cringe, consider shopping online instead of trekking to the stores this year. Online shopping gives you the convenience of making purchases at any time from the comfort of your own home. Plus, almost every store you would travel to has an online shopping site, you can find gifts rather easily by using search features, and you can snag some pretty great deals. Here are some great online gift ideas to get you started:
· Photo calendars – The special people in your life will adore this gift, especially if you are the resident picture-taker in your family or group of friends. Photo calendars come in a variety of sizes, styles, and themes and you have lots of options in terms of laying out your pictures on each month's page. There are several websites that offer great calendar options, such as www.kodakgallery.com, www.snapfish.com, and www.shutterfly.com. Photo calendars are typically around $20 a piece but you can find amazing deals if you monitor these sites leading up to the holidays. Check each site to see which one is offering the best deal in terms of price per calendar, special sales for bulk ordering, and shipping costs. You could get lucky and find a phenomenal deal like buy one get one half price plus free shipping.
· Envirosax bags – These eco-friendly bags are a female favorite. They are thin, light weight bags that are durable and can roll up to the size of your palm, so you can store them easily when you're not using them. They serve as a perfect spare bag – the kind you put in your purse in case you do some spur of the moment shopping one day. However, they are useful and pretty enough to serve as an everyday bag. They come in a multitude of colors and designs so you are sure to find the perfect bag for each woman in your life. Single bags cost around $9 or you can get a pouch of five bags for about $40 at www.envirosax.com.
· Wall decals – These are gaining in popularity and are a perfect gift for anyone who wants to decorate their room or home. Wall decals can be used on virtually any surface that is clean and smooth, they are quick and easy to use with no artistic skill or tools required, and they are easily removable without damaging your walls or other surfaces. They come in a wide variety of sizes, shapes, colors, and themes. You can find decals for nurseries and kids' rooms, decals for sports fans, decals with modern patterns, decals that are holiday themed, inspirational quotes decals, dry erase and chalkboard decals, and decals that look like trees and flowers, to name a few. Sites like www.wallforalldecals.com offer a wide variety of decal designs for adults and kids of all ages at affordable prices AND with low shipping costs- compared to the competition, this site ranked fairly high on our list of must-see's! Most wall decals cost $10-30 and some decal websites even have a gift certificate option. And did we mention wall decals don't damage walls?!
If you're having trouble finding the perfect gift for your loved one, you can also get some great ideas at www.gifts.com where you can search gift ideas by gender, age, price, category, and personality. In addition, sites like www.amazon.com, www.redenvelope.com, and www.overstock.com have a wide variety of gifts and offer great deals.
Now that you know where to look, you could get all of your online shopping done in no time and like a pro! But before you do, there are several safety tips to adhere to when shopping online. First, make sure the company is legitimate. If you are unfamiliar with the store, call their phone number and do a quick Google search to find customer ratings and other helpful information. Second, make sure the site is secure. There should be a closed padlock icon on the site or some other notification that the site is a secure one. Third, don't provide information that you think is unnecessary for the purchase. Next, make sure you understand the store's policy on returns, warranties, delivery dates, shipping and handling costs, and other applicable fees. Finally, after making your purchase, be sure to print the receipt or have it emailed to you.
Now you're ready. Happy shopping!

description.hltext_display: A Mothers Mission to Support Our Troops
description.content:
Standing up and supporting our troops through songs while trying to bolster the morale of our troops is an exhausting mission, a mission Songwriter and Army Mom Angela Lashley is proud to do.
FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE / PRURGENT
Contact Jessica Diana, Eclectic Media Productions (347) 92-STARS or (347) 927-8277, Email: infomediaproductions.tv
A Mother’s Mission to Support Our Troops
(Nashville, TN) – Standing up and supporting our troops through songs while trying to bolster the morale of our troops is an exhausting mission, a mission Songwriter and Army Mom Angela Lashley is proud to do.
Lashley’s life was forever changed when she received a phone call from her son Jonathan “Mom, I’m joining the Army” he said. Those few words would change Lashley’s purpose for moving to Nashville and lead to a song called “So Brave” that would tell her son how brave he is while supporting military families everywhere.
After the life changing phone call, Lashley and her husband sat in silence until Lashley said aloud “when did he get so brave?” That sentence put her on a journey to honor her son’s bravery, and comfort others in the same situation she found herself in.
Lashley came to Nashville to pursue her song writing career after her children were all grown and off to college. She had always been told she was talented and decided to pursue this career she loved. However, once she reached Nashville and found out her son was enlisting in the Army, that musical path would change for Lashley. It drove her to write songs that engulf her emotions and the experiences she’s encountered as an Army Mom, and express them in a way only she can.
After the song “So Brave” was released, more songs followed that were inspired by the loved ones of soldiers from all over the world who contacted Angela about So Brave. These songs not only touched the families with relatives in the Armed Forces, but the troops as well. It soon expanded farther than that, by touching people’s lives that don’t have anyone enlisted but could feel what these families feel.
These songs deemed Lashley the “Musical Military Mom of this War”, a title she is very proud to hold!
The song “So Brave” is politically vague. Instead it expresses the love and support for the troops and their families who sacrifice their loved ones through absence and death, to protect a country we’re proud to call home. It emphasizes the courage of servicemen and women facing danger day in and out, 24 hours a day. Most importantly it’s an open expression of a mother’s perception of how brave her child is, and how proud she is of him. That’s what her songs are all about.
Lashley’s goal is to help build the morale of the troops, which is very low, through her gift of music; and let these troops know they are loved and appreciated by everyone here back home.
Lashley has a holiday project to help build the morale of our troops. That is to have a blue star shining in the window of households nationwide. The meaning of the Blue Star is extolled and honored in Lashley’s song “Blue Star in the Window.” Her vision is for those who would hear the song in the media to understand the meaning of the near forgotten symbol of the American military mother. She believes nothing could be more effective to raise the morale of troops everywhere, home for the holidays or not, than for there to be a BLUE STAR shining in a window in every neighborhood in this country on Christmas Eve. A printable BLUE STAR for windows and the song singing its message are free from her website.
You can find out more about Lashley by visiting her website http://sobravesong.com or purchase “So Brave” through CD Baby at http://www.cdbaby.com/cd/angelalashley
Angela Lashley is available for interviews. Please contact Shannon Rose at Eclectic Media Productions (347) 92-STARS or (347) 927-8277, Email:
infomediaproductions.tv
Angela Lashley is represented by Eclectic Media Productions National PR Firm. Website: http://mediaproductions.tv

description.hltext_display: State of Audience Targeting Industry Study Finds 85 Percent of Agencies and Advertisers Currently Ut
description.content:
AudienceScience® released the results of their biannual State of the Targeting Industry study, conducted in conjunction with DIGIDAY. The overall findings indicate that marketing decision makers at top brands have further embraced audience targeting as a vital component of their programs in recent months, a development that AudienceScience attributes to better education and a demonstrated positive effect on revenue.
Key findings include:
85 percent of agency and advertiser respondents use audience targeting.
Nearly 50 percent of agencies and advertisers see spending on audience targeting to increase to over $500K in 2011.
For 63 percent of publishers, audience targeting has demonstrably increased revenue.
Over half of agency and advertiser respondents attribute their increased display budget to the effectiveness of audience targeting and the ability to better justify the advertising spend.
Audience Targeting and Data Management Platforms have emerged as a major provider of these services that now rival ad networks and exchanges.
Increasing transparency, quality data and usage rights, and potential third party validation of targets are seen as ways to improve upon audience targeting.
The previous installment of this study, conducted in May 2010, established that audience targeting had become a cornerstone of most online advertising campaigns. However, in just the six months since that study was conducted, new companies and technologies have emerged to drastically alter the landscape. With the growth of so many competing and overlapping platforms and services, there is market confusion over who does what and who can offer the solutions to best achieve marketers' specific goals and needs. Agencies, advertisers and publishers alike demand the ability to trust their partners when it comes to data quality, privacy best practices and maximizing returns.
"Analysis of this study, along with the one conducted in May, indicates that audience targeting has entered the mainstream as an essential part of any successful marketing campaign," said Marla Schimke, vice president of marketing, AudienceScience. "Spending on Audience Targeting continues to increase as advertisers, agencies and publishers all recognize the value of audience targeting as an effective channel. With Audience Targeting and Data Management platforms leading the way, the industry continues to improve the practice to make it less complex and more accessible to marketers, mitigating the confusion around disparate offerings. Companies like AudienceScience are developing new solutions like AudienceScience Connect™, our premier Media Transaction Platform and implementing practices that ensure transparency and data quality while offering brands the assurance of maximum returns that they require."
To download the complete study, visit www.AudienceScience.com.
About AudienceScience:
AudienceScience provides an integrated data management and audience targeting platform, enabling universal access to audiences. With 270 billion data insights daily into over 386 million people worldwide, this industry leading technology, The Audience Gateway, drives digital marketing success by empowering marketers with the intelligence and control to execute effective global campaigns. Strengthening AudienceScience's global presence are the 2010 acquisitions of Europe-based targeting leader wunderloop and Hispanic audience targeting innovator Consorte Media. Since 2003, AudienceScience has delivered over 100,000 targeted campaigns for clients including American Airlines, Financial Times, Gannett, New York Times Digital, Nikkei.com, SKECHERS, T-Com, Orange, Terra, Telecom Italia and Wall Street Journal Digital. For more information, please visit www.AudienceScience.com/.

description.hltext_display: L'Italia resta orfana di Bearzotil grande «vecio» del calcio
description.content: Milano. Il suo naso da boxeur e la sua pipa perennemente accesa hanno fatto la felicità dei vignettisti per anni. Erano i segni distintivi di Enzo Bearzot, scomparso ieri ad 83 anni. Detto «il vecio», come si fa per tutti i friulani doc - era nato ad Aiello del Friuli il 26 settembre 1927 - anche per quelli che vecchi non sono. Ed in effetti lui non lo è stato mai: aiutato in questo dalla passione del calcio che lo aveva preso da ragazzino, quando in un collegio di Gorizia dormiva con la foto di Campetelli, centromediano dell'Inter, sotto il cuscino. E non era taciturno né introverso, come sostenevano i suoi denigratori: non gli piaceva sprecare le parole. Fosse stato come lo dipingevano non avrebbe mai creato il gruppo che conquistò il terzo titolo mondiale del calcio italiano nel 1982 in Spagna.Un gruppo che non si è mai sciolto, neanche quando qualcuno si è allontanato dal pallone come Paolo Rossi. Oppure è stato prematuramente rapito dalla morte come Scirea. Un gruppo che ha mantenuto i contatti con l'uomo che l'ha plasmato e che continuerà a considerarlo vivo. Un legame veramente speciale, quello che legava gli azzurri a Enzo Bearzot: riconoscenti perché prima di condurli al traguardo più importante della loro carriera aveva saputo difenderli da critiche feroci. E li aveva sostenuti quando decisero quel clamoroso e innovativo silenzio stampa che anche oggi, di tanto in tanto, viene imitato. Il portavoce era Dino Zoff, altro friulano di poche parole, che Bearzot considerava il suo terzo figlio e che un giorno si sarebbe seduto sulla panchina azzurra con minor fortuna.Nel dicembre del 2000 il gruppo si strinse ancora una volta intorno a Bearzot, che presentava (con l'autore Gigi Garanzini) il libro biografico «Il romanzo del vecio». In quella serata il tecnico sorprese i suoi vecchi allievi rivelando che il calcio non gli mancava, pur amandolo: «Perchè sento di non appartenervi più». C'era amarezza nelle sue parole, un po' di malinconia, forse stimolata dalle note del jazz: la musica era la sua seconda passione. Quella sera Bearzot parlava del calcio al passato remoto, come di una storia finita tanto tempo prima.Ma dopo poco più di un anno - a gennaio del 2002 - mettendo fine a un distacco ventennale, Bearzot aveva accettato con rinnovato entusiasmo l'invito della Federcalcio ad assumere la responsabilità di presidente del settore tecnico della Figc. In quell'occasione Claudio Gentile, uno del gruppo, allora tecnico della Under 21, ricordando il bel gioco espresso dalla nazionale nei mondiali del 1978 in Argentina (azzurri quarti) e dell''82, lo definì il miglior commissario tecnico azzurro dopo Vittorio Pozzo: morto - incredibile coincidenza - come lui il 21 dicembre ma del 1968. L'ex terzino azzurro sosteneva che «Enzo Bearzot non deve restare lontano dal calcio, perché il calcio è il suo mondo». «Sono contento perché l'indicazione viene dal mio mondo», replicò lui. La sua avventura nel calcio era cominciata come giocatore: dalla Pro Gorizia, era passato, ventenne, all'Inter, poi al Catania, poi all'Inter nuovamente, ed aveva terminato la carriera al Torino. Era un difensore grintoso ma corretto, non privo di tecnica. Delle sue esperienze di calciatore seppe far tesoro alla guida della nazionale, riuscendo ad utilizzare al meglio i giocatori che sceglieva: incurante dei suggerimenti e delle critiche della stampa, anche quando i risultati non gli davano ragione. Fautore del «primo non prenderle» non fu mai catenacciaro. Fu maestro invece nell'esaltare l'arte del contropiede con cui nell'82 in Spagna schiantò una dopo l'altra Argentina, Brasile e Germania. Indimenticabili le imprese dei terzini-ala Cabrini e Gentile, delle ali a tutto campo Conti-Graziani, di Tardelli giocatore universale, di Zoff portiere-saracinesca, di Paolo Rossi imprendibile opportunista, di Scirea direttore d'orchestra di un gioco che a tratti ricordava il free-jazz per l'imprevedibilità.Paradossalmente, però, quattro anni dopo, l'attaccamento al gruppo e la conseguente incapacità a rinnovare gli fu fatale. Al cospetto di risultati negativi - mancata qualificazione agli Europei '84, eliminazione negli ottavi del mondiale messicano '86 - attaccato dalla critica e di fronte all'ostilità del vertice federale preferì lasciare anziché rinunciare alle sue convinzioni. Ma nella storia del calcio rimarranno sempre le immagini delle imprese precedenti. L'urlo e la corsa pazza di Tardelli dopo il gol alla Germania e quel giovane «vecio», dal naso di boxeur e dalla pipa eternamente accesa, che sull'aereo degli eroi di Madrid gioca a scopone con Causio, Zoff e il presidente della Repubblica Sandro Pertini: un altro celebre appassionato della pipa, un altro «vecio» che, come lui, non invecchiò mai.Ieri la consegna del silenzio è stata le regola di comportamento della famiglia Bearzot e degli amici più intimi. Fuori dal palazzo di via Crivelli, a Milano, dove Bearzot ha vissuto per anni, solo un commosso ricordo da parte dei vicini di casa che nel corso degli anni lo hanno incrociato per le vie della zona vigentina. A quanto si è appreso non è ancora stata fissata la data del funerale. Non è escluso che questo possa essere celebrato in Friuli o a Milano, nella parrocchia di Santa Maria al Paradiso che l'ex ct frequentava regolarmente. Da Roma, invece, l'omaggio più alto è arrivato dal presidente della Repubblica Giorgio Napolitano che, spiega una nota del Quirinale, «ha appreso con commozione» la notizia della scomparsa di Enzo Bearzot, «indimenticato commissario tecnico della nazionale italiana, campione del mondo in Spagna nel 1982. Calciatore e allenatore di grande talento, nella sua lunga e intensa carriera si è sempre reso testimone della più alta etica sportiva, trasmettendo un forte messaggio di lealtà, rispetto delle regole e correttezza nel gioco come nella vita. Nella nostra memoria la sua figura rimane indissolubilmente legata a quella del presidente Sandro Pertini: tra loro si stabilì un'amicizia suggellata dal medesimo spirito di rigorosa rettitudine e da analoga, umana schiettezza».

description.hltext_display: Alerta amarilla por viento y olas de 3 a 4 metros
description.content: La Agencia Estatal de Meteorología (Aemet) mantiene la alerta amarilla por rachas máximas de viento de hasta 75 kilómetros por hora en los municipios de La Orotava y Vilaflor, en Tenerife, así como en las cumbres y este de La Palma y en El Hierro, isla donde se prevén ráfagas de hasta 70 kilómetros por hora. El nivel de riesgo permanecerá hasta la medianoche del miércoles, según información de la Aemet recogida por Europa Press, que vaticina que desde mañana y hasta la medianoche del jueves se activará la alerta amarilla por riesgo de fuerte oleaje en la costa norte de Gran Canaria, las islas de Lanzarote y Fuerteventura, norte y oeste de La Palma, norte de La Gomera, El Hierro, y el litoral norte de Tenerife. Así pues, la Aemet advierte de mar de fondo del oeste-noroeste de 2 a 3 metros, aumentando pronto con olas de 3 a 4 metros. En general, este martes se prevén en Canarias intervalos nubosos con lluvias débiles en el extremo occidental y en el oeste del resto de las islas. POR PROVINCIAS En concreto, la previsión meteorológica en la provincia de Las Palmas para hoy indica que en Gran Canaria habrá intervalos nubosos con lluvias débiles. En Fuerteventura y Lanzarote se prevén intervalos nubosos con posibilidad de lluvias débiles. En cuanto al viento, soplará del oeste moderado a fuerte, más intenso en costa oeste, en medianías y en zonas altas Las temperaturas se mantendrán sin cambios o en ligero ascenso en las máximas. En Las Palmas de Gran Canaria oscilarán entre los 28 y 21 grados centígrados. Igualmente, la previsión en la provincia de Santa Cruz de Tenerife indica un predominio de los intervalos nubosos en general, con lluvias débiles. En cuanto a las temperaturas, el termómetro registrará un ligero ascenso en las máximas y un ligero descenso en las mínimas, principalmente en medianías y cumbres, y oscilará entre los 27 y 20 grados centígrados. Por último, según la Aemet, el viento soplará en esta provincia del oeste moderado a fuerte, siendo fuerte con rachas de muy fuerte en zonas altas y cumbres. TEMPORAL Un total de 16 provincias están en alerta por lluvias que podrán acumular hasta 30 litros por metro cuadrado en una hora, por tormentas y por vientos de hasta 80 kilómetros por hora, según la predicción de la Aemet. Concretamente, Cádiz está en alerta naranja (riesgo importante) por lluvias --también está en alerta amarilla por viento y tormentas--, mientras que Córdoba, Granada, Málaga, Badajoz y Cáceres están en alerta amarilla (riesgo moderado) por el mismo fenómeno meteorológico. Además, Sevilla tiene el mismo nivel de alerta por lluvia, viento y tormentas; Huelva y Ceuta lo están por lluvia y viento; y Navarra, La Rioja, las tres provincias aragonesas y las islas de Tenerife, La Palma y el Hierro se encuentran en alerta amarilla por viento. Así, se esperan precipitaciones débiles a moderadas en la Península y Baleares, persistentes y ocasionalmente con tormentas en Extremadura, oeste y centro de Andalucía, donde pueden ser localmente fuertes. Además, los chubascos serán menos intensos cuanto más hacia el este se produzcan, siendo débiles en Baleares y menos probables en el extremo sudeste y en el Levante. Por otro lado, los vientos soplarán de moderados a fuertes y de componente oeste en el suroeste andaluz, Málaga y Canarias, y serán del sur en Pirineos, Sistema Ibérico y zonas altas de la Península. En el resto de España predominarán las ráfagas moderadas del sur, excepto en Galicia, donde serán del noreste. Por último, la cota de nieve se situará entre los 1.000 y 1.300 metros en el extremo norte peninsular, subiendo hasta los 1.400 o los 2.000 metros. En el resto de la mitad norte y zona centro, oscilará entre los 1.400 y 2.000 metros. Asimismo, las temperaturas experimentarán un ascenso que variará de ligero a moderado, excepto en el extremo norte peninsular, Baleares y Canarias, donde se mantendrán sin cambios significativos.

description.hltext_display: "Se quei sei si comportano benela prossima volta vanno a Roma"
description.content:
la prossima volta vanno a Roma"
Le manovre per le elezioni regionali della primavera di quest'anno. Le parole ai suoi del boss Pelle. Le microspie registrano gli incontri in una casa di Bovalino, nella Locride
dal nostro inviato ATTILIO BOLZONI
REGGIO CALABRIA - A casa Pelle vanno in scena le "primarie" del centrodestra di Reggio. Pelle Giuseppe da San Luca, boss della 'ndrangheta, sorvegliato speciale con obbligo di firma. A casa Pelle, si decide chi sale e chi scende dalla giostra della politica calabrese.
Davanti al suo "domicilio coatto" c'è sempre la fila. Ogni volta che si va a votare, quelli sono là con il cappello in mano. "Loro hanno bisogno di noi", ricorda un mafioso al suo capo. E loro, quei candidati, si presentano in massa. Il boss li riceve a corte. Le elezioni sono quelle del Consiglio regionale della primavera di questo 2010, si traffica su appalti e trasferimenti di detenuti al 41 bis, però quello che i candidati veramente vogliono è raggiungere "un accordo" a vita con chi comanda. Sfilano e s'inchinano molti di quelli che corrono nella lista "per Scopelliti Presidente", il governatore voluto da Berlusconi, "l'uomo giusto per la Calabria", l'ex sindaco "più amato dagli italiani" che con oltre il 70 per cento dei consensi nella provincia di Reggio ha seppellito il centro sinistra. Sono amministratori comunali, avvocati, imprenditori. E medici come Santi Zappalà, sindaco di Bagnara, il più fortunato, il prescelto dai Pelle di San Luca.
Telecamere e microspie riprendono gli incontri alla vigilia del 28 marzo in una casa di via Borrello numero 20, a Bovalino nella Locride. Le selezioni sono cominciate, i boss ascoltano i pretendenti, dubbiosi si
consultano fra loro. Si rammarica Giuseppe Pelle: "Questi voti si disperdono tutti". E spiega: "La nostra politica è sbagliata, dobbiamo raccogliere tutto quello che abbiamo così vanno già in 6 al Consiglio regionale... e se si comportano bene la prossima volta quei 6 vanno a Roma e vanno altri 6 al posto di quelli, in questa maniera si può andare avanti sempre". L'interesse dei boss cade su Santi Zappalà, uno che ha consegnato al prefetto la sua fascia tricolore di sindaco "perché Bagnara è diventata terra di conquista da parte di criminali, ladri e assassini", uno che - anche lui - ha come slogan per la sua campagna elettorale "la politica del fare". Chi è Zappalà? Un rispettabilissimo fisiatra. Uno che - secondo i carabinieri - non chiede semplicemente l'appoggio della 'ndrangheta "ma è conosciuto dai massimi esponenti dell'organizzazione".
È il 27 febbraio, esattamente un mese prima del voto. E il sindaco di Bagnara arriva a Bovalino accompagnato da amici, uno è l'imprenditore Giuseppe Mesiani. Non perde tempo e non si spreca in giri di parole il dottore Zappalà, appena entra nella casa dice: "Vediamo se possiamo trovare un accordo". Gli risponde Pelle: "Da parte nostra ci sarà il massimo impegno". Parola mantenuta: i voti per Zappalà saranno 11.058. Alla conta, il fisiatra è il primo degli eletti nella provincia di Reggio. Nella casa di Bovalino si parla anche "di lavori per gli amici". E Mesiani, che è imprenditore edile, si sente in dovere di intervenire: "Quando sposo una causa io e gli amici miei diamo il massimo, nello stesso tempo poi non che dico che pretendiamo ma...".
Sono cavalli vincenti quelli che raggiungono Bovalino ma anche grandi elettori, supporter. Come Liliana Aiello, pure lei candidata nella lista "per Scopellitti Presidente". È una funzionaria della Regione che cinque giorni prima dell'apertura delle urne, il 23 marzo, bussa alla porta di Giuseppe Pelle. E dopo un riferire voci su certe attività dell'ex governatore Agazio Loiero ("Ha affari in mezzo mondo da far spavento, con quelli della Russia, con quelli di tutte le parti"), comincia a sparlare su chi fa compravendita di voti. La signora ha idee molto chiare: "Il pagamento no, perché ormai sono tutti svegli, io pago i voti però poi non ti riconosco, cioè se io pago vuol dire che non ti voglio più riconoscere, cioè non ci conosciamo. Se io invece dico no (i voti non si comprano, ndr) il rapporto ci rimane sempre, di stima, di riconoscenza, di amicizia e di tutto".
Quando i boss rimangono da soli commentano e si lamentano. Il più sofferente è Aldo Marvelli: "I partiti sono sempre di più... questa è una cosa che dobbiamo gestire noi in tutto il nostro locale (la famiglia, ndr), nel paese nostro dobbiamo gestircela noi, no che la gestiscono loro, i partiti". E quando poi devono decidere se appoggiare un certo Pietro Nucera, medico all'ospedale di Melito Porto Salvo, qualcuno chiede: "E' a destra lui no?, perché là quando vedono uno di sinistra... è inutile che glielo portiamo". Alla fine Mario Versaci, rivolgendosi al capo, fa la sua sintesi della campagna elettorale: "Compare, sapete quale è il fatto? Noi siamo per loro una valvola di scarico, loro hanno bisogno di noi".

description.hltext_display: 重庆部分银行停发个人房贷 称年底信贷额度紧张
description.content: 昨日下午，市内部分银行传出"惊人"消息：最近已全面暂停发放个人房贷，重启个人房贷可能要待明年初。 个人房贷全面暂停 "我们已经暂停发放个人房贷了，一手房、二手房的都停了。"深圳发展银行重庆分行有关人士称，暂停的原因，是临近年底信贷额度比较紧张。 市内全面暂停发放个人房贷的银行并非深发展一家。某商业银行重庆分行有关人士称，该行也于近日暂停了一手房和二手房个人房贷发放。另一商业银行南坪一网点的工作人员则表示，现在受理的个人房贷申请，最快也得明年初才会放款。另一商业银行重庆分行有关人士也称，该行也暂停了个人房贷发放。 在市内银行人士看来，部分银行之所以暂停个人房贷，主要是此前发放较猛，再加上最近又调高了存款准备金率，所以最近信贷额度骤然紧张。 有两个消息可以佐证这种说法---今年11月，全市住房贷款余额增加65.95亿元，占当月个人中长期消费贷款增量的89.9%。本月间，因为央行提高存款准备金率，市内银行可用于放贷的资金减少66亿元左右。 购房者用不着担忧 "市民贷款买房根本不用着急，现在着急的应该是开发商。"某商业银行重庆分行有关人士称，银行停房贷不会对市民购房产生任何影响，因为"市民要买房，只需要给开发商交定金或首付款"。又因为"银行的贷款资金是直接发放到开发商手里的"，暂停房贷只会让开发商拿到钱的时间大大延长。 在该人士看来，银行暂停发放个人房贷，对按揭购房的市民还是一种保护。因为如果银行很快就把钱打到开发商账上，不排除有开发商拿着这些钱用于其他项目，但是贷款的负担却要购房者背负。 卖二手房要受影响 南岸区弹子石市民夏先生称，他在一个月前便把位于沙坪坝区的一套二手房卖了。买家付了首付款以后，在市内一家银行办了二手房贷款，"可我至今还没有拿到银行的钱。" 在某商业银行重庆分行有关人士看来，个人房贷重启估计得在明年初。也就是说，卖二手房的市民，若买家要找银行办按揭，可能要在明年初才能拿到全款。另一商业银行重庆分行有关人士也提醒，如果市民想在最近卖房套现，应该要有"银行延迟放款"的心理准备。 对开发商的影响有待观望 市内部分银行全面暂停发放个人房贷，对急于回笼资金的开发商来说无疑是个坏消息。但最终影响几何呢？ 在重庆中原地产人士看来，银行暂停发放房贷，对开发商的影响有待观望。 一方面，从短期来看，银行暂停发放个人房贷以后，最近急于回笼资金的开发商可能会着急。另一方面，从中期来看，银行停发个人房贷估计不会持续太久。若在明年初迅速重启个人房贷发放，那么对多数开发商来说影响并不大。毕竟现在开发商卖一套房以后，也要等上一段时间才能拿到银行的按揭贷款。

description.hltext_display: 結婚に向けて見苦しくなってきた彼女 - 憧れだったんでしょうけど…
description.content:
私は38歳、彼女は36歳です。縁があって来年結婚することになりました。私も彼女ももういい年で、若い頃の様な燃え上がる情熱はありませんが、お互いを尊重しつつ相応の付き合いを続けております。
ところが、具体的に結婚に向けた話しを進めているうちに、だんだん彼女の様子がおかしくなってきました。結納はこう、婚約指輪はこう、新婚旅行はこう、新居はこう、家具はこう、といった具合に、彼女の中にはかなり具体的なイメージが固まっている様なのですが、いずれも随分派手で大げさな内容であり、かなり違和感があります。ただこれらは私たち二人或いはせいぜい家族の範囲内の話なので、気の済む様にさせてあげるつもりですが、極め付きは彼女が夢想する派手派手な結婚式です。
我々は四捨五入すると40だし、本当は、それなりのレストランでごく親しい親族・友人を招いて手作り感のある式・披露宴をしたかったのですが、それは諦めざるを得ませんでした。
それでも、
なあ、なんで忙しいのに講義に通ってまで教会で式を挙げるの？
お色直しをそんなにする必要あるの（白無垢とウェディングドレスはかぶってるだろ）？
なにそのウェディングドレス？自分の二の腕見たことあるだろ？
お色直し後のドレスの胸元がなんでそんなに開いてるの？見苦しいでしょ。
10年も音信不通の友人にまで動員かける必要あるの？
そもそもこのホテルでなくちゃ駄目っていう理由が良く判んないよ。オレの大学の同窓が利用する○○○○でいいじゃん、格式もあるし、メシも旨いし。
毎日喧嘩です。
どうも友人達の中では遅い結婚となる様なので、満を持してという気持ちの様なのですが、私の意向は完全に置き去りです。
そんなところで見栄張って、人間として薄く見えるよ？
何とか彼女を思いとどまらせたく考えておりますが、客観的なご意見をお聞かせください。
ユーザーID：2698820690
お気に入り登録数：943
古いレス順
レス数：401本
1 2 3 4 5 すべて トピ主のみ(9)
タイトル
投稿者
大
2010年12月19日 19:14
あなたが言う通り、見苦しい
その彼女、変ですよ・・・
結婚やめた方がいいと思う
ユーザーID：8553921420
momo
2010年12月19日 19:16
普段は冷静な彼女が、”Ｔｈｅ・結婚・イベント”にだけ人間変わっているのなら、出来るだけお付き合いしてあげたほうがいいですよ。
イベント後の生活にもかかわることには引き締めも大事ですが、イベントに夢持って夢持って生きてきたのかも知れません。
思うようにやらせてあげれば、のちの生活の幸せが保証されます。
それより、わざわざ教会に通ってまでするなら、あなたのために、と恩を着せてポイント稼いだ方がいいです。似合わないドレスは、彼女の親兄弟や友人にも意見を聞いて、やめさせた方が親切です。
まあ、がんばってください。式が終わって3か月もしたら元に戻りますから。
ユーザーID：9975802802
人生一度きり
2010年12月19日 19:18
そういう女性の価値観・金銭感覚はいくら言っても変えることはできない。
今からそんな状況じゃ、この先ほんと思いやられるね・・
もう一度、考え直したほうがいいと思う。
ユーザーID：9296007377
たまご
2010年12月19日 19:20
トピ主さんは堅実でまっとうな金銭感覚の持ち主だとお見受けしました。
トピ主さんたちと同年代・既婚女です。
われわれは披露宴に関してはトピ主さんと同じような感覚だったのですが、私の親が「一流ホテルでやらないのは恥」「出席者に手作りのギフトだなんてみっともない」だのなんだのと口を挟み、本人たちの意向無視の派手披露宴になってしまいました。
今思えば、本人たちの意向重視で、と突っぱねることもできたのでしょうが、しこりを残したくなかったのです。でも、結果としてわれわれは妻実家とは距離を置き、夫実家と親しくする関係で定着しています。
この場合はお相手が派手に披露したいと言っている以上、避けようがないですよね。
結婚式・披露宴の時だけで済むならあと数ヶ月辛抱すればいい話。
でも私はそういうお相手が、結婚後身の丈に合った生活をしていけるのか、そこに不安を覚えます。やめるなら今のうち、でしょうね。
ま、お付き合いしている間に見抜けなかったトピ主さんもトピ主さんということで、このまま進むのもありかと思います。
お幸せに！
ユーザーID：3302216380
しずか
2010年12月19日 19:23
結婚前の、そういったゴタゴタを処理することこそが
結婚生活を順調におくるための第一関門であり
最大の難所です。
いいかげんに流してしまってはいけません。
お互いが十分に納得するまで、出来るまで
すり合わせをすることをオススメします。
ここをいいかげんに済ますと、後々ほころびが出てきますよ。
毎日喧嘩で良いと思います。
妥協せず本音を出し合って頑張ってください。
ユーザーID：5837709259
あいラン
2010年12月19日 19:33
お二方のご両親はどう思ってるのでしょうか？
資金は大丈夫ですか？
見栄もあるのでしょうがお二人に見合ったお式で十分だと思います。
そんなに気合入れてあれもこれもやりたいこと全部やって・・・！白無垢にドレスもって・・・どんだけ結婚式に気合入れてるの！？って周りは内心ドン引きですよ。
人に見せるお式は少し控えめなほうがお上品でよい式だと思いますね。
披露宴をどこか店を貸しきって会費制でおしゃれにするのがうらやましがられますよ＾＾
ユーザーID：8928371635
真央
2010年12月19日 19:37
私たち夫婦も昨年、私36歳と夫37歳で結婚しました。
私たちもすごくもめて、毎日喧嘩してました。
36歳であれば、やっとという思いはぬぐいきれないと思います。
堂々と手にとった結婚情報誌を見れば、妄想は膨れ上がります。
いままでたくさんの式に出てきたのだから、その経験も踏まえれば、妄想は無限大です。
十分に妄想させてあげてください。
ただ、本当に彼女を愛しているなら（愛してるのですよね？）、ブレーキを掛けられるのはトピ主さんだけです。
彼女にとっては耳の痛いことだらけでしょうけど、「なんのための結婚式なのか」をテーマできちんと話し合えば納得してもらえると思いますよ。
私の場合は、以下に説得されました。
都内高級ホテル→実家近くの神社
ウェディングドレスお色直し→母の訪問着
たくさんの友人→2人
今では本当によい式だったと思ってますし、親族からは大好評でした。
夫の「結婚式は育ててくれた両親に見せるもの」という一言が効きましたね。
私の両親は私の好きなようにって言ってくれてましたが。。。。結果、とても喜んでくれました。
ユーザーID：6645552092
コタツムリなう
2010年12月19日 19:38
結婚式に理想を抱き続ける期間が長い人だとそういう方向に突っ走る人多いですね。若いとお金がないから派手婚はできないし、親に援助してもらうとそれはそれで親の意向を無視できないから常識的な式になりますしね。
式の派手さはお金と比例するのでお互いに折り合いをつけなければならないですが、ドレスだけは好きなのを選んでもらっては？二の腕を隠せるドレスなんてないですよ。何を着ても太いもんは太い。ダイエットするしかないです。
ユーザーID：0243416085
るるるの女房
2010年12月19日 19:40
とても冷たくてびっくりしました。。。
ご自身ではそう感じませんでしょうか？
二の腕、胸元を30過ぎてさらすと、他人ならともかく旦那様からも
そんな風に批判されてしまうのでしょうか？
正直、20代で結婚した若い友人らの結婚式も
「演出過多」、「自己満足なんだろうな」と感じたこともしばしば。
でも本人たちのお祝いの席なのですから、思う存分楽しんでもらって
良いと思いました。
年齢は関係ありません。
仮にですが奥様が26歳だったとしたら、喜んですべて
言いなりになったのでしょうか？
「若くてかわいいお嫁さんをもらえた！」とお友達に披露したくなるのですか？
だったら26歳の奥様をお探しください。
また逆に、奥様に「40近い旦那で正直おっさんだ。友人にみせられない。式はこっそりやりましょう」といわれても「えへへ、そうだね」っていえますか？
ユーザーID：8586949847
匿名
2010年12月19日 19:42
人間として薄く見えるとか、彼女の考えがちょっとズレてておかしいとお考えのようですが、それは違うと思います。
ただ単に、結婚式等に関するお二人の思いや嗜好が合っていないだけです。
お前の外見は見苦しいのでその格好はやめるのが「正しい」。そのプランは「人間として薄く見える」というのは、あなたの個人的な考えに過ぎないので決して言うべきではないと思います。
華やかな結婚式がみっともないわけではありません。素敵だと思う人もいます。
「自分はそういう式は好きじゃないので、もっと自分の意見も取り入れて歩み寄って欲しい。これでは自分はやや苦痛だ」
という言い方をしてください。
ユーザーID：5783196062
らいらっく
2010年12月19日 19:43
もし彼女が自分の夢のために多く負担すると言うなら、好きにやらせてあげたら？
腕や胸の出るドレスについては、式までにダイエットしたら解決しますし。
でも１０年音信不通の友人招待はちょっぴり迷惑でしょうね。
(人数ＵＰ目的？それとも１０年前に式に参加したから？＝これなら納得)
もし彼女がトピ主さんのお金を目当てに計画しているのなら、
止めさせる理由は「そんなにお金は出せない」で済みますけど。
ユーザーID：4597336782
おっさん
2010年12月19日 19:48
鬱積したものがあるのでしょう。触れてはいけない話題です。
せいぜい予算の上限は決めて、すべて任せましょう。
ユーザーID：8622797254
あいすどーる
2010年12月19日 20:02
Sex and the Cityの映画 パート1の方です。
ぜひご覧くださいな。
もちろん、ご一緒にですよ。
これで、ご本人自らがお気づきになるのでは、
と思いますが、翻意しないようなら、筋金入りです。
いろんなご覚悟を。
ユーザーID：4434860323
ジウン
2010年12月19日 20:09
彼女はもともと結婚式に思い入れのある方なのでしょうね。
それは彼女の価値観なので、変えることは非常に難しいと思います。
彼女の意向に合わせてあげる、または破談にしてトピ主さんと似た価値観の女性を探す、の二者択一でしょう。
それよりも気になったのは、トピ主さんの婚約者に対する上から目線です。
お互いを尊重しつつ相応の付き合いと書いてありますが、トピ文の後半を読むと「いい歳なのだから、若い女性のようなことを望むな」と言うことですよね？
そういう気持ちで結婚されて、彼女と上手くいくのでしょうか？
ユーザーID：8574460983
凛
2010年12月19日 20:14
お2人ともいい年なのでトピ主さんが言うようにごく親しい人だけの式、披露宴の方がいいように思います。正直40前の新婦のお色直しを何回も見たくないかな〜
ですが彼女の理想としている式、披露宴ができなかったら一生ネチネチ言われそうですね。
困りましたね。
結婚前からこんな事でもめてお互い歩みよれないでは前途多難ですね。
ユーザーID：9170143036
mico
2010年12月19日 20:16
トピ主さんのセンスに同意します。
確かに、彼女の鼻息の荒さは、傍目にはイタイ。
けれども、自分が結婚式にむけて準備していた時、やはりそれなりの夢、たった一回の晴れ舞台に大きな期待と願望を抱き、思うようにならないことに対してはムキーッとなっていたことも…事実です。
今から思うと、こだわったところこそセンスがいまいちだったり、こだわるその姿が我ながらイタかったり、恥の多い結婚式だったのですが、その中で、しかたないなあと合わせてくれた彼、実、義理の両親、親せき、友人には今でも感謝しています（私もいっぱいあきらめて譲歩しましたが）。
やっぱり、花嫁にとっては夢ですから。
そして今、結婚式にお呼ばれすると、昔とは違うあたたかーい目で、お式を見守る自分がいます。
結婚式する若い人たちが、多少イタくても、それはそれでかわいいのです。
友人たちはともかく、御親戚はそういう目で「若輩者」を祝ってくれるのではないかと思います。
まあ、お恥ずかしいとは思いますが、ここでぶつかったり、彼女の夢を一部叶えてあげたりというのも、長い結婚生活の初めの共同作業かと思うので…ご健闘を祈ります。

description.hltext_display: 四川成乐高速公路大雾连环追尾造成1死18伤(图)
description.author: sohu.com
description.content:
12月22日上午，四川成乐高速公路彭（山）至眉（山）段距服务区1公里处50多台大小车辆发生连环追尾交通事故，事故现场长达4公里，共造成1死18伤。其中，2人伤势较重，尚未脱离生命危险，有2名轻伤者已自行出院。目前，事故现场已清理完毕，道路已恢复通车，大雾是引发连环追尾交通事故原因之一。图为眉山消防支队官兵正在现场搜救。刘忠俊 摄
中新网眉山12月22日电 (刘忠俊)22日凌晨5时，四川再次遭遇大雾袭击，引发成乐高速眉山段连环追尾相撞的交通事故，车祸现场延绵长达4公里，有50余台车不同程度受损，车祸共造成1死18人受伤。
据高速公路管理部门介绍，大雾造成成乐、成南、成都绕城、广邻等五条高速公路先后关闭，其中成乐高速最低能见度不足5米。成乐高速交警称，22日上午8时起，成乐高速彭山至眉山段5个地点接连发生数十辆车连环追尾，并造成1人死亡。
10时许，记者跟随一辆救护车赶往事故现场，一路上都听见响着警报赶往现场的救援车辆，有消防车、救护车、警车等。抵达事故现场，现场一片狼藉，汽车碎片散落一地，很多车辆都在碰撞中扭曲变形，地上到处都是玻璃碎片，车祸中受伤较重的车辆多数为小车和客车。除了碎片，更醒目的是地面上留下的，一条条长约三四米的黑色刹车痕迹。“当时什么都看不见，刹车根本来不及。”许多侥幸躲过车祸的司机感叹说，雾太大了。事故现场不到1.5里事故路段，有20多辆被撞车辆正等待清障。赶到现场的医护人员、眉山119消防官兵正在搜寻、抢救伤员，清障车和吊车也正在清理疏通道路。记者现场清点，有58辆车不同程度受损。
现场目击者张先生介绍，他们一行五人从成都前往峨眉山旅游，早上8时许，司机发现前方堵车后，刚把车停下，只听见车后一声巨响，没有反应过来的他们被后面的车撞上了。他说，车祸发生后大家一片惊慌，迅速下车跑向路边。车上两名受伤女士被迅速送往医院救治。
事故发生后，眉山120指挥中心迅速调集救护车赶往事故现场，有8名伤者被送往眉山市骨科医院救治，另有10名伤者被送到眉山市第三人民医院救治，事故中18名伤者中2人伤势较重，尚未脱离生命危险。另有2人已自行出院。
成乐高速处理事故的交警介绍，造成连环车祸的主要原因还是清晨的那场大雾。交警提醒广大驾驶员，冬季大雾天气较多，请注意行车安全，控制好车速。22日中午12时左右，事故现场清理疏通工作全部结束，道路开始恢复通行。

description.hltext_display: اختتام فعاليات مؤتمر المنظمات غير الحكومية في بغداد
Aumentano le pompe bianche Prezzi più bassi ma quante spese
description.content: Vicenza. Aumentano le "pompe bianche", cioè i distributori indipendenti dalle maggiori compagnie petrolifere. Nell'area dell'ovest vicentino sono almeno 5 le pompe bianche nate negli ultimi anni: il loro punto di forza sono i prezzi bassi, come dimostra l'elenco riportato in questa pagine, in cui si vede come i distributori indipendenti siano quasi sempre quelli che propongono i carburanti a costi inferiori. Ma diventare autonomi non è semplice: «Serve un investimento di almeno un milione e mezzo di euro - dice Ornella Vezzaro, presidente mandamentale di Confesercenti - l'area per l'impianto deve rispondere a determinate esigenze di metratura per le pompe, il bar e i servizi igienici». Conferma Maurizio Gobbo titolare di BonGas di Brendola, una pompa bianca: «L'acquisto diretto del carburante ci consente di mantenere prezzi leggermente più bassi, ma in realtà per diventare autonomi serve molta attenzione: l'investimento è grosso, i guadagni sono minimi e la manutenzione di gestione dell'impianto è sulle proprie spalle». «È una lama a doppio taglio diventare autonomi - aggiunge Ruggero Bianco, titolare di Carburanti Bianco di Arzignano - Se aumentano i prezzi i gestori della rete ordinaria, li dobbiamo aumentare anche noi e i clienti acquistano solo i litri di benzina essenziali». Intanto il prezzo del carburante in questi giorni è aumentato ancora arrivando, nell'Ovest vicentino, a toccare punte di 1,460 euro al litro per la verde e di 1,336 per il diesel. «Sono le compagnie petrolifere a decidere i rincari - spiega il gestore dell'impianto Ip di Montecchio, Nicola Ferrian - noi possiamo solo adattarci. Ho visto aumentare la benzina di 3 centesimi dalla sera alla mattina, mai successo in otto anni di lavoro nel settore». «Chi è sul libero mercato - conclude Gastone Vicari presidente provinciale Figisc Confcommercio - ha più margini di manovra rispetto ai distributori legati alle grandi marche. La concorrenza è forte e ciò mette in dubbio il futuro dei gestori della rete ordinaria».

description.hltext_display: 俄羅斯客貨車相撞車禍 釀9死
description.content:
俄羅斯交通管理部門發佈消息說，克拉斯克邊疆地區發生一起客車和貨車相撞事故，導致9人死亡、7人受傷。
消息說，事故發生在當地時間昨晚9點30分。一輛客車在行駛過程中突然前輪爆胎，導致車輛失控，撞上迎面駛來的大貨車。事故導致9人當場死亡，包括2名司機在內的7名傷者已被送往醫院救治。
有關部門正在進行善後處理及調查。

description.hltext_display: Les entreprises confiantes pour 2011
description.content:
L'étude Conjoncture annuelle d'Opcalia révèle que 61% des entreprises ont confiance en l'avenir et que le recrutement progresse malgré une pénurie de profils adaptés.
À lire aussi
Les entreprises retrouvent le sourire. Selon l'édition 2010 de l'enquête annuelle d'Opcalia, 61% des entreprises disent avoir "confiance en l'avenir", contre seulement 53% en 2009. Les plus grandes sont les plus positives: parmi les 3732 interrogées (TPE et PME confondues) le mois dernier par l'organisme collecteur de fonds de la formation, la part des entreprises confiantes passe à 73% à partir de 250 salariés, et elle décroît à 58% pour les entreprises de moins de dix salariés.
Cet optimisme se traduit par une progression des prévisions d'embauche et un tassement des intentions de licencier pour l'année 2011. Toutefois, pour 35% des postes à pourvoir, les entreprises rencontrent de réelles difficultés de recrutement, la pénurie des profils adaptés constituant le principal frein, à hauteur de 75% bien devant la question de la rémunération (23%).
La formation, un enjeu prioritaire
Dans ce contexte, la formation continue prend du galon. Plus de 8 entreprises sur 10 voient en la formation continue le développement des compétences des salariés. Pour 68% des dirigeants, elle rend l'entreprise plus efficace et compétitive, et pour 4 chefs d'entreprise sur 10, elle améliore l'employabilité des personnes. Par ailleurs, si elles jugent importante la formation du personnel, la plupart des entreprises n'ont pas l'intention de redoubler d'efforts: 72% estiment que leurs budgets formation vont rester stables l'an prochain, contre 75 % lors de la précédente enquête.

description.hltext_display: «Seguimos esperando que Yeremi vuelva»
description.content:
CANARIAS7.es le agradece su interés por hacer uso de sus canales de participación. La conversación es una parte fundamental de Internet y una de las mayores aportaciones de la Red a la nueva era de la comunicación. Los comentarios de este periódico están para que todos podamos expresar nuestras opiniones.
Los comentarios están sujetos a diversos sistemas antispam. Si el suyo no se publica de inmediato, no se preocupe, puede haber sido 'cazado' por error y será publicado en breve. Por favor, evite enviar reiteradamente el mismo comentario, entorpeciendo considerablemente la labor de redacción.
Los comentarios han de ceñirse a las propuestas temáticas de cada artículo o propuesta, y no se permiten aquellos que resulten ofensivos, insultantes, de escasa educación o consideración con el resto de los usuarios, ataques personales, los que no tengan relación con el tema, publicidad, spam y, en definitiva, todos los que no contribuyan a hacer de este servicio del periódico lo que pretende: un espacio de opinión, reflexión, comunicación y debate sosegado y libre.
No se permite el envío de mensajes de contenido sexista, racista, o que impliquen cualquier otro tipo de discriminación. Tampoco se admitirán mensajes difamatorios, ofensivos, que afecten a la vida privada de otras personas, que supongan amenazas, o cuyos contenidos impliquen la violación de cualquier ley española. Esto incluye los mensajes con contenidos protegidos por derechos de autor, a no ser que la persona que envía el mensaje sea la propietaria de dichos derechos o cuente con autorización para el uso de dichos contenidos. Tampoco se permitirá el uso de este servicio por parte de empresas para promocionar sus productos o servicios. De la misma manera, no se permite el envío de cartas cadena, marketing piramidal o similares.
Las mayúsculas tienen un uso bien definido en la gramática española. Escribir todo el texto en mayúsculas es un esfuerzo inútil que no hará que su mensaje se lea más, sino más bien menos. Los comentarios escritos total o parcialmente en mayúsculas, especialmente si se producen de forma reiterada, son susceptibles de ser eliminados.
En CANARIAS7.es apostamos por potenciar el buen uso del idioma y la expresión. Los mensajes tipo SMS que empobrecen la comunicación también corren el riesgo de no ser tomados en consideración.
Defendemos el anonimato en la Red como un ciberderecho básico de todo usuario, en especial como arma en contra de sistemas que se caracterizan por la censura, la intolerancia o las restricciones a la libertad de expresión e información. El anonimato tiene sentido cuando la identificación pueda conllevar grave riesgo para el autor por sus opiniones o informaciones. En CANARIAS7.es entendemos que algunos usuarios prefieran no identificarse. Sin embargo, esconderse detrás del anonimato para insultar, difamar, vejar, 'trollear' o realizar ataques personales es una perversión del derecho al anonimato que pone en riesgo su propia consideración ante la Justicia, la Red y la ciudadanía. Ese tipo de anonimato tampoco se tolera en este periódico.
Si lo que desea es efectuar alguna observación personal a la Redacción o Dirección del periódico, bien en contenidos o en formas, los comentarios no son el lugar adecuado para ello. Envíenos un mail a info(arroba)canarias7.es (sustituyendo (arroba) por @).
Esperamos que disfrute leyendo y participando en CANARIAS7.es

description.hltext_display: 上海市民购房观望气氛浓 仅二成多欲在三年内购房
description.content:
国家统计局上海调查总队近日公布《房产新政下本市市民购房意愿调查报告》。 调查显示，房产新政下，上海市市民购房观望气氛仍浓，约半数受访者想购房，但近三年无计划。仅二成多受访者欲在三年内购房，改善型和安置型需求为主要动力；相对而言，中高收入者一年内和投资性购房比重较高。约1/4受访者不打算购房，其中收入低、购房负担过重是主因。对于即将出台的公共租赁房政策，受访者最希望政府多提供生活便利、配套成熟的公共租赁房。 本次调查采用网上调查，从受访者结构来看，一是年轻人较多，45岁以下占七成；二是高学历居多，大专及本科以上学历占近八成；三是家庭年收入5万元以上的占近2/3，其中家庭年收入在5～10万元的约占1/3。受访者构成显示，参与此次网上调查的，主要是正值购房需求高峰期的，具有一定收入水平的中青年群体，他们的看法大致反映了上海市市民主流购房意愿和需求。 调查显示，大部分市民有在上海市购房的意愿，计划在未来3年内购房的占23.4%，其中意愿明确、计划一年内购房的占12.6%；而想要购房但近3年暂无计划的占50.7%；25.9%无购房计划。这表明，在目前宏观房市调控的大背景下，本市市民购房观望气氛仍浓。 调查同时显示，约半数受访者在观望，另1/4不打算购房。具体表现为以下三点： 首先是家庭年收入20万元以上的受访者近六成在观望。有50.7%的受访者表示有需求、但近三年无购房计划。这部分群体主要是目前已经具备一定的住房条件、拥有一定的积累，但在目前国家出台多项政策、加强房市调控的环境下，对于购房往往有等等看看的想法，希望房价有所下降时再出手。调查中，在工作年限在10～20年间和家庭年收入超过20万元的两类受访者中，观望心态较为普遍，表示想购房但近三年无计划的比重分别占到56%和58.2%。 第二，不打算购房者，收入低、负担重是主因。有25.9%的受访者表示目前无购房计划。其中，有53.1%表示房价高、无力负担首付，17.5%表示还贷压力过重、影响正常生活。因此，对于大多数无计划购房者而言，面对房价高、负担重的现实，打消购房念头实属无奈之举。 第三，"以租代购"仍是解决住房问题的权益之计。值得注意的是，此次调查中，仅有8人(占不打算购房者的2.7%)是出于"租房更经济实惠"而不打算购房；即使在30岁以下人群中，此比重也仅为4.5%。在长期以来形成的置业安家的住房观念下，以租代购目前只是市民解决住房问题的"权宜之计"。 调查还显示，生活便利、配套成熟是低收入居民对公共租赁房的首要期待。收入低、无法承受目前高房价的人群迫切希望本市扩大保障性住房范围，尤其是早日实现公租房的建设与分配，以改善居住条件。他们对于上海市即将推出的公共租赁房政策充满期待。受访者对如何使公租房更贴近百姓的实际需求，提出不少的意见和建议。其中，市民反映最为集中的是希望公租房的选址能考虑居住者日常生活便利，近六成受访者建议"在生活便利、公共交通沿线区域发展建设公租房"；约五成受访者希望"在配套成熟的普通商品住房小区中配建公租房"。 在租金和费用方面，受访者一是希望租金低于市场价(48.4%)，二是希望能支付方式更为灵活，可使用公积金支付(37.3%)。记者
相关文章：
上一篇文章： 重庆部分银行停发个人房贷 称年底信贷额度紧张
下一篇文章： 住建部陈淮：公租房不全给穷人预备 高端人才也需要

description.hltext_display: A number crucial elements concerned with Recommendations to help you Redesign Your own Living room area
description.content: The family room has long been important designed for people to stay when go to your residence. In a nutshell, this has become the source connected with first opinions. As you combine some of these aspects, you might certainly design or even ruin the home's living room setting. Below are great tips you should consider when you require to jazz up ones own living room.Color selection as well as SettingThe color is exactly what identifies the atmosphere for the living room space. You will definitely consider what you need to convey. Mostly, many people adhere to design of which show their specific lifestyle. If you would like stay conventional, you could look into earthly hues or sometimes warm shades. The fashionable trend setters can also explore some avant-garde layouts connected with black or white to express their living area setting.Shade explains the particular setting you desire to show. If you prefer your own living room space to always be enticing intended for guest visitors, you actually should accustom hues which you notice suitable-don't ignore to be aware of which hues clash. Poor coloration mixtures can destroy the mood you wish to create. Dystopia would be a fantastic idea, although you need to have the appropriate mixes to bring the appropriate "wrongness" inside the overall ambiance.Your furnitureIt gets to be essential that your lounge room ought to have furnishings that suits the theme on your room or space. Make sure you smartly put the house furniture in areas that do not clutter. Be sure that all of your area with regard to movements results in being broad enough for everyone to easily take a glance around. First thing they will do just before being seated would be to look at all the room's climate. If you should provide enough living space, after that you can bring in additional interest when it comes to the particular element of your living area.Lighting effectsLighting effects gets to be the most important aspect of the room's ambiance. Colorations breathe life for your area whilst pieces of furniture contributes tangibility to your area. Lighting effects, likewise, increases along with matches a living room's environment. Very good illumination helps make the main difference of the beautifully-crafted living room from currently being monotonic. Lighting style gives that luminance when you want to indicate the particular dynamism in the room or space.A number of rooms include a key chandelier that will float within the place. This is fantastic just for high-class styles. Most people furthermore change up the lights with a variety of light sources along the place. Whichever design you choose, living room space design is best suited because of fantastic lighting fixtures.The living room space happens to be an interior design strategy that requires personal awareness. Individuals determine their first feeling within this living room. Once you learn the particular design connected with color choice as well as natural environment, furniture, and also lighting fixtures, you possibly can surely enjoy a family room that's enlivened utilizing theme and comfort.

description.hltext_display: ASUS N61JQ-XV1 16-Inch Versatile Entertainment Laptop-ASUS N61JQ-XV1 16-Inch Versatile Entertainment Laptop Review
description.content:
There wasn't many reviews out there about this system so i decided to leave one. A laptop with i7 OMG! This is just a note: Most of the software pre-installed on this system are 64-bit versions so if your wondering why some of the same programs on your 32-bit computer have been updated or newer versions available that is why. I discovered that after i deleted some of them and found out the 32-bit versions of the programs wouldn't work on this computer windows update would constantly give me an ERROR message trying to update the 32-bit software so I had to re-download the 64-bit versions.
I have never owned a 64-bit computer or a laptop before and I have always bought Dell desktops in the past. After searching around for months i couldn't find a laptop with these specs and price tag as the ASUS N61JQ Laptop anywhere. Newegg.com had the same laptop at the same price however Amazon offered free 2-day shipping so i went with Amazon. I received this laptop about 3 weeks ago and i couldn't be happier with my decision. It is a powerhouse and does everything i throw at it without a hiccup. I do a lot of TV recording and commercial editing and video editing and file transfers and downloading with a little gaming thrown in there and it does all the above flawlessly. It is incredibly faster than my 32-bit XPS Dell Desktop and its in laptop form! It runs at about 50-60 degrees Celsius during normal use however i did buy a Targus cooler. I have never seen the temp over 67 C. So far i have not had any negative things to say about its performance. I found most of the bloatware pre-installed on this system somewhat useful so i only had to remove a few programs i did not need. I plan to upgrade my DVD drive to blu-ray. I recommend buying Cyberlink Power DVD 10 with this system. It makes watching dvd's or videos look amazing! but that's just personal preference. The brown color of the cover on this laptop looks black with a hint of dark dark brown. You cant tell its brownish unless you shine a light right on it. I think it looks really classy. The 3.0 UBS port is AWESOME! Copy movies and TV shows to my external in like seconds. I did a complete back up of my ASUS primary hard rive (138GB) and it transferred everything to my external hard drive in about 5 minutes!! The 64-bit IE Browser seems to me to be considerably faster then the 32-bit browser. All of the slots are on the sides (i.e. power chord plug in, USB, Ethernet) because the screen folds to low in the back to have any there.
Since this computer is a powerhouse the battery only lasts about 45 to 90 minutes under normal use and since the screen hangs down so low in the back I'm not sure if you can get a bigger battery for it or not. So if you don't mind having your laptop plugged in most of the time i would definitely recommend this laptop. I would consider it more of a sleek and stylish portable desktop till they make a bigger battery for it. The screen seems dull to me(compared to HD TV's) but for a HD screen on a laptop that's not really a complaint. I wish the keys were back-lit. And this isn't really a complaint about the system itself per say but I have discovered that there isn't many programs out there yet designed for 64-bit computers. Even the browsers out there are still in beta stages. Even though i would prefer 64-bit software, most of the 32-bit programs will still run on a 64-bit system. Hope this review was helpful!
This baby has it all, it doesn't overheat, the processor is so fast I've had tons of programs downloading, open, doing tasks, and I've played all kinds of games. The color is not really brown so much as it is sleek and black. The keyboard is not as flexible, but way preferable compared to other laptops I have seen. The sound quality is really nice for just being a laptop, and it's great for watching movies and drawing art. It's a bit heavier and kinda big to lug around, but you won't regret this purchase. This is a well built, fast, and will last for a really long time.

description.hltext_display: "Furto" d'acqua? Vascon è assolto
description.content: Vicenza. L'assessore provinciale all'agricoltura e all'agriturismo Luigino Vascon avrebbe voluto l'assoluzione nel merito dall'ipotesi di furto d'acqua, come intendeva dimostrare il suo avvocato Francesco Pasquino con tanto di ricevute delle Aim, ma ha dovuto accontentarsi, si fa per dire, della prescrizione che ha cancellato il reato e gli ha tolto il peso di dosso che gli creava disagi dal 2007.Il giudice Resenterra senza entrare nel merito dell'accusa per la quale tre anni fa era stato rinviato a giudizio per furto aggravato perché non avrebbe pagato l'acqua per far crescere i suoi ulivi, ha seguito la linea processuale tracciata dal pm d'udienza Beppe Cracco e ha mandato assolto il politico leghista del Basso Vicentino. L'ex parlamentare leghista sedici mesi dopo essere stato interrogato si era ritrovato a processo per un presunto, e mai dimostrato vista la conclusione, furto d'acqua ai danni delle Aim. Per quasi quattro anni, dal 1999 al 23 ottobre 2002, Vascon, 54 anni, di Sossano, era stato accusato di essersi impossessato di acqua che non avrebbe provveduto a pagare alla municipalizzata di Vicenza che gestisce la rete idrica anche a sud del capoluogo. L'avrebbe fatto per annaffiare la sua proprietà coltivata ad ulivi sulla quale, più di recente, ha realizzato un rustico. «Questo non è vero, abbiamo la documentazione che dimostra il contrario e chiediamo l'assoluzione perché il fatto contestato a Vascon non sussiste», ha insistito con forza l'avv. Pasquino, che ha sollecitato il giudice a non considerare la prescrizione.Era stato il pubblico ministero Monica Mazza, ora in servizio a Bassano, a rinviare a giudizio l'esponente del Carroccio per l'ipotesi di furto aggravato. Era stato così citato come parte offesa il legale rappresentante delle Aim Roberto Fazioli. Vascon fin dall'interrogatorio del luglio 2007 aveva protestato la propria correttezza, spiegando che qualcuno dalle sue parti non gli voleva bene e per questo motivo aveva fatto partire la segnalazione ai carabinieri. «Non capisco perché mi accusano di fare il furbo, tanto più che si tratta di un po' d'acqua», aveva analizzato Vascon a suo tempo, sostenendo che il processo avrebbe dimostrato la sua lealtà. La vicenda era legata a un rustico costruito in un suggestivo luogo, in via Monte della Croce a Sossano, nel 2002. Dalla documentazione depositata in Comune l'edificio è stato regolarmente realizzato in quell'anno, ma l'allacciamento dell'acqua sarebbe risalito solo al 23 ottobre 2002, data in cui le Aim sono state richieste del collegamento. «È questo che non è vero - ha ribadito in aula l'avv. Pasquino - perché abbiamo le carte che dimostrano che Vascon ha pagato l'acqua fin dal '99 e per questo vogliamo il proscioglimento nel merito». Ma non è stato ascoltato.

description.hltext_display: تسعون مليون دولار مشاريع البنك الدولي في مشاريع الإسكان في العراق
description.content: بغداد/ أصوات العراق: قالت وزارة الإسكان والإعمار، الثلاثاء، إن كلفة المشاريع التي نفذت من قرض البنك الدولي بلغت تسعين مليون دولار، بحسب مدير إعلام الوزارة. وأوضح مدير الإعلام لوكالة (أصوات العراق) ان الوزارة ?نفذت عدداً من المشاريع الخاصة بقرض البنك الدولي البالغ تسعين مليون دينار وتشمل إنشاء طريقين ريفيين في واسط والنجف وإنشاء وتأهيل عشرة طرق عامة وإنشاء اربعة جسور ثابتة بدلًا عن العائمة في محافظتي بابل والمثنى?. وأشار إلى ان من ضمن الطرق المؤهلة ?طريق الديوانية دغارة بطول 10كم وتأهيل طريق بغداد كوت بطول19 كم وطريق كوت ناصرية بطول 11كم وطريق كوت عمارة بطول10 كم?. ح ش (خ) ص ع ز

description.hltext_display: ショック！彼からのメールで名前間違え。。。 - 面倒くさい女...
description.content:
付き合って半年の外国人の彼からのメール（英語）で名前を間違えられました。
とてもショックです。。。
○○子へ という宛名で、最後の「KO」のスペルだけはあっていたのですが、上は全く他の名前で誰なのか心当たりもありません。
元カノ？もしかして浮気相手？などモンモンとしていて、翌日はデートだったのですが、結局行きませんでした。
彼にはメールで（名前の間違いがありショックだったこと、今日は会いたくない）と連絡を入れたのですが、見ていなかったようで、約束の時間を少し過ぎて電話がありました。
その時に再度伝えましたところ、名前に心当たりはない、とにかく会って話し合おうと言われましたが、私は今は会いたくない、少し考える時間がほしいと伝えました。
２-３回そのやり取りがあった後、彼が逆切れし「もういい、勝手にしろ！」と電話をガチャ切りされました。
名前の間違いなど大したことないという方もいると思いますが、私にとっては大きな問題です。
そして、彼が謝らない（Sorryと言わない）ことと、電話をガチャ切りしたこともショックです。
普段の彼はとても温厚で怒ることもなく、大したことでもないのにSorryという言葉を口にします。
外国人は謝らないとよく言いますが、そういう性格ではないかと思います。
私が頑固だからいけないのかなどとモンモンと考えてしまいます。
なんだか愚痴っぽくなってしまいましたが、いろいろな意見を聞ければと思いますので、よろしくお願いいたします。

description.hltext_display: 住建部陈淮：公租房不全给穷人预备 高端人才也需要
description.content:
住建部政策研究室主任陈淮
公共租赁住房并不都是给穷人预备的，它的目标人群有四种。
第一种是收入中等偏下人群，在一段时间内不具备持有不动产的风险抵抗能力；
第二种是过渡期人群，比如刚刚走出大学校门的毕业生需要过渡；
第三种是流动性人才，在市场经济下，人才流动是一种资源优化配置的方式，这部分流动人群需要特定住房方式；
第四种是高端管理人才，他们被引进后不一定马上就能买房，这也需要给他提供住房。
住建部政策研究室主任陈淮在BTV财经频道《点击年关键》节目上表示。
相关链接：
公租房疾进：土地资金从哪里来？
公租房“没跟上”禁群租新规恐难落实

description.hltext_display: Aparece el cuerpo sin vida de un anciano
description.content: El cuerpo sin vida de un anciano de aproximadamente 75 años ha aparecido sobre las 16.04 horas de este martes en el Barranco de Los Conejos, en la Isla de La Graciosa, perteneciente al término municipal de Teguise (Lanzarote), según informó el Centro Coordinador de Emergencias y Seguridad (Cecoes) 112. Una llamada alertó a la hora indicada de que había aparecido un cuerpo sin vida en el barranco. En ese momento se activó el dispositivo habitual en estos casos y se trasladó al lugar al médico del Centro de Salud de la zona y a la Guardia Civil. Al llegar, el médico sólo puso confirmar el fallecimiento del hombre, mientras que los agentes de la Guardia Civil se encargaron de las diligencias correspondientes.

description.hltext_display: 暴雪“冻瘫”西欧：多处机场关闭 地面交通不畅
description.author: sohu.com
description.content:
多处机场关闭 地面交通不畅
暴雪“冻瘫”西欧，欧盟表示不满
晚报综合报道
西欧地区连日来经历的强降雪和低温天气，致使多处机场关闭，航班延误，空中和地面交通不畅，民众出行受阻。让英国、德国、法国等国家饱受困扰。
连日来的暴雪天气使欧洲国家的许多机场暴露出来的应急反应能力低下、服务质量跟不上的问题已经引起了欧盟委员会的关注。
欧盟要整顿机场地面服务
最近几天，西欧国家普降大雪，许多机场因此一片混乱。欧盟对这些机场面对大雪天气无能为力十分不满，并表示要对机场的地面服务进行整顿。
欧盟委员会副主席兼交通事务委员西姆・卡拉斯21日就此发表了一份声明。卡拉斯在声明中说，面对大雪天气，一些机场因无力应对而出现混乱，这是“绝对不可接受的”、“决不允许再次发生”，因为大雪天气在西欧国家并不是太特殊的气候现象。卡拉斯说，旅行安全当然是首先必须考虑的，但机场必须有一套应对大雪天气的有效手段。
声明说，最近几天的大雪天气暴露出机场的地面应急是航空交通中的“薄弱环节”，也是造成机场出现混乱的原因所在。为此，欧盟计划在明年夏天之前出台一个更加严格的机场地面服务标准，以提高欧洲国家机场在极端天气下为乘客服务的能力。为此，卡拉斯将在本周召集相关机场负责人举行会议，一是分析原因，二是商量应对措施。
英国派军队帮助清理机场
由于大雪天气，最近几天西欧国家的机场出现极度混乱。例如：伦敦希思罗机场几天来半数以上航班被取消，成千上万乘客滞留候机大厅。而比利时布鲁塞尔机场由于融冰液供应不足等原因，直到21日仍有半数以上航班不能起飞。另外，德国、荷兰等国家的许多机场也出现了类似的混乱。
在众多因暴雪导致部分瘫痪的机场中，被誉为世界最繁忙的机场之一的英国伦敦希斯罗机场倍受媒体关注，而由于持续关闭希思罗机场的第二条跑道，英国机场管理局也遭受广泛批评。
此前希思罗机场表示，直到23日早晨6点，将仍然只有大约三分之一的航班能够正常飞行。为此，英国首相卡梅伦21日特别表示，将向负责运营伦敦希思罗机场的英国机场管理局提供军事援助，派出军队帮助清理机场，以解决大雪造成的飞机航班延误、停飞及乘客滞留等问题，并承诺希思罗机场的第二条跑道将在几个小时内重新开放。
英国气象局警告，酷冻的天气将一直到圣诞节，最低气温可能暴跌到摄氏零下26度，交通混乱的情况恐延续到圣诞节后。
铁路公路均受严重影响
德国周一降雪达40厘米，主要机场有超过一千个航班取消。不过德国汉莎航空称有信心在周三恢复全面服务。德国的铁路和公路也受到严重影响，柏林和科隆的公路路况据报都很危险。
此外，由于列车因冰雪气候车速受限，英国和法国以及和比利时之间的欧洲之星列车服务受到严重影响，许多车次被延误。在伦敦圣克拉斯火车站排队等候搭乘欧洲之星列车的旅客队伍长达数百米。
持续不断的风雪导致巴黎地区交通严重受阻，大货车已被禁止在主要道路行驶，市中心的一些公交车车次也被取消。
荷兰与瑞典的交通也未能逃脱风雪的肆虐，荷兰已将部分高速公路的最高时速限制在50公里。甚至连远在欧洲东部的莫斯科也处于弥漫的风雪之中，当局调动了9000辆扫雪车清理路面积雪。

description.hltext_display: Walgreen To Report Q1 Results
description.content:
(RTTNews) - Drugstore chain operator Walgreen Co. (WAG) is slated to release its first-quarter earnings before the market opens Wednesday.
Earlier this month, the Deerfield, Illinois-based company stated that its total sales for the first quarter of fiscal 2011 grew 5.9% to $17.33 billion from $16.36 billion a year ago. On average, analysts polled by Thomson Reuters projected first-quarter sales of $17.29 billion, representing 5.7% rise from the prior year.
Comparable store sales, or sales at stores open for least one year, edged up 0.8%, while front-end comparable store sales for the quarter increased 0.4%. Prescriptions filled at comparable stores grew 2.2%.
On average, 25 analysts expect the company to report earnings of $0.53 per share for the quarter, with estimates ranging between $0.50 and $0.57 per share. Such estimates typically exclude special items.
In the month of November, Walgreens had sales of $5.83 billion, 8.6% higher than last year, with 3.2% rise in comparable stores sales. Comparable pharmacy sales grew 4.2%, despite negative impact of 3.3 percentage points due to generic drug introductions and 1.1 percentage points due to lower incidence of cough, cold and flu, while the results were positively impacted by 0.8 percentage point due to more flu shots provided by the company.
Kermit Crawford, Walgreens president of pharmacy services earlier said, "Considering the warm fall weather around much of the country and a lack of flu virus circulating, we're pleased we have provided more seasonal flu shots than we did at this point last year, when we ran out of flu vaccine supply in mid-October."
Flu shots administered at pharmacies and clinics during November totaled more than 1 million, with 5.6 million flu shots having been administered season-to-date. In its fourth quarter conference call, the company said it projects to deliver as many as 15 million flu shots in this flu season.
In October, Walgreens' comparable sales decreased 1.3%, as pharmacy sales declined 1.6% owing partly to lower incidence of cough, cold and flu, while total monthly sales improved 3.7%. In September, the company reported a 0.4% rise in comparable store sales and a 5.3% increase in total sales.
In the fourth quarter of the previous fiscal, net earnings were $470 million or $0.49 per share, on sales of $16.87 billion, with 1.5% rise in comparable stores sales. The double-digit increase in earnings from the previous year were driven by strong growth in prescription sales with improved operating performance across its store network and company wide expense control.
In the previous conference call, President and CEO Greg Wasson stated that the company will continue to drive core strategies in 2011. The company will continue to slow store openings with a goal of 2.5% to 3% this fiscal year, and it plans for cost reduction and productivity efforts to provide $1 billion in savings in fiscal 2011 versus its base year of 2008.

event_or_fact.property: the company will continue to drive core strategies in 2011.

Considering the warm fall weather around much of the country and a lack of flu virus circulating, we're pleased we have provided more seasonal flu shots than we did at this point last year, when we ran out of flu vaccine supply in mid-October.

description.hltext_display: «Molestata dal cliente», chiede 500mila euro
description.content: Vicenza. L'ingegnere Ruggero Righi è un signore di 60 anni conosciuto come equilibrato e per bene. Una giovane e bella barista, però, lo accusa di averla molestata sessualmente il 4 marzo 2009 all'interno del bar "Caffè Cinema" di via XX Settembre, quando l'avrebbe seguita in una stanza a fianco del locale, «bloccandomi e avvolgendomi una tenda attorno al collo, così impedendomi di difendermi, e dopo avermi sollevato il maglione mi leccava le spalle e mi palpeggiava i seni, dicendomi:« "Che bel sedere che hai", quindi mi ha palpeggiato di nuovo il seno sinistro e mi ha chiesto un bacio». Questo è il capo d'imputazione dal quale l'ing. Righi, residente in Borgo santa Lucia, assistito dall'avv. Maela Magliocco, dovrà difendersi il 17 marzo prossimo quando comparirà davanti al tribunale collegiale. L'ipotesi è la violenza sessuale, sebbene attenuata. Ieri il gup Stefano Furlani, su richiesta del pm Marco Peraro, ha rinviato a giudizio l'uomo.All'udienza era presente anche l'avv. Andrea Dal Maso, per conto della parte offesa E.S., di 24 anni, che ha presentato una richiesta danni di 512 mila euro, corredata da consulenza medico legale per i contraccolpi psicologici che lei avrebbe patito. È una somma che la difesa dell'ingegnere definisce non solo spropositata e fuori da ogni qualsivoglia razionalità giudiziaria, tenuto conto delle accuse, ma che sarebbe la spia di che cosa animerebbe la controparte, considerato che l'ing. Righi è una persona benestante. «Vuole spillare quattrini», ha sostenuto l'uomo visibilmente deluso per una situazione che alimenta disagio. La difesa spiega che la denuncia è del tutto infondata e strumentale a fini economici. L'ingegnere, aggiunge la difesa, conosce la barista fin da piccola perché ha la stessa età della figlia. È stato a lungo cliente del locale e non si sarebbe mai segnato di fare una cosa del genere. Il testimone Giulio R. citato dal pm, sottolinea infine l'avv. Magliocco, sarebbe stato contraddittorio. In aula sarà una battaglia.I.T.

description.hltext_display: Se espera otra jornada agobiante en la Ciudad
description.author: de Diciembre de 2010 (Infobae - DERF
description.content:
Los días tórridos continúan y para hoy se espera otra jornada a pleno sol, con vientos leves del sector norte y marcas térmicas que oscilarán entre los 20 y 35 grados.
Mañana, no obstante, el Servicio Meteorológico Nacional anticipa una jornada húmeda y muy calurosa: la máxima llegará a los 37 grados y habrá, además, elevada sensación térmica.
Por la tarde, el tiempo tenderá a desmejorar pero no se prevén lluvias. Los vientos moderados a leves del sector norte irán rotando al sector este.
El viernes amancerá lluvioso peró irá rápidamente mejorando con el correr de la mañana. Los vientos rotarán hacia el sector sur, sin que ello afecte el calor. La máxima a la tarde llegará a los 33 grados.
En la Noche Buena, la temperatura será de 26 grados, según las previsiones del SMN. La Navidad también será calurosa, con una máxima de 34 grados y buen tiempo.

description.hltext_display: RW Baird Made the Right Call, Acorda Therapeutics 2.19% Lower (ACOR)
description.content:
One week ago, Acorda Therapeutics (NASDAQ:ACOR) was downgraded to Neutral from Outperform at RW Baird. The stock closed yesterday at $25.92 which is 2.19% lower than the price one-week ago of $26.50.
Acorda Therapeutics (NASDAQ:ACOR) has a potential upside of 27.7% based on a current price of $25.92 and an average consensus analyst price target of $33.09.
Acorda Therapeutics is currently below its 50-day moving average of $26.97 and below its 200-day moving average of $32.32.
SmarTrend currently has shares of Acorda Therapeutics in an Downtrend and issued the Downtrend alert on October 04, 2010 at $31.66. The stock has fallen 18.2% since the Downtrend alert was issued.
Keywords: acorda therapeutics analyst ratings

description.hltext_display: تحديد مفهوم الاندماج ومقتضياته
description.content: قرارات الدورة العادية السابعة عشرة للمجلس الأوروبي للإفتاء والبحوث المنعقدة بمدينة سراييفو بدولة البوسنة والهرسك في الفترة من: 28 ربيع الآخر – 2 جمادى الأولى 1428هـ الموافق لـ 15-19 أيار (مايو) 2007م قرار 2/17 مما تحصَّل من الأبحاث والمناقشات التي تناولت موضوعات الدورة، قرر المجلس ما يلي: إن سياسات "الاندماج" المتبعة في الدول الأوروبية تتراوح بين اتجاهين: اتجاه يغلّب جانب الانصهار في المجتمع ولو أدّى ذلك إلى التخلي عن الخصوصيات الدينية والثقافية للفئات المندمجة. واتجاه آخر يرى ضرورة الموازنة بين مقتضيات الاندماج ومقتضيات الحفاظ على الخصوصيات الثقافية والدينية. ويرى المجلس أن الاتجاه الثاني هو الذي يعبّر عن الاندماج الإيجابي، الذي يجب أن تحدد مقتضياته بوضوح: أن مقتضيات اندماج المسلمين في المجتمعات الأوروبية مسؤولية مشتركة بين المسلمين أفراداً ومؤسسات من جانب، وبقية المجتمع الأوروبي أفراداً ومؤسسات من جانب آخر. وإن من أهم مقتضيات الاندماج التي تُطلب من المسلمين، التي لا حرج فيها عليهم، بل إن الإسلام يحث عليها، ما يلي: أ- ضرورة معرفة لغة المجتمع الأوروبي وأعرافه ونظمه، والالتزام تبعاً لذلك بالقوانين العامة، في ضوء قوله تعالى: "يا أيها الذين آمنوا أوفوا بالعقود" [المائدة:1]. ب- المشاركة في شؤون المجتمع والحرص على خدمة الصالح العام، عملا بالتوجيه القرآني: "وافعلوا الخير لعلكم تفلحون" [الحج:77]. ج- العمل على الخروج من وضع البطالة؛ ليكون المسلم فاعلاً منتجاً يكفي نفسه وينفع غيره، عملاً بالهدي النبوي الشريف: "اليد العليا خير من اليد السفلى، فاليد العليا هي المنفقة، واليد السفلى هي السائلة" (متفق عليه من حديث عبد الله بن عمر رضي الله عنهما). وإن من أهم مقتضيات الاندماج التي نرجو أن يحققها المجتمع: أ- العمل على إقامة العدل وتحقيق المساواة بين جميع المواطنين في سائر الحقوق والواجبات، وبالخصوص حماية حرية التعبير والممارسة الدينية، وكفالة الحقوق الاجتماعية وعلى رأسها حق العمل وضمان تكافؤ الفرص. ب- مقاومة مظاهر العنصرية والحدّ من العوامل المغذية لمعاداة الإسلام، وخصوصاً في مجال الإعلام. ج- تشجيع مبادرات التعارف الديني والثقافي بين المسلمين وغيرهم بما يحقق التفاعل بين أبناء المجتمع الواحد. ولتحقيق الاندماج الإيجابي المتوازن: - يدعو المجلس المسلمين إلى العمل على حفظ شخصيتهم الإسلامية دون انغلاق وانعزال أو تحلل وذوبان في المجتمع، وإلى إقامة المؤسسات الدعوية والتربوية والاجتماعية اللازمة لذلك. - ويدعو المجتمعات الأوروبية، وخصوصاً الهيئات المعنية بقضية الاندماج، إلى الانفتاح على المسلمين والتواصل مع المؤسسات الإسلامية، ك، لدراسة مقتضيات الاندماج وتيسير السبل المحققة له، بما يفيد المجتمع ويدعم استقراره وازدهاره، وبما يمكّن المسلمين من الحفاظ على هويتهم الإسلامية الأوروبية.

description.hltext_display: Gordon posts 1st 2 NHL points in Caps' win over NJ
description.content:
WASHINGTON Andrew Gordon had a goal and assist for his first two NHL points, and the Washington Capitals earned their second straight victory by beating the New Jersey Devils 5-1 on Tuesday night.
Washington is enjoying a winning streak after snapping an eight-game losing streak with a victory at Ottawa on Sunday. John Carlson added a goal and an assist, and Michal Neuvirth made 35 saves.
The Capitals jumped back over Atlanta into first place in the Southeast Division.
The Devils (9-22-2), who have the second-worst record in the NHL, dropped their ninth straight road game and third overall. New Jersey got even at 1 when Patrik Elias scored a power-play goal 4:56 of the second period, but the Capitals took then took over.
New Jersey has scored only 10 goals in seven games.
Washington took command during a stretch of 6:31 in the second period when Jay Beagle, Jason Chimera and Carlson scored to make it 4-1. Mike Knuble netted the final goal for the Capitals, who had points from 12 players.
Washington won at home for the first time since beating Carolina on Nov. 28.
The Capitals have been one of the NHL's best home teams the past few seasons, but had dropped five straight in Washington.
Gordon gave Washington a 1-0 lead with his first NHL goal. Marcus Johansson sent a perfect pass from the left boards that Gordon redirected past goalie Martin Brodeur with 3:19 left in the first.
The Capitals hope Johansson will become a play-maker, but the rookie center has only two other assists this season.
Beagle scored his second career goal ? first this season ? off a pass from David Steckel at 10:00.
Chimera made it 3-1 with a breakaway goal at 12:39 of the period, beating Brodeur as Devils defenseman Mark Fayne hung all over him. Gordon earned his first NHL assist.
Carlson scored the final goal of that stretch, picking up a loose puck that Alex Ovechkin lost near the high slot and firing a shot past Brodeur with 3:29 left in the period.
NOTES: Eric Fehr missed the game for Washington to attend the funeral of his grandmother. ... Ovechkin earned one assist. ... Dainius Zubrus was originally credited with New Jersey's goal, but it was changed to Elias. ... Brodeur's next game will be the 1,100th of his NHL career He finished with 23 saves.
