description.hltext_display: Festmusik und Frauenberger-Messe
Konstabel Polis Bebas Tuduhan Cabul Inspektor Wanita
description.content:
PETALING JAYA: Seorang konstabel polis dilepaskan dan dibebaskan oleh Mahkamah Majistret daripada pertuduhan mencabul kehormatan seorang inspektor wanita yang merupakan rakan setugasnya, tahun lepas.
Majistret Aishah Hijriah Arshad membuat keputusan itu selepas mendapati pihak pendakwaan gagal membuktikan kes prima facie terhadap Yusri Yusof di akhir kes pendakwaan.
Yusri, 35, dituduh menggunakan kekerasan jenayah ke atas inspektor wanita berumur 24 tahun itu dengan niat mencabul kehormatannya di pejabatnya di sini pada 5.35 petang, 26 Mei 2009.
Yusri, yang sebelum ini digantung tugasnya, didakwa mengikut Seksyen 354 Kanun Keseksaan yang memperuntukkan hukuman penjara sehingga 10 tahun atau dendaatau sebatan atau mana-mana dua daripadanya, jika sabit kesalahan.
Aishah ketika membuat keputusan itu berkata, mahkamah mendapati keterangan mangsa tidak konsisten dengan laporan yang diberikan.
"Terdapat percanggahan keterangan yang diberikan oleh mangsa dalam kes inikerana berdasarkan laporan polis yang dibuat, mangsa menyatakan bahawa dia dipeluk dari arah belakang dan cuba dicium di pipi kanan serta peha kanannya diusap sebanyak dua hingga tiga kali oleh tertuduh.
"Sebaliknya, ketika pemeriksaan utama oleh pihak pendakwaan, mangsa tidak dapat mengesahkan sama ada dia dipeluk ataupun tertuduh hanya memegang bahunya".
Aishah berkata, mangsa juga dilihat teragak-agak untuk menjawab dan tidak yakin untuk memberi jawapan ketika pemeriksaan utama dan pemeriksaan balas oleh pihak pendakwaan dan pembelaan.
Selain itu, keterangan mangsa tanpa keterangan sokongan tidak dapat membuktikan tertuduh telah menggunakan kekerasan jenayah ke atasnya.
"Tindakan mangsa yang tidak memaklumkan kejadian yang berlaku ke atas dirinya dengan serta-merta dilihat tidak munasabah kerana sebagai pegawai polis, mangsa mempunyai pengetahuan bahawa apa yang terjadi kepada dirinya adalah salahdi sisi undang-undang dan mangsa sememangnya ada banyak peluang untuk bercerita masalah yang dihadapi dengan rakan sebiliknya," katanya.
Sepanjang perbicaraan, empat saksi memberi keterangan bagi pihak pendakwaan yang dikendalikan oleh Timbalan Pendakwa Raya Choong Kak Sen manakala tertuduh diwakili peguam Wan Shahrizal Wan Laden. - BERNAMA

description.hltext_display: Glarus: Pauschalsteuer soll bleiben
description.content:
Der Glarner Regierungsrat möchte die Pauschalsteuer für Ausländerinnen und Ausländer nicht abschaffen. Damit lehnt er einen Antrag der Grünen ab.
Im Frühling 2010 reichten die Grünen des Kantons Glarus einen Memorialsantrag zur Abschaffung der Pauschalsteuer für Ausländerinnen und Ausländer ein. Dies weil sie zu ungerecht sei. In seiner Sitzung vom Dienstag positionierte sich der Regierungsrat gegen die Abschaffung.
Der Antrag kommt jetzt vor den Landrat. Das letzte Wort hat aber das Glarner Stimmvolk an der Landsgemeinde. Im Kanton Glarus werden fünf ausländische Personen pauschalbesteuert, sie zahlen 450'000 Franken Steuergeld. (holy)

description.hltext_display: Teen found in victim's A4
description.content:
An 18-year-old man was arrested in Soweto allegedly in possession of an Audi that belonged to a man who was murdered on Kliprivier Road, said Captain Mega Ndobe on Wednesday.
The driver of the car was found tied up and badly assaulted on the side of Kliprivier Road on Tuesday night.
He died before an ambulance could arrive.
Patrolling policemen spotted the Audi A4, which was being traced by a tracking company, being driven by the 18-year-old.
They arrested him for possession of a stolen vehicle and found the dead man's cellphone inside the vehicle.
The man will face charges of hijacking and murder.
Ndobe said the dead man's name would be withheld until all his relatives had been informed.

description.hltext_display: Carro cai em cratera aberta por forte chuva...
description.content:
Buraco se abriu quando o Fusca passava pelo local Foto: Ediglei Feitosa
Um jovem de 21 anos retornava ontem, por volta das 2 horas da madrugada, junto com sua namorada e uma prima dela, de uma formatura no Clube Campestre quando o Fusca que dirigia pela Avenida Gabriel Esperidião, em direção ao centro de Paranavaí, foi engolido por uma cratera. Apesar da profundidade do buraco ser de aproximadamente três metros, os três ocupantes do veículo apresentaram apenas ferimentos leves e dispensaram atendimento médico.
Além da interdição parcial da avenida, com apenas uma via sendo utilizada pelos veículos nos dois sentidos do tráfego, a cratera provocou a queda de um poste de energia elétrica, o que causou a interrupção do fornecimento nas redondezas por cerca de duas horas.
A rede coletora de esgoto também ficou bastante danificada e ontem à tarde uma empresa terceirizada da Sanepar avaliava os estragos provocados pela força da chuva.
O buraco, com mais de 24 metros de comprimento, também destruiu parcialmente os canais de escoamento do Ribeirão Paranavaí. Funcionários de uma empresa de telefonia acompanhavam ontem os trabalhos de recuperação, pois havia o risco de rompimento da rede de cabos telefônicos que passa pelo local.
O secretário de Infraestrutura de Paranavaí, Eurípedes Lemes Silva, informou ontem à tarde que a principal preocupação daquele momento era restabelecer o tráfego de veículos, já que a avenida é um dos principais pontos de acesso ao centro comercial da cidade.
Lemes acredita que a cratera possa ter sido causada por uma ruptura na malha asfáltica e a consequente infiltração, situação que não tinha sido percebida anteriormente pela administração municipal.
Ele disse que será preciso fazer um levantamento minucioso para determinar o tempo necessário para recuperar a avenida. Em entrevista à imprensa, o prefeito Rogério Lorenzetti estimou que os estragos devem ser arrumados dentro de dois ou três meses.
O motorista do Fusca, Bruno Gaiano da Silva contou que saiu do clube onde estava sendo realizada a formatura da noiva por volta das 2 horas e passou a seguir o sogro que estava no veículo da frente. Ele lembra que não deu tempo para nada e quando viu já estavam dentro do buraco.
Ainda assustado, Bruno ligou para seu sogro que voltou para socorrê-lo. Ele e outras pessoas que chegaram no local do acidente fizeram uma espécie de “corrente humana” e tiraram os três do veículo.
No final da tarde de ontem, a prefeitura informou que não foram relatados outros estragos provocados pela chuva. O Serviço Meteorológico do Iapar informou que o índice pluviométrico registrado na noite de segunda e madrugada de ontem foi de 48 mm.

description.hltext_display: 伊藤忠商事、Coalworks社とジョイントベンチャー契約締結
description.content:
- (JCN Newswire) - 伊藤忠商事株式会社(TSE:8001)の100%子会社であるITOCHU Minerals & Energy of Australia Pty Ltd(豪、以下「IMEA」)は、COALWORKS Ltd(豪、以下「Coalworks」)と、今年2月に両者間で締結したヴィッカリー・サウス石炭鉱区の開発に向けた探査作業に関する覚書に基づき、この度正式にジョイントベンチャー契約(以下JV契約)を締結しました。またIMEAは本JV契約締結に先立って、初期調査に使用される5百万豪ドル(約4億円)を拠出し、同鉱区の権益29%を取得しました。
なお現在のJV権益保有比率はIMEA29%(Coalworks71%)となっておりますが、今後の探査結果を踏まえIMEAは49%まで持分を増やしていく権利を保有しております。
契約では、同鉱区で生産される全ての石炭について伊藤忠商事が全世界向けにマーケティング活動を行なうことが合意されています。同鉱区からは、鉄鋼生産に必要なコークスをつくる原料である原料炭(非微粘炭)と、発電その他に利用される高品位一般炭の両方が産出される予定で、伊藤忠商事は需要増が見込まれるアジア市場を中心に鋭意マーケティングを展開したいと考えております。
伊藤忠商事は、石炭の更なる優良資産の積上げとトレード機能の拡充を目指すと共に、今後も資源権益ポートフォリオの一層の充実を図ります。
Coalworks社概要
会社名：COALWORKS Limited
代表者：Andrew Firek
本社所在地：ニューサウスウエールズ州ノースシドニー市
設立年月日：2008年6月、ASX(豪州証券取引市場)上場
事業内容：豪州に複数の資源探査権を保有する資源開発会社
Vickery South鉱区概要
所在地：ニューサウスウエールズ州Gunnedah(ガネダ)地区。Newcastle港から鉄道で約330km。
探査対象炭種：原料炭(非微粘炭)・一般炭
生産開始：2013年(予定)
本リリースの詳細は下記URLをご参照ください。
http://www.itochu.co.jp/ja/news/2010/101222.html
伊藤忠商事株式会社
詳細は www.itochu.co.jp をご覧ください。
Source: 伊藤忠商事株式会社

description.hltext_display: 兰德里22+10国王6连败
description.content:
数据 组图 投篮点
搜狐体育讯 北京时间12月22日消息，萨克拉门托国王队坐镇主场迎战金州勇士队，拉德玛诺维奇在第四节常规时间结束前命中压哨3分将比赛拖入加时赛，埃利斯在加时赛独砍9分，带领勇士打出一波15-3攻势，最终勇士通过加时赛以117-109击败国王。勇士客场5连败就此被终结，国王遭遇6连败。
具体比分为（勇士在前）：26-18，23-30，21-36，32-18，15-7。勇士：埃利斯36分7次助攻，雷吉-威廉姆斯24分7个篮板，赖特17分，李15分12个篮板，拉德玛诺维奇15分8个篮板。国王：尤德利34分创个人得分记录，埃文斯15分10个篮板7次助攻，考辛斯7分13个篮板，兰德里22分10个篮板。
比赛开始后，勇士打出了5-0开局，双方在战成8平后，埃利斯连进两球帮助勇士再次占据上风，随后赖特，威廉姆斯等人纷纷建功，首节战罢，勇士以26-18领先。次节，勇士一直保持着10分左右的领先优势，本节后半段场上形势突变，兰德里一人连砍9分，带领国王发动反击，在兰德里的带领下，国王在上半场结束时将比分追至48-49。
易地再战，勇士在打出5-0小高潮后，国王就掌控了场上局势，单节他们净胜勇士15分，使得在三节比赛结束时，国王以84-70领先勇士。末节，埃利斯和拉德玛诺维奇联手射进3个三分球，带领勇士发动反击，国王在4分多钟的时间内一分未得，勇士趁机将比分追至89-94，埃文斯上篮得手帮助国王打破得分慌，但凭借拉德玛诺维奇的压哨三分球，勇士在第四节结束时，将比分扳成102平，双方进入加时赛。
加时赛，国王连投再罚拿下4分，威廉姆斯立刻3分还以颜色，随后埃利斯和李纷纷建功，勇士一波15-3进攻高潮锁定胜局，最终勇士以117-109击败国王。
双方首发阵容
勇士：赖特，埃利斯，大卫-李，雷吉-威廉姆斯，刘易斯-阿姆森
国王：尤德利，杰克逊，埃文斯，考辛斯，格林
（搜狐体育：晨晨）

description.hltext_display: 放寬農漁會幹部資格 爭議條文保留協商
description.content:
立法院經濟委員會今天審查「農會法」、「漁會法」修正草案，不過民進黨立委質疑，修法條文放寬了農漁會代表、理監事和總幹事資格，有放生黑金的嫌疑。委員會最後雖然通過初審，不過對於放寬農漁會人員資格的爭議條文，全數保留交付朝野協商。
立法院經濟委員會22日審查農會法、漁會法修正草案，不過民進黨立委質疑修法條文放寬了農漁會代表、理監事和總幹事資格，有放生黑金的嫌疑。立委翁金珠質疑，行政院以五都改制和農業金融法配套修法的理由，根本是想偷渡黑金放生條款。
立委李俊毅則質疑，行政部門提案放寬農會幹部、約聘人員的資格，根本是反改革的行為，李俊毅質疑，農漁會修法是馬總統為了的2012連任而拉攏農漁會系統。民進黨一定堅決反對。
委員會雖然通過初審，不過綠營對於行政院版本，放寬規定受緩刑而交付保護管束、5年內沒有不良債權記錄，以及受保安處分者可以競選農漁會會員代表、理監事和總幹事的提案，都提出修正動議。會議主席蕭景田最後裁示，對於綠營有提出修正動議的條文，都保留交付協商。

description.hltext_display: Inicia mañana pago de becas
description.author: Noroeste/Redacción
description.content:
CULIACÁN.- A partir del jueves, los beneficiados con los apoyos económicos del Sistema Estatal de Becas de Sinaloa, podrán pasar a cobrarlas en cualquier sucursal de banco Banamex, anunció la profesora María del Rosario Valenzuela Medina.
La Coordinadora del Sistema Estatal de Becasin señaló que para este ciclo escolar 2010-2011, se convocaron 17 mil 861 becas económicas para estudiantes de escuelas públicas del estado, destacando por su número las de educación básica.
Desde ayer se está proporcionando información con la lista de los beneficiarios con una beca económica para educación básica, media superior y superior, y el pago que se efectuará este jueves 23 corresponde al cuatrimestre septiembre-diciembre del presente año.
A los beneficiarios se les proporciona la clave requerida por la institución bancaria para poder cobrar la beca, misma que se compone con los primeros 16 dígitos de la CURP, el número de municipio (Culiacán es 06) y al final las letras BA (que significa que son de educación básica).

description.hltext_display: 29歳。たった一言が言ってもらえません。 - 意外とマジメ
description.content:
私（29歳）には、付き合って9ヶ月の彼氏（31歳）がいます。
私、彼共に北米在住で、彼はアジア系アメリカ人なのですが、未だに「愛している」という言葉を私にかけてくれたことはありません。
ふとしたことで彼からの思いやりを感じ、自分から「愛しているよ」と言ったところ（内心テレテレですが）「雨音のことはとても大切に思っているよ。だけど、まだお互い知り合って間もないから、知らないことはたくさんある。正直に言うと、その言葉を言う心の準備が出来ていない。心からそう感じた時のためにその言葉は取っておきたい。それまで待っていてくれる？」と返されました。交際2ヶ月くらいの時の話です。（何だかキザ（古）な言い回しに聞こえると思いますが、英語を直訳するとどうしてもこんな感じになるんです、笑）
私もいい年なので、心にもないことを言われても意味がないことは重々承知しています。虚しいだけですから。ただ、言わないということは、やっぱりそこまでの気持ちがないということなので、その現状がちょっと寂しいんです。
ちなみに彼との仲は至って良好です。仕事帰りが彼よりも遅い私のために前もって夕食を買って（もしくは作って）彼のアパートで待っていてくれたり、私がどこに行くにも、「着いたら無事かどうか連絡して」と声を掛けてくれたり（自分の時も同様に報告有り）、本当にちょっとしたことなんですけどね。私が抜けている性格なので、「これに関してはもっとシッカリしないと、１人の時本当に困るよ。ちゃんと覚えておいて」と、時には厳しいことも言ってくれるいい男なんです。（のろけてすいません）彼の家族や兄弟にもきちんと紹介してくれましたし、誠実な人であることは間違いないのですが、その言葉だけは言ってくれないんですよね。そういう男性心理、お分かりになる方いらっしいますか？ すみません、半分愚痴も入ってました。

description.hltext_display: BBC: Romania, Bulgaria Blocked from Joining Schengen Zone
description.content:
France
The French and German interior ministers said it was "premature" to let them join Schengen in March 2011.
They said Bulgaria and Romania needed to make "irreversible progress" in the fight against corruption and organised crime.
Romania condemned the decision, while Bulgaria promised to "do its utmost" to remove doubts about its membership.
French Interior Minister Brice Hortefeux and his German counterpart, Thomas de Maiziere, raised their objections in a letter to European Home Affairs Commissioner Cecilia Malmstroem, AFP news agency reported.
Experts from EU states who visited Romania and Bulgaria are due to present a report in January that will be used by governments to make a decision on Romanian and Bulgarian membership, but it must be agreed by the Schengen members in unanimity.
"Grave consequences"
A spokesman for Germany's interior ministry said there had also been a lack of progress by Romania and Bulgaria in reforming their judiciary, Associated Press news agency reported.
The spokesman said those deficits could have "grave consequences for the European Union's security" and raised concerns about an "overly swift" adhesion to the Schengen area.
Romanian President Traian Basescu said: "I believe that the Franco-German letter sent to the European Commission is an act of discrimination against Romania."
Bulgarian Foreign Ministry spokeswoman Vessela Tcherneva told AFP: "We are aware that the political situation in some EU member countries is complicated. For that reason, we will do our utmost to remove any doubts, including in the areas of the judicial system and society as a whole."
The Schengen zone is made up of 25 European countries - the 27 EU members, minus the UK, Ireland, Bulgaria, Romania and Cyprus; plus three non-EU nations - Norway, Iceland and Switzerland.

event_or_fact.property: We are aware that the political situation in some EU member countries is complicated.; For that reason, we will do our utmost to remove any doubts, including in the areas of the judicial system and society as a whole.
I believe that the Franco-German letter sent to the European Commission is an act of discrimination against Romania.

description.hltext_display: Aumento salarial dos secretários foi retirado...
description.content:
O projeto de lei que reajusta o salário dos secretários municipais foi retirado da pauta da Câmara de Vereadores pela mesa diretora, atendendo pedido da liderança do Poder Executivo de Paranavaí. Foi questão de estratégia, portanto, política, informa um assessor direto do prefeito Rogério Lorenzetti, presente na reunião ordinária da Câmara anteontem à noite. A proposta deve retornar à Casa hoje, na sessão extraordinária, marcada para 17 horas.
Mesmo antes de colocado em votação, o projeto já tem votos declarados. Na sessão desta segunda-feira, o vereador Roberto Picorelli (Pó Royal) se antecipou e disse que votará contra. O vereador Antônio Carlos Utrila Garcia igualmente manifestou voto contrário ontem pela manhã. Utrila entende que o projeto não deveria ser apreciado em sessão extra, mas sim, em sessão ordinária.
Já o vereador Mohamed Soumaille declarou voto favorável em seu programa de rádio na Transamérica FM. Um grupo de cerca de 15 pessoas participou da sessão para manifestar contrário ao reajuste de salário do primeiro escalão.
Outros dois projetos importantes que estavam na sessão de anteontem foram retirados. O que cria o Centro Comercial de Ambulantes e regulamenta tal atividade na praça do Terminal Urbano Ângelo Bogoni (Praça Brasil) e o que altera o Estacionamento Regulamentado - Estar.
O projeto dos ambulantes deve ser analisado em audiência pública. Já com relação ao Estar o objetivo teria sido anexar alguns documentos.

description.hltext_display: "Die dicken Kinder" im "Parkplatz"
【ドスパラよりリリース】 「第2回秋葉原PCゲームフェスタ」初日に 「電撃の旅団クリスマス！『FFXIV』と『FFXI』でムダに話す会 in 秋葉原」 開催決定！
Indonesia Stocks Expected To Test 3,650-Point Level
description.content:
(RTTNews) - The Indonesian stock market has finished higher now in two of three sessions since the end of the five-day losing streak in which it had plummeted more than 215 points or 6.5 percent. The Jakarta Composite Index finished just below the 3,640-point plateau, and now analysts are expecting to see the market continue to rebound when it kicks off trade on Wednesday.
The global forecast for the Asian markets is positive, although any movements may be exacerbated by light volume ahead of the holidays, while the easing of tensions on the Korean peninsula adds to the sentiment. Steel stocks are likely to provide support, as are financials and technology shares. The European and U.S. markets finished higher on Tuesday, and the Asian bourses are expected to follow suit.
The JCI finished sharply higher on Tuesday as traders snatched up bargain. Property stocks, automobile producers and resource stocks led the market higher.
For the day, the index jumped 68.64 points or 1.9 percent to finish at 3,637.45 after trading between 3,569.46 and 3,642.10. Volume was 3.1 billion shares worth 4.2 trillion rupiah. There were 152 gainers and 57 decliners.
Among the gainers, Bank Mandiri added 3.2 percent, while Bakrieland Development gained 0.6 percent, Energi Mega Persada jumped 1.6 percent and Astra International climbed 2.4 percent.
The lead from Wall Street is cautiously optimistic as stocks were able to post solid gains on Tuesday, with buying interest partly driven by optimism regarding the potential of U.S. economic growth in 2011. Market participation was limited as many stayed away from their desks ahead of the holiday weekend.
Corporate news drove some of the day's moves amid the absence of market moving economic reports.
Canadian lender Toronto-Dominion Bank (TD) closed higher after announcing a deal with Cerberus Capital Management to acquire auto lender Chrysler Financial for about $6.3 billion in cash. TD expects the acquisition to close in the second quarter of its fiscal 2011. Shares of Toronto-Dominion bounced off of the four-month low set on Monday.
Nutritional products firm Martek Biosciences Corp. (MATK) also rose after signing an agreement to be acquired by Royal DSM, a Netherlands-based life sciences and materials sciences company, for $31.50 per share in cash. The total deal is worth approximately $1.09 billion. Martek jumped to a two-year closing high on the news.
Cliffs Natural (CLF) also moved to the upside on news that it has received Australian Commonwealth and State government approval for developing new deposits at its iron ore reserves in Western Australia. Shares moved up to their best close in two years.
Jabil Circuit (JBL) advanced to its best closing price in three years after forecasting second quarter earnings and revenues in ranges that were above analyst expectations.
Meanwhile, Darden Restaurants (DRI) sank to a six-week closing lower as sales at restaurants open for at least a year fell short of expectations for the second quarter.

description.hltext_display: 莎娃男友16分篮网胜
description.content:
数据 组图 投篮点
搜狐体育讯 北京时间12月22日，洛佩兹统治内线，莎娃未婚夫武贾西奇替补上场建功，篮网客场101比94击败灰熊，取得两连胜。四节具体比分为26-18，19-25，28-24，28-27（篮网在前）。
洛佩兹贡献26分6篮板，亨弗里斯12分15篮板，武贾西奇替补上场8投6中贡献16分4篮板。灰熊6人得分上双，小加索尔19分4篮板，兰多夫11分14篮板5助攻，盖伊11分9篮板4盖帽4抢断。
开场后，洛佩兹连续单打得手，哈里斯打三分成功，篮网率先占据主动。亨利连得7分帮助灰熊反超，篮网在末段掀起了一波11比2的小高潮，首节结束，篮网领先8分。第二节，武贾西奇在前半段得到7分，篮网一度将分差拉大到10分，兰多夫和加索尔随后引领了灰熊的反击。半场，篮网仅领先2分。
第三节，篮网内外结合，多点开花，灰熊的进攻也很犀利，但是命中率稍逊一筹，盖伊单节完成2次2+1。篮网领先6分进入第四节。最后一节，梅奥爆发在前半段独得9分，洛佩兹连续罚球打破篮网得分荒，哈里斯也适时得分，灰熊无力缩小分差，吞下失利苦果。
双方首发阵容：
篮网：布鲁克-洛佩兹，克里斯-亨弗里斯，特拉维斯-奥特洛，史蒂芬-格拉汉姆，德文-哈里斯
灰熊：马克-加索尔，扎克-兰多夫，鲁迪-盖伊，泽维尔-亨利，麦克-康利
（搜狐体育 立青）

description.hltext_display: Forex: GBP/USD picking up, approaches 1.5500
description.author: FXstreet.com
description.content: FXstreet.com (Barcelona) - Pound's decline from 1.5900 area last week, extended to a fresh 3-month low at 1.5435 yesterday, were the pair found support to pick up during Asian trading, reaching 1.5500 area ahead of London session opening. On the upside, immediate resistance lies at 1.5490 (Daily Pivot Point/session high), and above here, 1.5565/75 (Dec 20/21 highs) and 1.5665 (Dec 17 highs). On the downside, support levels remain at 1.5450 (Dec 17 low) and below here, 1.5435 (Dec 21 low) and 1.5345 (Sept 14 low). The pair's bias is negative, according to Ian Coleman, technical analyst at FXstreet.com, although bears are losing momentum: " All indicators are still bearish but we can see them rising (Red Line). I would look to 15508 today for signals of another push lower but would trade with extreme caution."

description.hltext_display: Jovem furta em hotel e acaba preso
description.content:
Todo o material furtado foi entregue na delegacia de Loanda
Um jovem de 19 anos foi preso pela Polícia Militar de Loanda, segunda-feira, depois de ter realizado um furto em um hotel próximo da estação rodoviária. O acusado levou cinco relógios de pulso, um notebook Semp Toshiba, um aparelho de toca-CD e um carregador de notebook.
Com o rapaz os policiais ainda encontraram um monitor de computador, marca LG, e um computador furtados no interior do Núcleo Regional de Educação. O material recuperado ainda estava com as etiquetas de patrimônio do Paraná Previdência.
Os policiais ainda encontraram um amplificador de som furtado na Casa da Sopa, de Loanda. O rapaz recebeu voz de prisão e foi encaminhado a 20ª DRP, onde foi autuado em flagrante. (Por Robson Fracaroli)

description.hltext_display: 宜蘭跨年晚會 邀百位民眾發聲祝福
description.content:
跨年進入倒數計時，今年宜蘭跨年晚會訂於12月31日晚上在蘭城新月廣場舉行，邀請K歌情人品冠開場演出，並由金鐘獎影后萬芳一同陪民眾熱情倒數，迎接中華民國100年的到來。
宜蘭市公所與蘭城新月合作舉辦『宜蘭久久、活力勁百』建國百年跨年晚會，晚會由知名藝人陳漢典、徐可主持，與會歌手包括K歌情人品冠、歌手萬芳、模仿天王黃鐙輝、哈爾濱之光陸瑤、超人氣偶像賴雅研、南拳媽媽、武虎將，還有白吉勝、陳傑瑞、黃小柔、hotshock等人，將和民眾一同跨年，迎接民國百年到來。
宜蘭市跨年晚會，為了展現建國一百年「市民優先」的意義，並特別募集百位民眾同發聲，說出新年新希望或祝福的話，民眾事先報名拍攝錄影，將在12月31日晚會中播出。

description.hltext_display: FPP Asset Management moves to Daiwa’s web portal to access their Fund NAV data
description.content:
FPP Asset Management has announced that it is migrating to the Daiwa Securities Global Asset Services web portal. The asset manager has made the decision to move to Daiwa’s platform in order to be able to access its fund NAV data.
“We are delighted to migrate to Daiwa’s web portal solution as it provides us the enhanced functionality and transparency that the market demands whilst at the same time gives us the flexibility in accessing current and historical data in a very user friendly and secure manner,” commented Michele Wood Chief Operating Officer of FPP Asset Management.

description.hltext_display: Lo proponen para titular de la SCOP
description.author: Janneth Aldecoa
description.content:
Alfredo Inzunza Valenzuela
Fotografía: Noroeste.
CULIACÁN.- El presidente del Colegio de Ingenieros Civiles y ex director de Obras Públicas del Ayuntamiento de Culiacán, Alfredo Inzunza Valenzuela, fue propuesto por el Consejo Integrador de la Construcción en Sinaloa, para ocupar el puesto de Secretario de Comunicaciones y Obras Públicas en el periodo 2011-2016.
Inzunza Valenzuela consideró que quien ocupe el cargo debe tener el perfil de ingeniero civil con visión y espíritu gremialista y participación, así como con experiencia en la administración pública.
"En una reunión del Consejo Integrador de la Construcción a nivel estatal, integrado por la Cámara de la Construcción, los colegios de ingenieros civiles de todo el estado y los colegios de arquitectos, de ingenieros mecánicos y de electricistas, además de los valuadores y las facultades de ingeniería y arquitectura, me proponen como titular de la Secretaría. Enviamos un documento al gobernador electo, con el entendido de que él es el único facultado de tomar una decisión al respecto y seremos muy respetuosos de esa decisión", dijo.
El ex funcionario propuso la sectorización de las áreas de la construcción, a fin de propiciar un trabajo en conjunto y abrir un espacio para la participación ciudadana.
"Proponemos que en torno a la Secretaría de Comunicaciones y Obras Públicas se sectoricen todas las áreas de construcción del estado como el INVIES, área de Catastro y todas las áreas técnicas en el sector de infraestructura, para trabajar juntos en ese sentido", expresó.
Otras de las propuestas del gabineteable es el entendimiento entre actores del sector de la construcción.
"Somos una propuesta a la sociedad civil. Queremos que haya gente con espíritu y participación gremialista. Que nuestro gremio no tenga roces con la nueva titularidad, que hablemos de tú a tú dentro de los diferentes actores del sector de la construcción, así como que representamos, entre obra pública y privada, entre el 5% del producto interno Bruto del Estado de Sinaloa", agregó.
"Proponemos que en torno a la Secretaría de Comunicaciones y Obras Públicas se sectoricen todas las áreas de construcción del estado como el INVIES, área de Catastro y todas las áreas técnicas en el sector de infraestructura, para trabajar juntos en ese sentido".
Alfredo Inzunza Valenzuela
Presidente del Colegio de Ingenieros Civiles

description.hltext_display: Escolar de Xadrez teve participação de 42...
description.content:
O Clube de Xadrez de Paranavaí e o Paranavaí Xadrez Clube realizaram de 15 a 17 de dezembro, em sua sede, anexa à Fespar, a edição 2010 do Campeonato Escolar de Xadrez de Paranavaí, que contou com a participação de 42 enxadristas de Paranavaí e região.
Os campeões em cada categoria em disputa foram os seguintes: Feminino - Sub-08 - Beatriz Juliani Kihara (Colégio Paroquial). Sub-10 - Fernanda Ferreira Prazeres Lima (Colégio Paroquial). Sub-12 - Catarina de Oliveira Miranda (Escola Municipal Hermeto Botelho). Sub-14 - Juliana da Silva Rocha (Colégio Paroquial). Sub-16 - Carolina Contrera Sakada (Colégio Paroquial). Sub-18 - Tayra Maria Tavares (Colégio Nobel). Universitário - Imyra Cecília Tavares (Educação Física/Fafipa/Paranavaí).
Masculino - Sub-08 - Eric Juliani Kihara (Colégio Paroquial). Sub-10 - Gustavo Vinicius Santos (Escola Municipal Santa Teresinha). Sub-12 - Marcos Vinicius Contrera Sakada (Colégio Paroquial). Sub-14 - Gustavo Inumaro (Colégio Estadual Bento Munhoz da Rocha). Sub-16 - Denis da Luz (Escola Municipal Elsa Caselli). Sub-18 - Dione da Silva (Colégio Estadual Newton Guimarães). Universitário - Mateus Camargo - campeão (Cesumar/Maringá), vice Sálvio Sakakibara (Administração/Fafipa/Paranavaí).
Com exceção de Mateus Camargo, que estuda no Cesumar, em Maringá, todas as outras entidades representadas são de Paranavaí.
A arbitragem da competição foi realizada por José de Arimatéia Tavares e Adriana da Silva Alexandre. A competição contou com o apoio da Fundação de Esportes e da FEXPAR - Federação de Xadrez do Paraná.

description.hltext_display: Wettbewerb für Hobbykünstler
UPDATE1-Gas leak at Dr Reddy's plant in India kills two
description.content:
BANGALORE, Dec 22 (Reuters) - The death of two people at Indian pharmaceutical firm Dr Reddy's Laboratories Ltd's plant, which the police say was caused by gas leakage, has not impacted production at the unit, the drug maker said.
An employee and a contract worker died in the incident that occurred at the company's plant in the southern state of Andhra Pradesh. Dr Reddy's company said no one else was injured in the incident.
The police are investigating the incident that occurred around midnight on Tuesday and have booked a case of negligence but have made no arrests so far, A.S.K. Das, a senior police officer, told Reuters.
Shares in the drugmaker, which fell more than 4 percent on the news, had reversed losses to trade 0.4 percent higher at 1,695 rupees in a firm Mumbai market at 0824 GMT.
The plant is approved by the U.S. Food and Drug Administration and makes bulk drugs, a company official said.
(Reporting by Bharghavi Nagaraju; Editing by Aradhana Aravindan) (If you have a query or comment on this story, send an email to news.feedback.asia@thomsonreuters.com) Keywords: DRREDDYS UNIT/DEATH
(bharghavi.nagaraju@thomsonreuters.com; +91 80 4135 5805; Reuters Messaging: bharghavi.nagaraju.reuters.com@reuters.net)

description.hltext_display: 篮网掘金欲多人交易
description.content:
搜狐体育讯 北京时间12月21日《雅虎体育》消息：尽管掘金对安东尼仍未死心，但志在必得的篮网离“甜瓜”又更近了一步。有消息源曝料称，篮网方面正在筹划一个多队复杂大交易，并有望通过这个潜在交易一举拿下卡梅隆。
种种迹象表明，掘金挽留安东尼的希望越来越小。虽然尼克斯是“甜瓜”心目中的首选球队，但掘金似乎还是更愿意和篮网合作。今年夏天，篮网曾策划了一个涉及4支球队的交易方案，但最终没能成行。消息源称，篮网的新交易方案相比上一次更为复杂，也更有诱惑力。
据悉，篮网打算用这次多队交易获得一些给力的球员，以此来辅佐安东尼，好让“甜瓜”在交易后能与球队续约。此前的流言也指出，安东尼不想到处流浪，他渴望加盟一支有实力能与其续约的球队。
一名涉及到谈判但并不想透露姓名的球队总经理告诉雅虎体育，篮网的这次交易计划已经明朗化，如果能如愿，那他们的实力将会有显著的提升。他还表示，篮网准备在引进安东尼的同时，得到艾尔-哈灵顿，当然哈灵顿并非是唯一的附带球员。
“梅罗希望的是类似于魔术的大交易，无论去哪里，他都希望自己能有一批得力的助手，而不是孤军奋战。”一名西区的球队经理如是说。
至于篮网究竟联系了哪些球队，目前还无从得知。但一名联盟官员透露，篮网已经开始遍地撒网，并准备好了费佛斯、墨菲、两个或者三个首轮选秀权，以及300万美元来作为筹码参与交易，他们的最低目标是得到安东尼和哈灵顿。这名官员还强调，中锋洛佩兹是唯一一名没涉及到任何交易谈判的篮网球员。
掘金方面之所以突然加快了交易步伐，是因为近期有很多球队开始打电话询问交易事宜。甚至有消息称，联盟有两支有望冲击总冠军的球队，愿意冒着续约失败的风险来得到安东尼。如果和这两支球队交易，掘金甚至都不用和安东尼进行沟通，因为这两支球队根本就不在乎安东尼是否会选择续约。
有些参加了谈判的球队经理认为，有关安东尼的交易很可能在近期内完成。尼克斯的总裁沃尔什最近几周一直在和掘金高层进行谈判，但由于他们拿不出具有足够诱惑力的筹码，掘金方面仍然倾向于和篮网合作。
与此同时，篮网还有可能送出哈里斯去第3支球队，以此来换回可以更好帮助球队的球员，而比卢普斯也有可能被送到篮网。消息源称，掘金高层愿意送走J.R.史密斯，而公牛对史密斯很有兴趣。
总之，篮网如今距离安东尼更近了一步。正如一位匿名的总经理所说，篮网的这次交易计划相比上次“更复杂，更庞大”。看样，篮网得到安东尼只是时间问题。（搜狐体育 清河村）

description.hltext_display: Diamante Negro termina o Amador de Colorado...
description.content:
A jovem equipe Esporte Clube Diamante Negro, de Santo Antonio do Caiuá, ao não conseguir superar a equipe de Centenário do Sul, no jogo de volta da final do 25º Campeonato Amador de Futebol da Liga de Colorado, ficou como vice-campeã.
O jogo disputado no domingo, 19, em Santo Antonio do Caiuá, terminou com o placar apontando a vitória de Centenário do Sul por 5 a 3. Os gols foram assinalados por Robson (2), Birimbal, Alexandre e Dudu (Centenário); Juarez (2) e Wilson (Diamante). No jogo de ida, Centenário do Sul havia vencido por 2 a 0.
O técnico Gordo, auxiliado por Paraíba utilizou estes atletas: Roberto Padilha, Ricardinho, Renato, Camelo, Zezinho, Ivan, Ney, Almir, Wilson, Valzinho, Buiú, Juarez, Carlinhos, Polaco, Igor, Ratinho e Dill. Integram a comissão técnica Corre Trio (massagista) e Absalon Tiago (diretor).
Atletas campeões por Centenário do Sul: Gil, Caqui (Dudu), Márcio, Iô, Marquinhos, China (Izael), Robson (Nei), Joãozinho (Alex), Birimbal, Alexandre e Fábio. Técnico - Canela.
O árbitro foi Celso Ramos dos Santos, assistido por Antônio Rodrigues e Carlos Vicente Medeiros, delegado Patão.
A equipe terceira colocada foi Alto Alegre e a quarta colocada Guaraci. O artilheiro foi Sidnei Silva (Diamante) com 10 gols, a defesa menos vazada a de Guaraci com nove gols.
Segundo o diretor Absalon “a equipe começou há seis meses, quando resolvemos disputar o amador, muitas pessoas falaram que não passaríamos da primeira fase, mas tivemos coragem e colocamos o coração na ponta da chuteira e conseguimos essa honrosa segunda colocação, lutamos muito sem apoio algum, mas mesmo assim quero deixar nossos agradecimentos a todos que torceram contra ou a nosso favor, agradeço ainda os jogadores que não mediram esforços e luta ao longo da competição”.

description.hltext_display: 拼觀光 集集鎮推出特色三輪車搭載遊客
description.content:
南投縣花卉嘉年華系列活動的「花現集集」，即將在25號揭幕，集集鎮配合推出十部「花車和火車造型的三輪車」，為街道景觀增色不少，這也是全台唯一的特色三輪車隊，未來將以收費方式，搭載遊客遊覽市區。
集集鎮長莊瑞麟表示，十部三輪車中，其中五部火車頭造型的三輪車是集集的泰祥木材行打造，火車頭三輪車分別彩繪當地的五種水果以及鳥類，金蕉、芭樂、紅龍果、葡萄、五色鳥；五部花車造型三輪車則由南開大學協助裝置，五輛花車分別是香蕉花車，富貴花車，聖誕花車，花仙子花車，嘉年華花車；外觀華麗，而且駕駛都穿著制服。
25號下午，「花現集集」開幕式後，特色三輪車將載著當天選出的水果公主遊行花田區及集集市街；未來則計畫在假日營運，每次收費3百元，約1到1.5小時，搭載遊客遊覽集集市區主要景點。
另外，二十五號當天上午有水果公主選拔、牆面彩繪比賽、魔術表演、下午開幕儀式邀請歌手表演、還有踩街活動及集集巡禮等。

description.hltext_display: Quieren 175 ser secretario particular
description.author: José Alfredo Beltrán
description.content:
José Alfredo Beltrán
CULIACÁN.- Si de secretarios particulares se trata, al Gobernador electo Mario López Valdez le sobra "de dónde echar mano".
Y es que éste es uno de los puestos más demandados por los usuarios del "Chambaweb".
Un total de 175 personas postuló para ser considerada en este cargo, que en los hechos es uno de los de mayor confianza del titular del Ejecutivo estatal.
Ninguna Coordinación General o Secretaría de Estado, salvo el caso de Desarrollo Tecnológico, que es considerado "atípico", supera el número de currículas recibidas para una área específica del Gobierno estatal.
El artículo 45 del Reglamento Orgánico de la Administración Pública estatal de Sinaloa establece que a la Secretaría Particular le corresponde el despacho de asuntos como el de prestarle al titular del Ejecutivo Estatal el auxilio que en lo personal requiera para el desempeño de su encargo constitucional.
"(También) debe llevar y dar cuenta al Gobernador de su correspondencia oficial y particular, turnando a las dependencias respectivas, para su atención, los asuntos de su competencia, así como atender y tramitar los demás asuntos que le encomiende el Ejecutivo, con el apoyo de un equipo de servidores públicos", se indica.
En el caso del aún Mandatario Jesús Aguilar Padilla esta responsabilidad recayó en Mayra Gisela Peñuelas Acuña, en la parte final del sexenio.

description.hltext_display: 三井物産、西豪州ローブ・リバー ジョイントベンチャーの鉄鉱石積出港拡張について
description.content:
- (JCN Newswire) - 三井物産株式会社(TSE:8031)は、本日、世界有数の鉱物資源会社リオ・ティント社(英・豪)と共に西豪州で共同運営している鉄鉱石事業ローブ・リバー ジョイントベンチャー(以下「ローブJ/V」；リオ・ティント社53%、三井物産33%、その他株主14%)において、鉄鉱石積出港であるケープ・ランバート港の年間出荷能力を現在の8,000万トンから5,300万トン追加し、1億3,300万トンへ拡張することを決定しました。
今回のローブJ/Vの拡張投資総額は約37.8億豪ドル(約3,030億円)を見込んでおり、三井物産は豪州の100%子会社 ミツイ・アイアン・オア・ディベロップメント社を通じて約12.5億豪ドル(約1,000億円)の投資を行うことになります。完工時期は2013年末の予定です。
三井物産は、ローブJ/Vを通じて、中長期的に見込まれる鉄鉱石の世界的な需要増に対応してまいります。
本リリースの詳細は下記URLをご参照ください。
http://www.mitsui.co.jp/release/2010/1190922_3893.html
三井物産株式会社
詳細は www.mitsui.co.jp をご覧ください。
Source: 三井物産株式会社

Tenistas revelação de 2010: Francisco Ivantes e Luciano Peres.

description.hltext_display: "Wir zünden eine Kerze an"
麦蒂或逼活塞神投离开
description.content:
(汉密尔顿资料图) 搜
搜狐体育讯 北京时间12月22日消息，据《底特律新闻报》报道，活塞队知情人透露，理查德-汉密尔顿，这个活塞昔日曾连续6次打进东部决赛的核心，由于对自己现在在球队当中的角色不满意，希望自己能够被球队交易出去。
汉密尔顿并没有参加球队当地时间周六的训练，而且因为肚子疼痛也缺席当地时间球队周日的比赛。汉密尔顿十分不满意自己在球队当中的地位，他对自己在队中表现机会的不断递减也开始抱怨，这激化了他与球队之间的矛盾。
“他（汉密尔顿）已经抛弃了我们。”一位球队内部人士透露。而另一位内部人士则表示汉密尔顿现在太情绪化了，他应该做出相应的调整。
当地时间周日，活塞与黄蜂的比赛中，汉密尔顿就声称自己肚子疼而缺席了比赛，但在这场比赛之后，球队当中就有很多人认为汉密尔顿在说谎。球队总裁乔-杜马斯之前表示，由于球队在兜售，所以做交易并不容易，如果汉密尔顿与管理层的关系决裂的话，那么活塞势必也会做出相应的举动。要知道，魔术，太阳和奇才刚刚做完一笔大交易。
“如果需要我和他（汉密尔顿）好好谈谈的话，那么我会去做的，”杜马斯说道，“对我来说，他真的很不错，我会看看接下来的情况。”
本赛季，汉密尔顿的表现可以算是自2002年来到底特律之后的最糟糕的，如今他还剩下3年1260万美元的合同。本赛季至今，汉密尔顿场均可以获得26.4分钟的上场时间并贡献13.6分，但本赛季由于技术犯规的问题，汉密尔顿已经几次被驱逐出场。事实上，本赛季主教练库斯特给了汉密尔顿大量的表现机会，但是他却没有用表现来回报主帅的信任。本赛季，他的投篮命中率只有41%，为职业生涯新低。
是谁将汉密尔顿逼到了这个份儿上？在某种程度上，130万美元底薪合同的麦蒂或许是“罪魁祸首”。从活塞交易到艾弗森那个赛季，被打压的就是汉密尔顿，活塞当年的夺冠功臣给艾弗森让路打替补，今夏杜马斯又签下了麦蒂，而后者在新赛季的状态逐渐上升，麦蒂也逐渐受到活塞队的重视。事实上，在麦蒂的使用上，活塞队一直很小心，他们也为麦蒂设立了上场时间限制，但麦蒂找回昔日的状态后，他很有可能打30分钟的比赛，上一场对阵黄蜂的比赛麦蒂就代替受伤的汉密尔顿首发出场，虽然4分5篮板的数据很一般，但麦蒂确实打的很努力。
底特律当地媒体曾发表文章指出，麦蒂已经成为了活塞队新领袖，年轻球员都十分听从麦蒂的领导，在活塞战胜老鹰的比赛里麦蒂命中4个三分帮助球队获得胜利，这也让麦蒂在球队的地位稳固提高。从活塞内斗的趋势看，麦蒂会占据上风，而麦蒂也会得到更多的上场时间。或许汉密尔顿并不想再看到当年与艾弗森为出场时间暗战的局面，才有了今天希望自己被交易出去的意愿。
（搜狐体育：晨晨）

description.hltext_display: Quadra coberta de Mandiocaba será entregue...
description.content:
Foram investidos no local cerca de R$ 330 mil com recursos do Programa de Construção de Quadras Cobertas do Governo do Estado. Foto: Divulgação/Marcelo Zavan
Uma obra há muito tempo aguardada pela comunidade de Mandiocaba, a quadra coberta de esportes da escola estadual do distrito será entregue hoje, quarta-feira, pelo Governo do Estado. A solenidade que marcará a entrega da obra terá início às 8h30 e contará com a presença de diversas autoridades e lideranças locais.
Toda a comunidade está convidada a participar. É importante ressaltar que a cerimônia oficial de inauguração da quadra será realizada em fevereiro com o 1º Torneio de Futsal Vereador José Dolvino Garcia.
Foram investidos no local cerca de R$ 330 mil com recursos do Programa de Construção de Quadras Cobertas do Governo do Estado, que foram assegurados graças a intervenção do deputado estadual Antonio Teruo Kato. A Prefeitura Municipal investiu outros R$ 100 mil, referentes ao valor do terreno e sua preparação.
A obra foi executada pela Construtora Tuiuti, vencedora da licitação, e deverá beneficiar, além dos 250 alunos da instituição, toda a comunidade do distrito, que há anos sonhava com a conquista da obra.

description.hltext_display: SKOPOS Discuss Impact Of Organisational Culture On Efforts To Enhance Human Resource Competitiveness In Egypt
description.content:
Egyptian Human Resource Management Association gathers leading HR professionals
SKOPOS Consulting, a leading Organisation Development (OD) solutions firm in the Middle East and Africa, conducted a special discussion about the impact of organizational culture in driving business performance during a speaking engagement hosted by the Egyptian Human Resource Management Association (EHRMA) yesterday (December 22, 2010) at the Conrad Hotel in Cairo, Egypt.
The discussion, which was attended by EHRMA members and other HR professionals in the country, provided a closer look at how organizational culture can help enhance organizational outcomes and boost business longevity and success. Dr. Hussein El Kazzaz, Managing Director, SKOPOS Consulting Group, served as the keynote speaker of the event and focused his discussions on strategies related to organization development and organizational culture that ultimately contribute in reinforcing Egypt's human resource competitiveness.
“Adopting constructive reforms in organizational culture is vital as it helps optimize the working environment and subsequently increase the productivity across all levels of the business enterprise. Companies that invest in efforts to clearly define their organizational culture have benefited from enhanced decision-making capability, optimal use of professional competencies, improved job satisfaction levels and increased employee engagement, among others.
The speaking engagement organized by EHRMA is a great opportunity to share SKOPOS' practical experiences in helping redefine the organizational cultures and consequently improving the business performance of leading institutions in the Middle East and Africa," said Dr. El Kazzaz.
SKOPOS has been a leading proponent of culture development and change management through advanced executive coaching, corporate team building, and soft skills development across the MEA region.

description.hltext_display: 10 Money-Saving Year-End Tax Tips
description.content:
Filed Under: Laws, Personal Finance, Taxes
Although you may have until April 15, 2011, to file your 2010 tax return, your tax preparation should start in the current year. Getting a start on your tax planning before the New Year begins can help you to maximize benefits and minimize taxes. In this article, we provide some tips that can help you make the best of the upcoming tax season.
Tutorial: Personal Income Tax Guide
1. Use Withholdings From Retirement Plan Distributions To Pay Estimated Taxes
You may be required to pay estimated taxes to the IRS to avoid a penalty for underpayment of taxes. In particular, you may be required to make an estimated tax payment if 1) you expect to owe at least $1,000 in tax for 2010 after subtracting your withholding and credits, and 2) amounts withheld from your salary and other taxable income during the year is less than the smaller of the following:
90% of the taxes you will owe for the current tax year
OR
100% of the taxes you owed for the previous tax year. This may be increased to 110% if your adjusted gross income exceeds certain amounts.
Generally, estimated tax payments must be made on a quarterly basis by the end of each quarter of the year. However, an exception applies if the amount is withheld from income you receive on an ad-hoc basis. For instance, if your IRA distribution is processed later in the year and you have taxes withheld from that distribution, this will be enough to meet your estimated tax requirements because these withholding amounts are treated as if they were withheld throughout the year. (For more on estimated tax, see IRS Publication 505.)
The following tables can be used to determine your estimated taxes for 2010:
Schedule X - Single
If taxable income is over:
But not over:
The tax is:
10% of the amount over $0
$837.50 plus 15% of the amount over $8,375
$4,681.25 plus 25% of the amount over $34,000
$16,781.25 plus 28% of the amount over $82,400
$41,827.25 plus 33% of the amount over $171,850
no limit
$108,421.25 plus 35% of the amount over $373,650
Source: www.irs.gov
Schedule Y-1 - Married Filing Jointly or Qualifying Widow(er)
If taxable income is over:
But not over:
The tax is:
10% of the amount over $0
$1,675 plus 15% of the amount over $16,750
$9,362.50 plus 25% of the amount over $68,000
$26,687.50 plus 28% of the amount over $137,300
$46,827.25 plus 33% of the amount over $209,250
no limit
$101,085.50 plus 35% of the amount over $373,650
Source: www.irs.gov
Schedule Y-2 - Married Filing Separately
If taxable income is over:
But not over:
The tax is:
10% of the amount over $0
$875.50 plus 15% of the amount over $8,375
$4,681.25 plus 25% of the amount over $34,000
$13,343.75 plus 28% of the amount over $68,650
$23,416.75 plus 33% of the amount over $104,625
no limit
$50,542.75 plus 35% of the amount over $186,825
Source: www.irs.gov
If taxable income is over:
But not over:
The tax is:
10% of the amount over $0
$1,195 plus 15% of the amount over $11,950
$6,235 plus 25% of the amount over $45,550
$23,416.75 plus 28% of the amount over $117,650
$44,584.50 plus 33% of the amount over $190,550
no limit
$105,095 plus 35% of the amount over $373,650
2. Making Charitable Donations
If you plan to make a charitable donation, bear in mind that you must itemize your deductions in order to receive related tax benefits. Individuals who take a standard deduction are not eligible for those benefits. (To read more, see Deducting Your Donations.) The following tips apply to charitable donations:
Only actual contributions are deductible; therefore, if you pledged an amount during the year, only the amount that you actually contributed during the year is usually counted for that year. If you want to donate cash and do not have the cash immediately available, you may use your credit card to finance the donation. Of course, you should use your credit card for this purpose only if you are sure you will be able to pay off that balance within a short period, preferably before it incurs interest.
Effective for tax years beginning after August 17, 2006, cash contributions to qualified charities must be supported by a dated bank record or receipt.
Effective August 17, 2006, charitable donations of clothing and household items are not deductible unless the property is in good used condition or better.
(For more on charitable donations, see IRS Publication 526 and 561.)
3. Offset Gains Against Losses
If you want to deduct losses on stocks that have depreciated, be sure to liquidate those stocks in time to ensure the trades settle by year-end. These losses can come in handy if you have considerable gains on other stocks, as the deductible losses from depreciated stocks that you sell can be used to reduce the taxes you owe on those gains. Tax experts recommend selling winning stocks with long-term capital gain and losing stocks with short-term capital gain to maximize tax benefits. (To learn more on this, see Selling Losing Securities For A Tax Advantage.)
4. Fund A Retirement Plan
If you need additional deductions to reduce the amount of taxes you will owe for the year, consider making contributions to your retirement accounts. This will work for Traditional IRAs, but only if you are eligible to receive a deduction for the contribution. If you are neither an active participant, nor married to someone who is an active participant, then your Traditional IRA contribution is deductible. If you or your spouse is an active participant, then your eligibility to deduct your contribution is determined by your modified adjusted gross income (MAGI) and your tax filing status. (See Traditional IRA Deductibility Limits for information about deducting IRA contributions when you and/or your spouse participate in an employer sponsored plan.)
If you own your own a business, consider establishing a retirement plan for that business. Depending on the type of plan and your compensation for the year, you may be able to contribute and deduct up to $49,000 for 2010. In addition, you may be eligible to claim a deduction for plan-related expenses.
(For information about retirement plans for small business owners, see Plans The Small Employer Can Establish and Tax Credit For Plan Expenses Incurred By Small Businesses.)
5. New Exemption Amounts for AMT
You may be required to pay alternative minimum tax (AMT) if your taxable income is more than a certain amount. The AMT is in addition to your regular income tax, and it eliminates many of the deductions and tax credits for which you are eligible. For 2010, the exemption amounts have been increased to the following:
Single: $33,750
Married filing jointly or surviving spouse: $45,000
Head of household : $33,750
Married filing separately : $22,750
Check with your tax professional to determine whether certain transactions, such as Roth IRA conversions, will affect whether you are subject to AMT. This will help you to determine whether it's best to defer certain transactions. Furthermore, late Congressional action may alter the amounts listed for 2010.
6. Check If You Are Eligible For Free Expert-IRS-Tax Assistance
One of the organizations within the IRS is the Taxpayer Advocate Service. This organization offers free assistance to individuals who fall into one of the following categories:
The individual can no longer provide for basic necessities such as housing, transportation or food because of IRS actions.
The individual owns a business and is unable to meet basic expenses such as payroll because of IRS actions.
The individual has experienced a delay of more than 30 days to resolve a tax-related problem.
The individual has not received a response from the IRS by the date promised.
If you need to speak with a Taxpayer Advocate, you may call the Taxpayer Advocate Service toll free at 1-877-777-4778. Additional information about the Taxpayer Advocate Service, including mailing address for your local representative, is available in the IRS Publication 1546.
7. Check Your Address With The IRS
Every year, the IRS reports tens of thousands of refund checks that can't be delivered because of bad addresses. Incorrect addresses will not only result in failure to deliver any refund by mail, but could also result in you missing important communications from the IRS. If you are eligible for a tax refund, consider having the amount sent directly to your account by direct deposit. You can even split your refund into three accounts, including your IRA. Regardless of how you have your tax refund sent to you, you should still check to make sure the IRS has your correct address on file.
8. Gather All Tax-Related Documentation
Gather all your related tax documentation and categorize where possible. This includes receipts for charitable donations, receipts for medical expenses, amounts paid for estimated taxes and amounts paid for educational expenses. This will make it easier for your tax preparer to complete your tax return. If you are not sure whether something should be included, add it to the pile anyway and have your tax preparer make a determination as to whether it can be used for tax purposes.
9. Consider A Flexible Spending Account
When signing up for your benefits at work, either during open enrollment or when you become eligible for benefits, consider whether signing up for a flexible spending account (FSA) could be beneficial to you. Under a flexible account program, funds are taken from your paycheck on a pretax basis, which reduces your taxable income, and are refunded to you when you submit the appropriate claim forms to your benefits department. The following example is a high-level explanation of how it works:
Assume the following:
Your taxable salary is $100,000 per year.
You pay $4,000 per year for childcare out of pocket. This is paid with funds that have been taxed already.
You participate in a dependent care FSA and have your employer deduct the $4,000 from your paycheck and credit it to your FSA. This reduces your taxable income to $96,000, which means you now pay less taxes.
You submit a claim, along with the required receipts or documented proof of expenses, and the $4,000 is refunded to you.
Result: Your $4,000 is tax-free.
There are two kinds of FSAs, dependent care and healthcare. Dependent care is used for expenses incurred through caring for certain dependents. Up to $5,000 can be contributed to each account, but take care not to contribute more than you will use, as these accounts come with a ‘use-it-or-lose-it rule. Also, check with your employer to determine which expenses are covered under the FSA. Starting in 2011, participants cannot use FSA funds to purchase OTC drugs. (For more insight on these accounts, read Healthcare FSAs Increase Your Disposable Income.)
10. Lesser-Known Deductibles
There are several deductible items that many people are unaware of that you can watch out for. For example:
You can deduct certain expenses incurred for a job search in your present occupation, even if you do not get a new job. However, you cannot deduct the expenses if they were incurred while looking for a job in a new occupation, if you are looking for a job for the first time, or if there was a substantial break between the end of your last job and your subsequent job search.
You can deduct the depreciation of your home computer if you use it to produce income.
You can deduct the depreciation for a computer or cellular telephone if you use it for work and it is required by your employer.
Some tax benefits are not as obvious as others and special rules may apply in order for you to receive these deductions; therefore, it is important that you allow your tax professional to help you make the right determination. (Find out what deductions you could be missing out on in 10 Most Overlooked Tax Deductions.)
Conclusion
Preparation is the key to having a tax season that is free of frustration and mistakes. It also helps to make sure that you receive all of the tax benefits for which you are eligible. Being prepared also helps to eliminate the risk of having to file an amended return, or of receiving a notice of amendment from the IRS. Usually, a notice of amendment means your refund is being reduced, or the amount of taxes you owe is being increased. Avoid the surprises by working with a competent tax professional.
by Denise Appleby,CISP, CRC, CRPS, CRSP, APA (Contact Author | Biography)
Denise Appleby is founder and owner of Appleby Retirement Consulting,which provides technical consultation, content, coaching, writing, editing and training services on related topics.
With more than 14 years of experience in the IRA and defined-contribution plans fields, Appleby has held several senior retirement-plan related positions with Pershing LLC, which included vice president of plans products and services, retirement plans manager, trainer, training manager, compliance consultant, technical help desk manager and writer.
Filed Under: Laws, Personal Finance, Taxes

description.hltext_display: Podrán por decreto eliminar tenencia
description.author: Claudia Beltrán
description.content:
CULIACÁN.- La coalición Cambiemos Sinaloa, compuesta por el PAN, PRD, PT y Convergencia presentó el lunes ante el Congreso del Estado la cuarta iniciativa para eliminar la tenencia que de aprobarse, por decreto Mario López Valdez cumpliría su promesa de campaña.
Carlos Felton González, coordinador de los diputados del PAN en el Poder Legislativo, detalló que con la iniciativa buscan reformar la Ley de Hacienda, primer paso para dar a Mario López Valdez, la posibilidad de subsidiar la tenencia y el contribuyente deje de pagarla.
De aprobarse la iniciativa, el impuesto dejaría de ser federal, para convertirse en estatal.
La Ley de Coordinación Fiscal establece que los estados no pueden eliminar ningún impuesto federal, a menos que lo hagan estatal primero.
"Nosotros estamos reformando la Ley de Hacienda, para que se cree una ley espejo, o un capítulo espejo que le llamamos, que es exactamente igual que el federal, pero lo hacemos estatal, al hacerlo nosotros estatal, le damos ya la posibilidad al próximo Gobernador de mediante un decreto subsidiar".
Felton González abundó que ayer se aprobó la iniciativa en protocolo para entregarse a los diputados y hoy se le estaría dando primera lectura y el jueves se le estaría dispensando la segunda al dictamen.
Dispensándose la segunda, se van a discusión y aprobación en su caso, y de ser así, se publica en el Periódico Oficial del Estado para que entre en vigor y con ello, el martes ya estarían en posibilidad de aprobar una Ley de Ingresos en donde se establece el impuesto estatal.
En el presupuesto de egresos, se aprobaría un subsidio de 310 millones de pesos.
"Nos vamos por la modificación de la Ley de Hacienda primero, y en segundo, por un decreto del Ejecutivo, en donde va él a poner las reglas, en donde se subsidia a las personas físicas".
En el decreto se establecerían los plazos que tendrían los contribuyentes morosos para pagar, lo cual sería en un periodo de meses.
"Nosotros estamos reformando la Ley de Hacienda, para que se cree una ley espejo, o un capítulo espejo que le llamamos, que es exactamente igual que el federal, pero lo hacemos estatal".
Carlos Felton González
Coordinador de los diputados del PAN

description.hltext_display: 32 gols aconteceram na rodada do Suíço Sesc/Amigos...
description.content:
A quinta rodada do 13º Campeonato Sesc/Amigos da Segunda-feira de Futebol Suíço (grama sintética) disputada no dia 20, no Centro Esportivo do Sesc, de Paranavaí, teve assinalados 32 gols. Resultados - Escritório Suelin 10x1 Churrasqueiras Delta Grill. Equipes e gols: Escritório - Rafael, Ademar (2), Guilherme (4), Wilson, Peté, Guto e Edson (4).
Delta: Rodrigão, Magal, Bacardi, Luciano, Geleia, Delegado, Igão (1) e Zé Rato.
Estúdio Flash Total 9x4 Cantoni Revisões. Equipes e gols: Estúdio - Márcio (2), Xuxa (4), Leandro, Bisteca, Cebola (1), Kila (2) e Kadu.
Cantoni: Gustavo, Márcio Lopes, Jorginho (1), Paulinho, Juninho (2), Gardenal e Paulo (1).
Dida Auto Peças 4x4 Censura Livre Locadora. Dida - Lucimar, Tozinho (1), Zé Cabra (3), Marquinho, Virjão, Ivaldo, Pastel e Darcy.
Censura: Chumbo, Hélio, Márcio Freitas (1), Osmar (3), Riva, Negovéio e Samuel. Árbitros: Kila, Magal e Jorginho. Mesários: Hélio e Zé Rato.
Classificação final da primeira fase: 1º Estúdio Flash Total 15; 2º Escritório Suelin 12; 3º Dida Auto Peças 7; 4º Censura Livre Locadora 5; 5º Cantoni Revisões 4; 6º Churrasqueiras Delta Grill 0 ponto.
Principais artilheiros: Zé Cabra 10, Guilherme 9, Gardenal 7; Osmar, Xuxa e Ademar 6 gols cada.
Goleiros menos vazados: Rafael (Suelin) 10, Márcio (Flash Total) 13, Chumbo (Censura Livre) 14 gols.
A sexta rodada no dia 27, será o mata-mata, às 18h10 - Censura Livre Locadora x Dida Auto Peças, 18h50 - Escritório Suelin x Cantoni Revisões, 19h25 - Churrasqueiras Delta Grill x Estúdio Flash Total.

description.hltext_display: 赛季十大惊喜球队
description.content:
每个赛季总有出人意料的球队，每个赛季总有些球队会让你情不自禁地为他们拍案叫绝，比如曾被认为多年不能脱贫的纽约尼克斯，比如说被认为老迈无力的圣安东尼奥马刺和波士顿凯尔特人，但当你有空瞄一下东西部排名时，马刺和凯尔特人赫然名列各区榜首，湖人和热火都在他们屁股后面跟随。至于尼克斯，看上去已经拽牢了季后赛的门票。
现在，我们在新年即将到来之时盘点一下过去两个月令人惊喜的球队――记住了，并非仅仅因为他们显赫的战绩，有时候某些人的横空出世也会划在此列，至少他们吸引了球迷的眼球。
NO.1 纽约尼克斯
当这个夏天，尼克斯疯狂砸下亿元签下小斯塔德迈尔的时候，人们一致认定的只是――此举只是为了勾引勒布朗-詹姆斯，但最终勒布朗-詹姆斯没来，只是签下了自由球员，来自山猫的控卫费尔顿，于是德-安东尼的球队依然遭到质疑，直到赛季开打，人们甚至认为小斯是尼克斯这个夏天签下的一个大泡沫，但是当小斯打出连续九场30+的成绩一举攻破尼克斯的队史之时，所有人闭嘴了，而且给尼克斯带来的是许久未见的八连胜和14场比赛13胜的骄人战绩――凭借这波疯狂，纽约尼克斯已经跻身东部六强之列，在他身后都是徘徊50%之外的球队，在他之前则是近几年传统的东部季后赛球队，不要忘了这样的尼克斯并没有太多的大牌，能够取得如此疯狂的成绩，小斯和德-安东尼功不可没，看样子，尼克斯正在努力走上正轨。

description.hltext_display: バーバリーのミュージック・クリスマスカード
description.content:
今週末のクリスマスに向けて、バーバリーがデジタル・クリスマスカードをデザインしました（英語版のみ）。カードでは、バーバリーの音楽プロジェクト「BURBERRY ACOUSTIC」にも参加している英国バンド、レイザーライトのボーカル、ジョニー・ボーレルによる「Can't complain about Christmas」のパフォーマンスがフィーチャーされています。
またこのクリスマスカードは、1回の送信ごとにバーバリー社からバーバリー・ファウンデーションに寄付が行われる仕組みになっています。バーバリー・ファウンデーションは、2008年にCCO(チーフ・クリエイティブ・オフィサー)のクリストファー・ベイリーと、CEOのアンジェラ・アーレンツによって設立され、若い人たちの創造性や夢の実現を支援しています。今回パフォーマンスを行ったジョニー・ボーレルも、その報酬をバーバリー・ファンデーションおよび他のチャリティ団体に全額寄付しています。
クリスマスカードは http://holiday.burberry.com でご覧いただけます。オリジナルのメッセージを入れられるほか、FacebookやTwitterで共有することもできます。また、iPhoneやiPadでも閲覧可能です。
バーバリーは2010年6月より、音楽プロジェクト「BURBERRY ACOUSTIC」をスタートとしています。このプロジェクトでは、イギリスの才能あるアーティストを支援し、また彼らとのコラボレーションを通じて、バーバリーのブランド体験と音楽の持つエネルギーの融合を図っています。

description.hltext_display: Refrigeração Elétrica conquista título com...
description.content:
Um placar fora das previsões foi o da final do Campeonato de Futebol Suíço da Avícola Felipe, de Paranavaí, onde a equipe Refrigeração Elétrica conquistou o título após golear por 7 a 0 os Meninos da Norea.
A decisão que aconteceu no domingo, 19, teve os gols assinalados por Luciano (3), Marcos Paulo (3) e José Rodrigues. Árbitro - Guilherme Tavares Lucin. Mesário e coordenador Elizeu Cardoso de Andrade.
Na decisão do terceiro lugar, a Rodovini venceu por Wx0 a equipe Ração.
Os artilheiros foram Marcos Paulo e Luciano com 15 gols, ambos atuaram pela Refrigeração; mas Luciano por ser o mais velho ficou com o troféu. O goleiro menos vazado foi Jorge Aparecido (Refrigeração) com três gols sofridos.
As demais equipes participantes foram: Administração, Bola Cheia/Norea II, Fomento/Integração e Paletização.
Nos 18 jogos realizados participaram 113 atletas, sendo marcados 125 gols, foram aplicados 52 cartões amarelos e oito vermelhos.

description.hltext_display: State Street appointed fund administrator by LibreMax Capital
description.content:
State Street Corporation has been appointed to provide fund administration services to a hedge fund launched by LibreMax Capital LLC at the end of October. State Street’s hedge fund administration company, International Fund Services (IFS), will provide the administration services, which will include: a complete suite of fund accounting, fund administration, corporate administration, and risk and credit services to institutional investors, hedge fund, private equity and real estate fund managers.
“Appointing State Street to provide our new fund with administration services enables us to focus entirely on achieving investment results,” said Greg Lippmann, co-founder and chief investment officer of LibreMax Capital. “State Street's proven track record of servicing some of the most complex hedge funds in the industry made it the clear choice for this assignment.”
“In today's highly competitive market with increased demand for transparency, more hedge fund managers are electing to use third party providers for their administration requirements,” added George Sullivan, executive vice president of State Street's Alternative Investment Solutions group.
As of the end of the third quarter in 2010, State Street’s hedge fund services had over $625 billion in alternative assets under administration.

event_or_fact.property: ?Appointing State Street to provide our new fund with administration services enables us to focus entirely on achieving investment results,?
co-founder and chief investment officer, LibreMax Capital State Street Corporation

description.hltext_display: To kvæstet i sammenstød i Karup
description.content:
Et sammenstød mellem tre biler i Karup gav problemer for pendlerne mellem Herning og Viborg. To personer blev kvæstet i et sammenstød tidligt onsdag morgen i Karup, oplyser Sydøstjyllands Politi.
Ulykken skete i midtbyen på hovedfærdselsåren mellem Herning og Viborg. Tre timer efter sammenstødet var krydset Nygade/Viborgvej stadig spærret for trafikken, som måtte ledes udenom med forsinkelser til følge.
Sammenstødet skete mellem en personbil og to lastbiler, hvoraf den ene indeholdt 50 ton majs. En del af majsen røg ud på kørebanen ved sammenstødet, der begyndte, da en mindre lastbil svingede ind foran lastbilen med majs.
Føreren af lastbilen mistede herredømmet og stødte ind i en modkørende personbil. Personbilens fører blev kvæstet, da bilen blev trykket ind i en have og endte mod et træ. Også føreren af lastbilen med majs blev kvæstet, men politiet har ingen nærmere oplysninger om de kvæstedes tilstand. Der skulle dog ikke være tale om livsfare.
Kommentar til artiklen
Deltag selv i debatten

description.hltext_display: Buscará Implan movilidad para sindicaturas
description.author: Janneth Aldecoa
description.content:
CULIACÁN.- La continuación de proyectos de la administración municipal, generación de mayor movilidad en las sindicaturas de Culiacán y la creación de proyectos con visión de negocios, son algunas estrategias de trabajo del nuevo titular del Instituto Municipal de Planeación.
Jorge Avilés se reunió ayer con el Colegio de Ingenieros Civiles.
"Quisiera tener siempre al Colegio de Ingenieros, siempre pendiente, presente y aportante a lo que hace el Implan. Podríamos generar un grupo de interesados en discutir lo que tiene que ser llevado a consideración de Implan", dijo.
Avilés recalcó que al frente del Implan buscará dar movimiento a las sindicaturas más importantes del municipio, ya que se ofrecería una mejor calidad de vida a quienes diariamente se trasladan a Culiacán.
"Culiacán no es sólo su ciudad capital, tiene algunas sindicaturas importantes por lo que representan ellas mismas. Costa Rica, Culiacancito, Eldorado y Quilá son de las más importantes y ya merecen la atención de Implan en el sentido de que ahí tenemos oportunidad de ganarle la carrera a los problemas".

description.hltext_display: Teruo Kato viabiliza 7 novas ambulâncias...
description.content:
Alziro recebe as chaves das mãos do governador Orlando Pessuti. Ele estava acompanhado do secretário de Saúde, José Paranhos de Mesquita, e pela diretora da Secretaria, a médica Gislaine Erédia Araújo Foto: AE Notícias
Foram entregues ontem pelo governador Orlando Pessuti, sete novas ambulâncias do Serviço de Atendimento Móvel de Urgência (SAMU) para os municípios de Cruzeiro do Sul (1), Loanda (1), Nova Londrina (1), Paranavaí (3) e Terra Rica (1). Os veículos foram viabilizados graças ao trabalho do deputado estadual Teruo Kato. Também Rondon foi beneficiada. O Samu foi implantado no Paraná em 2004 e hoje atua em 15 municípios. É um programa destinado para o atendimento das emergências clínicas, obstetrícias, pediátricas e psiquiátricas que funciona 24 horas pelo telefone 192.
Na Escolinha de Governo, ontem, o governador Orlando Pessuti entregou ao todo 27 ambulâncias para 21 municípios.
“As ambulâncias são necessárias para melhorar o socorro à população desses locais, tornando o primeiro atendimento fundamental para a chance de sobrevida daqueles que precisam de atendimento emergencial”, afirmou Pessuti.
Alziro - “Uma grande conquista para a comunidade de Paranavaí e municípios da região”. Essa foi a declaração do vice-prefeito Alziro Melli Lopes após receber das mãos do governador Orlando Pessuti as chaves das três ambulâncias, em Curitiba. A solenidade de entrega dos veículos também foi acompanhada pelo Secretário Municipal de Saúde, José Paranhos de Mesquita, e pela diretora da Secretaria, a médica Gislaine Erédia Araújo.
Ainda na capital, Alziro destacou “a atitude louvável do prefeito Rogério Lorenzetti, que lutou durante meses para trazer o Samu para a macrorregião Noroeste”, e parabenizou toda a comunidade por mais esta conquista na área da saúde.
“É um serviço que, sem dúvida, vai melhorar significativamente o atendimento de urgência e emergência em Paranavaí e municípios vizinhos. A UPA (Unidade de Pronto Atendimento), juntamente com os novos veículos, vai proporcionar mais agilidade nos atendimentos e mais tranquilidade para a população”, afirmou o vice-prefeito.

description.hltext_display: Forex: USD/CHF hits fresh 2-month low below 0.9545
description.author: FXstreet.com
description.content: FXstreet.com (Barcelona) - Dollar retreat from Monday's high at 0.9720has extended below November and December lows, at 0.9545/55, ad the pair reached a fresh 2-month low at 0.9530, although the pair has not yet confirmed below 0.9545 level, which is under bearish pressure at the moment. On the downside, below 0.9545 (Nov 5 low), nest support levels lie at 0.9500/15 (psychological level/Daily pivot Point S2), and 0.9481 (Oct 15 low). On the upside, resistance levels lie at 0.9580 (session high), and above here, 0.9610 and 0.9640 (intra-day resistance levels).

description.hltext_display: Meralco sees net income up nearly 100% to P12B
description.author: noreply@allvoices.com
description.content: Robust electricity sales will likely lift the net income of power utility Manila Electric Co. (Meralco) nearly 100 percent to P12 billion this year, a company official told reporters Wednesday. We are looking at a net income of P12 billion or around P11.5 billion to P11.7 billion.

description.hltext_display: 【サンプル動画が無料で見られる】～かぎ針編み講師資格が取れる！～通信講座「かぎ針編み講師認定講座」受講受付中！[株式会社日本ヴォーグ社]
description.content:
大好きな編み物、趣味で楽しむだけでは物足りないという方のための通信講座がスタートしました。かぎ針編みの基礎が身につく上に製図の方法をマスターできるからオリジナルニットも編めるようになる講師資格が取れる株式会社日本ヴォーグ社の通信講座「かぎ針編み講師認定講座」のご紹介です。
--------------------------------------------------------
◆◇DVDの動画サンプル無料配信中！◇◆
かぎ針編みは初めてという方もまずは一度ご覧ください。
ただ今ご覧いただける内容は・・・
「ブレスレットの編み方」
「携帯エコバッグの作り方」
「ベストとパターンの編み方」
--------------------------------------------------------
本講座は、創業来50年以上、編み物の出版・教育活動で培ったノウハウを持つ株式会社日本ヴォーグ社が企画運営し、これまで多くの指導者を育成してきた社団法人日本編物文化協会（※1）および財団法人日本手芸普及協会（※2）が認定する「かぎ針編み講師認定証」が取得できる初めての通信講座です。
★DVD付きでどこよりも、わかりやすい通信講座で2つのコースで学べます！
〈入門コース〉
初心者向けに基本の9つの模様の編み方や作品作りを詳しく丁寧にレッスンします。
〈講師認定コース〉
今まで教室でしか学べなかった採寸の仕方や、アイロンのかけ方、製図の仕方などを、DVDやテキストで詳しく解説します。
★作品30点以上満載の作品集から好きなデザインが選べるから楽しみながら学べる！
※1
「文部科学省設立許可 社団法人 日本編物文化協会（NAC）」 http://www.nac-web.org/
1961年設立。50余年の歴史をもつ会員数18,000人（2010年現在）を誇る、編み物指導者と愛好家の団体。様々な編み物セミナーやイベントを行い、編み物の資格認定も行っている。年4回ニットを紹介する情報誌発行。
※2
「文部科学省設立許可 財団法人 日本手芸普及協会」 http://www.jhia.org/
1969年設立。手芸8部門（手あみ、パッチワークキルト、刺しゅう、レース、レザークラフト、手織り、押し花、トールペイント）の指導者育成と資格認定を行っている団体。手芸催事に後援・協力の他、コンクールなどを開催し、手芸全般の普及に取り組んでいる。
◆通信講座「かぎ針編み講師認定講座」詳細はこちら
◆手編み・パッチワーク・刺しゅうなど講座は他にも色々あります！
