description.hltext_display: 拍案惊奇-十大雷人语录
description.content:
NBA球员有时候喜欢在接受采访时卖弄自己的小聪明，不过一旦过犹不及，就会成为大家取笑的对象。事实上，本赛季有许多球员在采访时语出惊人，雷倒众多球迷。
科比炮轰联盟老板
在NBA劳资协议谈判的关键时刻，作为联盟的顶级球星，科比第一次发表关于劳资协议的看法就一语惊人，他宣传球队老板需要照照镜子，并宣布自己将为球员而战。科比说：“球队老板应该照照镜子，他们需要正确认清自己，别再强迫我们这些球员来做出改变。他们应该照照镜子，弄清楚自己到底要如何处理篮球产业，然后我们这些球员会来做我们该做的事。我将为球员而战，责任不在我们身上，人们总是想把责任推给我们，但这些都不是我们的。那是老板们该管的事，是他们的责任。”
(责任编辑：张嘉扬)

description.hltext_display: RPT-UPDATE 2-Idemitsu sees total Q1 crude refining up 1 pct y/y
description.content:
* Q1 crude refining for domestic market down 2 pct
* Robust exports help offset shrinking domestic demand
* Ups 2010/11 refining outlook helped by robust exports
TOKYO, Dec 22 - Idemitsu Kosan Co , Japan's third-largest refiner, said on Wednesday it plans to refine a total of 8 million kilolitres of crude oil in January-March, or 559,000 barrels per day, up 1 percent from a year earlier as robust exports offset weak domestic demand.
Refining for the domestic market by the nation's third-biggest refiner will fall by 2 percent or 200,000 kl from the previous year to 7.5 million kl, it said.
The company plans to export 500,000 kilolitres of oil products in the first quarter of 2011, up 93 percent from a year earlier.
It has four refineries in Japan with total crude refining capacity of 640,000 barrels per day.
Idemitsu has upgraded its total refining outlook for the year ending next March by 600,000 kl from its initial plan of 28.9 million kl, up 2 percent, as a 41 percent rise in exports to 2 million kl helped offset a 1 percent decline in domestic demand.
The company estimated its total processing for October-December at 7.0 million kl, up 1 percent from a year earlier but down from the original plan of 7.2 million kl, hurt by problems at its Hokkaido and Aichi refineries in November and December.

description.hltext_display: Pessuti autoriza licitação para centro de...
description.content:
CURITIBA (AEN)- O governador Orlando Pessuti e os secretários do Desenvolvimento Urbano, Wilson Bley Lipski, e do Trabalho, Emprego e Promoção Social do Paraná, Tércio Albuquerque, autorizaram, segunda-feira, licitação para a construção de seis centros de referência em assistência social (Cras), no valor total de R$ 1,28 milhão. Entre os municípios beneficiados está Querência do Norte.
As informações são da Agência Estadual de Notícias.
Os centros atendem famílias pobres, ampliam a rede de atendimento na área de assistência social e orientam os municípios sobre os procedimentos para acesso a recursos federais destinados a famílias em situação de risco. “A importância dos Cras é muito grande e ainda muito desconhecida pela maioria. Uma unidade é tão importante para um município quanto um posto de saúde é para o enfermo”, explicou Albuquerque.
O projeto arquitetônicos das edificações é da Sedu/Paranacidade, que executa o programa em parceria com a Secretaria do Trabalho, Emprego e Promoção Social. A construção das unidades envolve recursos do Tesouro do Estado e financiamentos aos municípios.

description.hltext_display: Consum, Colòmbia i innovació, a "Valor afegit"
description.content:
El programa dedica el seu espai a parlar dels consumidors més petits, de la comunitat colombiana a Barcelona i de les empreses més innovadores.
Petits grans consumidors
"Valor Afegit" dedica el programa a:
Petits grans consumidors
A Espanya, hi ha 6 milions de nens, un col·lectiu de petits consumidors que manen més que ningú en les decisions de compra, i que les empreses no volen deixar escapar. Més enllà de joguines, marques d'alimentació, roba, llibres i altres sectors, s'han agrupat per treure nous productes i serveis per a aquest col·lectiu.
Colòmbia a Catalunya
Dins la programació que el 33 dedica aquest desembre al col·lectiu de colombians que viuen a Barcelona, ens fixem en una empresa de telefonia de prepagament i en el foment turístic que es vol impulsar d'un país que encara s'identifica com una destinació insegura.
"Pensat per": Chic & Basic
Continuem la sèrie sobre innovadors. En aquest cas, una nova cadena d'hotels que combinen el disseny i el bon servei amb els preus baixos.
Comentaris (0)
De moment, encara no hi ha missatges.
Inaugura els comentaris!
Avís: Tots els comentaris passen per un procés de moderació, per això poden trigar uns minuts a aparèixer publicats.
Per a més informació, consulta les normes d'ús.
Encara no has escrit cap comentari!
Tots els comentaris passen per un procés de moderació, per això poden trigar uns minuts a aparèixer publicats.
Aquests comentaris són l'opinió dels usuaris i no la d'aquest portal.
No s'admeten comentaris insultants, ni racistes, ni contraris a les lleis vigents.
No es publicaran comentaris que no estiguin relacionats amb la notícia.
No es publicaran els comentaris que incompleixin les condicions d'ús que asseguren una participació de qualitat i respectuosa.
Recomanacions pels comentaris:
Els comentaris han de ser educats i no poden caure en el mal gust.
Aconsellem fer servir una ortografia correcta, amb punts i comes perquè l'opinió sigui més entenedora.
Recomanem escriure amb un ús adequat de majúscules i minúscules.
Un comentari tot en majúscules dóna la sensació d'estar cridant.
Un comentari tot en minúscules es pot malinterpretar o no entendre's correctament si conté noms propis o topònims.

description.hltext_display: Advierte el IMSS de riesgos por 'cuetes'
description.author: Noroeste/Redacción
description.content:
CULIACÁN.- Durante las fiestas de Navidad y Fin de Año en México es tradición, al igual que en muchos países, quemar "cuetes", fuegos artificiales o pirotécnicos; sin embargo, el uso incorrecto de éstos puede ocasionar lesiones con secuelas permanentes, alertó el Instituto Mexicano del Seguro Social.
Una de las principales demandas de atención en los servicios de urgencias del IMSS durante las fiestas decembrinas, son las quemaduras por "cuetes", y generalmente los más afectados son los menores de entre 5 y 14 años, informó a través de un boletín.
Detalló que el daño causado por la explosión de cohetes puede ser muy grave. Más de la mitad de las lesiones por fuegos artificiales afectan las manos o brazos, el resto en el abdomen, tórax, cara, genitales y piernas. En el mejor de los casos, cuando los cohetes no se sueltan oportunamente, pueden producir quemaduras leves aunque dolorosas, que pueden dejar cicatrices menores; sin embargo, en muchos casos se llega a la amputación de los dedos de la mano o de la mano completa y hay quemaduras que son tan extensas y profundas que ponen en riesgo la vida.
Además, dijo, el ruido ocasionado por estos productos puede provocar lesiones auditivas ya que el estallido alcanza hasta 190 decibeles, que es bastante más de lo que el oído puede soportar. Los niños están más expuestos al daño, porque su sistema auditivo es más vulnerable, por lo que se recomienda colocar tapones o alejarlos de la cercanía del impacto.
En el caso de que una persona presente quemaduras por esta u otra causa, es muy importante conocer los primeros auxilios adecuados, ya que le ayudará a evitar los errores iniciales, dio a conocer.
En primera instancia retire enseguida todos los objetos en contacto directo con la piel: anillos, relojes, pulseras, etc., determine qué tipo de quemadura es, según su profundidad se clasifican en tres tipos: de primero, segundo o tercer grado.
Personal médico del Seguro Social advirtió que todos los juegos de pirotecnia conllevan riesgos, aún en manos de expertos, ya que la chispa de una simple estrellita o luz de bengala, puede prender fuego a la ropa o lastimar un ojo. Por tal razón, comprar y permitir que los niños jueguen con cohetes aunque algunos parezcan inofensivos, es sumamente peligroso.
Tipos de quemaduras
Quemaduras de primer grado: Se presenta enrojecimiento y ardor en la parte afectada, por lo que se debe refrescar inmediatamente la quemadura con agua fría durante 10 minutos como mínimo y después cubrir con compresas frías. Luego se debe secar el área afectada y cubrirla con una gasa estéril y seca. Procurar inmovilizar la zona afectada y darle a beber abundantes líquidos al paciente.
Quemaduras de segundo grado: Se recomienda lavar inmediatamente con agua fría durante 5 a 10 minutos. Si la ampolla está intacta no la rompa. Desinfecte con un antiséptico y aplique un poco de pomada para quemaduras, después coloque una gasa limpia y seca. Si la persona tiene dolor, se le puede dar un analgésico suave.
Quemaduras de tercer grado: Son las más graves. Es muy importante que no se retiren los restos de ropa, ni se rompan las ampollas que aparezcan. Lo más adecuado es lavar la zona con abundante agua fría durante 5 a 10 minutos y después envolver la zona o a la persona.
Si las quemaduras son muy extensas, se debe utilizar una sábana humedecida con agua o suero y acudir inmediatamente al área de urgencias de la unidad médica más cercana y durante el traslado vigilar constantemente el nivel de conciencia, la respiración y el pulso de la persona afectada.
Atenderá IMSS urgencias
en Navidad y Año Nuevo
El Instituto Mexicano del Seguro Social en Sinaloa informó que el servicio de urgencias permanecerá abierto y con personal extraordinario durante los días 25 de diciembre y 1 de enero de 2011, ambos caerán en día sábado.
Mientras que los días 24 y 31 de diciembre se laborará normalmente.
En Navidad y Año Nuevo los servicios de hospital se prestarán a través de guardias en todas las especialidades médicas con las que cuenta el Seguro Social en Sinaloa en los ocho hospitales con servicios de urgencias las 24 horas.
Notificó a la población que, por ser ambas fechas días festivos, se suspenderán los servicios de consulta sabatina que se prestan en las Unidades Médicas Familiares.

description.hltext_display: Servidores municipais de Santa Cruz de Monte...
description.content:
Prefeito Zé Maria e Fran Boni entregando o pagamento de alguns servidores
Mesmo em ano de dificuldades para as prefeituras, principalmente dos municípios pequenos, a administração municipal de Santa Cruz de Monte Castelo vem dando bons exemplos de bom uso do dinheiro público e buscando injetar valores no comércio local para as festas de final de ano paga hoje aos funcionários o salário adiantado, a exemplo do 13º salário, já pago no último dia 16.
A primeira parcela do 13º salário já havia sido paga opcionalmente no mês de junho. Zé Maria destacou que o município começa a pensa no 13º salário no início do ano, para garantir o benefício aos servidores. “Planejamos e economizamos durante todo o ano para esse objetivo, temos que valorizar os funcionários públicos municipais que são nosso alicerce para administrar a cidade”, destacou o administrador.
O vice-prefeito Fran Boni também lembrou a importância do pagamento em dia dos servidores para todo o comércio local. “A prefeitura é a maior empregadora do município e antecipando esses pagamentos é mais um bom motivo pra que o comércio local se anime ainda mais nessa época de final de ano”, destacou.

description.hltext_display: 魔兽3场篮板20+三年未见
description.content:
搜狐体育讯 北京时间12月22日，魔术主场99-105不敌小牛，中锋霍华德打出26分23篮板的双20惊艳数据。此前两场在对76人和老鹰的比赛中，魔兽均抓下20个篮板，算上本场的23个，他已经连续三场篮板过20。
霍华德上一次完成这样的数据，还要追溯到2007-08赛季，2007年12月29日，霍华德在客场对阵热火的比赛摘下21个篮板，背靠背第二场主场对阵山猫的比赛中得到21个篮板，2008年1月1日，霍华德又在对阵公牛的比赛中抓下22个篮板。三场比赛，魔术全部取得了胜利。时隔三年，当霍华德再次完成这样的数据时，魔术不幸三连败。
尽管本场比赛魔术主场败北，但是他们并未让小牛在自己主场肆无忌惮。前两节之间的一波17-2的高潮，曾一度让客队措手不及。引领这精彩一幕的是魔术新员阿里纳斯和板凳球员克拉克。
当时霍华德和尼尔森坐在场边休息，大将军和克拉克向小牛展示了魔术的“板凳深度”，一度将比分改写成31-29。坐在场边的魔兽不断地为队友精彩表现鼓掌喝彩。

description.hltext_display: Red Hat Q3 revenue up 21.3% to $235.6m
description.content:
Subscription revenue up 21% on year ago quarter
Red Hat has reported revenues of $235.6m for the third quarter of 2010, an increase of 21.3% compared to $194.3m for the same period last year.
Revenue from subscription rose to $199m from $164.4m and training and services revenue increased to $37m compared to $30m for the same quarter previous year.
For the quarter ended 30 November 2010, gross profit increased to $196m from $165m, and operating income increased to $38m, compared to $20m for the same quarter last year.
The company has posted a net income of $26.1m for the third quarter of 2010, an increase of 59% compared to $16.4m for the same period last year.
For the third quarter of 2010, the company's diluted earnings per share increased to $0.13 from $0.08.
Red Hat president and CEO Jim Whitehurst said strong market demand and sales execution, combined with a compelling value proposition, led to organic billings growth of over 20%, or $262m. "In Q3, we were particularly proud that Red Hat was recognised by CIOs for the seventh consecutive year as one of the top IT vendors delivering value according to CIO Insight Magazine Vendor Value survey," Whitehurst said.

event_or_fact.property: strong market demand and sales execution, combined with a compelling value proposition, led to organic billings growth of over 20%, or $262m

In Q3, we were particularly proud that Red Hat was recognised by CIOs for the seventh consecutive year as one of the top IT vendors delivering value according to CIO Insight Magazine Vendor Value survey

description.hltext_display: Pista de atletismo é desmembrada do Colégio...
description.content:
O esporte de Paranavaí recebeu uma boa notícia nesta semana. É que a pista de atletismo do Colégio Estadual foi desmembrada e agora pertence ao município.
De acordo com o técnico da equipe de atletismo de Paranavaí, Ademir Nicola Francisco (Mimi), o fato de a pista não pertencer mais a um prédio estadual vai permitir à Prefeitura angariar recursos na esfera federal, além de possibilitar investimentos com verbas próprias.
Mimi explicou que já existe um projeto para a recuperação da pista. De acordo com ele, devem ser investidos quase R$ 200 mil no local. “É uma grande conquista para o esporte de Paranavaí”, declarou. Ele destacou o empenho do prefeito Rogério Lorenzetti que “desde o início do mandato tem trabalhado para conseguir desmembrar a pista de atletismo” e agradeceu o apoio que o deputado estadual Antonio Teruo Kato garantiu ao município na conquista da pista.

description.hltext_display: 居酒屋チェーン業界初のiPhoneアプリ「ワタミアプリ」が機能を大幅に強化！ 〜ダウンロード数は累計60,000件を突破、忘・新年会シーズンの売上げに寄与〜
description.content:
スマートフォンの位置情報を利用したモバイルサービスを運営する株式会社ロケーションバリュー（本社：東京都千代田区、代表取締役CEO：砂川 大、以下 ロケーションバリュー）は、ワタミ株式会社の 100％子会社で、居食屋「和民」や炭火焼だいにんぐ「わたみん家」などを運営するワタミフードサービス株式会社（本社：東京都大田区、代表取締役社長：桑原 豊、以下 ワタミ）と共同で開発した居酒屋チェーン業界初のiPhoneアプリ「ワタミアプリ」の機能を大幅に強化しリリースしたことを発表いたします。
iPhoneを始めとするスマートフォンのユーザー層は、2010年12月のスマートフォンの販売シェアが全携帯販売台数のうち約半数（※2）に達するなど急速に拡大いたしており、企業の公式サイト等に対するスマートフォン対応を求める声はますます高まっております。
ロケーションバリューではこれらのニーズにあわせ、2010年5月に「イマナラ！」のiPhoneアプリをリリースしたほか、2010年8月には「イマナラ！」をベースにした企業公式アプリの第一弾として、居酒屋チェーン初のiPhoneアプリ「ワタミアプリ」をワタミと共同で開発し、公開をいたしました。
今回は、「ワタミアプリ」ユーザーから寄せられた声を元に、企業公式アプリに求められる機能の再定義を行い、大幅な機能追加のうえリリースを行いました。
■「ワタミアプリ」に追加された主な機能
●メニュー 機能 ：ワタミグループ各ブランドごとのフード・ドリンクメニューの写真・詳細・お値段等を、一覧で確
認する事ができます。
●お知らせ機能 ：ワタミの最新情報を確認できる他、アプリ内ブラウザで公式ホームページの各種情報を閲覧
する事も可能です。
●プッシュ通知機能 :アプリを所有している全ユーザーのホーム画面にメッセージを表示する事ができます。
●メール機能 ：お店・クーポン情報をメールで送る事ができます。
●お気に入り機能 ：お近くのよく行くお店をリストに登録することができます。
今回の機能追加を元に、忘・新年会シーズンのiPhoneアプリユーザーにより多くの利便性を提供する事で、店舗売上げの向上に寄与してまいりたいと存じます。
ロケーションバリューでは今後もユーザー・企業双方のスマートフォン対応ニーズに応えるべく、「イマナラ！」アプリの機能追加や企業公式アプリの開発に力を入れてまいります。今後の展開に是非ご期待下さい。
※１：時限クーポン：当日限定で使用できる時間・枚数限定の特典率の高いクーポンのこと。
※2：2010年12/1〜12/19の国内携帯販売台数におけるスマートフォンの販売シェア 49.8％ BCN社調べ。
▼「ワタミアプリ」の紹介ページはこちら
■イマナラ！について
時限クーポン配信サービス「イマナラ！」は、携帯電話やスマートフォンの位置情報を活用し、利用者がいる場所の周辺で配信されている時限クーポンを無料で取得できるサービスです。有効時間や枚数を限定するかわりに、「お会計から50％OFF！」など特典率の高いクーポンが多数掲載されています。
2009年9月1日に携帯サイトでサービスを開始し、『HOTPEPPERグルメ』を運営する株式会社リクルート飲食情報カンパニーと提携のもと、11,000店を超える店舗にご登録をいただいております。
また2010年5月19日にはiPhone専用アプリをリリースし、8月24日にワタミフードサービス株式会社と共同で居酒屋チェーン業界初のiPhoneアプリ「ワタミアプリ」を、12月3日はシダックス・コミュニティ株式会社と共同でカラオケチェーン業界初のiPhoneアプリ「レストランカラオケ・シダックス」をリリースするなど、スマートフォン対応にも力を入れ、全アプリの合計ダウンロード数は30万件超となっております。
2010年7月9日には、モバイル・コンテンツ・フォーラムが主催する「モバイルプロジェクト・アワード2010」にてソリューション部門の優秀賞を受賞した他、同年11月4日には日経トレンディ「2011年ヒット予測ランキング」の第1位「得するジオゲーム」で代表的なサービスとして紹介されるなど、各方面からも高い評価をいただいております。

description.hltext_display: A Herefordshire farmer near Ross on Wye has savoured early success from his latest sparkling venture.
description.content:
A HEREFORDSHIRE farmer has savoured early success from his latest sparkling venture.
Workers at Castle Brook Vineyard popped a cork to mark the launch of “Chinn Chinn” sparkling wine.
The vines were planted by the Chinn family in 2004 on the site of an ancient Roman vineyard at Coughton, near Ross on- Wye.
Producers have already reaped success as the 2006 vintage claimed a medal at its first awards ceremony.
The brand, available in a handful of local outlets, claimed silver at the South West Vineyards Association 2010 awards.
John Chinn, of Cobrey Farms, is a well-known asparagus grower and has a lucrative contract to supply Marks & Spencer. The wine is produced with traditional methods and champagne grapes, while the terrain and soil is very similar to the region.
“We’ve worked really closely with winemakers in Sussex to get the best grapes and that’s paid dividends,” said Mr Chinn.
“It’s really more of a hobby than a full financial enterprise and we’re looking to market it locally in local restaurants.”
The vintage was launched before at Orles Barn Hotel and is available online and through select local outlets.

event_or_fact.property: ?We?ve worked really closely with winemakers in Sussex to get the best grapes and that?s paid dividends,?

description.hltext_display: Le sacan solicitantes de empleo a la PGJE
description.author: José Alfredo Beltrán
description.content:
Cuatro aspiran a titularidad de la Procuraduría
José Alfredo Beltrán
Cuatro aspiran a titularidad de la Procuraduría
José Alfredo Beltrán
Son pocas las personas que quieren un puesto en la Procuraduría General de Justicia del Estado.
Fotografía: Noroeste.
CULIACÁN.- El área de Procuraduría General de Justicia del Estado fue la más desairada por los solicitantes de un empleo público a través del "Chambaweb".
El Gobernador electo Mario López Valdez recibió sólo 18 propuestas de currículas para diferentes posiciones de la PGJE, según datos recabados por el equipo de transición.
Esto contrasta con las 196 expedientes que se recibieron para la Secretaría de Educación Pública y Cultura; las 126 para Administración y Finanzas, y las 104 para Desarrollo Social y Sustentable.
Hay cuatro aspirantes para ocupar la vacante de Procurador, aunque el nombre de éstos, como del resto de los 25 mil 874 aspirantes, se mantiene en reserva.
Elisa Pérez Garmendia, vocera de Malova, explicó que esto con el fin de cuidar la identidad e imagen de quienes tuvieron la confianza de participar en este mecanismo.
Los datos indican que una persona se registró para ser considerada como Subprocurador General; dos más, para Subprocurador Regional de la zona norte, cinco para la zona centro, y tres para la zona sur.
Además hay tres "tiradores" para la Policía Ministerial.
Esto no significa que de éstos Malova integrará necesariamente su gabinete 2011-2016, el cual anunciará hasta el 31 de diciembre por la tarde.
Hasta hoy sólo Sergio Rochín Trujillo, ex dirigente de Convergencia y ex funcionario de la Procuraduría General de la República, ha hecho público que fue uno de los que se registraron en el "Chambaweb".
Y entre los partidos que postularon a Malova, ninguno ha "enseñado" alguna carta para esta área.
Incluso Francisco Solano, líder del PAN estatal, declaró recientemente que no tenían propuestas ni para la PGJE ni para la Secretaría de Seguridad Pública.
Aunque ha trascendido que Francisco Córdova, panista de Sonora y con experiencia en el ramo, quien apoyara a Malova en el proceso electoral, es uno de los fuertes prospectos.
La Secretaría de Seguridad Pública es otra de las áreas "menos atractivas", aunque en este caso se recibieron 56 currículas, para los diversas responsabilidades.
Siete se "anotaron" para la titularidad de la SSP y el resto para otras carteras.
Poco atractiva...
Sólo 18 personas, de las 25 mil 874 que se registraron, aspiran a trabajar en la PGJE.
Cargo Número de registros
Procurador General 4
Subprocurador General 1
Subprocurador norte 2
Subprocurador centro 5
Suprocurador sur 3
Director de Policía Ministerial 3
Elaboró Noroeste, con datos del "Chambaweb".
CARGOS CODICIADOS
265
"sueñan" con pertenecer al staff cercano de Malova.
175
aspiran a la titularidad de la Secretaría Particular
17
para Secretario Auxiliar del Gobernador.
11
quieren ser director de Eventos y Enlaces.
Fuente: equipo de transición de Malova.

description.hltext_display: UPDATE 1-Idemitsu sees total Q1 crude refining up 1 pct y/y
description.content:
TOKYO, Dec 22 (Reuters) - Idemitsu Kosan Co, Japan's third-largest refiner, said on Wednesday it plans to refine a total 8 million kilolitres (559,000 barrels per day) of crude oil in January-March, up 1 percent from a year earlier as robust exports offset weak domestic demand.
Refining for the domestic market by the nation's third-biggest refiner will fall by 2 percent, or 200,000 kl, from the previous year to 7.5 million kl, the company said.
Idemitsu plans to export 500,000 kl worth of oil products in the first quarter of 2011, an Idemitsu official told reporters.
The company has four refineries in Japan with total crude refining capacity of 640,000 barrels per day.
(Reporting by Osamu Tsukimori; Editing by Chris Gallagher)
((osamu.tsukimori@thomsonreuters.com ; +813 6441 1857; Reuters Messaging: osamu.tsukimori.reuters.com@reuters.net))
((If you have a query or comment on this story, send an email to news.feedback.asia@thomsonreuters.com)) Keywords: CRUDE IDEMITSU/REFINING
* Q1 crude refining for domestic market down 2 pct
* Robust exports help offset shrinking domestic demand
* Ups 2010/11 refining outlook helped by robust exports
(Adds details)
TOKYO, Dec 22 (Reuters) - Idemitsu Kosan Co, Japan's third-largest refiner, said on Wednesday it plans to refine a total of 8 million kilolitres of crude oil in January-March, or 559,000 barrels per day, up 1 percent from a year earlier as robust exports offset weak domestic demand.
Refining for the domestic market by the nation's third-biggest refiner will fall by 2 percent or 200,000 kl from the previous year to 7.5 million kl, it said.
The company plans to export 500,000 kilolitres of oil products in the first quarter of 2011, up 93 percent from a year earlier.
It has four refineries in Japan with total crude refining capacity of 640,000 barrels per day.
Idemitsu has upgraded its total refining outlook for the year ending next March by 600,000 kl from its initial plan of 28.9 million kl, up 2 percent, as a 41 percent rise in exports to 2 million kl helped offset a 1 percent decline in domestic demand.
The company estimated its total processing for October-December at 7.0 million kl, up 1 percent from a year earlier but down from the original plan of 7.2 million kl, hurt by problems at its Hokkaido and Aichi refineries in November and December.
(Reporting by Osamu Tsukimori; Editing by Ed Lane)
((osamu.tsukimori@thomsonreuters.com ; +813 6441 1857; Reuters Messaging: osamu.tsukimori.reuters.com@reuters.net)) Keywords: CRUDE IDEMITSU/REFINING
(If you have a query or comment on this story, send an email to news.feedback.asia@thomsonreuters.com)

description.hltext_display: Brüderle erwartet ein "Jahrzehnt der Arbeitnehmer"
description.content:
dpa Bundeswirtschaftsminister (FDP) rechnet mit einem lange anhaltenden Aufschwung und einer Rückführung der Neuverschuldung im Bund bis spätestens 2015.
„Wir sehen einen nachhaltigen Aufschwung, der durchaus über die kommenden Jahre anhalten könnte. Angesichts der rückläufigen Bevölkerung in Deutschland und des Fachkräftemangels in der Wirtschaft könnte es ein Jahrzehnt der Arbeitnehmer werden", sagte Brüderle der in Düsseldorf erscheinenden „Rheinischen Post".
„Sollte sich das Wirtschaftswachstum als robust erweisen, kann die Rückführung der Neuverschuldung auf Null bis 2014 oder 2015 realistisch sein", so der FDP-Minister. Das Ziel, die „breite Mitte" steuerlich noch vor der nächsten Bundestagswahl zu entlasten, bleibe bestehen.
Auch der FDP-Haushaltspolitiker Otto Fricke hält eine Nettoneuverschuldung von Null für möglich. Voraussetzungen seien aber ein solides Wirtschaftswachstum, eine weiter sinkende Arbeitslosigkeit und eine Stabilisierung des Euro.Wirtschaftsminister Brüderle rechnet mit einem anhaltenden Aufschwung. Sogar die Rückführung der Neuverschuldung auf Null könnte erreicht werden.

description.hltext_display: UGT advierte de que los Presupuestos de 2011 obstaculizarán la recuperación
description.content:
MADRID, 22 Dic. (EUROPA PRESS) -
UGT ha advertido de que los Presupuestos Generales del Estado (PGE) de 2011, aprobados en el Congreso, consolidarán el retroceso social y obstaculizarán la recuperación económica y del empleo en España.
El sindicato ha asegurado que las cuentas públicas sólo reflejan la preocupación del Gobierno por cumplir las exigencias de Bruselas respecto a la reducción del déficit, "en detrimento de los ciudadanos y del avance social".
Así, la organización dirigida por Cándido Méndez ha criticado que los PGE del próximo año contemplan un recorte del dinero destinado a sanidad, a los servicios sociales, a la educación, a las infraestructuras, a la I+D+i, a la industria, a la energía y al turismo, entre otros.
Además, UGT ha denunciado que pese a la difícil situación de muchas personas y familias, las cuentas públicas de 2011 reducen las partidas destinadas al desempleo, a la incapacidad temporal, a las prestaciones por maternidad y paternidad y a la protección a la familia.

description.hltext_display: 诺天王总得分超越大鸟
description.content:
数据 组图 投篮点
搜狐体育讯 北京时间2010年12月22日，NBA常规赛继续进行。在今天小牛以105-99战胜魔术的比赛中，德克-诺维茨基全场拿下了17分，从而让自己的职业生涯总得分达到了21798分，超过了凯尔特人名宿拉里-伯德，上升到了NBA历史得分榜的第25位，同时也是现役球员中的第四位。
在今天这场比赛开始前，诺维茨基的总得分已经达到了21781分，如果他今天能够得到10分的话就可以追平伯德的纪录，如果得到11分就可以完成超越，而今天虽然面对魔术，但是10分对于诺维茨基来说并不算是很困难，因为他本赛季的得分还没有低于过这个数字。
比赛开始不久诺维茨基就上篮得手，不久后又两罚全中，接下来又是一个远距离的投篮加上两次罚球，第一节下来诺维茨基就拿下了8分。
虽然在比赛的中间两节诺维茨基非常罕见的没有得分入账，但是到了第四节初的时候他很快就命中了一个三分球，第10分和第11分就这样同时到来了，此时的诺维茨基已经完成了对于伯德的超越，独占历史得分榜的第25位。最终全场结束的时候，诺维茨基拿下了17分。
目前排在诺维茨基前面的是绰号手套的加里-佩顿，他的得分是21813分，诺维茨基和他的距离是15分，下一场比赛超越的可能性非常大。再往前则是火箭名宿德雷克斯勒的22195分，和诺维茨基的差距是397分，预计需要十几场比赛才能够完成。
目前排在第20名的是阿德里安-丹特利的23149分，诺维茨基距离这个数据还有1351分，本赛季结束前是否能够完成现在还不得而知。而且在诺维茨基前面还有一个22669分但是还在不断前进的加内特，他将会在诺维茨基之前超越丹特利，所以诺维茨基想要进入到前20名，应该需要1536分超越第19名的酋长帕里什才行，因为那个时候加内特已经完成了超越，帕里什是第20名而丹特利则是第21名。
在现役球员中，诺维茨基的总得分高居第四名，位居他之上的只有奥尼尔（28445分）、科比（26514分）和上面说的加内特的22669分（上述三人的数据均不包含22日的得分）。
在诺维茨基之下的现役球员，按照得分高低进行排列分别是：雷-阿伦、邓肯、皮尔斯、卡特、麦蒂、贾米森、基德等。
（搜狐体育：少东）

description.hltext_display: Saúde transportou quase 10 mil pacientes...
description.content:
Quase 10 mil pacientes transportados ao longo de 2010 para consultas ou cirurgias em diversas cidades da região e do estado. Ou seja, uma média de 820 pacientes por mês e cerca de 200 por semana. Estes foram os números apresentados recentemente pelo setor de transporte da Secretaria Municipal de Saúde de Paranavaí.
“Tudo isso graças a um incremente na frota de veículos que aconteceu ao longo deste ano e à manutenção dos veículos que já pertenciam à frota, mas que estavam sucateados quando assumimos a Secretaria no início de 2009”, destacou Selma Weber, diretora administrativa da Secretaria.
No total, foram adquiridos em 2010 sete veículos, sendo um micro-ônibus e duas ambulâncias para transporte de tratamento fora de domicílio, uma kombi para o transporte de pacientes do Caps 2, um carro para o Caps-ad, uma kombi para transportes de agentes de saúde que trabalham no combate à dengue e um carro para o setor administrativo da Secretaria, além da manutenção do contrato de locação de mais um ônibus e um micro-ônibus para transporte de pacientes em tratamento e locação de outros dois veículos de apoio para o Programa Saúde da Família e de um caminhão de apoio ao combate à dengue que faz o trabalho de recolhimento de entulhos.
As informações são da assessoria de imprensa da Prefeitura.
Com esta frota, a Secretaria oferece transporte diário para tratamento em Curitiba, Maringá, Londrina e Arapongas, onde o paciente é levado até o local de seu procedimento. Em trajetos mais longos, como no caso de Curitiba, os usuários do transporte ainda ganham lanche, cobertores e, os mais debilitados, ainda podem contar com uma casa de apoio transitório na capital que oferece serviços de hotelaria.
“O serviço de Tratamento Fora de Domicílio (TFD) antigamente era muito deficitário. Eram oferecidos apenas duas viagens a Curitiba por semana, e os pacientes não podiam contar com um alojamento para dormir e fazer suas refeições. Hoje, oferecemos transporte diário, além de uma casa de apoio que visa dar um pouco de conforto para estas pessoas”, comentou Selma.
Apesar disso, a diretora administrativa e o médico Sari Omar, diretor de Saúde, concordam que, para o maior conforto dos pacientes e otimização do transporte e dos recursos públicos, o ideal seria o credenciamento de alguns serviços no município, como no caso das ressonâncias, que hoje só podem ser realizadas em Curitiba.
Com relação ao próximo ano, a diretora afirma que é meta da Secretaria ampliar o número de motoristas no quadro efetivo de funcionários, adquirir novos veículos para o setor de Vigilância Sanitária, uma ambulância para o PA (Pronto Atendimento), e um carro para o Programa de Atenção ao Idoso. (Ass./Pref.)

description.hltext_display: Alagón expone su Belén elaborado de forma artesanal hasta el 6 de enero
description.content:
La localidad zaragozana de Alagón ha inaugurado ya su Belén de Navidad, elaborado de forma totalmente artesanal, que podrá visitarse hasta el próximo día 6 de enero. Una de las principales novedades del Nacimiento este año es la inclusión de una réplica de la ermita de la Virgen del Castillo del municipio, realizada a escala.
Tu nombre Email destino
Enviado
ALAGÓN (ZARAGOZA), 22 (EUROPA PRESS)
La localidad zaragozana de Alagón ha inaugurado ya su Belén de Navidad, elaborado de forma totalmente artesanal, que podrá visitarse hasta el próximo día 6 de enero. Una de las principales novedades del Nacimiento este año es la inclusión de una réplica de la ermita de la Virgen del Castillo del municipio, realizada a escala.
El Belén de Alagón ha sido elaborado de forma artesanal por vecinos de la localidad aficionados a la tradición belenista. Desde el año 2005 su sede es la bodega del centro cívico Antonio Fernández Molina donde, año tras año, elaboran una nueva escenografía para sorprender a los visitantes.
Este Nacimiento incluye réplicas a escala de algunos de los edificios más emblemáticos de Alagón y cada año va creciendo. Ya forman parte del mismo varias casas aragonesas del casco histórico, incluida la casa de la Calle Damas que aloja el Belén, el desaparecido Arco del Marqués o el lavadero de la Fuente de las Mujeres.
El Belén se ha elaborado con más de 13.000 tejas y 18.000 ladrillos, más de 1.000 kilos de piedra y cerca de 500 figuras pintadas a mano, según ha destacado la Asociación de Vecinos Allabone. Se podrá visitar hasta el 6 de enero de lunes a viernes, de 10.00 a 12.00 y de 17.00 a 21.00 horas.

description.hltext_display: La neige de retour mercredi dans vingt départements
description.author: LeMonde.fr avec AFP
description.content:
L'accalmie aura été de courte durée. Vingt départements de la moitié nord de la France, de la Loire-Atlantique aux Ardennes, ont été placés en vigilance orange par Météo France en raison de chutes de neige attendues mercredi 22 décembre en fin de journée. Par ailleurs, la vigilance orange est décrétée pour la Moselle et le Bas-Rhin en raison de risques de crue de la Sarre. Lire la suite l'article
Photos/Vidéos liées Plus d'articles sur : Météo Les chutes de neige atteindront 5 à 10 cm dans les départements d'Ile-de-France, dans l'Aisne, les Ardennes, l'Eure, l'Eure-et-Loir, l'Ille-et-Vilaine, la Loire-Atlantique, le Maine-et-Loire, la Mayenne, le Morbihan, l'Oise, l'Orne et la Sarthe. La pluie traversera dans la matinée l'Aquitaine et les Charentes avant de remonter vers le nord où, en butant sur l'air froid, elle se transformera en neige sur le nord des Pays de la Loire et les collines normandes.
ALERTE AU VERGLAS
'Ces chutes de neige s'étendront en soirée et la nuit suivante au bassin parisien et aux Ardennes et pourraient être précédées d'un peu de verglas', prévient Météo France. 'Cet épisode neigeux débutera vers 18 heures sur les Pays de la Loire, 19 heures sur l'Ile-de-France, 20 heures sur la Bretagne, le sud de la Normandie et la Picardie', selon les prévisionnistes de Météo France.L'Ecotron, une infrastructure pour étudier les écosystèmes

description.hltext_display: FT: Bulgaria, Romania Suffers EU Open Borders Blow
description.content:
By Stanley Pignal in Brussels
Financial Times
Germany and France
Romania and Bulgaria had been working towards joining Schengen in spring 2011, a timetable that many thought unrealistic amid doubts in some member states over the wisdom of entrusting either country with the external borders of the EU.
The interior ministers from the bloc's two biggest hitters definitely buried that ambition in a letter to the European Commission, calling an early 2011 date "premature".
"We do not believe all conditions for an entry into Schengen by these two countries are being met," the letter said. "It would not be realistic nor responsible to make light of known shortcomings."
It goes on to highlight weaknesses in the applicants' judiciary as well as continuing problems with corruption and organised crime.
As unanimous political agreement among EU countries is necessary to join Schengen, the Franco-German position will force a new timetable to be drawn up, diplomats said.
The move will be particularly disappointing for Hungary, which takes over the EU's rotating presidency on January 1 and which had hoped to repair the fraying ties between "old" European member states such as France
In another sign of tension, at last week's summit of European leaders, the French, German and British leaders led a campaign to limit the growth in the EU budget, which would most immediately impact on eastern European countries, the biggest recipients of regional development funds from Brussels.
"The Hungarians had made the Schengen accession a priority, and though they have been realistic on the chances of success, they will feel rebuffed by this," one national diplomat said.
The Schengen area, named after a town in Luxembourg, has been in force since 1995 and now includes 25 European countries, most of them within the EU. Britain and Ireland are not members; Switzerland, Norway and Iceland are. It allows border-free travel.
People who have followed the debate said the factors listed in the Franco-German letter – on the weakness of the judiciary in particular – are concerns shared beyond those two countries.
But political factors are also thought to have weighed in. France
Paris was criticised by the European Commission for apparently placing a priority on the dismantling of Romanian camps and for deporting more than 8,000 of them, sometimes with compensation.
The episode soured relations between France
Germany is said to be concerned about the effect of the two countries joining Schengen on European migration flows.
Including Romania and Bulgaria in the bloc would open a land bridge for migrants to enter the EU from Turkey, either directly into Bulgaria or through the porous border with Greece.

description.hltext_display: NTTドコモ、奄美大島での集中豪雨に伴う携帯電話料金の取扱いについて
description.content:

NTTドコモ(TSE:9437)は、今回の豪雨による複数の通信設備障害に伴い、携帯電話が長時間ご利用いただけなかった地域にお住まいのお客様を対象に、以下の通り、料金を無料とさせていただき、料金を返還いたします。

2011年1月ご利用分(2011年2月請求分)の料金から減算し、返還いたします。

description.hltext_display: Asian markets advance after upbeat Japanese exports; Euro and Pound pick up
description.author: FXstreet.com
description.content: FXstreet.com (Barcelona) - Asian markets have traded in a positive tone on Wednesday, supported by bright Japanese exports, which rose 9.1% in November, boosting investor's confidence about economic recovery. In FX markets, Euro and Pound appreciated as risk appetite picked up. Japanese Nikkei Index has edged up 0.1%, while the Hong Kong Hang Seng Index rose 0.7% and the Australian ASX Index and South Korean Kospi Index have added 0.2% each; On the negative side, Chinese Shangai Composite Index lost 0.4%. Shares of Japanese exporters have risen, favoured by upbeat exports figures, Canon rose 2%, while Nissan advanced 0.3% and Honda added 0.1%, while resources and energy stocks advanced on higher oil prices. The banking sector showed moderate losses. Euro and Pound off lows EUR/USD traded lower yesterday, after rejection at 1.3200 resistance area, and the pair dipped to a fresh 3-week low at 1.3075, to pick up on Asian session, returning above 1.3100, to reach 1.3150 session high ahead of the European session opening. GBP/USD decline from 1.5900 area last week extended lower on Tuesday, reaching a fresh 3-month low at 1.5435, were the pair found support to pick up over the Asian session reaching 1.5500 area ahead of London session opening. USD/JPY retreat 84.40/50 resistance area, extended yesterday to a fresh one-week low at 83.50 on Tuesday's US session, bouncing up later to find resistance at 83.90.

description.hltext_display: São Carlos do Ivaí inaugura a sua Biblioteca...
description.content:
A administração municipal de São Carlos do Ivaí inaugurou a sua Biblioteca Cidadã Waldomiro Roda, com cerca de 2 mil livros em seu acervo o espaço já está aberto para população.
“Não poderíamos dar outro nome a nossa Biblioteca, Waldomiro Roda foi o nosso primeiro prefeito, homem honesto e sempre preocupado com o bem-estar da nossa população”, destacou Jurandir Alves Contro, prefeito da cidade.
O projeto da Secretaria de Estado da Cultura, em parceria com a Biblioteca Pública do Paraná e prefeituras, beneficiará, até o fim do ano 105 municípios em todo o Paraná. O prédio de 180 metros quadrados reúne cultura e tecnologia no mesmo ambiente, com cinco computadores com acesso à Internet.
O espaço conta ainda com salão comunitário, espaço cívico e de recreação e um mural na fachada pintado por um artista da cidade.
A Biblioteca Cidadã possui um acervo que contempla todos os gêneros literários e chama a atenção para o fato de promover a inclusão cultural e intelectual da população de cada região atendida.
A viúva do homenageado, senhora Iolanda Bego juntamente com os filhos e netos esteve prestigiando a inauguração do espaço cultural. “A senhora Iolanda é um exemplo para nós, somos muito grato pelo trabalho realizado”, disse Bida. O evento contou ainda com a presença de vereadores, autoridades locais e comunidade.

description.hltext_display: You Can Win Your Ex Back
description.content:
Losing your loved one through a breakup can be a nerve-racking experience. This sets off an emotional sand storm that can last for years. It can also leave in its wake, animosity, anger, bitterness, and even a bruised ego and self-esteem. Many relationships which break up do not recover and the couples go separate ways and start new lives. But there are relationships which also recover and get back on track once more. Winning your ex back into your life takes a deliberate effort and may also involve a process of self-change.
Back off for some time
This concept is overly misunderstood. It is also one of the hardest to implement. This is because it involves you backing off your ex and allowing them to chart the course of their lives without your involvement. Many experts call this NC or no-contact and it involves you completely removing yourself from your ex's life.
Again, we cannot underestimate the difficulty of pulling this off. This is because you had a life with this person that was intertwined practically in all aspects. Disengaging is not easy, mainly because you are likely to experience painful withdrawal symptoms. Understandably, this comes about because you have literally build a life around each other. You most likely even have the same friends and hobbies. Walking away from this and taking a back seat can be a gigantic task to say the least.
What if you were married with children?
Exercising the no-contact rule is harder when the two of you have children. This is because you or they will want to see the children from time to time. The whole thing is complicated even further by the fact that while the two of you may want some time apart, the children will ask to see you or your partner. Children who are older also tend to ask more questions and will demand answers.
Attitude counts
In any relationship breakup, there is a residue of anger. This is mainly because one or both parties will blame each other for the demise of the relationship. This is then accompanied by blame. From time to time, when you and your ex get in contact, there is the overwhelming temptation to vent this anger. If you want to win your ex back, you must desist from this completely. No matter how strongly you feel about the other party, avoid the angry exchange of words.
Whenever there is an exchange of angry words, it gives ammunition to your ex to justify leaving you even more. These words are also most likely to be shared with his or her friends and family making even harder for you to make a comeback later. While emotions may run high, it is strongly recommended that you exercise self-control.

description.hltext_display: Lindsay Lohan droht schon wieder Haft

description.hltext_display: Piden no mediatizar las traiciones en PRI
description.author: Claudia Beltrán
description.content:
CULIACÁN.- Acudir ante la Comisión de Justicia Partidaria a señalar y aportar pruebas de los presuntos traidores en el PRI para no mediatizar el tema, pidió Sergio Torres Félix.
El ex diputado local del tricolor reiteró que de no acudir ante los órganos institucionales, se caería en los dimes y diretes.
Comentó que como priista se une a la postura de Pablo Moreno Cota, dirigente estatal del PRI, quien calificó de 'falso debate' la traición en el partido, calificativo dado el sábado 11 de diciembre en el pleno del Consejo Político Estatal por Eduardo Garrido Achoy.
"Yo me adhiero a lo que dijo el presidente de mi partido", expresó.
-- ¿Porque te adhieres?
Porque yo creo que en todos los asuntos se debe de privilegiar la legalidad, por eso hay órganos de justicia interna del partido, entonces, yo creo que eso es lo correcto.
-- Es un falso debate, mencionaba Pablo, ¿estás de acuerdo?
Pues, independientemente de eso, para eso están las instancias y las instancias al hacerles llegar las pruebas, pues ellas determinarían lo que procediera.
-- ¿Dirimir en las instancias del partido?
Yo soy de esa idea, de no mediatizar todo, yo soy de la idea de que debemos de privilegiar el diálogo, privilegiar la ley y los estatutos que rigen la vida interna de nuestro instituto político, entonces esas son las instancias, y yo soy de la idea de que por ahí debe ser el asunto y menos mediático.
¿Quien tenga pruebas las aporte ante los órganos internos?
Efectivamente, yo creo que eso es lo correcto.
-- ¿Hubo traición o no en el PRI?
Pues mira, eso es un asunto, ¿cómo te diré?, es un asunto que se ve desde diferentes perspectivas, entonces, yo creo que para poder ir avanzando en ese tema, debemos dar cauce a los comentarios, soportado con pruebas, con elementos y que sean las instancias correspondientes las que determinen, yo no me atrevería a decir una cosa o la otra.
-- ¿En el PRI hay traidores o no?
Pues mira, nosotros somos un instituto político plural, donde hay muchas voces, y bueno, yo , me reservaría la respuesta.
-- ¿Por qué la reserva, por qué no reconocer la palabra traición?, tan fácil de decir, si hubo o no.
No, para eso hay instancias internas del partido que son las que de cierta manera califican la conducta de todos y cada uno de los que formamos parte de él.

description.hltext_display: How International Tax Rates Impact Your Investments
description.content:
Filed Under: Bonds, Currencies, Economics, Economy, Financial Theory, International Markets, Regulations, Taxes
A revealing report by Swedish think tank Timbro entitled "EU versus USA" garnered considerable international economic and media attention when it was released in June 2004. It is essential reading for anyone looking at overseas investments, especially in the Euro region.
The Effects of High Taxes, Big Government and Regulation
The authors of the study, Dr. Fredrik Bergström, President of The Swedish Research Institute of Trade, and Mr. Robert Gidehag, formerly the Chief Economist of the same institute, painted a disturbing picture of the cumulative effects that high taxes, burgeoning government size and escalating regulations have had on EU nations in the last three decades of the twentieth century.
According to the study, if the European Union (comprised of 15 nations) were a state in the United States, the EU's gross domestic product (GDP) per capita - an important measure of economic well-being - would rank fifth from the bottom, slightly ahead of Arkansas. When compared to the U.S., the nations of France, Germany, Italy and the UK were found to have GDP per capita rates lower than all but four of the poorest U.S. states, and below that of Oklahoma.
The report also went a long way in dispelling the myth that, thanks to the social safety net provided through high tax rates, Europe's poor are better off. Data showed that the poor in the U.S. were in fact considerably better off than their European counterparts. For example, 40% of Swedish households (where overall tax rates have consistently been among the highest in Europe) would have been below the poverty line if they lived in the U.S. In 2000, 12% of the U.S. population was below the poverty line.
The Economic Impact of EU and U.S. Difference on International Investment
The report was enough to prompt a closer examination of what implications the economic differences between the U.S. and EU might have on an international investment strategy. Here are some more pertinent facts revealed in further research:
1. There is an almost direct linear correlation between overall taxes as a percentage of GDP and productivity. The higher the tax burden, the lower the productivity. No real surprise here, but the Timbro study showed the seriousness of the impact and how much the prosperity of the EU nation states and that of the U.S. had diverged.
2. In the 36 years between 1960 and 1996, taxes as a percentage of GDP in the U.S. increased from 28.4% to 34.6%. In 1960, taxes per GDP in the 'EU-15' were actually lower than the U.S. at 28.2%, but by 1996 had grown to a whopping 52.4% of the average of GDP, which means that over the span of 36 years since 1960, governments increased what they were taking out of the economy by 85% (see table 1).
3. In May 2004, there were 10 new additions to the EU. Without exception, each new member had a GDP per capita well below the EU-15 average. If, again, the EU-15 GDP per capita is set at 100, the 2001 data shows that the 10 new members average GDP/capita was less than 53. The U.S. scored 141.
4. As a percentage of GDP, the EU-15 spent 1.95% of GDP on research and development in 2001, versus the U.S. expenditure of 2.7%. In the same year, the overall EU economy was less than 90% of the size of the U.S. economy. In 2004, the gap in research and development (R&D) expenditure continued to widen.
Global Investment Returns – A Comparison
Determining the impact of an event such as the addition of 10 more 'have-not' states to the EU should be of great immediate concern to the global investor. If taxes have a negative effect on economic productivity and growth, what is the impact on investment returns? And can it be measured?
Figure 2 compares the relationships between tax rates of four nations as a percentage of GDP and the average annual return in those nations' stock market indexes over the 11-year period from 1990 to 2000. Indexes used were the French CAC-40, German SE XTRA DAX, U.S. Dow Jones Industrial Average (DJIA) and Hong Kong Hang Seng Index.
It appears there was an almost linear relationship between tax burden and index returns (see dashed dark red and green lines). If the rates of return in figure 2 continued for 20 years starting in 2004, the international investor would earn the returns represented in figure 3 if he or she were to invest $10,000 in each of the four national indexes.
Differences in index performances between nations were found to be significant. Over a 20-year period, an investment in Hong Kong's Hang Seng Index, for example, would have returned more than double the same investment in France's CAC-40 and nearly double an investment in Germany's SE XTRA DAX Index.
Star Euro Performers
It is important to point out that, as of 2004, not all European Union members were experiencing declining economic prosperity. Luxembourg and Ireland - both listed as low-tax jurisdictions in Walter and Dorothy Diamond's three-volume tax reference entitled "Tax Havens Of The World" - are notable exceptions. Comparisons using the EU-15 GDP per capita of 100 in 2001 show that Luxembourg scored an impressive 194, while Ireland outperformed most other nations in Europe with a score of 118. Ireland was also the only member of the EU-15 to experience a decline in taxes per GDP between 1970 and 1996.
It is no surprise that the Irish SE ISEQ Overall Index outperformed the French, German, Canadian (TSX Composite Index) and UK (FTSE 100 Index) markets in the 14 years preceding 2004. Ireland took an aggressive approach to getting its economy going in the early 1990s by slashing corporate tax rates, much to the consternation of Europe's tax-and-spend bureaucrats. The policy worked, and the Irish economy is now a model of how cutting tax rates and government spending is the right answer to viable long-term economic prosperity.
Tax Rates and Your Portfolio
While it may be difficult to say that there is always a direct linear relationship between tax treatment and investment returns, the data shows a strong correlation over the long haul. Are taxes completely to blame, or could there be other factors? Generally, there are a variety of considerations when making an investment. But the evidence of a link between taxes, regulation and red tape, and economic performance is clear. And these factors exhibit significant bearing on all aspects of the economy, including investment returns.
The Canadian Slide
There is also evidence to indicate a correlation between taxation policies and currency performance. In the mid-1970s, the Canadian dollar was worth $1.10 U.S. By the early 1990s the "loonie" had fallen to 62 cents. An investment by a U.S. investor in Canadian markets over this period would have resulted in a loss of nearly 50% thanks to the devaluation in the currency.
What caused the drop? In 1960 (see table 1) tax rates in the U.S. and Canada were nearly identical. By 1990, the overall tax burden in Canada had increased by 70% to 47.8% of GDP while the U.S. increase was a more manageable 22.5%. Both Canada's corporate tax rate and personal income tax rate were also significantly higher. Taxes were certainly a factor at the root of the problem.
The Canadian TSX Composite Index significantly under-performed both the S&P 500 and the DJIA thanks in part to the tax differential between the two countries. This gives investors one more good reason to be careful when investing in any country with excessive tax rates. (For further reading see, Going International and Using Tax Lots: A Way To Minimize Taxes.)
The Competition Cartel
Interestingly, instead of recognizing and addressing the fatal link between declining economic prosperity and increases in taxation, EU governments, under the auspices of the Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development (OECD), initiated a program in 1998 called The Harmful Tax Competition Initiative. The initiative targeted nations around the world with low-tax policies, including countries in the Caribbean, Eastern Europe and the Pacific region. Many of the nations with such policies were poor and desperate to attract international investment dollars. Since the initiative began, a number of countries have been singled out and systematically blacklisted by the OECD. Explaining its actions, the OECD declared that it wanted to stop practices it labeled "unfair tax competition" and halt "a [tax] race to the bottom."
This is ironic because the European Commission has a competition agency headed by Competition Commissioner Mario Monte, who, in the name of protecting the public, has the job of assiduously seeking out monopolistic practices and enforcing competition among corporations operating in the EU. There seems to be a contradiction if, on the one hand, competition between corporations is desirable and corporate cartels are undesirable, but, on the other hand, competition among states to offer more attractive tax rates is wrong and a tax cartel is considered beneficial. The moral of the story is that investors should take note of such contradictions.
For more information on tax rates in OECD countries, please refer to the OECD website (http://www.oecd.org/)
Forewarned is forearmed!
by Matt Blackman (Contact Author | Biography)
Matt Blackman, the host of TradeSystemGuru.com, is a technical trader, author, keynote speaker and regular contributor to a number of trading publications and investment/trading websites in North America and Europe. He also writes a weekly market letter.
Filed Under: Bonds, Currencies, Economics, Economy, Financial Theory, International Markets, Regulations, Taxes

description.hltext_display: Dr. Reddy's Enters Into Agreement With Russia's R-Pharm
description.content:
(RTTNews) - Indian pharmaceutical giant Dr. Reddy's Laboratories Ltd. announced entering into a licensing, technology transfer, manufacturing and marketing agreement with Russia-based R-Pharm.
The Hyderabad-based company said the collaborate was in the area of high-technology and works on a profit sharing model.
The agreement will entail licensing of manufacturing know-how of products by Dr. Reddy's local manufacturing of products in Russia, co-development of high technology products and knowledge sharing between both parties at regular intervals.
At the BSE, Dr. Reddy's Laboratories shares are being traded at Rs.1,658.95, down by 1.71% from the previous close.

description.hltext_display: Enigt om regler för flygtillverkare
Jersey’s fund administration sector grows in Q3
description.content:
The fund administration sector in Jersey grew during the third quarter of 2010 with 40 new funds having been established in the jurisdiction compared to the same time period twelve months before. According the Jersey Financial Services Commission’s statistics, as of the end of the three month period running up to September 30, 2010 assets under administration increased by £3 billion (1.70%) in the jurisdiction to total £178.9 billion.
The total number of funds in the domicile increased from 1,287 to 1,327, and the total of unregulated funds in the jurisdiction is now at 105, an increase of 18 funds since the third quarter in 2009.
“We are continuing to work with government on a number of inward investment initiatives which we believe will strengthen Jersey’s position as a preferred centre for fund managers wishing to establish a physical presence in Jersey and an attractive domicile for alternative funds and fund administration services,” said Geoff Cook, Chief Executive of Jersey Finance. “With such important initiatives running, we are very confident we can build upon our excellent reputation in 2011 and beyond.’’

description.hltext_display: 诺天王嘲笑魔术
description.content:
数据 组图 投篮点
搜狐体育讯 北京时间12月22日，小牛以105-99击败新魔术，赛后诺维茨基在接受采访的时候表示，经历交易后的这支魔术依旧没有夺冠的实力。霍华德在接受采访的时候公开抱怨队友，直言没有比这更加糟糕的比赛了。
诺维茨基砍下17分，职业生涯的总得分也达到21798分，这一数据超越了凯尔特人的传奇巨星拉里-伯德，上升到历史第25。诺天王不仅创下纪录，而且帮助球队在客场击败魔术，这才是最关键的。在谈到这场比赛的胜利的时候，诺维茨基说道：“我们一直知道魔术拥有些什么，霍华德是他们进攻的中心，他们还有大量的投手，比如像尼尔森等人。诺维茨基的这番话其实另有深意。他的意思是交易之后的魔术依旧没有击败联盟顶级球队的能力。
巴特勒是小牛取胜的另一位功臣。他全场得到20分，及时地为诺维茨基分担进攻端的压力。能够战胜魔术，让巴特勒感到十分的高兴。“我们感觉自己是联盟当中最好的球队之一，即便现在不会是最好的，”巴特勒说道，“我们在比赛中打得相当的棒，所以我们不会放过任何的机会。”
事实上，魔术确实也给了他们一个绝佳的机会。尽管球队签下阿里纳斯、特科格鲁以及理查德森等一众好手，但是球队现在几乎没有时间训练。这也导致球员们在场上的配合不够默契。即使霍华德砍下26分23个篮板的超级两双，但是由于队友给予的帮助太少而输球。对于其他队友的不给力，霍华德也在赛后公开发起抱怨起来，他在接受采访时说道：“没有比这更加糟糕的了。”而魔术也只能期望其他人的表现不会再像今晚这么糟糕，因为他们在今晚之后，又要去挑战联盟两大强队，马刺和凯尔特人。
球队的失利，让主教练斯坦-范甘迪很是恼火，他点名批评新来的三名球员表现太差。“他们三人的投篮都很糟糕，我不知道是因为来到一个新环境，让他们感到不适应，还是我给了他们很大的压力，他们三人的投篮一直处于挣扎的状态。”
（搜狐体育：布谷）
相关新闻：
魔术三援再次打铁不给力 或成全魔兽卫冕篮板王

description.hltext_display: Spanien verabschiedet einen strengen Sparhaushalt
description.content:
dpa Mit knapper Mehrheit hat das spanische Parlament den Sparhaushalt für das nächste Jahr verabschiedet. In der Abgeordnetenkammer stimmten am Dienstag 177 Abgeordnete für das Budget für 2011, mit dem die Staatsausgaben weiter drastisch reduziert werden sollen. 171 Parlamentarier votierten dagegen.
Die Regierung des sozialistischen Ministerpräsidenten José Luis Rodriguez Zapatero war bei der Abstimmung auf die Unterstützung zweier kleinerer Regionalparteien angewiesen, da seine Anhänger nur über 169 Sitze verfügen. Für die Verabschiedung war die absolute Mehrheit von 176 Stimmen nötig.
Spanien will im nächsten Jahr sein Haushaltsdefizit auf sechs Prozent des Bruttoinlandsprodukts herabschrauben. Dafür sind harte Einsparungen nötig: Die Pläne der Regierung sehen unter anderem eine Kürzung der Ausgaben in den einzelnen Ministerien um bis zu 16 Prozent vor.
Die spanischen Beamten bekommen bereits seit Juni fünf Prozent weniger Gehalt. Um den angeschlagenen Haushalt zu sanieren, hat die Regierung Anfang Dezember zusätzliche Sparmaßnahmen angekündigt. So sollen beispielsweise Sonderhilfen für Arbeitslose nicht verlängert werden und im Februar auslaufen.Die Etats der spanischen Ministerien werden um bis zu 16 Prozent gekürzt. Nur mit äußerst knapper Mehrheit stimmte das Parlament dem Haushalt zu.

description.hltext_display: Fanfarra municipal de Guairaçá recebe incentivos...
description.content:
Desde o início do mandato da prefeita Janeslei, em 2009, o principal objetivo do incentivo a Fanfarra no Município de Guairaçá, é de desenvolver a participação dos jovens em
trabalhos coletivos, e possibilitar o aprimoramento de técnicas musicais. Com recursos próprios a administração municipal comprou uniforme para Fanfarra, no valor de R$ 31.042,00 e com ajuda da vereadora Carmem que viabilizou mais R$ 7.131,00 foram comprados mais instrumentos.
De acordo com os coordenadores do projeto a Fanfarra é uma ferramenta que faz o aluno participar mais ativamente no aprendizado musical, despertando um potencial que deve ser explorado e desenvolvido,
Através da fanfarra os alunos aprendem não só o ritmo, mas também a melodia que embora às vezes simples, dará ao estudante o prazer de emitir sons diferentes no mesmo
instrumento.
A Fanfarra de Guairaçá tem promovido ainda o orgulho dos moradores da cidade, já que a Fanfarra tem se apresentado em outros municípios e participado de competições.

description.hltext_display: PNG government gives nod to LNG fibre optic cable investment.
description.content:
Papua New Guinea’s National Executive Council has agreed to invest in the LNG fibre optic cable as part of a US$60 million rollout of an national broadband network accessible at competitive costs to the wider public.
A Cabinet meeting on Friday, chaired by Acting Prime Minister Sam Abal, gave approval for the Independent Public Business Corporation to borrow US$35 million to fund the acquisition of a 41.67% share in the PNG LNG fibre optic cable.
Other partners in the proposed PNG LNG fibre network include Esso Highlands (33.33%) as operator of the PNG LNG Project, Oil Search (16.67%) and the Southern Highlands Provincial Government (8.33%).
The IPBC proposes to raise a further US$25 million to integrate the PNG LNG fibre cable into current infrastructure and to build additional linkages to complete the broadband network.
In briefing cabinet, the Minister for Public Enterprises, Arthur Somare, said the LNG fibre optic agreement needed to be executed by the end of this month with expectations the cable could be ’ready for service’ by the end of 2012.

event_or_fact.property: the LNG fibre optic agreement needed to be executed by the end of this month with expectations the cable could be ?ready for service? by the end of 2012

description.hltext_display: How Do Men Deal with Breakups - Do Men Handle Break-Ups Worse?
description.content: Maybe one of the most common questions some people have is how do men deal with breakups. Breaking up with someone you love is really not an easy one. Periodically, it takes a long time before you can get a move-on with your life, while others take shorter period of time than normal. Guys do not have the same level of emotional strength that women do and would rarely be seen or known to have cried over a fallen relationship.The theory of how do men deal with breakups, is not really an easy thought to have. They are known for retaining that ever so macho appeal that they are rarely seen wallowing especially in public. However, this does not imply that they are insensitive or indifferent to the fact that the relationship is over. It is simply a way where they are able to put on a face that people would not easily be able to see beyond reality. While women have their lady friends, men have their pals that they hang around with. Some men have regular poker or drinking friends that they regularly see. Others have friends that date as far back to their childhood or during their school years. These are great ways to be able to overcome losses as men deal with it uniquely. The real deal on how do men deal with breakups is rather simple. You would see a group of grown men in a bar smiling and laughing while drinking a couple of beers. Beneath the facade, you will see that this group of men is there to support someone who is going through the process of recovery. The reality remains that it is not a common sight or thought to see a man talking about his woes on a broken relationship. In most cases, these are never brought up in full detail. While everyone around him is aware of the fact that the relationship has failed, they support him without saying a single word relevant to the concern.Guys have an unique way of handling with the problem. Contrary to the above, this does not apply to all. There are still some men who are in touch with their sensitive nature; and would rather talk about it before they actually begin to move forward. However, no matter how we look at it, it is by comparison very different than how women would typically get over a failed relationship. Some male friends would even go as far as trying to hook them up with someone in the soonest possible period of time. The best way that they are able to achieve this kind of success is simply through making sure that their friend is able to feel like he did years before the relationship has begun. In a sense, it is like revitalizing the old him so that he can recognize that there is life after this break up - no matter how devastating it has been. In the most complicated of all ironies, the ways on how do men deal with breakups are not always ideal, but it works.

description.hltext_display: 寒冬暖阳 嘟嘟牛福利院献温暖
description.content:
近日气温骤降，深圳希之光公司组织了“嘟嘟牛寒冬献温暖”活动前去深圳市福田区社会福利中心为孤残儿童献。 嘟嘟牛人们准备了108套御寒衣物及几袋零食来到福田区社会福利中心，上午到达时，福利院的孩子们正在参加电视台录制的节目，为了欢迎献团队的到来，福利院的工作人员特意精心布置了节目会场，舞台上是附近校区献的小朋友们在认真表演着为孤残小朋友准备的节目，台下福利院的小朋友们都目不转睛的看着小哥哥小姐姐们的演出，显得非常专注和开心。
节目表演完后，孩子们就开始了友好欢乐的的互动，嘟嘟牛人们去了孩子们平时学习与生活的地方，感受着他们生活的点滴，教室的桌椅崭新整齐，寝室窗明几亮、床铺干净整洁，活动天地贴满的图画及照片体现了孩子们丰富的娱乐生活。社会各界人士的关心，温暖着孩子们的心，看到学习墙上他们天真无邪的，让嘟嘟牛人们无比的感动及欣慰，希望他们永远心如暖阳，无惧寒冬，期望更多人士的关心和关怀浇灌着他们茁壮成长。 台上台下的孩子们真诚的交谊、心与心的交融
嘟嘟牛人们整理着孩子们的御寒衣物 孩子们天真无邪的 活动结束后嘟嘟牛人们福利院内的集体合影

description.hltext_display: Lindsay Lohan ‘out of control’
description.author: editor@ahlanlive.com ( Ahlan! Live Staff Writer
description.content:
Why rehab worker was fired because of LiLo
Lindsay Lohan caught drinking in rehab
picture: WENN.com
Lindsay Lohan has been caught drinking while spending time in rehab. The troubled star who is currently receiving treatment at the Betty Ford Center is said to be “out of control” spilled a worker at the facility.
But according to the center the employee who released the information was out of line despite the reports being true. "Regrettably, one of our employees violated strict confidentiality guidelines and laws by publically identifying patients in a media interview and by disclosing a privileged document," said a rep of the center.
Lindsay is also currently being examined for a misdemeanor abuse case.

description.hltext_display: Governo libera R$ 40 milhões para pagamento...
description.content:
O décimo-terceiro salário dos servidores temporários da Secretaria da Educação será depositado nesta quarta-feira (22). São R$ 40 milhões para o pagamento de mais de 27.000 funcionários. Também recebem seus salários, inclusive o valor proporcional do décimo-terceiro, 1.303 temporários contratados nos últimos meses que não haviam sido incluídos no sistema, inclusive o valor proporcional do décimo-terceiro. .
As informações são da Agência Estadual de Notícias.
O anúncio foi feito na tarde de ontem, durante reunião entre o secretário do Controle Interno, Cícero Gonçalves de Oliveira, e a diretoria da APP- Sindicato. “Assim, o governo encerra o ano atendendo as reivindicações da categoria”, afirmou.
A presidente da APP- Sindicato, Marlei Fernandes de Carvalho, confirmou a informação de que 2.400 professores aprovados no concurso de 2007, cujo processo de contratação vem tramitando neste governo, serão nomeados já no dia 3 de janeiro.
Nova reunião com a categoria está marcada para a quinta-feira (23) para finalizar os entendimentos sobre o pagamento relativos às promoções e progressões dos servidores de carreira. “O governador Orlando Pessuti faz questão de deixar todos os assuntos devidamente encaminhados”, afirmou o secretário do Controle Interno.

description.hltext_display: 魔兽26+23负小牛四连败
description.content:
数据 组图 投篮点
搜狐体育讯 北京时间12月22日，NBA常规赛继续进行，西部的小牛客场与东部的魔术作战，这是东西部的巅峰对决，本场比赛霍华德虽然砍下了双20，但是还是没能抵挡住小牛的冲击，魔术99-105不敌小牛遭遇四连败，小牛取得了四连胜。
本场比赛，霍华德连续第三场篮板超过20个，诺维茨基职业生涯总得分超越拉里伯德，上升到历史第25。本场比赛前，诺维茨基职业生涯总得分为21781分，本场比赛结束后，诺维茨基生涯总得分达到了21798分。
四节比分（小牛在前）：27-21，22-24，27-27，29-27。
小牛：基德13分12助攻6篮板，诺维茨基17分8篮板5助攻，巴特勒20分，钱德勒16分，史蒂文森11分，特里13分。
魔术：霍华德26分13篮板，尼尔森19分6助攻，雷迪克21分，理查德森10分，特科格鲁9分8助攻，阿里纳斯2分4助攻，巴斯6分。
史蒂文森开场就命中三分球，巴特勒也射进三分球，小牛的状态非常出色，开局就10-2反客为主。理查德森中投，霍华德二次进攻，魔术稍微稳定住阵脚，没想到小牛的进攻再次升温，欠缺磨合的魔术队在进攻和防守端都不及小牛，首节比赛小牛27-21领先主场的魔术队。
次节比赛开始后，阿里纳斯带领一帮替补打出12-2的攻击高潮，迅速将比分以33-29反超。暂停后小牛不断攻击魔术内线，钱德勒连续三次进攻得分，魔术这边赶紧换上霍华德压制钱德勒，但是特里的三分球与马里昂的上篮继续打击魔术的防线，巴特勒适时的三分打击让魔术的防守顾此失彼。上半场比赛主动权完全在小牛的掌控之下，半场比赛结束的时候，小牛49-45保持4分的微弱领先优势。
巴特勒在第三节开场就命中三分球，这给了试图在下半场挽回不利局面的魔术当头一棒。魔术改变进攻策略，由年轻的尼尔森攻击基德这个点，尼尔森连得6分一度帮助魔术将分差缩小到2分，关键时刻史蒂文森三分球命中，压制住魔术的势头。尼尔森回敬一个三分球后，两队比分杀成64平。此后魔术勉强能跟上小牛的节奏，但是无法在比分上实现反超，第三节比赛结束的时候魔术72-76仍然处于落后。
末节决战阶段，双方先是让替补在场上厮杀，特里与海伍德等人的表现压倒了阿里纳斯与克拉克，小牛打出13-8的攻势后，在比分上89-80领先。双方换人后进行最后决战，没想到关键时刻特科格鲁与霍华德先后被断球，小牛连得6分扩大领先优势。尼尔森的三分球与理查德森的上篮艰难地帮助魔术将分差缩小到个位数，比赛结束前24秒魔术只落后2分。关键时刻诺维茨基与特里都两罚全中，雷迪克的三分球没能命中，魔术就此失去了逆转的机会，主场99-105不敌魔术遭遇四连败。
（搜狐体育：布谷）

description.hltext_display: A Few Tips on Hiring Employees and Freelancers
description.content:
Hiring can be hard — especially if you aren't supported by a dedicated human resources department. But for all those employers who handle their own hiring, we've just posted seven tips to help you conduct effective interviews. Here are a few of them:
Know the job. Really break down the tasks and the requisite skills and attributes. Discussing the open role with a colleague can help you craft a clearer job description and pinpoint the areas of focus for interviews. Ask behavioral questions. Probe for character traits relevant to your opening and ask for detailed responses. "Tell me"-type questions work well: "Tell me about a time you had trouble communicating with a client." "Tell me about a situation where you were in over your head." "Tell me the steps you take to ensure accuracy in your work." Shhhh. If you're talking more than a third of the time, you're talking too much. Let them tell you why they're a good fit for the position. Communicate about communication. Have an honest understanding of your communication style — are you frequently available by email or IM? Do you respond quickly to questions? Do you need someone who will report progress regularly, or who'll just show up on deadline with the work completed? Make sure you know how both you and the contractor prefer to communicate.
Whether you need a programmer, web designer, writer, artist, virtual assistant or customer service rep to boost your business in the coming year, it all comes down to making the right choice. Check out the rest of our tips, and know that your next hiring decision will be one of your smartest.
There's a lot of paperwork involved in starting up a new business, but Vcorp's experienced staff can help entrepreneurs in any U.S. state start a company, incorporate or create a partnership — quickly and inexpensively. And thanks to our recent partnership, it's more affordable for oDesk users than ever: In the month of January, oDesk employers can start a business with Vcorp's help and the company will waive its entity formation fees — a $170 value!

description.hltext_display: The Adjustable Social Natural
description.content: So what's up my friend? This past month has been rather interesting for me. My computer has been down and I have been handling with a lot of setbacks in my life but that is just part of life. What am I supposed to do, cry about it every time a little upset appears?...ok, I can do that but if I did, I wouldn't tell you would I? :)But regardless now I'm back and ready to kick ass! Today, I want to talk about something that is beyond being a pickup artist, player, pimp, and you name it...and that is the idea of being a "social natural."In ways, a social natural embraces all these things, just being a naturally cool, social guy who can pickup and having multiple women in his life and an entourage of cool guy buddies who look up to you. It can be illustrated by water; you flow in every different social environment agilely that can show up and maneuver through it.But let's break this down a little bit. Being a social natural is a method in itself, being capable of recognizing the patterns of your interaction in social environments, the things you say and do, and the feedback you get from them, and then calibrating you following response for the desired reaction you want.What am I trying to say? Well, we all know being cocky and funny are some of the numerous magical ingredients to getting the chicks into you. Let's say you are talking to a ravishing woman who was raised in the high octane life of LA, and takes that as a challenge and becomes curious about you, now your social feedback for your pattern of response in the future to an usual LA woman will be this similar cocky and funny behavior.Now try that on a conservative, small town girl type, and she gets turned off by your cocky and funny behavior, but you think to yourself if that worked for the LA chick, it must for this girl as well, right? But she is a different type of girl, so your social feedback you receive from this interaction tells you need to calibrate either by being more funny or decreasing the cocky.That's it for today. I'll definitely delve more into this in the down the road, but the lesson I want you to keep in mind in any interaction is to recognize the recurring patterns that will continue to come up in social dynamics. Talk to you later!

description.hltext_display: Flooring giant Barlinek doubles Romanian output
description.content:
Polish-based timber flooring producer is doubling the output of its Romanian factory next year.
The company acquired Romania’s largest solid wood flooring producer to set up Barlinek Romania SA in 2008 and last year produced 250,000m2 at the plant.
It is now investing in a new production line, with work due to start in the New Year, which will boost output to 500,000m2. It is expected to reach full capacity in the second quarter.
Director Marek Janke said the move was a response to growing market demand for its Romanian-made products.
“We knew that interest in solid floors was increasing and when we started production in Romania last year, the high quality of its output made an immediate impression, not only in Poland, but also abroad,” he said.
Barlinek also opened a factory in Ukraine in 2007. It’s total output is now around 9m m2 a year, mostly comprising its engineered products.
It sells in around 50 countries.

event_or_fact.property: the move was a response to growing market demand for its Romanian-made products

description.hltext_display: Midlanders are Simply Potty About Their Cats...
description.content:
/PRNewswire/ -- Cat lovers everywhere can tell you what they love most about their cats, but what about the habits that drive them potty? A survey by Your Cat magazine and HiLife Potty about ... cat food has revealed what drives Midlanders potty about their cats. It seems that their constant talking and mewing all day comes top of the agenda. Some cats in the Midlands enjoy skidding on wooden floors late at night, while others are capable of sending emails and pressing the answer phone button! And sleeping on the computer keyboard seems to be a favourite thing to do!
Despite all of this, Midlanders are truly potty about their potty cats. And some of their cats do some truly strange things. One owner reported her cat likes to sleep on her head, while another told us her cat sleeps on top of the wardrobe in a suitcase. Some cats were potty about lettuce, while others preferred Marmite on toast. Cats in the Midlands, however, mainly seem to prefer the taste of spiders and crane flies. Well there's no accounting for taste!
Above all their quirkiness, Midlanders are still potty about their cats; their loving temperament, affection and individuality seems to be the eternal attraction - so it seems that Brits and their cats seem to be bonded by a delightful touch of pottiness!
