description.hltext_display: Plácido Domingo feiert 3500. Opern-Vorstellung
description.content:
Wien (dpa) - Ein Blumenregen, eine riesige Torte und Glückwünsche an den «Weltmeister der Oper»: Startenor Plácido Domingo hat am Dienstagabend in Wien seine 3500. Opern-Vorstellung gefeiert.
Startenor Placido Domingo hatte Grund zum Feiern.
«Ich bin glücklich, stolz und dankbar, dass ich dieses Ereignis hier feiern kann», sagte der Künstler bei einem Fest im Anschluss an die letzte Vorstellung der Oper «Il Postino» im Theater an der Wien. Der 69-Jährige, der im Frühjahr eine Krebsoperation überstanden hat, kündigte an: «Ich werde wiederkommen und alle meine Pläne verwirklichen».
Zahlreiche Künstlerkollegen, Fans und Freunde feierten mit dem spanischen Musiker. «Nach meiner 700. Vorstellung, das war 'La Traviata' in New York, habe ich beschlossen, immer nach 100 Aufführungen eine Party zu feiern», erzählte Domingo. «Mittlerweile habe ich überall auf der Welt gefeiert». Mitarbeiter des Theaters an der Wien überreichten dem Sänger eine große Torte, auf der ein stilisierter Bühnenvorhang zu sehen war. In schwarzen Buchstaben stand darauf: «3500 Vorstellungen - Der Weltmeister der Oper».

description.hltext_display: 體現兩岸特色？小英：自我矮化
description.content:
〔中央社〕民主進步黨主席蔡英文今天表示，投保協議的共識文字，出現「體現兩岸特色」的文字太輕率，等於是自動放棄國際規範的保護傘，也是自我矮化。
蔡英文下午在中常會致詞表示，第6次江陳會有關投資保障協議（簡稱投保協議）不但沒有簽署，且根據21日公布的「階段性共識」看來，未來投保協議的討論，是依中國設定的的方向進行。
蔡英文表示，投保協議的共識文字，出現「體現兩岸特色」。民進黨提醒，與中國交往的最佳途徑，是「從世界走向中國」；台灣不應該輕率地在兩會共識中，接受「兩岸特色」這樣的文字，這等於是自動放棄國際規範的保護傘，也是自我矮化。
她表示，民進黨要求立法院要實質審查與中國簽署的所有協議，協議授權下的工作進行，包括ECFA（經濟合作架構協議）下的「經合會（經濟合作委員會）」、衛生醫藥合作協議下的「工作組」，未來的決議與方案都應送國會審查，以避免空白授權剝奪了政府公權力。
另外，對於八德國中校園霸凌一事，蔡英文說，這顯示會報與通報機制停擺、崩解，整個體系螺絲鬆掉。她說，除了各級首長應負責外，要先對症下藥，就是「建立校園專業輔導體系，設置專業專職的輔導教師」。

description.hltext_display: Wikileaks-Chef befürchtet Auslieferung an die USA
description.content:
dpa Wikileaks-Gründer Julian Assange will nicht mehr mit den schwedischen Behörden zusammenarbeiten. Er fürchte, dass eine Auslieferung nach Schweden nur ein erster Schritt für seine Überstellung in die USA sei, sagte Assange der „Süddeutschen Zeitung". Dort bereite man nach Angaben seiner Anwälte eine Anklage wegen Spionage vor.
Assange sagte, er halte die schwedische Untersuchung der Vergewaltigungsvorwürfe gegen ihn für fehlerhaft und politisch manipuliert. Dass Dokumente der schwedischen Justiz internationalen Zeitungen zugestellt wurden, sei der bewusste Versuch, das Recht zu beugen. Deshalb wolle er der schwedischen Staatsanwaltschaft nicht mehr helfen. Die schwedische Untersuchung der Vergewaltigungsvorwürfe sei fehlerhaft und möglicherweise politisch manipuliert. „Da ist was im Busch", sagte Assange. „Schweden ist nicht mehr das unabhängige sozialistische Land, als das es früher galt."
Assange sagte, Bradley Manning, der angeblich Dokumente an die Internetplattform Wikileaks weitergegeben hat, solle als Zeuge aufgebaut werden, damit er, Assange, wegen Verschwörung und Spionage angeklagt werden könne. Manning befinde sich derzeit unter miserablen Bedingungen in Haft, was darauf hindeute, dass man ihn für diese ihm zugedachte Rolle mürbe zu machen versuche.
Assange soll in Schweden wegen der mutmaßlichen Vergewaltigung zweier Frauen befragt werden. Er wurde international gesucht und stellte sich Anfang des Monats in Großbritannien der Polizei. Nach gut einer Woche wurde er gegen Kaution und unter strengen Auflagen auf freien Fuß gesetzt. Er weist die Vorwürfe zurück und spricht von einer Intrige.Julian Assange verweigert die Zusammenarbeit mit den schwedischen Behörden. Er fürchtet die Auslieferung an die USA und eine Anklage wegen Spionage.

description.hltext_display: Perrô analisa como positivo o amistoso e...
description.content:
Jogadores serão liberados quinta-feira a festa de Natal Foto: Fabiano Fracarolli
O técnico Rogério Perrô gostou do time do AC Paranavaí no amistoso de domingo passado contra o União Guairaçaense, em Guairaçá. O time de Paranavaí venceu de 4x1, tendo feito três gols no primeiro tempo. “Enfrentamos uma equipe forte”, por isso analisou que o teste foi proveitoso. Perrô projeta melhoria no seu time até a estreia no Paranaense, prevista para o dia 16 de janeiro no WW - o Vermelhinho recebe o Cascavel na abertura do campeonato. “Fisicamente estamos bem, mas ainda precisamos melhorar. Isso virá gradualmente”, analisou Perrô, que tem no dia 5 de janeiro um amistoso contra o Cianorte para mostrar como será o time no Paranaense de 2011.
Ele avaliou que, tecnicamente, alguns jogadores estiveram abaixo do esperado, mas que essa questão vai melhorar. “Num todo o time foi bem, sofremos um gol que ninguém teve culpa, a bola resvalou no Márcio. Lá atrás fomos firmes, fortes. Na frente, conseguimos quatro gols através de atacantes. Isso me deixou muito contente”.
Rogério Perrô anunciou que o grupo fará um coletivo, amanhã pela manhã, e depois será liberado para o Natal, com reapresentação marcada para segunda-feira.
Ontem, chegou o meia Tatico, que atuou no futebol do Mato Grosso do Sul. Esse jogador pode ser o último a ser contratado pela diretoria. Eurisvaldo Pereira Silva, o Tatico, tem 30 anos e é meia-atacante. Em 2009 foi campeão sul-mato-grossense com o Naviraiense e neste ano atuou pelo Águia Negra, de Rio Brilhante (MS).

description.hltext_display: Evaluarán el desempeño de elementos policiacos
description.author: Nancy López
description.content:
Inauguran Centro de Evaluación y Control de Confianza
Nancy López
Inauguran Centro de Evaluación y Control de Confianza
El Gobernador Jesús Aguilar Padilla y funcionarios del área de seguridad inauguraron el Centro de Estatal de Evaluación y Control de Confianza.
Fotografía: Noroeste/Enrique Serrato.
CULIACÁN.- El Centro de Estatal de Evaluación y Control de Confianza abrió sus puertas ayer para brindar a elementos policiales de Sinaloa una atención más personaliza y de igual forma para evaluar de cerca el desempeño y comportamiento de cada uno de ellos, señaló el secretario ejecutivo el Consejo Estatal de Seguridad Pública Herman Leuffer Mendoza.
"En agosto de 2008 el señor Presidente de la República sancionó en sesión del Consejo Nacional de Seguridad Pública el acuerdo por la seguridad, la justicia y la legalidad, siendo uno de sus puntos medulares formar un centro de evaluación y control de confianza, en Sinaloa cumplimos ese deber", dijo.
Leuffer Mendoza indicó que el objetivo del centro es darle a la sociedad policías más confiables y preparados, para que la seguridad deje de ser un pendiente y sea un cumplimiento.
Sinaloa es el primer estado que ha conseguido la certificación de sus programas, junto con Chihuahua y Baja California que también cuentan con centros de este tipo.
"La importancia de este centro radica en direccionar a quien darle el mando a quien dirija, porque ser policía implica salir todos los días a dar la vida y defender a quien ni si quiera se conoce, el policía debe contar con dignidad e integridad en su labor y este centro es la instancia que detecta el calibre de los principios del policía".
El Gobernador Jesús Aguilar Padilla comentó que la depuración de las policías municipales y estatales han servido para no seguir "durmiendo con el enemigo".
Señaló que sólo tres estados de la república han cumplido con el compromiso de crear centros de evaluación y que Sinaloa está en primer lugar con el cumplimiento de este programa y su operación eficiente.
Aguilar Padilla mencionó que es este el primer eslabón para crear una policía blindada y de esta forma saber quienes son aquellos que se incorporarán a realizar tareas de seguridad pública.
"Quiero reconocer a Arnoldo Berrelleza, que es el titular de este centro, porque este centro de evaluación de confianza no es sólo esta instalación física, sino es el compromiso para inducir, formar y admitir sólo aquellos servidores públicos que servirán la sociedad y que cumplen con ciertos requisitos para blindar a las policías", agregó.
PERSONAL
El Centro de Estatal de Evaluación y Control de Confianza contará con personal especializado en el área de sicología, poligrafía, química, trabajo social, atención jurídica y atención médica.
INVERSIÓN
Se invirtieron 80 millones de pesos.

description.hltext_display: 南沙工作小組會議 昆明召開
description.content:
〔中央社〕南沙群島各主權聲索國的代表，今起在中國昆明召開3天的工作小組會議，希望為南沙群島主權爭議帶來長遠的解決辦法。
中國駐菲律賓大使劉建超今天在記者會表示，工作小組會議將討論如何共同推出更具法律約束力的「南海行為準則」，確保區域的和平與穩定。
劉建超強調，中國與東南亞鄰國有足夠的智慧解決南沙群島主權爭議，不需要第3者介入。他說，第3者的介入只會使問題複雜化。
美國高層官員曾表示，南海島嶼領土爭議攸關美國利益，也願意協助東南亞國家與中國啟動多邊談判。
劉建超說，昆明的工作小組會議沒有美國官員參加。

description.hltext_display: Teenage Love Stories from the Heart
description.content: Here's a true piece in the pages of teenage love stories that you would definitely love.I first met Lucy as a young teen, we were in the same class at school but we weren't the best of friends. We used to say hi when we passed each other in the halls, but other than that we were complete strangers. She had her friends and I had mine. But over time, we shared a lot of stuff and by the time we were teenagers in their fifteens we were best friends. She had an older brother, but he was always busy or out when I would go to her place. So it wasn't until I was nearly sixteen that I met my Willi, and wrote my love in one of the best teenage love stories ever. My friends who had seen him told me he was very good looking, and almost all the teen girls who had seen him wanted their own teenage love stories with him! He was the sort of guy that was into games, always playing one outdoor game or the other, and always talking about it. I was really interested to know who this teenager was, maybe because I used to come over to Lucinda's place so often, and yet I wouldn't see him. So one night we decided to have a party in Lucie's house. It was one of those fun get-togethers that we used to have back in our teenage days. We were having a lot of fun and when I got a bit hungry by one in the night I went to the kitchen to grab something to eat, reclining on a pole was the hottest looking guy I'd ever seen in shorts and a baggy nightshirt, eating Ben & Jerry's ice cream straight from the tub. He smiled at me and held out his hand. Gosh, there was there start of of one of the best romantic teenage love stories in my life!When I took it I thought we were going to shake, but instead he went all English gentleman and placed a gentle peck on the back of my pal. I went bright red. I was lost for words and I never ever assumed that I would meet the hero of the teenage love story of my life in my bum pal's kitchen in the middle of the night. He pulled up a chair for me and we got talking. I'm really into sports too and we hit it off immediately. He told me about himself, and how he got into sports, and I told him about how Lucinda and I got to know each other better and became best friends. But what made me blush red was when he told me that he wanted to know who I was. His sister had spoken quite a bit about me. Apparently, he had heard that I was a cute girl who is really sweet and friendly. He told me that he was damn sure about the 'cute' part, but he would love to get to know more about me over time to be really sure about the friendly and the sweet part! I was on cloud nine!I started hanging out in Lucie's place more often, and I also got more chances to see Will too. I used to chat with Will all the time, but whenever we saw each other, even though we flirted and sometimes we would go on flirting for hours and hours, nothing ever happened. But I really never stopped hoping. One night, at a party in Lucie's place, I knocked on his door while he was playing games in his room. He welcomed me in, and his room was just like any dude's room would be, posters and numbered jerseys all over. We sat down, and he asked me if I was interested in playing games on his Xbox. I was overjoyed with the prospect of spending time alone with him. We played for a while and Lucie dropped by. She winked and me and asked me what I was doing with her brother instead of spending time with the girls on a girls night out. We laughed a bit, and I reluctantly told William that I had to go. He smiled, and dragged myself out of his room. But at the same time, he gently clasped my hand and asked me to come back again. I just smiled at him, but boy, I was melting like chocolate for this guy. I just told him he was very sweet.Lucie held my hand firmly and we walked up to the girls together, and ended up playing games and laughing throughout the time. We were up for a long time and it was way past midnight by the time we decided to call it a night. Half the girls were already asleep and Lucie and I were the only ones who were up. Finally, her head started bobbing and she fell asleep, and I just lay there thinking about what to do next. I decided to follow my heart and I tiptoed to Will's room. I thought I'd just knock once and if I don't get any response after a gentle knock, I'd go back to the girls and fall asleep. I just knocked softly on his door, and surprisingly, he opened the door in a flash. He invited me in and said that he was hoping I'd drop by. I was so happy to hear that. We spoke the whole night and by morning, we knew we liked each other and were in the middle of a teenage love story . He told me he really liked me a lot and wanted to be with me, and I just couldn't hold back. We started seeing each other, but it sometimes became awkward with Lucinda being his sister and him being two years older. Those two years don't seem much now, but when you're sixteen and have an eighteen year old boyfriend it seems much more. He took me to his May Ball, his school's last formal event before Will cleared his schooling. I had a great time there and we had some teenage romantic moments too.We stayed together through the summer, and we had loads of fun doing just about anything over the summer. William, Lucie and I spend a lot of time together, but she always used to poke fun at us or tease us. Lucie thought it was extremely funny that her brother and I started going out, though I really don't see what's so funny! But the good times didn't stay forever and we had to part ways. He was travelling around the world with his friends for a year and that was too fragile for our relationship. And just before I started my next year, we broke up. We'd been going out for just under a year and the both of us decided to end the relationship, because of him going round the world, and it would be hard with so much distance between us.I started my next levels, and Will came back and went to University after a year. We didn't bump into each other much, only on a rare bump in at Lucie's house. But instead of things being awkward between us, I felt the same longing for him I had when I first met him and realized I still had feelings for him. William and I would talk, and meet each other once in a while, but there was nothing more between us. When we had just started our final year in school, Lucinda came into school and handed me an envelope, irritated about being her brother's messenger. I opened the letter hesitantly, and what I read made my heart flutter. He said that he was truly in love with me and missed me a lot. I was so overcome with emotions that tears started streaming down my cheeks. Lucie was shocked and though that Will had written something bad in the note and wanted to know what it said. When I told Lucinda and my friends, who had gathered around me, they were really happy for me and wanted me to start going out with him again.I was really happy to know that he wanted to get back with me. I had always wanted to get back with him, but I just didn't know how, because we had broken up over a simple reason like being apart for a year. Perhaps I was just feeling really stupid for breaking it off last year, but now that I was sure he too had the same feelings, I was ecstatic with joy!It's been five years since we've been together again now, and I'm pursuing my college. He's always been there as a friend and a lover, and his warm shoulder has always been my pillar of strength when I can't move on.I was a little teenager in love with a boy, but over time even the distance and the break up didn't really keep our teenage love apart. We've had our fights and our make-ups, and everything else in between. But as with any happy love story, we've had a lot more happy and wonderful moments and we've taken this young teenagers love story and turned it into a perfect page in the book of romantic teenage love stories. I truly must say that I love William and I am so happy in love and it is such bliss to be a page in this wonderful manuscript of romantic teenage love stories.

description.hltext_display: Em férias, Danilo e Rafael participarão...
description.content:
Danilo e Rafael, ontem na Redação do Diário do Noroeste Foto: Ediglei Feitosa
Danilo e Rafael Avelar (são primos) estão “curtindo” as férias em Paranavaí. Na próxima sexta-feira, eles participam do amistoso “frutos da terra” a ser realizado no Harmonia, a partir das 17h. Este jogo vai envolver atletas revelados em Paranavaí e que atuam em clubes brasileiros e no exterior.
Danilo tem 21 anos e atua no Karpaty, da Ucrânia. O lateral-esquerdo atuou em 37 das 38 partidas de sua equipe no Campeonato Ucraniano e Liga Europa. O retorno de Danilo para Lviv, na Ucrânia, será no dia 15 de janeiro. Ele considera muito forte o futebol daquela região, diferente do futebol brasileiro. O jogador tem contrato com o Karpaty por mais três anos, mas espera se transferir logo para outro país.
Rafael é atacante, tem 27 anos e há seis atua na Europa. Ele começou pela Itália, jogando futsal e em 2008 migrou para o futebol de campo. Neste ano, esteve atuando em Toledo (Espanha) e em 2011 estará defendendo o Palestrina (Roma).
O amistoso de futebol suíço, na sexta-feira, deverá contar com participação do zagueiro Miranda e o lateral Diogo (atletas do São Paulo), Wilton Batata (ex-ACP e que hoje atua no Malmo, na Suécia), Fábio (ex-ACP) e amigos dos atletas.
Apoiam o evento o DJ Xina, Visoarte Painéis, Instaladora Capel, Inviolável, Freeway e Refrigerantes Garoto.

description.hltext_display: Uninsured drivers all shook up by ELVIS
description.content:
Warwickshire Police is using powerful vehicle management software to keep uninsured and unlicensed drivers off the road.
The Easy Link Vehicle Information System for Vehicle Recovery (ELVIS–VR) is helping Warwickshire deal quickly with scores of seized and damaged vehicles. The force handles thousands of vehicle recoveries every year and previously used a paper-based system for recording details.
ELVIS-VR speeds up communications between the agencies involved by reducing the need for paperwork, saving both time and money.
The system notifies removal agents automatically and records all information about a vehicle's removal and the nature of its disposal, providing police with a central database of valuable intelligence. It improves information sharing between the police and garages and reduces the need for emails and faxes.
“The system will assist us in better managing the recovery and seizure of vehicles, ” said Chief Inspector Tim Bailey, head of the Operations Task Force in Warwickshire Police. “It will increase the efficiency of the Warwickshire Police Vehicle Recovery Scheme (VRS), which manages the recovery of approximately 6,000 vehicles a year, many from road traffic collisions, or used on the road without insurance or in an anti-social way.

description.hltext_display: Medienzensur in Ungarn – Luxemburg alarmiert EU
description.content:
dpa
Die EU-Kommission muss nach Aussagen von Luxemburgs Außenminister Jean Asselborn sofort gegen die Pläne der ungarischen Regierung vorgehen, die Kontrolle über die Medien zu verstärken. „Die Pläne verstoßen klar gegen den Geist und die Worte der EU-Verträge", sagte Asselborn.
Halte die rechtsnationale ungarische Regierung an den Plänen fest, stelle sich die Frage, ob das Land „würdig" sei, am 1. Januar die halbjährliche EU-Ratspräsidentschaft zu übernehmen. Dann würden elementare Werte der EU diskreditiert. Wenn Ungarn mit diesem Gesetz den EU-Ratsvorsitz übernehme, müsse man wirklich von Doppelstandards der Europäer sprechen. Denn die Europäische Union sehe sich bisher zu Recht als weltweite Speerspitze im Kampf für Meinungs- und Pressefreiheit.
Ungarns Parlament hat ein Mediengesetz verabschiedet, das der von der rechtsnationalen Regierungspartei Fidesz kontrollierten neuen Medienbehörde NMHH künftig neben der Aufsicht der staatlichen Medien auch die Kontrolle über die privaten Fernseh- und Radiosender sowie Zeitungen und Internetportale erteilt. Kritiker fürchten eine massive Einschränkung der Medienfreiheit, zumal die NMHH-Präsidentin für neun Jahre von Ministerpräsident Viktor Orban ernannt worden war.
Asselborn sieht darin einen Bruch der Werte der Europäischen Union und wählte drastische Worte: „Dies ist eine direkte Gefahr für die Demokratie. Hier wird die Meinungsbildung unter die Kontrolle des Staates gestellt." Etwas Schlimmeres könne es in einer Demokratie nicht geben.
Ausdrücklich warf Asselborn der ungarischen Führung autoritäre Tendenzen vor: „Bisher galt der (der weißrussische Präsident) Lukaschenko als der letzte Diktator in Europa. Wenn das Gesetz in Kraft tritt, stimmt das nicht mehr ganz", sagte er.
Luxemburgs Außenminister wies zudem einen Vergleich mit dem missglückten Versuch der EU-Staaten zurück, Österreich im Jahr 2000 wegen der damaligen Regierungsbeteiligung des Rechtspopulisten Jörg Haider auszugrenzen. „Im Vergleich zu den ungarischen Plänen war Haider ein Messdiener." Der Österreicher habe nie versucht, die Medien unter staatliche Kontrolle zu stellen. „Diesmal kann auch niemand behaupten, ein Eingreifen der EU sei eine Einmischung in innere Angelegenheiten: Das geplante Gesetz verstößt gegen die festgeschriebenen Werte von 500 Millionen Europäern." Es dürfe nicht in Kraft treten.Drastische Worte aus Luxemburg: Außenminister Asselborn wähnt Ungarn auf dem Weg in die Diktatur – und fordert harte Sanktionen der Europäischen Kommission.

description.hltext_display: 禅师狠批湖人表现太糟糕
description.content:
搜狐体育讯 北京时间12月22日消息，在今天进行的NBA常规赛中，卫冕冠军湖人主场79-98负于雄鹿。，不仅终结了5连胜的势头，而且79分的得分创下了湖人本赛季最低纪录。在比赛最后时刻，郁闷的科比也因对裁判发泄被驱逐出场。赛后双方对本场比赛发表了看法：
在刚刚结束一次漫长的客场之旅、而且和热火的圣诞大战即将来临之际，湖人很清楚缺兵少将的雄鹿很可能会成为一个给他们设下的陷阱，然而湖人最终还是落入了陷阱输掉了比赛。“我告诉他们，我认为他们的表现糟糕无比，”湖人主教练杰克逊说。“这就是我们担心的方面。下半场我们遭遇了重挫，就再也没能恢复过来。”
虽然只有9名球员能够上场，但雄鹿不仅打出了漂亮的防守，而且本赛季第3次投篮命中率超过50%。“我们在攻防两端的表现都很好，所以我不想单独赞扬某个方面，”雄鹿主教练斯凯尔斯说。“下半场我们打出了今年最好的防守，将湖人这样的对手命中率限制到33%，让他们最后一节只得到13分，这是一个艰难的任务。”
本场比赛出战28分钟，只得到2分的费舍尔说，“我认为我们没有打出我们需要打出的风格，我想如果对手不一样的话，比赛会有不同的结局，但是我不能这么说。”
比赛最后2分07秒，科比因为抱怨裁判判罚被连吹两次技术犯规驱逐出场，赛后科比也拒绝接受记者的采访。“我们输的一点也不冤，”拿下12分10个篮板的奥多姆说。“很显然我们必须朝前看，但是我觉得这场比赛我们本应该拿下。”
雄鹿此役获胜的头号功臣博伊金斯表示：“湖人通常总是在第四节打出进攻高潮，我们只是想要尽可能的保持领先。如果你能带着信心努力打球，你就能做到任何事情。”斯凯尔斯也称赞说，“博伊金斯很久以前就学会把自己的身高劣势变成自己的优势，今晚没有厄尔的话，我们不可能赢得比赛。”（搜狐体育 Wella）

description.hltext_display: Resolução fará eliminação gradativa da queima...
description.content:
CURITIBA (AEN) - O secretário do Meio Ambiente e Recursos Hídricos, Jorge Augusto Callado Afonso - juntamente com o presidente da Associação de Produtores de Bioenergia do Estado do Paraná (Alcopar), Miguel Rubens Tranin, assinou a resolução n° 076/2010-SEMA que prevê a eliminação gradativa da despalha da cana-de-açúcar através da queima controlada em todo o Paraná.
De acordo com a nova resolução, os plantadores de cana-de-açúcar - que utilizam a queima controlada como método para a despalha - serão obrigados a eliminar a prática, nas áreas mecanizáveis nos seguintes prazos e percentuais:
até 31 de dezembro de 2015 deverá ser eliminada a queima da cana em 20% do total da área mecanizável do plantio;
até 31 de dezembro de 2020, a queima da cana deverá ser eliminada em 60% do total da área mecanizável;
e até 31 de dezembro de 2025, os produtores terão que eliminar 100% da queima em área mecanizável do plantio da cana de açúcar.
O secretário do Meio Ambiente, Jorge Augusto Callado Afonso, disse que a medida se deve à preocupação com o aumento da poluição atmosférica, causada pela despalha da cana-de-açúcar, através da queima.
“Esta atividade reflete sobre a sociedade, a economia e o meio ambiente. Por isso vimos à necessidade de uma estratégia para controlar e reduzir de forma gradativa e equilibrada a emissão de gases provenientes da queima, preservando e recuperando a qualidade do ar nas regiões onde ocorre o plantio”, declara o secretário.
Segundo ele, os prazos podem ser mais curtos, desde que haja evolução da tecnologia e de outras formas de inclusão social dos trabalhadores que atuam na atividade.
São consideradas áreas mecanizáveis plantações em áreas acima de 150 hectares, com declividade igual ou inferior a 12%, além de solos com estruturas que permitam a adoção de técnicas usuais de mecanização da atividade de corte da cana.
Já nas áreas não mecanizáveis - plantações em áreas de até 150 hectares - a utilização da queima controlada deverá ser eliminada até 31 de dezembro de 2030, desde que haja tecnologia viável.
CONTROLE - Os plantadores de cana deverão apresentar ao Instituto Ambiental do Paraná - 30 dias antes do início da safra - uma planilha contendo o total dos imóveis rurais com áreas cultivadas, o percentual de áreas mecanizáveis e o percentual de áreas não mecanizáveis.
A medida servirá para controle dos percentuais relativos as datas de eliminação da queima controlada.
Além disso, a resolução prevê que os plantadores de cana-de-açúcar terão que respeitar as Áreas de Preservação Permanente e os percentuais mínimos em áreas de Reserva Legal, dentro dos limites e confrontações de cada imóvel rural das áreas mecanizáveis ou não.
O não cumprimento da resolução poderá resultar em sanções penais e administrativas previstas na legislação federal, estadual e municipal.

description.hltext_display: 北市有線電視收費 明年不變
description.content:
〔中央社〕台北市政府今天核定，明（100）年度台北市有線電視基本頻道收視費用，每戶每月收費上限維持新台幣515元；另外，低收入戶享收費優惠，每戶每月最高不得超過515元的1/4。
為審議明年度費率，北市有線廣播電視系統費率審議委員會自9月起共召開4次會議，邀請各有線電視系統業者及消費者、產業等團體代表列席表達意見。
北市觀光傳播局表示，為督促業者提供更便利、快速、精準的服務，費率委員會同時決議，各業者明年度應確實配合執行5項重點措施，實際執行成效也將納入未來費率審議評估範圍。
重點措施包括：加強回饋地方與社會服務，強化業者在地經營特質及數位化推廣，相關經費不得少於「視訊收入」的1%，其中數位化推廣經費至少佔1/10；各業者數位機上盒鋪設率99年度未達10%，須提升至12%以上，已達10%者應提升至15%以上。
審議委員會要求業者：全面提供24小時線上專人服務；加速清整附掛纜線；強化網路訊號穩定度，減少斷訊對收視戶的影響。

description.hltext_display: Northerners are Simply Potty About Their Cats...
description.content:
/PRNewswire/ -- Cat lovers everywhere can tell you what they love most about their cats, but what about the habits that drive them potty? A survey by Your Cat magazine and HiLife Potty about ... cat food has revealed what drives Northerners potty about their cats. It seems that the early feline wake-up call comes top of the agenda, followed by their cats' need for attention. Cats in the North just love to stay close to their owners, even it means attending to the more mundane chores, such as the washing up, or maybe sharing the more personal moments, such as watching them have a bath!
Despite all of this, Northerners are truly potty about their potty cats. And some cats do truly strange things. One owner reported her cat sleeps on her oven gloves, while another said her cat sleeps in her handbag. Some cats were potty about baked bean juice, while others preferred naan bread or chips. Well, there's no accounting for taste!
Above all their quirkiness, however, Northerners are still potty about their cats; their loving temperament, affection and individuality seems to be the eternal attraction - so it seems that Brits and their cats seem to be bonded by a delightful touch of pottiness!

description.hltext_display: Demandan rescate de El Patagüe
description.author: Claudia Beltrán
description.content:
A diputados del Congreso del Estado demandaron apoyos los pescadores.
Fotografía: Noroeste/Alejandro Escobar.
CULIACÁN.- Aprobar recursos para rescatar el poderío que representó la granja acuícola El Patagüe, pidieron pescadores a los diputados del Congreso del Estado.
Luis Osmán Fernández Ramírez, presidente de la Sociedad de Cooperativas de Producción Pesquera Ejidal El Patagüe, mencionó que quieren reactivar esta actividad.
Mencionó que están demandando a los legisladores de esta 60 legislatura recursos para enfrentar una deuda que vienen arrastrando desde hace varios años.
En estos momentos, prosiguió, enfrentan una deuda de 280 millones de pesos.
Entrevistado en el salón de sesiones del Poder Legislativo, Fernández Ramírez recordó que esta granja ubicada en Eldorado, nació en septiembre de 1986.
Los problemas sanitarios que se estuvieron registrando terminó afectando la producción de camarón, actividad con la que salían adelante los pescadores.
"Nosotros venimos pidiendo el apoyo de los diputados, ya que las anteriores legislaturas y gobiernos tuvieron ojos cerrados a este problema de la cooperativa El Patagüe".
La cooperativa 'El Patagüe' sigue siendo noble, por el impacto social que generó en Eldorado, expresó.
Si cayeron en cartera vencida, no es porque no hayan querido pagar, aseguró.
En ese año, indicó, hubo un problema de sanidad acuícola que les bajó la producción, por ello, no pudieron cumplir con los compromisos.
El Patagüe fue la segunda granja en esa zona, pero en importancia, la más grande.
Demandan fideicomiso
Junto con los pescadores, en el Congreso del Estado también estuvieron productores del sector social, demandando recursos para un fideicomiso.
Este fideicomiso serviría para la compra de semillas y fertilizantes, insumos que los agricultores comprarían más baratos, abundó Rangel Espinoza López, dirigente agrícola.

description.hltext_display: 醫衛協議 藥商：縮短臨床時程
description.content:
〔中央社〕對「江陳會」簽署「兩岸醫藥衛生合作協議」，太景生物科技董事長兼執行長許明珠表示，可避免兩岸重複臨床試驗，有利於開發亞洲流行疾病新藥的藥商。
太景生技今天舉行記者會，許明珠特別看好「兩岸醫藥衛生協議」簽署後，可大幅縮短臨床試驗時程、節省成本所帶來的新藥商機。太景的新藥可望提早 5年，領先在台灣、大陸上市。
她說，江陳會簽署上述協議，要求新藥開發須以最嚴格標準進行，但大陸認可台灣已完成臨床試驗結果，兼顧安全與速度。中國是成長最快速的醫藥市場，太景早在2005年在當地設立子公司，並進行1.1類新藥、屬於非進口藥的1至3期臨床試驗。
另外，太景研發新藥奈諾沙星，可治療抗藥性黃金葡萄球菌，甚至糖尿病傷口發炎都能治療，並完成第 2期臨床試驗，再授權國際知名藥廠Warner Chilcott在歐美進行第3期臨床試驗，預計耗時2年，並在上述地區取得上市核可後，進行製造與銷售。
不過，奈諾沙星在台灣、中國大陸的 3期臨床試驗仍由太景進行，預計於2012年底在台灣與中國申請上市許可。

description.hltext_display: CAIXA INAUGURA AGÊNCIA EM HOMENAGEM AOS...
description.content:
A Caixa Econômica Federal inaugura hoje uma nova agência em Maringá (PR), nas imediações da ACEMA, entidade representativa da comunidade nipo-brasileira local. A unidade leva o nome Kakogawa em referência à avenida onde está localizada e também à cidade japonesa co-irmã de Maringá. As instalações ficam na Avenida Kakogawa, 35, no Parque das Grevíleas. O início do atendimento ao público será 28/12/2010.
Em razão da forte presença da colônia japonesa na região, a agência é dotada de sinalização bilíngüe, com identificação de setores e serviços em português e japonês.
O edifício foi especialmente projetado para abrigar a nova agência da Caixa com características orientais. Na entrada foi instalado um pórtico inspirado no Torii - portal típico do Japão - cujo significado, entre outros, é “o portal dos pássaros”. Na fachada há uma ampla área de vidro, executada no sistema spyderglass (reduz a quantidade de encaixes), onde foram aplicados elementos da estamparia oriental, os bambus e libélulas - símbolo de felicidade, boas-vindas e sucesso, para saudar os clientes e passantes.
A nova unidade atende aos critérios de Sustentabilidade e Eficiência Energética, com sistema de aproveitamento da água das chuvas e a otimização da iluminação natural entre outros. A unidade possui o novo modelo de sinalização interna da Caixa e está adequada ao padrão de atendimento privativo nos guichês de caixa. O novo modelo de sinalização interna das agências está alinhado a um dos desafios estratégicos da instituição, que é ser referência em atendimento, valorizando a acessibilidade, satisfação e comodidade dos usuários.
A agência apresenta novo padrão visual e funcional, para facilitar o direcionamento e movimentação dos usuários. Reformulada dentro de uma política ambientalmente correta e de acessibilidade, a agência contará com piso tátil, para pessoas com deficiência visual, e assentos reservados e sinalizados para atendimento preferencial a pessoas com necessidades especiais, como idosos, gestantes e pessoas com crianças de colo.
REDE CAIXA
A rede CAIXA hoje é composta por 2.104 agências (dessas 419 unidades com Penhor), 528 postos de atendimento bancário, 1.444 postos de atendimento eletrônico, 21.692 correspondentes não lotéricos (desses 5.325 com equipamentos CAIXA AQUI e 16.847 somente negociais), 10.657 casas lotéricas, 22.113 pontos de autoatendimento em 2.622 salas contíguas às agências e mais 436 equipamentos em 126 salas de autoatendimento não contíguas, além da rede do Banco 24 horas com 10.145 equipamentos, à qual a CAIXA também é associada, e a rede externa de caixas automáticos compartilhada com o Banco do Brasil (acrescentando mais 6.125 terminais daquele Banco).

description.hltext_display: 英国発行『ジョン・レノン没後30周年記念コイン』12月22日（水）より国内予約販売開始
description.content:
泰星コイン株式会社（本社：東京／社長：岡 政博）は、12月22日（水）より、2010年『ジョン・レノン没後30周年記念コイン』5ポンド白銅貨の国内予約販売を開始いたします。この記念貨は、ジョン・レノンの肖像と彼が愛用したギターの絃の一部が描かれ、英国で1,100年以上の歴史を有する英国王立造幣局により鋳造されます。
■全世界からの人気投票で1位を獲得
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
今年初め、英国王立造幣局は「Your Great Briton（偉大な英国人）」という人気投票を行い、投票1位に選らばれた人物を記念貨として発行するという企画を実施しました。2010年7月には、英国の歴史上有名な人物6名に候補が絞られました。さらに最終候補者の中から1名を選ぶ投票が行われ、応募総数30,267票のうち、27,874票と、全体の92%の票を集めたのがジョン・レノンだったのです。奇しくも2010年は彼がファンを名乗る男の凶弾に倒れてから30年を迎えた年であり、彼の功績を称えた記念貨が発行されることとなりました。
■記念銀貨は発行後わずか1週間で完売
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾

description.hltext_display: Migranten sind karriereorientierter als angenommen
description.content:
dpa Migranten in Deutschland sind einer Studie der Bertelsmann-Stiftung zufolge besser integriert als gedacht. Sie seien beispielsweise deutlich karriereorientierter als gemein angenommen, berichtete die „Frankfurter Rundschau" unter Berufung auf die Untersuchung der Bertelsmann-Stiftung. Neun von zehn Befragten mit Migrationshintergrund wollen demnach beruflich weiterkommen. Bei den Befragten ohne Migrationshintergrund seien lediglich 45 Prozent so sehr auf ihre berufliche Entwicklung bedacht.
74 Prozent der Befragten mit ausländischen Wurzeln lehnen der Studie zufolge die Vorstellung von der Frau am Herd ab. Auch 70 Prozent der Bürger aus muslimisch geprägten Ländern stimmten diesem Frauenbild nicht zu. Sie sind damit nicht konservativer als die Deutschen. Laut Bertelsmann-Stiftung ist auch bei der Aufteilung der Arbeit im Haushalt die Emanzipation bei den Migranten weiter: 41 Prozent der Männer mit Migrationshintergrund sehen Putzen, Kochen und Kindererziehung als gemeinsame Aufgabe von Paaren an. Bei den Befragten ohne Migrationshintergrund betrachten das nur 35 Prozent der Männer so.Migranten sind laut einer Studie besser integriert als gedacht. Neun von zehn Befragten mit Migrationshintergrund wollen beruflich weiterkommen.

description.hltext_display: 印尼愛滋病患者逾9萬人
description.content:
〔中央社〕印尼民間醫療組織千禧發展機構，在西爪哇茂物縣（Bogor）芝斯恩（Ciseeng）一間孤兒院指出，截至2010年年底，印尼全國愛滋病患者在9萬3000人至13萬人之間。
同時根據印尼衛生部的統計資料顯示，自1980年至2009年9月，各縣市地區的愛滋病患者平均達1萬8442人，感染愛滋病的男性是女性的3倍。
為了顯示克服愛滋病蔓延的決心，千禧發展機構將把預防愛滋病的資訊宣傳給社會各階層人士，同時千禧發展機構還有另一個使命，就是關心和消滅印尼兒童貧窮的問題。
千禧發展機構並在孟塔維群島（Mentawai）、中爪哇日惹縣（Yogyakarta）梅拉比火山（Merapi ）爆發災區，對災民傳達預防愛滋病的資訊，並且對兒童和孕婦注射預防針。

description.hltext_display: Aadhaar Number Enough To Open Bank Account
description.content:
(RTTNews) - The Planning Commission said in a statement on Tuesday that the finance ministry has recognized Aadhaar number issued by the Unique Identification Authority of India (UIDAI) as an "officially valid document" to satisfy the Know Your Customer (KYC) norms for opening bank accounts.
"This notification is expected to promote the financial inclusion of the poor and the hitherto excluded by making it possible for them to easily establish their identity and open bank accounts," it said.
The UIDAI is facilitating opening of bank accounts for residents at the time of enrollment for Aadhaar through partner banks and acceptance of Aadhaar as a valid KYC document will make the process seamless.
For comments and feedback: contact editorial@rttnews.com

description.hltext_display: Villefranche-de-Lauragais. Défaite des handballeurs
description.content:
Au fil de la rencontre, moins tranchant devant le but gantois, les locaux se faisaient distancer par les Béarnais (6-12). L'ailier Martin réduisait le score (7-12) avant la mi-temps après avoir repiqué vers le centre de la cage pour s'ouvrir un angle de tir plongeant plus favorable. Face à un adversaire puissant mais un peu lent, les villefranchois gardaient toute leur chance. Après une bonne série d'arrêts de Loïc Gaëtan et 5 buts enchaînés par le bondissant Adrien Marquié, les espoirs lauragais redevenaient palpables au véléda du tableau d'affichage (12-17). Mais avec toujours trop d'approximation sur les balles de relance et des tirs trop souvent hors cadre (ou poteau sortant), le HBCV laissait le FR Gan creuser son avance au score.
Malgré les deux derniers buts inscrits par la famille Bicard, avec le père Dominique puis le fiston Sylvain à la conclusion, les lauragais laissaient la victoire prendre la direction des Pyrénées Atlantiques (18-27). L'aventure de la coupe de France s'achève sur une défaite amère et porteuse de regrets. Car comment ne pas croire qu'avec plus d'assiduité dans sa préparation, l'équipe villefranchoise aurait sans hésitation bousculé et inquiété davantage son vis-à-vis.
1. Remplir correctement les cases ci-dessous. 2. Validez le mail de confirmation envoyé dans votre boite mail. Depuis le 10 décembre, Dalila Y. est au chômage, licenciée par l'Union Locale de la CGT à Blagnac. Une situation inhabituelle pour la Confédération... L'année se termine par une victoire 16 à 9 contre L'Isle en Dodon. Ceux-ci étaient venus pour gagner à l'extérieur et il s'en fut de peu que leur...

description.hltext_display: New Rapport Information For Building A Potent Cornerstone
description.content: So you have discovered an individual who's just perfect for you and need to be sure you do not mess it up. Just the fact that you are in search of tips at this early stage is really an excellent signal. For a brand new relationship, advice on building a solid foundation can have a main affect in your potential like a couple.Be your selfThis is probably the oldest advice in the guide, but there is a cause for that. Think about it this way: do you really want waste months or many years of time and power pretending to be somebody you are not? Even though your partner thinks the planet of you, in actuality, they don't even know who you're. So go forward and show your accurate colors appropriate from your outset.Take it sluggishOne of the fastest methods to destroy a budding relationship would be to leap into bed also quickly or live like you're connected in the hip. Go sluggish with physical affection, starting with basic hand holding and building up from there. Regardless of how crazy you're about every other, attempt to not spend each and every waking minute collectively. Now after which go out with another friends or just by yourself. It helps you protect your own sense of identity and keeps you from wearing each other out.Remain friendsEventually, friendship will be the foundation of any happy, long-term partnership. Romance and passion are good, but friendship is what keeps youtogether. Regrettably, when we get employed to a person, there's a tendency to get the other individual for granted or give yourself permission to nit choose their behavior. Don't fall into that trap. Even whenever you disagree, you are your spouse the same respect you'd exhibit every other shut friend. Bear in mind, in a new romantic relationship, advice on staying friends can aid keep the passion alive, as well.Discover to deal with conflictWhilst it may well not be rather comfortable, conflict isn't only unavoidable, it is also an chance for growth. When you deal with distinctions and disagreements inside a wholesome way, you actually gain from your expertise. Following all, it could just be that your companion genuinely does have a much better way of performing some thing.The trick is not to let irritations construct up. If some thing your companion does critically bothers, provide it up kindness and gentleness. If might be easier to resolve than you anticipate. In any situation, attempting to disregard an issue whilst letting resentment brew is really a recipe for catastrophe. That is why, for a new relationship, sound guidance on resolving conflicts can be a large support.Learn what tends to make relationships performIf you are hoping to uncover your accurate enjoy some day, you've possibly previously read several of those interviews with couples who've been married 50 years or much more. Examine far more of those and while you're at it, examine anything you may discover around the secrets and techniques of effective long-term relationships. Certain, no two relationships are the exact same, however the ones that final do have specific things in popular. Understanding what these are provides your relationship a far better likelihood of staying the program.Generating lasting appreciate final isn't constantly straightforward, but starting off the appropriate way helps you construct the strong foundation a long-term dedication depends upon. When you've just entered a new partnership, guidance on what to complete next can seriously assist you set off around the appropriate foot.

description.hltext_display: 科比21分骂裁判遭驱逐 惨淡湖人令飞侠情绪失控
description.content:
技术统计 投篮点 直播实录
搜狐体育讯 北京时间12月22日消息，湖人队主场迎战雄鹿队，眼看主场失利，科比有些情绪失控，在终场前2分3秒，科比突破被吹进攻犯规，科比指着裁判情绪激动不依不饶，结果裁判直接将科比驱逐出场。科比全场16投9中，其中三分球2投0中，贡献21分，3个篮板和2次助攻。
在与费城76人的比赛中，科比不慎拉伤右手小指，这也影响了他的投篮。在与猛龙的比赛中，尽管受到伤病的困扰，但科比仍打出了高效的发挥，最终砍下20分，职业生涯总得分超过火箭传奇巨星奥拉朱旺，成为为单独一支球队效力时期总得分排第三的球员。今天主场迎战雄鹿队，科比与萨尔蒙斯的对位也值得关注。过去两次对位萨尔蒙斯，科比总共在他头上轰下73分，而萨尔蒙斯只拿下12分。
由于伤病的困扰，科比在今天比赛前3分多钟的时间内并没有参与球队的进攻，直到首节比赛进行到8分45秒，科比接到奥多姆的妙传后跳投命中拿下本场比赛个人头2分。几个回合之后，奥多姆在三分线外将球传给篮下科比，飞侠高高跃起空中接力暴扣得手，30秒后，科比一次干拔跳投得手，本场比赛他前3次出手全中。但紧接着科比出现失误，而在两次出手不中后，主教练禅师将其换下场，湖人正式进入阵容轮换时间。
次节，由于替补球员发挥出色，科比得到了充足的休息时间，本节还有6分28秒，科比换下布雷克登场。重新上场的科比攻击欲望依旧不强，但面对萨尔蒙斯，科比仍是打得十分自信，用身体挡住萨尔蒙斯，一个小勾手命中拿下2分，帮助湖人将比分反超。不过湖人此时打得十分放松，雄鹿趁机再次取得领先优势，关键时刻，科比持球强攻，一挑三强攻造对手犯规罚中2分，这次造成博古特个人第三次犯规下场休息。尽管科比打得十分努力，不断为队友创造更多的得分机会，但无奈队友不在状态，辜负了他一片苦心。
易地再战，由于球队落后，科比在本节一开始就更多的选择突破，在科比的激励下，身边的队友也逐渐找到手感，本节还有5分21秒，科比转身上篮命中，湖人以1分优势反超。1分45秒，科比被布朗换下后，萨尔蒙斯在场上掀起进攻高潮，湖人再次陷入被动。
末节，看到队友们毫无斗志，科比十分恼怒，赛场上再次上演单打独斗时刻，飞侠一人独挑雄鹿五将。科比在博古特身上打三分得手，但此时湖人仍落后雄鹿13分之多。终场前2分7秒，科比持球强攻，但被吹罚了进攻犯规，科比情绪失控怒吼裁判，后果可想而知，裁判连续给科比两个技术犯规，飞侠直接被罚出场。湖人也失去了翻盘希望。
（搜狐体育：晨晨）

description.hltext_display: UConn women's basketball alone at the top as winning streak reaches NCAA-record ...
China Jan-Nov land supply hits record high - paper
description.content:
BEIJING, Dec 22 (Reuters) - China's land supply for property hit a record high of 128,200 hectares in the first 11 months of the year, up 47.8 percent from a year earlier, the China Land and Resources Daily reported on Wednesday.
That included 13,400 hectares of land to build affordable housing, said the paper, run by the Ministry of Land and Resources.
Beijing plans to build 10 million units of affordable housing, designed to meet demand from middle- and low- income households, next year, up from a target of 5.8 million this year.
Vice Minister Yun Xiaosu told a televised meeting on Monday that the property sector should be treated as an 'important and basic' sector, rather than a 'pillar' sector for the economy.'
That was the first official downgrade of the property industry. Officials announced it as a pillar industry in 2003, but the soaring home prices since then, particularly in recent years, have intensified debate on the role of the sector in economic growth.
The Ministry of Land and Resources said on Monday that it had told local authorities to step up efforts to curb excessive land price rises, which have been contributing to soaring home prices.
The newspaper also said land supply for residential property construction rose 50.6 percent in the first 11 months to 95,600 hectares.
(Reporting by Langi Chiang and Kevin Yao; Editing by Chris Lewis)
((yan.jiang@thomsonreuters.com; +8610 6627 1207; Reuters Messaging: yan.jiang.reuters.com@reuters.net)) Keywords: CHINA PROPERTY/LAND
(If you have a query or comment on this story, send an email to news.feedback.asia@thomsonreuters.com)
COPYRIGHT

description.hltext_display: Correios renova patrocínio do futsal
description.content:
Os Correios assinaram na sexta-feira (17), a renovação do contrato de patrocínio à Confederação Brasileira de Futsal (CBFS). O valor do patrocínio, para o período 2010/2011, é de R$ 9.373.000,00.
Desde 2004 os Correios são o Patrocinador Oficial do Futsal do Brasil. Nesse período, a empresa destinou R$ 47,373 milhões para a CBFS, sendo a principal responsável pelo crescimento do futsal brasileiro. O investimento dos Correios na modalidade, além de estimular as conquistas em campeonatos nacionais e internacionais, ainda possibilita ações de relacionamento e de responsabilidade social, como a criação de escolinhas para a inclusão de 500 crianças em situação de risco.
Como Patrocinador Oficial do Futsal do Brasil, os Correios deram novo impulso ao esporte coletivo mais praticado no País - são cerca de 11 milhões de praticantes estudantis e profissionais - e recordista de títulos internacionais (62 títulos). A CBFS é a confederação com maior número de atletas registrados: 370 mil jogadores federados.
No futsal, o Brasil foi campeão seis vezes em nove campeonatos mundiais disputados. Além disso, o Brasil tem a melhor seleção do mundo e conta com a presença dos ídolos Falcão, eleito o melhor jogador do mundo (FIFA - 2004 e 2008) e Tiago, melhor goleiro do mundo (FIFA 2008).
A ECT também é patrocinadora oficial da Confederação Brasileira de Tênis (CBT) e da Confederação Brasileira de Desportos Aquáticos (CBDA). Desde 2000 os Correios investiram R$ 139 milhões em patrocínio esportivo. Atualmente, a ECT investe por ano cerca de R$ 24 milhões no segmento.

〔中央社〕行政院主計處今天公布11月失業率數據，隨著景氣好轉、就業機會增加，11月失業率為4.73%，較10月降0.19個百分點，較去年11月下降1.13個百分點。
主計處表示，11月就業人數為1060.5萬人，較10月續增4.5萬人，較去年11月增加23.6萬人。失業人數為52.7萬人，較10月減少1.9萬人，與去年11月比較，減少11.8萬人。
此外，經季節調整後，11月失業率為4.79%，較10月下降0.17個百分點，已連續15個月下降。

description.hltext_display: Aumenta el consumo de drogas en jóvenes
description.author: Nancy López
description.content:
Inauguran Alcalde y el Gobernador Museo Interactivo sobre Adicciones
Nancy López
Inauguran Alcalde y el Gobernador Museo Interactivo sobre Adicciones
En el Modular Inés Arredondo se tratarán temas relacionados con las adicciones a las drogas, alcohol, tabaco y de la ludopatía.
Fotografía: Noroeste/Luis Brito.
CULIACÁN.- El índice de jóvenes que ingresan al consumo de drogas se ha incrementado en un 30 por ciento, informó el Alcalde Carlos David Ibarra Félix al inaugurar junto con el Gobernador Jesús Aguilar Padilla, el Museo Interactivo sobre las Adicciones.
Comentó que a como crece la incidencia en las drogas se ve también un aumento en los delitos cometidos por los jóvenes de entre 15 y 22 años.
"Es una tristeza que el 50 por ciento de los delitos del fuero común lo cometan jóvenes entre 15 y 22 años, tenemos que trabajar con una nueva generación, una sociedad más justa, más equitativa pero también más culta", manifestó el Presidente Municipal.
El Alcalde señaló que en el museo se tratarán temas relacionados con las adicciones a las drogas, alcohol, tabaco y de la ludopatía, del mal uso de los medios electrónicos y de enfermedades degenerativas alimenticias como la anorexia y la bulimia.
Prevenir las adicciones es la principal tarea para la formación de una sociedad creada con base en valores, comunicación y cultura, aseveró.
Mencionó que en el museo se podrá experimentar cómo se viven las drogas sin tener un contacto real con ellas, con la finalidad de que los jóvenes estén conscientes de lo que se pueden enfrentar.
Hace más de dos años, indicó, se propusieron la creación del MIA que es único en México y América Latina.
Jesús Aguilar Padilla, Gobernador del estado, invitó a las familias y jóvenes para que visiten el MIA.
"Quiero hacer hincapié en el MIA y en lo que es el Museo Interactivo de las Adicciones, que es un espacio para prevenir adicciones en nuestros jóvenes, sin duda lo más valioso de nuestra ciudad capital son nuestros jóvenes, los adolescentes de 14 a 18 años que tenemos que cuidar y custodiar para que no salgan con prácticas nocivas como son las adicciones", expresó.
El Mandatario exhortó a los padres de familia a que asuman la responsabilidad que les corresponde con sus hijos, porque la tarea de prevención no es sólo del museo y de las autoridades.
INVERSIÓN
120 millones de pesos se invierten en el Museo Interactivo sobre las Adicciones.
INSTALACIONES
Mil 505 metros cuadrados de infraestructura:

description.hltext_display: Lideranças destacam a importância do hipermercado...
description.content:
No local da obra já começou o serviço de terraplanagem e demolição Foto: Fabiano Fracarolli
Foi lançado ontem pela manhã o hipermercado Super Muffato de Paranavaí. Autoridades e lideranças aproveitaram o momento para destacar a importância regional do empreendimento. Trata-se do maior volume de recursos a ser investido em um só projeto na história da cidade, lembra o prefeito Rogério Lorenzetti. O prefeito aposta que a loja Super Muffato será uma referência para a região Noroeste do Estado. Ele parabenizou a visão diferenciada do grupo, que viu no local das futuras instalações, uma oportunidade de negócio.
“Onde alguns veem apenas um terreno baldio, o empreendedor vê uma obra. Assim o Éderson (Muffato) e sua equipe chegam a Paranavaí”. O prefeito também falou do empenho das autoridades, incluindo a Câmara de Vereadores, para viabilizar o projeto.
O deputado estadual Antonio Teruo Kato deu as boas-vindas ao Super Muffato, avaliando que foi uma grande conquista, pois trata-se de empresa que valoriza os seus profissionais e vai contribuir para o desenvolvimento regional. Teruo também destacou a preocupação ambiental do grupo.
O presidente em exercício da Câmara de Vereadores, José Galvão igualmente destacou o empreendimento em Paranavaí. Aponta que a vinda do hipermercado é um fato importante, pois mostra a força da cidade. Justifica que o empreendedor só investe onde vê potencial. “Nossa região vai ganhar muito”, analisou.
Uma referência nacional - O presidente eleito da Câmara, Nivaldo Mazzin falou da importância do Super Muffato. Lembrou que se trata de uma referência nacional do varejo e que vai investir o que há de melhor para a cidade. Mazzin aproveitou para lamentar que “pessimistas” daqui preferem não ver o que pessoas de outros centros veem, ou seja, o bom momento de Paranavaí.
O presidente da Aciap (Associação Comercial e Empresarial de Paranavaí), Guto Costa, colocou a estrutura da entidade para apoiar o Super Muffato nesta fase de implantação. Para ele, a vinda do hipermercado é a realização de um sonho e um marco na história da cidade. Costa falou do empenho das autoridades e lideranças na concretização do empreendimento. A loja paranavaiense será na Avenida Distrito Federal, esquina com a Rua Amazonas.
F/300
Prefeito Rogério Lorenzetti destacou a visão empreendedora do grupo
Foto: Fabiano Fracarolli
f/301
Guto Costa disse que a Aciap dará suporte aos empreendedores
Foto: Fabiano Fracarolli
SUPER MUFFATO
Uma empresa paranaense e que
investe no Paraná, destaca diretor
Uma empresa paranaense e que investe no Paraná. A definição é do diretor do Hipermercado Super Muffato, Éderson Muffato, feita ontem no lançamento do projeto paranavaiense. Ao contrário de outras redes, que enviam ao exterior os seus resultados, o Super Muffato aposta no crescimento do Estado e se consolida entre as maiores corporações varejistas do Brasil, apontou.
Ele informa que serão gerados 250 empregos diretos e outros 100 indiretos. Os funcionários são preferencialmente da cidade e treinados pela empresa. Nela, têm oportunidade de crescer e construir carreira, antecipa. O recrutamento e seleção deve acontecer através da Agência do Trabalhador, a partir do mês de janeiro de 2011. A loja deve ser inaugurada no meio do ano.
O presidente falou com entusiasmo das parcerias e promete trabalhar desta forma com Paranavaí e região. Uma dessas parcerias é com o produtor rural. No começo de 2011 deve ter início um trabalho junto aos produtores de hortifrutigranjeiros. O diretor antecipa que vai buscar aliados, visando o treinamento desses profissionais para que possam produzir seguindo padrões de qualidade, tratos culturais e de apresentação dos gêneros. A intenção é manter fornecedores exclusivos.
Acompanhado do diretor do grupo Renan Silva, o empreendedor Éderson Muffato falou um pouco da história da rede, iniciada em 1974. Depois de 36 anos de caminhada são 28 hipermercados, três atacados e um centro de distribuição. Presente em dez cidades do Paraná e Presidente Prudente (interior de São Paulo), a empresa tem 500 parceiros na linha de produtos e serviços, bem como 7.500 funcionários.
Esse tamanho confere ao Super Muffato a condição de uma das maiores geradoras de empregos do Paraná, além do título de primeira corporação varejista do Estado e uma das dez maiores do Brasil. Preocupações ambientais são constantes na rede.
Preocupações ambientais - Tanto que, de acordo com o empreendedor, a unidade paranavaiense utilizará práticas sustentáveis como sistema de ar condicionado que não prejudica a camada de ozônio, estação de reciclagem para coleta seletiva de lixo e aproveitamento da luz natural, entre outros.
O Super Muffato se destaca no Paraná nos setores de eletro, bazar e alimentação. Tem em seu interior uma série de parceiros que apresentam serviços que variam de perfumaria a laboratórios de análises clínicas. Enfim, um hipermercado de nova geração, como resume o empreendedor.

description.hltext_display: Haushälter wollen Guttenberg zum Sparen zwingen
description.content:
CSU
dpa Die Haushaltspolitiker von Union und FDP pochen darauf, dass Verteidigungsminister Karl-Theodor zu Guttenberg (CSU) die ihm auferlegten Sparvorgaben erfüllt. Er dürfe die geplante Bundeswehrreform nicht als Vorwand missbrauchen, um das vom Kabinett beschlossene Sparpaket im Gesamtvolumen von 80 Milliarden Euro auszuhebeln, sagten die Chef-Haushälter der Koalitionsfraktionen, Norbert Barthle (CDU) und Otto Fricke (FDP), der „Süddeutschen Zeitung". „Der beschlossene Finanzplan gilt – auch für den Verteidigungsminister", betonte Fricke.
Nach diesem Plan muss Guttenberg bis 2014 insgesamt 8,3 Milliarden Euro zur Haushaltssanierung beitragen. Kanzlerin Angela Merkel (CDU) soll dem Bericht zufolge dem Minister jedoch zugesagt haben, dass er wegen der Anlaufkosten der Bundeswehrreform nur die Hälfte der Summe aufbringen muss. Der Rest solle auf die übrigen Ministerien aufgeteilt werden. Guttenberg will die Truppe in eine Berufsarmee umwandeln und die Zahl der Soldaten von derzeit 240.000 auf bis zu 185.000 reduzieren.
Barthle äußerte Verständnis dafür, dass die Reform zunächst Geld kosten werde. Wenn dem so sei, müsse der Minister jedoch an anderer Stelle sparen, etwa bei Rüstungsvorhaben. Fricke erklärte: „Der Finanzplan ist das Maß aller Dinge, insbesondere auch mit Blick auf die neu in der Verfassung verankerte Schuldenbremse." Der FDP- Politiker betonte: „Da kann ein Minister nicht einfach nach Lust und Laune ausscheren." Wo Guttenberg spare, sei dessen Angelegenheit, da wolle er sich als Haushälter nicht einmischen.
Der SPD-Haushaltsexperte Carsten Schneider warf Guttenberg vor, sich bei der Etatsanierung „vom Acker" zu machen. Die Debatte zeige, dass alle Sparzusagen des Ministers von Beginn an reines Wunschdenken gewesen seien. Guttenberg müsse jetzt umgehend ein Konzept für eine Verringerung der Rüstungsausgaben vorlegen. „Da werden genügend Dinge bestellt, einfach nur, weil das Geld da ist", sagte Schneider.Widerstand gegen Guttenberg: Die Koalitionsfraktionen beharren auf Sparkurs für die Bundeswehr. Der Verteidigungsminister könne nicht nach Lust und Laune ausscheren.

description.content:
フィリピン・セブ島で過ごす、超ご機嫌な格安海外留学体験！
それぞれが目指すステージで、多様な生徒を育んでいくために、さまざまな環境を構築している広域通信制の代々木高校（よよこ〜）では、海外留学にも積極的に環境づくりを行ってます。
英会話のスキルアップはもちろんのこと、今までのしがらみから解放され、リセットされた環境で過ごす生活は、また新たな自分に出会えますよ。新鮮な気持ちで海外から日本を眺めてみませんか。
「代々木高校 セブ島留学コース」(フィリピン)なら、一年間(10ヶ月間)の寮生活（3食付き）を通して、毎週月曜から金曜まで1日7時間のレッスンがあり、しかもプライベートレッスンが中心なのでみっちりと英会話のトレーニングが行えて、それでなんと総予算130万円です。
しかも寮と言ってもプールも完備の超快適な住環境で、さらに日本人スタッフが常勤しているので安心です。
「代々木高校 セブ島留学コース」の仕組みは、国内にいる2ヶ月間のうち数日間(履修によって異なる)の集中スクーリングを受けることにより、日本の高校卒業資格を取得できるようになっています。
また、セブ・サテライト教室では、オプションにより日本では体験できないさまざまなアクティビティーにチャレンジすることができる上、マングローブの再生や、いろいろなNGO活動に参加することもでき、一生忘れることのできない素晴らしい体験をすることも可能です。それにより一回りも二回りも大きくなっていくことでしょう。近年大学入試において中心となりつつあるAO入試においても、さまざまなNGO体験活動は面接官の心にも響いていくはずです。
セブ島留学コースは、アジアの高級リゾート地でもあるセブ島の治安の良さと、講師は有名大学卒の方が中心でホスピタリティー精神あふれる親身な指導、しかも、プライベートレッスンが半分以上を占めており、グループレッスンも1クラスの生徒数が4～6名と、英語の実力を上げるにはこれ以上ない環境が揃っています。
「代々木高校 セブ島留学コース」を運営するのは、現地のセブPhilinter（フィリンター）高等学院ですが、サポートをビサヤ大学付属英語学校日本代表事務所、語学学校Philinter、CIP、AELC日本代表事務所を運営する株式会社イージーグループが行いますので、日本での相談も受けられて安心です。
お問い合わせは
代々木高校
渋谷区千駄ヶ谷５－８－２
050-3535-2797
info@yoyogi.ed.jp
セブPhilinter高等学院 日本事務局(イージーグループ)

description.hltext_display: The Unexplained Mystery Into Get a Guy Back Uncovered
description.content: It might be that things went awry: you were less than honest with your man, or there was a quarrel; perhaps things even went so far that you were unfaithful. Regardless of the previous circumstances it is imperative that you put your pride in its place in order to learn how to get a guy back. Making a man feel small and insignificant to the point where he believes that you don't really care about his thoughts and feelings is probably one of the worst things you can do to him. Make sure that you believe him to be special, worthy of winning back, and take this seriously or you could end up breaking his heart again. Possibly the biggest problem when it comes to relationships is that there are so many people who don't take them seriously or care about whether or not they hurt the ones they're supposed to love. If you've ever wondered whether you may have lost someone truly special, this article will give you some tips on how to get a guy back. Below are somet tips you can try out How to get a guy back: The first step is sincerely, genuinely apologize for your actions or behavior. When considering how to get a guy back, remember that he has feelings and needs to know that you are sincere about reconciling and that you are genuinely apologetic for your actions. Part of the process will also be to forgive any of his misdeeds, then learn to put them in the past. You need to make sure that you are doing the right thing in getting back with him. Forget what has happened in the past and look towards your future together. An additional tip regarding how to get a guy back is to expect a bit of rejection. If this is worthy it to you, then this is something that you are going to have to be willing to do, but this may not be the easiest thing to do because we all have our pride. Men are often not as willing to show their own emotions as women. As such, they may not rush back into your arms immediately.

description.hltext_display: 明年智慧手機產值年增51%
description.content:
〔中央社〕根據資訊工業策進會產業情報研究所 (MIC)預估，明年台灣通訊產業產值將達新台幣1兆7237億元，年增32%，其中，智慧型手機產值年增率更達到51%。
MIC表示，包括微型基地台 (Femtocell)、網路攝影機(IP Camera)、電力線 (PLC)、智慧電視盒(SmartTV Box)、Wi-Di、WiMO及Bluetooth 4.0等，為未來值得持續關注的產品及技術。
MIC認為，明年行動寬頻用戶將成長4成，達10.4億戶，其中以HSPA及中國的TD-SCDMA成長最快速，WiMAX(全球互通微波存取)在新興國家持續建置下仍將維持成長力道，預估2011年用戶數將達到1800萬戶。
MIC預估，明年將有49家營運商開通長期演進技術(LTE)商用網路，主要的4個頻段包括700MHz至800MHz(百萬赫茲)、1.9GHz(10億赫茲)、2.3GHz及2.6GHz，已累積WiMAX能量的台廠也將積極卡位。
此外，明年也是行動物聯網起飛的一年，行動電話搭載物聯網技術的NFC(近場通訊)晶片滲透率將超過7成，搭配社群網站及地圖導航應用，將促使LBS (行動定位服務)、社群、Payment(付費)等三合一應用逐漸興起。

description.hltext_display: 科比被逐拒采访
description.content:
技术统计 投篮点 直播实录
搜狐体育讯 驻洛杉矶记者高原12月21日报道 湖人带着五连胜的势头结束了漫长的客场之旅。周二回到斯坦普斯中心迎战从波特兰赶来的雄鹿。
周一雄鹿在波特兰被开拓者狂胜26分，再加上雄鹿最近缺兵短将，外界赛前一致认为湖人将在主场取得六连胜。然而结果却令人大跌眼镜，雄鹿在湖人主场赢了19分，这也是本赛季目前为止湖人输的最惨痛的一场比赛。
赛后菲尔.杰克逊倒显得比较平静，他提到湖人在连续的客场之后回到主场，体力受到了不少的影响。“很多人认为客场之旅是对体力的最大考验，这话不全对，”杰克逊说，“在一个很长的客场之旅之后，回到主场的第一场比赛才是对体力最大的考验。因为你一直在外面，回到家会有很多事让你分心。”
不过面对背靠背第二天的雄鹿，体力显然不能成为惨败的借口。杰克逊说：“是我们的防守让他们的进攻如此顺畅，但同时我要对他们的防守脱帽致敬，另外，厄尔（博伊金斯）给我们造成了很大的麻烦。我们的两个控卫（费舍尔与布雷克）在速度上跟不住他。”
赛后湖人的更衣室里气氛沉闷，没人大声说话，似乎所有人还沉浸在主场惨败给弱旅19分的情绪中。
“我们自己投入的精力出了问题，”加索尔说，“我们在思想上就放松了。NBA里，任何一支球队，任何一个球员，都有能力在某个晚上打出出色的水准。我只能说他们打了一场比我们要出色很多的比赛。”
科比在第四节因为不满裁判的判罚，大骂出口，其中说了“F”打头的词，且一再争执，得到两个技术犯规离场。赛后科比的座位围了一圈记者，等了大约20分钟，公关过来跟大家说，“对不起，他已经离开球场了，不再回来。”大家虽然失望没有采访到科比，但是还是理解他的心情。

description.hltext_display: JuLi-Chef ermahnt Westerwelle zu Selbstkritik
description.content:
dpa Der Chef der Jungen Liberalen, Lasse Becker, hat den angeschlagenen FDP-Vorsitzenden aufgefordert, beim Dreikönigstreffen in Stuttgart „selbstkritisch den einen oder anderen Fehler zu benennen". In den „Stuttgarter Nachrichten" vermied Becker indessen ein klares Bekenntnis zu Westerwelle als Parteichef über die Landtagswahlen hinaus: „Von den Wahlergebnissen hängt viel ab. Und beim Bundesparteitag wird analysiert: Wer hat welchen Fehler gemacht, und wie baue ich ein zukunftsfähiges Team."
Auf Distanz ging Becker zu dem Modell, Partei-Vize Rainer Brüderle als Übergangsvorsitzenden zu installieren. Die Jungen Liberalen stünden „Interimslösungen so oder so sehr skeptisch" gegenüber. „Dauerhaft tragfähige Lösungen – egal in welcher Teamkonstellation – erscheinen mir wesentlich sinnvoller."
Programmatisch sprach sich Becker für einen Kurswechsel aus. „Jedenfalls wird man nicht dadurch glaubwürdig, dass man zum 200. Mal eine Steuersenkung ankündigt." Der JuLi-Chef forderte eindeutige Schwerpunkte bei der Haushaltskonsolidierung, bei der Ablehnung der Vorratsdatenspeicherung, beim zukunftsfesten Umbau der Sozialsysteme und beim Thema nachhaltige, ökologische Marktwirtschaft. solle selbstkritisch Fehler benennen, fordert JuLi-Chef Becker. Auf Distanz ging der FDP-Nachwuchs zu Brüderle.

description.hltext_display: 年代綜合台遭撤照 NCC首例
description.content:
〔中央社〕年代綜合台因節目廣告化情節嚴重，國家通訊傳播委員會（NCC）今天決議撤照，這也是NCC成立4年以來，第1個遭撤照的頻道。年代表示遺憾，並說，將循法律途徑解決。
NCC發言人陳正倉指出，年代綜合台在民國93年2月27日取得衛星廣播供應業執照，99年2月26日屆滿6年。98年11月年代綜合台向NCC申請換照時，NCC發現年代綜合台違規紀錄相對高，裁罰高達49次，金額總計新台幣1675萬元。
因此，NCC在今年2月26日有條件許可年代綜合換照，並附上「解除條件」，也就是，1年內年代綜合台如有違反17條（妨害兒少身心健康、公序良俗）或19條第1項（節目與廣告未區分）規定，以及6個月內節目首播率未達40%；任何1個條件成就時，許可執照就失去效力。
但NCC指出，99年2月26日之後，年代綜合台仍然違反節目未與廣告區分的規定，3月、6月共違規3次，已達到解除執照許可條件，因此，NCC在7月15日已通知年代綜合台「執照許可失去效力」，應立即停止節目和廣告的播送。
不過，由於年代綜合台合乎解除條件後，仍繼續播送節目與廣告，NCC委員會今天在做出撤照決議之外，再以違反衛星廣播電視法第40條遭撤銷許可，仍擅自經營的規定，裁罰年代綜合台210萬元。
陳正倉表示，NCC會儘速行文年代綜合台停止營運以及節目和廣告的播送，同時也將知會系統業者。
至於年代綜合台下架後空出的45頻道，NCC表示，原則上遞補的頻道將以同質性或相當的綜合頻道為主，最快明天找相關業者討論，尊重系統業頻道規劃，務必達到無縫接軌，維護消費者權益。
另外，前述年代綜合台在2月26日至7月15日違規3次，其中3月的2次違規已裁罰，6月20日「瘦身最前線」違反衛廣法19條第1項節目與廣告未區分，NCC今天另外罰100萬元。
NCC在2月有條件通過年代綜合台換照後，年代綜合台3月曾提出訴願，行政院不受理；10月再向高等行政法院提行政訴訟，現在審理中。
年代電視台執行董事王宜陵對NCC的做法表示遺憾，並說這是「恐怖的做法」；他同時說，至少應等到司法判確定後再做處理。

description.hltext_display: Top Reasons Forex Traders Fail
description.content:
Filed Under: Brokers, Currencies, Forex, International Markets, Money Market, Portfolio Management, Young Investors
The forex market is the largest and most accessible financial market in the world, but although there are many forex investors, there are few truly successful ones. Many traders fail for the same reasons that investors fail in other asset classes. In addition, the extreme amount of leverage provided by the market and the relatively small amounts of margin required when trading currencies deny traders the opportunity to make numerous low-risk mistakes. There are factors specific to trading currencies that can cause some traders to expect greater investment returns than the market can consistently offer or to take more risk than they would when trading in other markets. (For a complete step-by-step guide on forex trading, check out our Forex Walkthrough.)
TUTORIAL: Introduction To Currency Trading
Forex Market Trading Hazards
There are certain mistakes that can keep traders from achieving their investment goals. The following are some of the common pitfalls that can plague forex traders:
Not Maintaining Trading Discipline
The largest mistake any trader can make is to let emotions control trading decisions. Becoming a successful forex trader means achieving a few big wins while suffering many smaller losses. Experiencing many consecutive losses is difficult to handle emotionally and can test a trader’s patience and confidence. Trying to beat the market or giving in to fear and greed can lead to cutting winners short and letting losing trades run out of control. Conquering emotion is achieved by trading within a well-constructed trading plan that assists in maintaining trading discipline. (Find out how your mindset can play a larger role in your success than market influences can, read Trading Psychology And Discipline and Momentum Trading with Discipline.)
Trading Without a Plan
Whether one trades forex or any other asset class, the first step in achieving success is to create and follow a trading plan. “Failing to plan is planning to fail” is an adage that holds true for any type of trading. The successful trader works within a documented plan that includes risk management rules and specifies the expected return on investment (ROI). Adhering to a strategic trading plan can help investors evade some of the most common trading pitfalls; if you don't have a plan, you're selling yourself short in terms of what you can accomplish in the forex market. (Read 10 Steps To Building A Winning Trading Plan.)
Failing to Adapt to the Market
Before the market even opens, you should create a plan for every trade. Conducting scenario analysis and planning the moves and countermoves for every potential market situation can help significantly reduce the risk of large, unexpected losses. As the market changes, it presents new opportunities and risks. There is no panacea or foolproof “system” that can persistently prevail over the long term. The most successful traders adapt to market changes and modify their strategies to conform to them. Successful traders plan for low probability events and are rarely surprised if they occur. Through a process of education and adaptation, they stay ahead of the pack and are continuously finding new and creative ways to profit from the evolving market.
Learning Through Trial and Error
Without a doubt, the most expensive way to learn to trade the currency markets is through trial and error. Discovering the appropriate trading strategies by learning from your mistakes is not an efficient way to trade any market. Since forex is considerably different from the equity market, the probability of new traders sustaining account-crippling losses is high. The most efficient way to become a successful currency trader is to access the experience of successful traders. This can be done through a formal trading education or through a mentor relationship with someone who has a notable track record. One of the best ways to perfect your skills is to shadow a successful trader, especially when you add hours of practice on your own. (By blending good analysis with effective implementation, you can dramatically improve your profit in this market, check out Top 4 Things Successful Forex Traders Do.)
Having Unrealistic Expectations
No matter what anyone says, trading forex is not a get-rich-quick scheme. Becoming proficient enough to accumulate profits is not a sprint - it's a marathon. Success requires recurrent efforts to master the strategies involved. Swinging for the fences or trying to force the market to provide abnormal returns usually results in traders risking more capital than warranted by the potential profits. Foregoing trade discipline to gamble on unrealistic gains means abandoning risk and money management rules that are designed to prevent market remorse. (For more on controlling your trading, see Understanding Forex Risk Management.)
Poor Risk and Money Management
Traders should put as much focus on risk management as they do on developing strategy. Some naive individuals will trade without protection and abstain from using stop losses and similar tactics in fear of being stopped out too early. At any given time, successful traders know exactly how much of their investment capital is at risk and are satisfied that it is appropriate in relation to the projected benefits. As the trading account becomes larger, capital preservation becomes more important. Diversification among trading strategies and currency pairs, in concert with the appropriate position sizing, can insulate a trading account from unfixable losses. Superior traders will segment their accounts into separate risk/return tranches, where only a small portion of their account is used for high-risk trades and the balance is traded conservatively. This type of asset allocation strategy will also ensure that low-probability events and broken trades cannot devastate one’s trading account. (Currency trading offers far more flexibility than other markets, but long-term success requires discipline in money management, read Forex: Money Management Matters.)
Managing Leverage
Although these mistakes can afflict all types of traders and investors, there are issues inherent in the forex market that can significantly increase trading risks. The significant amount of financial leverage afforded forex traders presents additional risk that must be managed.
Leverage provides traders with an opportunity to enhance returns. But leverage and the commensurate financial risk is a double-edged sword that amplifies the downside as much as it adds to potential gains. The forex market allows traders to leverage their accounts as much as 400:1, which can lead to massive trading gains in some cases - and account for crippling losses in others. The market allows traders to use vast amounts of financial risk, but in many cases it is in a trader’s best interest to limit the amount of leverage used. (For more insight, read Forex Leverage: A Double-Edged Sword.)
Most professional traders use about 2:1 leverage by trading one standard lot ($100,000) for every $50,000 in their trading accounts. This coincides with one mini lot ($10,000) for every $5,000 and one micro lot ($1,000) for every $500 of account value. The amount of leverage available comes from the amount of margin that brokers require for each trade. Margin is simply a good faith deposit that you make to insulate the broker from potential losses on a trade. The bank pools the margin deposits into one tremendous margin deposit that it uses to make trades with the interbank market. Anyone that has ever had a trade go horribly wrong knows about the dreadful margin call, where brokers demand additional cash deposits; if they don't get them, they will sell the position at a loss to mitigate further losses or recoup their capital.
Many forex brokers require various amounts of margin, which translates into the following popular leverage ratios:
Maximum Leverage
The reason many forex traders fail is that they are undercapitalized in relation to the size of the trades they make. It is either greed or the prospect of controlling vast amounts of money with only a small amount of capital that coerces forex traders to take on such huge and fragile financial risk. For example at a 100:1 leverage (a rather common leverage ratio), it only takes a -1% change in price to result in a 100% loss. And every loss, even the small ones taken by being stopped out of a trade early, only exacerbates the problem by reducing the overall account balance and further increasing the leverage ratio.
Not only does leverage magnify losses, but it also increases transaction costs as a percent of account value. For example, if a trader with a mini account of $500 uses 100:1 leverage by buying five mini lots ($10,000) of a currency pair with a five-pip spread, the trader also incurs $25 in transaction costs [(1/pip x 5 pip spread) x 5 lots]. Before the trade even begins, he or she has to catch up, since the $25 in transaction costs represents 5% of the account value. The higher the leverage, the higher the transaction costs as a percentage of account value, and these costs increase as the account value drops. (For more, see How Does Leverage Affect Pip Value?)
While the forex market is expected to be less volatile in the long term than the equity market, it is obvious that the inability to withstand periodic losses and the negative effect of those periodic losses through high levels of leverage are a disaster waiting to happen. These issues are compounded by the fact that the forex market contains a significant level of macroeconomic and political risks that can create short-term pricing inefficiencies and play havoc with the value of certain currency pairs.
Conclusion
Many of the factors that cause forex traders to fail are similar to ones that plague investors in other asset classes. The simplest way to avoid some of these pitfalls is to build a relationship with other successful forex traders who can teach you the trading disciplines required by the asset class, including the risk and money management rules required to trade the forex market. Only then will you be able to plan appropriately and trade with the return expectations that keep you from taking excessive risk for the potential benefits. (Check out our Forex Walkthrough - Level 1: Forex Intro, Level 2: Markets.)
While understanding the macroeconomic, technical and fundamental analysis necessary for trading forex is as important as the requisite trading psychology, one of the largest factors that separates success from failure is a trader's ability to manage a trading account. The keys to account management include making sure to be sufficiently capitalized, using appropriate trade sizing and limiting financial risk by using smart levels of leverage.
by Robert Stammers,CFA (Contact Author | Biography)
Robert Stammers, CFA, uncovers and analyzes stock and option trading opportunities as a senior equity analyst at stock market education company BetterTrades. Previously, he was portfolio manager for a $1 billion enhanced real estate fund, a public timber fund and multiple pension fund separate accounts, while acting as a senior executive for several institutional fund managers. Mr. Stammers holds The CFA Institute's Chartered Financial Analyst designation, a Bachelor of Arts in economics from Connecticut College, and a Master of Business Administration with honors from Emory University. Visit Bettertrades.com to learn more timely strategies and tactics for creating cash flow with stocks and options.
Filed Under: Brokers, Currencies, Forex, International Markets, Money Market, Portfolio Management, Young Investors

description.hltext_display: ソフトバンクモバイル、軽量でコンパクトなスマートフォン「Libero 003Z」を12月24日発売
description.content:
- (JCN Newswire) - ソフトバンクモバイル株式会社は、軽量でコンパクトなスマートフォン「Libero(リベロ) SoftBank 003Z」(ZTE製)を、2010年12月24日(金)より全国で発売します。
なお、本製品はスマートフォンの待受画面であるホームスクリーンに、ビジネス向けのアプリケーションやウィジェットだけを表示させることができる「ビジネスホームスクリーン」および、ビジネスマンに役立つスマートフォン向けのアプリケーションやスマートフォンに関するニュースなどを紹介するサービス「仕事アプリナビ」に対応します。詳細は本日の報道発表資料「スマートフォンがより簡単・便利に活用できる！！『ビジネスホームスクリーン』『仕事アプリナビ』を提供開始」をご参照ください。
1. 主な特長
- Android(TM) 2.2を搭載し、ウェブブラウジングやアプリの利用が快適
プラットフォームにはAndroid 2.2を搭載し、当社のAndroid端末で最軽量の115gのスマートフォン。3.5インチWVGA高精細液晶でウェブブラウジングやアプリケーションをストレスなく快適に利用可能です。また、パソコンでよく利用するGmail(TM)などのGoogle(TM)サービスとの連携がスムーズです。さらに、Android マーケット(TM)やGoogle マップ(TM)など多彩なGoogleサービスも快適に利用できます。
- 日本語・英語・中国語の3カ国語に対応したスマートフォン
海外で便利な日本語・英語・中国語の3カ国語に対応したスマートフォン。メニューやブラウザなどの文字表示だけでなく、検索やメールなどの入力も3カ国語に対応しているのでグローバルなコミュニュケーションが可能です。
2.主な対応サービス・機能・アプリケーション
S!メール(MMS)
SMS
Eメール(POP3／IMAP4)
世界対応ケータイ
3Gハイスピード 7.2Mbps
GPS
Bluetooth(R)
ミュージックプレイヤー
YouTube(TM)
3. 主な仕様
通信方式：
- 国内 W-CDMA方式
- 海外 W-CDMA方式、GSM方式(900／1,800／1,900MHz)
サイズ(幅×高さ×厚さ)／重さ：約57×114×12.5mm(突起部除く)／約115g
連続通話時間／待受時間：
- W-CDMA網 約390分／約420時間(静止状態)※
- GSM網 約370分／約310時間(静止状態)※
ディスプレー：約3.5インチWVGA(800×480ドット)TFT液晶
モバイルカメラ(画素数／タイプ)：有効画素数約500万画素／CMOS(AF対応)
外部メモリー／推奨容量：microSDHCカード(2GB同梱)／最大16GB
Wi-Fi：IEEE 802.11 b/g
Bluetooth(R)：Ver.2.1＋EDR
プラットフォーム：Android 2.2
カラーバリエーション：チタンブラック、ホワイト
[注]
※電波を正常に受信できる静止状態での平均的な利用時間です。使用環境や機能の設定状況などにより、ご利用時間が半分以下になることがあります。
4. 希望小売価格(標準セット)
オープン価格
標準セットには、本体、電池パック、ACアダプタ、Micro USBケーブル、クイックスタート、お願いとご注意、2GB microSD カード(試供品)、3.5mm マイクロフォン付きイヤホンが含まれます。
5. 発売日
チタンブラック：2010年12月24日(金)
ホワイト：2011年2月中旬以降
* 世界対応ケータイは、2010年12月22日時点で、海外のGSMネットワークにおいて、209の国と地域で音声通話、147の国と地域でインターネット接続サービスを利用できます。また、海外の3G(W-CDMA方式)ネットワークにおいて、73の国と地域で音声通話、71の国と地域でインターネット接続サービスを利用できます。
本リリースの詳細は下記URLをご参照ください。
http://www.softbankmobile.co.jp/ja/news/press/2010/20101222_02/index.html
ソフトバンクモバイル株式会社
詳細は www.softbankmobile.co.jp をご覧ください。
Source: ソフトバンクモバイル株式会社
